story:
For us, a Smart Thermostat should not be just a thermostat that detects your presence or your absence from home and switches the heating system ON and OFF accordingly,

nor just a thermostat that can be switched ON and OFF remotely through your Smart Phone !

________________________________________________________

 

What is the SmarTHERM?

As mentioned above, the SMARTHERM is an intelligent Heating and A/C Control system for the home.  What makes it special is that, like large commercial or industrial Heating and A/C Control systems, it is computer-based.  This specificity allows the system to have many features and capabilities not otherwise possible with conventional dedicated thermostat devices.

The system is full-featured and absolutely unique!

Indeed, in addition to being based on a computer infrastructure, the system is also founded on Artificial Intelligence (AI).  The system benefits from this technology in achieving the maximum level of energy savings and comfort possible from any heating system.  This is possible because thanks to this technology, the system is designed to learn and adapt to any house configuration (size, surroundings, spatial orientation, heating system power, etc.) and any weather conditions (outside temp, wind chill, sunshine strength, etc.).

The main component of the SmarTherm that makes it possible for it to learn and adapt, apart from of its software and its knowledge database, is its integrated outdoor Weather Station.  This Weather Station gathers all the outdoor sensors (temperature, wind, sunshine strength) and collects all the on-site meteorological data required for the system's decision process.

                                                     

Furthermore, the SmarTherm system is also equipped with a PC card that interacts from one hand with the Weather Station to continuously read the data from all the sensors and on the other hand interacts with the Heating System, a Heat Pump or the A/C system to turn any of these systems ON or OFF based on the circumstances analyzed by the SmarTherm software.

________________________________________________________________

For us, a Smart Thermostat should be able to determine the most economical degree to lower the temp at night or during the day when there is nobody home!

For us a Smart Thermostat should above all be able to determine at what time it must restart the heating system to make sure the set temp is reached when you wake up or when you return home!

________________________________________________________________

 

Key Features

 

  • thanks to its 'SMART COMFORT' system and also to its control of the temperature to hundreds of degrees, keeps the temperature constant (minimum swing) when the house is occupied and this, no matter the outdoors weather conditions;
  • thanks to its 'SMART SetBack' system, optimizes the degree at which the interior temperature can be set back at night or during the day when the house is empty, and this without affecting the comfort of the occupants at wake up time or at return home time and also without consuming any kilowatt of energy needlessly (determines the most economical setback temp);
  • thanks to its 'SRAS (Smart Restart After a STOP)' system, optimizes the time at which the heating system must turn ON after a programmed stop or a programmed temperature 'setback' so the indoor temperature can be reached at the exact desired wake up or return home time (NOT BEFORE, NOT AFTER!);
  • thanks to its on-site integrated Weather Station, the system adapts instantaneously to temperature, wind and sunshine strength variations to which the house is submitted at any time of the day and the night;
  • great flexibility of programming (unlimited) and settings compared to conventional programmable thermostats,
  • displays a lot of statistics regarding the weather data, the heating system performance, the heating costs, the savings, etc.
  • heating costs savings of 15% to 30% depending on the living habits of the occupants;
  • pays for itself within 1 year or 2;

 

For more details about the above features and many more infos,
go to our website:  http://www.sylver-tech.com/products.html

 

The Short Story

The SmarTHERM system has existed for more than 25 years now. The reason for its creation is that its founder built a large house in Quebec (Canada) in the early nineties. The house was equipped with a 25 KW/hr central electric heating system (furnace).  The winters being rather cold at north of the 49th parallel, the first electricity bills were very high (about $4500/yr, (60,000 KW/yr)).  So, being a long time software engineer, the founder believed at the time that a computer-based heating control system would do a better job to dramatically reduce the heating costs and increase the level of comfort of the occupants than any existing programmable thermostat.  So, an old TRS-80 Model I was brought to the rescue and this is how the SmarTHERM system came alive at the beginning.

At first, the system was very basic and the hardware interface was built on a small hard-wired "breadboard". But rapidly, the system evolved and was ported to an IBM PC-XT infrastructure, then an AT-286 infrastructure, a 386, a 486, and so on... By the same time, the system migrated from a DOS environment to a Windows 98, a Windows XP, and a Win 7 environment.  At a certain point, the breadboard was replaced by an ISA Printed Circuit Board (PCB), and more lately a PCI compliant PC Card.

The system is now fully functional and has proved its point
with energy savings of about 35% !

Over the years and through its constant improvements, the system proved its robustness and its efficacy. Currently, the energy consumption of the above house has dropped to about 37,000 KW/yr and a heating cost of about $3200/yr despite the increased rates of energy over the years.

Often, visitors who had the chance to see the system in action ask us why we do not sell the system on the market.  During many years, we refused to bring to the market a product which was not perfect enough with regard to what we wanted it to accomplish.  But since a couple of years, the system has reached a level of completeness and robustness that brought us to envisage this possibility and we made some moves in that direction lately.  This campaign is a turning point towards that direction to bring the SmarTHERM system to the market.

 

Our Goal 

The goal of our campaign is to bring to the market our flagship project in which we invested thousands and thousands of hours in research and development over the last 25 years. At this time of its life cycle, the product has successfully passed all the preliminary phases of development and is market ready.

For now, our more specific goal is to manufacture a limited quantity of our SmarTHERM product, test them, sell them, receive feedback and comments about the product from our committed subscribers, make modifications where appropriate and launch a more widespread campaign in a second phase after this phase will have proven the robustness of the product in different house configurations.

It is very important for us to reach our campaign funding target because our campaign budget is based on the manufacturing of a number of units that will allow us to acquire parts, components, devices, etc. or to negotiate services at discounted volume prices and consequently, meet the unit cost on which our perks are based on.

What happens if we do not reach our Campaign goal?

We will make all possible efforts to make our campaign successful and we hope it will be, but if we don't reach our campaign funding target, we are prepared to fulfill our obligations even though this will mean we will probably have to ship some of our perks at loss. Even with a reduced number of units sold, we think we will be able to reach most of the goals aimed by this campaign at this stage.

 

Risks and Challenges

As mentioned earlier, the SmarTHERM system has existed for more than 25 years and over time has successfully passed all the development phases of a project (concept, design, alpha, beta, prototype and fully functional system). At this time, the technological risks and challenges facing the SmarTHERM project are very limited.  

The project is not a vague conceptual idea to be developed and realized.
It is a fully functional product!

The system is made up of 3 main components:  the Software, a PC Card and the Weather Station.

The SOFTWARE:

The Software has completely been developed in-house and is probably the most robust and time-tested part of the system. Indeed, the software is at the heart of the system and as previously mentioned, the system has been in used for more than 25 years now. So, over the years, thousands and thousands of hours in development has been devoted to this part of the system including a lot of improvements, tuning, testing, etc. . As most software products, we know that there will always be improvements to come in future versions but taking into account its development state, there is absolutely no risks attached to this part of the system.

N.B. You can check by yourself the SmarTHERM software performance by downloading a fully functional DEMO at the following address:
http://sylver-tech.com/download.html

The PC Card:

At the beginning, this part of the system was developed in a "lab" mode, basically founded on a "breadboard" and manually hard-wired.  But as soon as this part of the system became relatively stable in terms of completeness and functionality, a Printed Circuit Board (PCB) was developed to support this fundamental part of the system. The first version of the PCB was an ISA PC Card and was totally designed in-house. Obviously, the manufacturing of the PCB has been outsourced to a specialized manufacturer, but at that time, the assembly of the components of the board was made in-house.

A couple of years ago, given the phasing out of the ISA standard, we developed a PCI compliant PC Card.  The migration to this new and more demanding technology standard proved to be very challenging and required a lot of efforts but at the end, the SmarTHERM system now runs on this more flexible and open technology.

So, in terms of challenges, this hardware part of the system is completely functional and does not require any modification now. Moreover, in terms of risks, the manufacturing of this piece of hardware is outsourced to a specialized manufacturer, as well as the assembly of the components of the PCB which is more complex and demanding in the case of the PCI technology.  In short, the risks related to this part of the system are very limited!

The Weather Station:

As mentioned earlier, the Weather Station is an important part of the system. It gathers all the outdoors sensors (temperature, wind, sunshine strength) required for the software to take its decisions based on the real actual on-site weather conditions.

At the beginning of the project, most of the sensors of the Weather Station were entirely home-made devices. But over time, we replaced them by sensors available on the market that we have adapted to our system. These sensors are largely available on the market and so this part of the system does not constitute a risk either.

 

How you can help  (from $0 to all you can allow...)

Clearly the most helpful way to support our campaign is to commit to buy the SmarTHERM system by clicking on our 50% discount offer appearing above on the right side of this text. This way, not only you contribute directly to the coming of the SmarTHERM on the market, but you contribute also to its improvement through your comments and your well-advised inputs.

But the above implies that you are a candidate for the use of this product in your home which we know is not the case for the majority of the potential subscribers that found out this product campaign. So, if you are not a candidate for using this product, but you find the product interesting and promising, you can choose to subscribe an amount proportional to your enthusiasm by clicking on the "BACK  IT" button just above the product offer mentioned above. By doing so, you will allow our campaign to manufacture a greater number of the product and this way allow us to reduce our unit cost.

One way or the other, you can also help us by spreading the word through your social networks. This does not cost you anything and who knows, maybe you will do a favor to someone who may be interested in our product or in contributing to our campaign! If you enjoy having a large base of friends or subscribers to your social networks, you will almost surely have contributed indirectly to our campaign and we will as much thankful of your contribution as if you would have contributed directly.

Thanks for your support any way you want !!!

story:
To be a happy companion, every dog needs home and loving owner. Most dogs prefer to rest after walk or play. However, if it’s too hot or too cold in the doghouse, their rest wouldn’t be that much relaxing.

Our solution: eegloo - small, very silent doghouse air conditioner. We are convinced every dog on the planet dreams about it. More than that, such an AC will help your pet stay healthy and active, isn’t it what you dream about?

Not only our AC controls the “weather” in your dog’s home, it cools or heats based on the current outside temperature. Our AC also removes excessive moisture, fine dust, and even bacteria all-together.

 

 

 

 

As a base for our invention, we took Nikola Tesla’s disc pump and then developed unique 2-in-1 node - heat exchanger and fan unit (patent pending). It has high heat exchange effectiveness, compact size and very low noise level during its operation.

There are plenty of applications for our invention - computer cooling, individual climate zones, air conditioning systems and etc. However as big dog lovers, we decided to start with a doghouse AC.

 

 

 

The main element of the heat exchange device developed by us is a rotating multi-disk rotor. On one hand, disks rotate between the fins by which a heat source (or absorber) is equipped with. On the other hand, the multi-disk rotor is the element of the fan which is similar to Tesla’s turbine device. Unlike fan equipped with blades, disk fan can pump substantially large volumes of air and that provides excellent heating or cooling of disks which are intermediate heat carriers between the heat transfer fins of the heat source and air. The temperature of the disks which closed to pumped air, the relatively high rate of passage of disks between the fins, and the short distance between the disks and fins, together, provide enhanced heat transfer process.  

In fact, Tesla claimed that his turbine was the most efficient and the most simply designed rotary engine ever designed. Until today no one has refuted his claims!

 

 

  • Dimensions (expected), LxWxH: 35x14x17 cm
  • Power supply: 12-15 VDC, 25 A
  • Cooling / Heating zone: up to 120x120x120 cm (50 cu ft)

 

 

You can install eegloo in three easy steps:

  1. Make hole in doghouse wall
  2. Install eegloo
  3. Connect eegloo to the power source

 

 

 

Turn ON your eegloo by pushing button and set desired temperature. Period.

 

 

Q: What makes your AC unique?

A: Good question, additional to above features here are some highlights to help to answer it:

  • High efficiency of our heat exchanger allows us to reduce energy usage and expand AC operational temperature range, for example very cold or very hot weather;

  • Device monitors if pet is inside the doghouse and deactivates itself if not. OLED display indicates if pet is present;

​

 

  • It will heat up your pet in cold time and cool down in hot time;

  • Lifespan of our product is longer than average, thanks to the use of simple electronic thermoelectric elements;
  • eegloo is designed in a way it’s dust immune, which spares you time cleaning it.

​

Q: Is this good for pets?

A: We are glad you asked. Our device not only keeps optimal temperature range in the doghouse, but also removes moisture, ammonia, dust particles and even bacteria.

Q: Can I use it for cat?

A: Absolutely!!

Q: Your air conditioner looks great and promising. Is there any other use of it?

A: We wanted to create our device as versatile as possible. Besides the air conditioner for doghouses we can recommend to use eegloo for refrigeration cabinets, thermostats, any confined small rooms like tents, boat cabins, and so on. In our future plans we are going to expand thermal power of our cooling / heating systems and to find new applications for our invention.

 

 

Vera, CEO

“Rocket engine” in commercialization of business ideas. Her view is embracing problems both in whole and in details as well.

She is a student in Miami International University, studying Business Laws.

 

Aleksandr, CTO

He is able to see unusual in habitual things. “Resolve the problem is usually much easier than see it”.

He has a solid education – master’s degree in Math, PhD in Mechanics of Fluid, Gas and Plasma. For many years worked as practical technological, mechanical, RnD engineer. He is an inventor and Company founder.

 

Alex,  Our IT department Brain and market Strategist

He is an extremely creative person and has a master’s degree in Computer Science, knows how to connect one with another in everything from micro controllers to cloud based web solutions.

He is successful serial entrepreneur and seeing great opportunity in this project.

 

Olga, Administrator of Company and “cargo boat”.

She is in charge of all our current management concerns.

 

 

 

Yuriy, RnD Mechanical Engineer

Aka “Wizard”. He can find technological solutions to anything that you want even if it is only conceptual.

He has a master's degree in CNC machining and has wide knowledge in electronics, microcontrollers, and digital communications.

 

Cody, Marley and Simon

QA team

Our outstanding test team is in a waiting for test stage

 

 

 

LIGI TOOL & INGINEERING, Inc.

Engineering, prototyping and producing any embodiments with any complexity

 

 

            NAV-TV

Design, prototyping and producing any electronic devices

 

 

 

 

 

 

We have been working on eegloo using our personal funds to get to this point. We’ve made primitive, homebrew sample which has shown outstanding results. Now we are working on the creation of our first fully working prototype. Your support will be used to take eegloo into production and delivery phase.

The funds raised will be used for redesign of mechanical and electronic parts of eegloo to provide declared features and prepare to mass production.

With your help, we can make eegloo available to you / your pets and millions of others who love their pets.

We are open to any kind of collaboration which can help us to achieve our goals.

 

 

Obviously, the main potential problem would be not raising sufficient funds. If the crowdfunding effort doesn't yield enough money, it may seriously slow down the production. On the other hand the successful funding of our project can open wide road for our revolutionary heat exchanging technology. We believe crowdfunding is a good way to raise money to go into mass production and to showcase our product to the world.

 

 

(Prices do not include the shipping expenses)

In our future plans we are going to expand thermal power of our cooling / heating systems and to find new applications for our invention.

 

 

Vera, CEO
“Rocket engine” in commercialization of business ideas. Her view is embracing problems both in whole and in details as well.
She is a student in Miami International University, studying Business Laws.
 

Aleksandr, CTO
He is able to see unusual in habitual things. “Resolve the problem is usually much easier than see it”.
He has a solid education – master’s degree in Math, PhD in Mechanics of Fluid, Gas and Plasma. For many years worked as practical technological, mechanical, RnD engineer. He is an inventor and Company founder.
 

Alex,  Our IT department Brain and market Strategist
He is an extremely creative person and has a master’s degree in Computer Science, knows how to connect one with another in everything from micro controllers to cloud based web solutions.
He is successful serial entrepreneur and seeing great opportunity in this project.
 

Olga, Administrator of Company and “cargo boat”.
She is in charge of all our current management concerns.
 
 
 

Yuriy, RnD Mechanical Engineer
Aka “Wizard”. He can find technological solutions to anything that you want even if it is only conceptual.
He has a master's degree in CNC machining and has wide knowledge in electronics, microcontrollers, and digital communications.
 

Cody, Marley and Simon
QA team
Our outstanding test team is in a waiting for test stage
 
 

 

LIGI TOOL & INGINEERING, Inc.
Engineering, prototyping and producing any embodiments with any complexity
 
 
            NAV-TV
Design, prototyping and producing any electronic devices
 
 
 

 

 

 
We have been working on eegloo using our personal funds to get to this point. We’ve made primitive, homebrew sample which has shown outstanding results. Now we are working on the creation of our first fully working prototype. Your support will be used to take eegloo into production and delivery phase.
The funds raised will be used for redesign of mechanical and electronic parts of eegloo to provide declared features and prepare to mass production.
With your help, we can make eegloo available to you / your pets and millions of others who love their pets.
We are open to any kind of collaboration which can help us to achieve our goals.
 

 
Obviously, the main potential problem would be not raising sufficient funds. If the crowdfunding effort doesn't yield enough money, it may seriously slow down the production. On the other hand the successful funding of our project can open wide road for our revolutionary heat exchanging technology. We believe crowdfunding is a good way to raise money to go into mass production and to showcase our product to the world.
 

 

(Prices do not include the shipping expenses)

story:
We’ve built a team based on diverse expertise, experience and passion, and have been in LED field since 2010, with fully experience on design and manufacture on LED lights. Arthur came up with the idea when he worked late and woke up his wife at night. One day he installed the strip light under his bed and lighted it all night. Later, he realized that a motion-activated sensor would save more energy. Having friends around the house everyone who came by was like it, “this is so cool; I want one”. So he thought, maybe we should have an IndieGogo to help others too. 

Light has a profound influence on our mood, productivity, stress levels, sleep patterns, and overall sense of well-being, yet it’s not easy getting the right light.

iLLumibed is the best light kit for home improvement, typically covers any bed, working perfectly to safely guide you through the room whenever you get up. Easy-set-up light kit allows you to pick various colors and adjust the brightness, setting any mood or theme to the room, and dim enough not to wake up others.

iLLumiBed light kit is a combination of the most intelligent motion activated sensor, color changing RGB LEDs as well as the smartest dimmer setting. Easy installation and simple setup ensure to light your way in the dark.

Motion Sensor

Motion Sensor is perfect for areas in your home where lights are commonly left on like the laundry room, closets, and garage. With the built-in daylight sensor, iLLumiBed light kit turns on / off automatically when you enter or leave the room, totally consumes lower energy.

RGB LEDS

When you use RGB Color Changing iLLumiBed light, you can choose your favorite color, simply according to your whim or different seasons. RGB contains red, blue and green LEDs, can literally produce more than 20 colors with a controller. See how the colors perform in an RGB color changing light kit.

Couple

Have you ever waken up your sleeping partner when you got up in the midnight? iLLumibed light kit only turns on at the side of movement detection, while the other side is off. No more disturbing blinding light to others.

Baby / kid

Checking baby at night is the normal routine for moms. It can ruin your mood when stumble around, because of the obstacles hidden in the darkness like children’ toys or clothes.

Elder parent

Do you know how dangerous is for the elderly to get up in the darkness, fumbling to the lamp switch? Documented statistics show that about one third of the elder often falls in the darkness.

Student

Have you ever waken up your roommate when you get up in the middle of the night? With several personalities shaped by individual experiences living in one space, issues are sure to arise.

 

The iLLumibed comes with a range of intelligent features that support our mission of enhancing your home and influencing the atmosphere through the use of light. iLLumibed knows when you need it- perhaps even before you do.

  • Color changing: 20 single colors available for your free option. You take the control
  • Brightness Dimmable :  dim light will make you feel more pleasing and comfortable at night.

  • Fits any bed:  adhesive to double bed, single bed and crib in wide application. Good helper in your life for existing beds.

  • Motion-activated:  automatically ON/OFF for energy-saving. Light activates when you enter and deactivates when you leave.

  • Easy installation:  No complicated wiring, no router.

  • Timer setting.  you can set the on-time of the light at 30s to 10 minutes, which would be available for you to decide how long the light will deactivate after you leave

Simply install the bed light under your bed frame and forget about it. It will turn itself on automatically when your feet are on the floor and off when you leave. It’s simple but stylish.

 

Over the past 1 years, we have worked hard to get to the current stage with working prototypes and basic functionality. We ensuring that we can ramp up production at the quality we want, means we have to invest in molds and manufacturing equipment. Additionally, Stretch goal to reach $30 K, we’re going to launch an APP and bring something more fun to you.This campaign gives us the final push to finish the creation of the product that not only we, but everyone will love!

Q:How much is voltage of power supply? 110V or 220V? Adaptor for US only or EU too?

A:For illumibed light, input voltage is 100-240V AC, and working voltage is 12V DC, available to be used in worldwide. Adaptor is available for both US and EU. Also, it’s easy to find optional adaptor in the market for 12VDC usage.

Q:Does the illumibed light have color options? And how many options?

A:Yes, it’s RGB version, and there’re about 20 kind of light colors for your option. Press the color button on the dimmer, you can choose your favorite color, and the setting will be memorized automatically, and stay at the same color until any new change.

Q:Can I dim the illumibed light’s brightness?

A:Yes, sure. There’re 5 levels of brightness setting you can choose. With the button of “bright+” and “bright-“, the setting has memory function, the brightness will stay the same in your last setting.

Q:In the dual sensor kit for illumibed light, does motion detected by either motion sensor turn on both LED strip lights, or just one?

A:There’s just one light kit that turns on when that side of sensor detected. With this design, you will not wake up the sleeping partner when you get up in the middle of the night, because the light kit on the other side is off without movement detection.

Q:Do the RGB lights have a white or soft white color in addition to RGB?

A:Yes, there’s natural white as well as pale yellow, which is soft brightness when you get up at night. Also, you can also dim the brightness down by pressing the button of “bright-“ on the dimmer, and it has memory function to keep the setting same as last time.

Q: Can I order iLLumiBed even though I do not live in US?

A:Yes, we deliver iLlumiBed anywhere in the world with the perfect logistic solution.

Q: What kind of warranty do you offer?  

A: All iLLumiBed light kit comes with a 1 year manufacturer's warranty. Should you encounter some production related default in that timeframe, you will simply contact our customer support and we will take care of it.

More information about iLLumibed on our website.

 

Member of BackerClub.co

story:
Warm in the winter, cool in the summer.

 

We know they are sensitive. They climb on radiators, lean against cold wall, and drink water to keep their body temperature optimal.

It's about time we introduce them a climate controlled house.

We're featured!

 

 

 

 

 

Fully Autonomous

 While the ambient temperature is within the comfort zone, it idles, periodically checking the temperature. Once a decent amount of temperature differential is detected, it will cool or warm towards the ideal temperature by a few degree. When the occupancy is detected, it goes into a full cooling/warming mode with it's speed curve set by the animal's weight - the heavier the animal is, the harder it pushes to get to the optimal stage.

 

 

 The occupancy pattern is learned and will prepare Aridus Den to react faster or be more energy efficient. If the animal does not come in for an extended period of time, it will go into different stages of energy savings mode, just like your laptop or a smartphone to save energy.

 So whether the season has changed, or the animal has gone for a vacation, there is never a need to adjust temperature. Just plug in, and let them enjoy.

 

 

(quiet)

 

Most small animals- Cats, dogs, ferrets, and rabbits - have very sensitive ears. So we got rid of these - the noise, moving parts, and fans.

The result is silent operation. Even while it cools at full speed, to provide the most comfortable space for your loved one.

 

 

Efficiency

 

Most air conditioners and heaters at households are convective. It means that they cool or warm the entire air in the space to get to your animal friend.

Aridus Den is conductive for both cooling and heating. In fact, it uses the same component for both cooling and heating, known as thermoelectric module. 

The module heats and cools a panel of aluminum alloy, one of the most heat conductive element around us, and it spreads the temperature on the sitting surface evenly.

Stacked with it's smart energy control, leaving Aridus Den on at all times consumes only about the same amount of energy that a regular 60W light bulb would, if it was lit only for a few hours at night.

 

 

Refrigerant-free

 

Unlike a simple fan, Aridus Den can cool below room temperature. But it differs itself from an air conditioner or refrigerator in that it does not use any refrigerant.

Any of those gases - methyl chloride, CFC, HCFC, HFC - are not only toxic to animals and humans to inhale, but is also one of the main source of air pollution when escaped (and yes, they do escape over time).

As for you, You'd never need to call a mechanic to fix a refrigerant leak. For the animals, they will be intrinsically safe.

 

 

Emotional attachment

 

We like to buy new things for them. A new warm pet bed for the winter, a new wooden house for the spring, a cooling pad for the summer.

We keep buying them, partially because they only work for a specific (narrow) temperature range, and also because your loved one simply does not recognize it as their home.

Aridus Den is the all-season solution that goes much cooler than what a cooling pad can handle on a hot summer day, and much warmer than a thick fluffy houses in a cold winter day. 

A sensor monitors ambient temperature real time and another sensor locates millimeters beneath their body, to get the accuracy that a home thermostat can never achieve.

All-season also means that the house isn't getting replaced every few months, and that will grow an emotional attachment as their own private space that is always comfortable.

Moving every few months versus living in one house for years. Which would feel more like being at home?

 

 

Smart padding

 

We are using a type of gel that allows the aluminum panel to transfer heat more efficiently. At the same time, it will provide a soft cushion. The types of fabrics we are testing have a higher heat conductivity to make sure that we have a better communication with the animal's body temperature. They can easily be separated and washed, so your loved one won't have to share the bed with bugs and bacteria.

 

 

Don't chew worry

 

Some animals will chew. We anticipate it. So we located the transformer right at the plug to make sure that even if they chew through the cord, the voltage running the cord is low enough not to harm them or to start fire.

And we are stepping further to sculpt and test various designs of the cord itself to be chew-proof in the first place.

We are still going though trials and errors, but it's only a matter of time until we find a form that fuses a great degree of safety and sound aesthetics.

 

 

A den

 

Small animals like small spaces. They like to fit themselves into boxes, sleep under the bed, hide in closets and hang inside a washing machine. Leaving them under a nine feet high ceiling designed for human makes them feel vulnerable. A house for them should just fit them. Like a den.

 

 

Ear accessories

Magnetic attachment allows free-positioning of these ears to make them even cuter.

 

 

 

Q&A

 

Q. What about my big dog?

A. We've already designed a larger version. But a large product requires a large amount of funding, so we are concentrating this smaller version at the time - we think a size that fits most every cats, small dogs, rabbits, and ferrets has a larger market. Help us take off, and we'll definitely make a larger version, bringing all the technology.

 

Q. Supported voltage?

A. Current prototype only supports 120V for US. But there's plenty of transformers that supports 110V-277V universal input, so there's no reason we can't bring this to the rest of the world. 

 

Q. What's the processor like? Is this a computer?

A. It does compute, but it's not going to give you a friendly Windows blue screen. Depending on the production volume, we'll decide the specifics of electronic components. Current prototype uses Arduino based system with a few dedicated boards, but we are hoping to make everything into one chip.

 

Q. What color of the pad will I get? How soft is it?

A. We'll provide a variety of inner pad and the outer cover so you can mix and match. Specifics of it will depend on pricing and availability of the factories so we'll take a round of survey before we place the order. If you have an awesome idea, let us know.

 

Q. Can the ears and pad covers be used independently from Aridus Den?

A. The bottom of ears have curvature matching the outer diameter of Aridus Den so you can't really stick it to other surfaces. The covers can be put on something else, but we made it to have higher heat conductivity that you wouldn't want to use it separate from Aridus Den. All accessories are free of shipping, as we'll only ship these to the people who has an order of Aridus Den.

 

Q. How much electricity will I save, compared to using an air conditioner and heater?

A. There are too many variables such as the size of the space they are in, leakage, climate of where you are at, and so on. But think of it this way. It should consume much less than an incandescent 60W light bulb in most every scenarios. And 60W is not a very bright one.

 

Q. Why such a slash of price?

A. Most, if not every, components of Aridus Den are mass-market friendly. The more we can produce, the cheaper it gets at a dramatic rate and in this campaign we are also skipping all the middle merchants other than Indigogo and Paypal each taking small fees. Besides, we really think that this is a product that will make it's early buyers to advocate. Let's disrupt the copy-and-paste pet house market that's filled with consumables. It's time we make something that the four-pawed users will like.

story:
Background

I am the inventor for the Chokeless (Anti-clog) sink strainer. In year 2006, I invented the chokeless feature for the kitchen sink strainer to prevent the sink from clogging during washing. Since then, I have not been stopping design and develop strainers and floor traps for all the drainages in living quarters.

The products are well accepted by the users in local Singapore and worldwide.

With the help from SIMTech - Singapore Institute of Manufacturing Technology, I am now able to produce the chokeless feature in Stainless Steel. SIMTech is the renowned research institute in Singapore. After more than 6 months of research and development, SIMTech has come out the guidelines to form the shape needed using precision engineering. The report was passed to a local factory for further develop into full automated stamping tooling. The stamping process is now ready for mass production.

There are minimum order quantities for the mass production. The production need at least 10k pieces before it can mass produce. Therefore, this project is important for me to gather enough quantity for the production run.

With your supports, the production will be able to start and the cost per piece will be much affordable for everyone. So, do contribute to the quantity and make the production possible.  

SME Day 2019

I am glad to announce that the Stainless Steel Chokeless sink strainer was selected by A*star to showcase a success story on the SME Day 2019 at the Resorts World Sentosa.

Development

It was 10 years of waiting, $100k of investment, and 1 year + of development to bring you this invented, designed, developed, and made in Singapore product.

 

The product

This is a well-engineered product. This design has been proven working in the markets for over 10 years now. This model is using Stainless Steel SS304 as the material as per the requests from the users.

Advantages 

  • Chokeless (anti-clog) design.
  • Resistant to hot boiling water and oil.
  • Fits 3.5" sink waste.
  • Small holes to trap wastes.
  • No gap.
  • Faster water flow.
  • Industrial grade.

Specification 

  • Model SS-020
  • SS304 Stainless Steel.
  • Rust resistance.
  • Corrosion resistance.
  • Up to 1600 deg F or 870 deg C.
  • Strainer Size 74mm.
  • Sink Outlets size 75mm to 100mm.
  • Hanging box packing.
  • Weight per piece: 120 (g).
  • Invented, Designed, Developed and Made in Singapore.

 

Pledge and Rewards

For the mass production, I need about USD 30K to get it started. This amount is needed to purchase the raw stainless steel sheets for stamping out the part. The parts will then need to go through the tumbling process to remove all the sharp corners and edges. The next step will be the surface polishing process to give the strainers a smooth and shiny surface finishing. At this polishing stage, there are a few steps of reducing the polishing grands sizes to get the surface finishing needed. Normally, it takes about 3 hours per batch to reach the smoothness needed.

In returns, the backers will get the rewards from the range of chokeless products that I have designed and developed in the pass years. Of course, the rewards also include this ultimate stainless steel chokeless sink strainer.

There are a few tiers of rewards for the backers to select. The backers can choose from as low as USD2 just to give a moral support or USD 35 to get a full range of chokeless products. The rewards are much-discounted price from the current list prices in the market. They are good-buy rewards and must buy.


 

Shipping packaging

The products will be packed in mail bags and sent by registered mails. 

Why Stainless Steel?

I wanted the strainers in stainless steel when it started. However, due to the chokeless shape needed, it was not possible using metal stamping technique. The shape required the sheet metal to be drawn in opposite direction and will break easily during the stamping process.

At that time, plastic injection was used. Although, over the years, recyclable thermoplastic materials were used to reduce the eco issue of using plastic, stainless steel material is still my first option.

The designs are now will accepted in Singapore for over more than 10 years now. These chokeless designs also sold as far as to Japan, China, Australia, Europe, and USA. Currently, it is listed in Amazon USA as another brand. Do check out the Youtude testimony video from an Amazon buyer.

Also, check out my 10 years anniversary video. There are testimonies in Chinese, English, and even Indonesian languages.

 

Stainless steel is possible now!!

Producing the chokeless shape needed in metal is easy. There are many techniques like welding and 3D printing can be used to make the shape in metals. However, to producing it fully automated in progressive stamping to drive down the unit cost so that it is affordable by the publics is difficult.

Over 10 years of searching and trying, finally, SIMTech has casted the light on using precision engineering. The most difficult parts of the development have been overcome now. What is left now is the final astatic look of the end products. It is up to the market to accept it.

The first difficulties of the development were the forming of the fundamental shape. That was resolved by pre-forming technique own by SIMTech. The next hurdle was the hardness of the material used. SIMTech has identified the grade of the stainless steel that can be used for the production. So, the major issues are over now.

When come to the mass production, the holes and slots need at the vertical sides were the main issue. There were a few proposals for the process. Eventually, thanks to a local stamping master in Singapore, the issue was resolve by using lancing technique.

Following is the final design. I hope the outlook is acceptable to the public and that is the final risk for the marketing.

 

You can help

I invented this chokeless sink strainer was to help those who face the clogging issues in the kitchen. It was a very irritating issue when the sinks keep clogging. To remove the clog, you need to risk the pipe below getting choked up and you need to pay for the plumber to clear it.

When I invented this product, what I did was to tell the person next to me and the news just spread out. Now, in Singapore, I have the major DIY shops and supermarkets selling the products.  

So, what you can do is to tell your friends and colleagues about this project. But don’t forget about your moms and dads. They need this product the most.

What you can do is also share this project in your Facebook, Instagram, Tweeter, messenger, and any social media. Text it if you can.

You small actions will make a big different.

Thanks.

Referral reward system for backers ​

After you will back the project, I will send you the referral email. You can then forward the email to your friends who you think they may need the product. Once your friends have backed it, you or your friends can go to the following link page to let me know. I will verify your friends'emails at Indiegogo and then both you and your friend will have the referral gift in the parcels.  

If you don't get my referral email on time, just follow the link and send me your email to get the referral email.

http://dotdesign.com.sg/backerscount.php

 

Contact the designer

Feel free to contact me for any clarification and request. 

Designer: Ho Yeong Cherng

HP / Whatsapp: +65 97835637

Email 1: dotd3sign@yahoo.com

Email 2: hoyeongcherng@dotdesign.com.sg

BackgroundI am the inventor for the Chokeless (Anti-clog) sink strainer. In year 2006, I invented the chokeless feature for the kitchen sink strainer to prevent the sink from clogging during washing. Since then, I have not been stopping design and develop strainers and floor traps for all the drainages in living quarters.The products are well accepted by the users in local Singapore and worldwide.With the help from SIMTech - Singapore Institute of Manufacturing Technology, I am now able to produce the chokeless feature in Stainless Steel. SIMTech is the renowned research institute in Singapore. After more than 6 months of research and development, SIMTech has come out the guidelines to form the shape needed using precision engineering. The report was passed to a local factory for further develop into full automated stamping tooling. The stamping process is now ready for mass production.There are minimum order quantities for the mass production. The production need at least 10k pieces before it can mass produce. Therefore, this project is important for me to gather enough quantity for the production run.With your supports, the production will be able to start and the cost per piece will be much affordable for everyone. So, do contribute to the quantity and make the production possible.  SME Day 2019I am glad to announce that the Stainless Steel Chokeless sink strainer was selected by A*star to showcase a success story on the SME Day 2019 at the Resorts World Sentosa.DevelopmentIt was 10 years of waiting, $100k of investment, and 1 year + of development to bring you this invented, designed, developed, and made in Singapore product. The productThis is a well-engineered product. This design has been proven working in the markets for over 10 years now. This model is using Stainless Steel SS304 as the material as per the requests from the users.Advantages 
Chokeless (anti-clog) design.
Resistant to hot boiling water and oil.
Fits 3.5" sink waste.
Small holes to trap wastes.
No gap.
Faster water flow.
Industrial grade.
Specification 
Model SS-020
SS304 Stainless Steel.
Rust resistance.
Corrosion resistance.
Up to 1600 deg F or 870 deg C.
Strainer Size 74mm.
Sink Outlets size 75mm to 100mm.
Hanging box packing.
Weight per piece: 120 (g).

story:
Stressed out? Troubled Sleeping? Hyperhidrotic? Got the caffeine jitters? The SUNTQ weighted blanket, made of 100% polyester, adopting the latest technology, makes the blanket more chill than that made of bamboo. Some experts get the result after their research. The weighted blanket can make you feel secure, as if you’re being hugged,which helps you calm down and lulls you to sleep, says Chris Branter, a certified sleep science coach and founder of SleepZoo.com. 

As for why weighting blanket is effective, most of the benefits boil down to so-called “deep stress stimuli” or “deep stress treatments”—the kind of pressure that babies feel in their shackles, Branter explains. "The researchers believe that stress will make you feel grounded in your sleep surface, reduce the secretion of stress hormone cortisol, which has a negative impact on melatonin production.

Who should use a weighted blanket?

Almost everyone can benefit from the use of weighted blankets. But adults with anxiety or depression, Sleep disorders,Nervous system disorders, people who drink too much caffeine, stay up too late, work addicts, as well as children with Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD) or ADHD, ADHD may experience the greatest benefits. The people with hyperhidrotic situation are more suitable for this cozier weighted blanket.

Studies have also shown weighted blankets to be useful in battling insomnia, which isn’t surprising since stress and anxiety are two of the most common underlying causes of insomnia,” Branter points out.

A study published in The Journal of Sleep Medicine & Disorders found that insomniacs using a heavier blanket, sleep more calmly, longer and have less activity at night.

How to choose the Best weighted blanket? 

Interested in trying a weighted blanket? As a general guideline, choose a blanket that’s about 10% to 15% of your body weight. Make sure you lie the weighted blanket flat across your bed so that the weight is evenly distributed, experts advises.

 

Soft, Chill, Cozier 100% Polyester Material

The SUNTQ weighted blanket, made of 100% polyester with100% biodegradable

High-quality, Eco-friendly, Durable,thermoregulated, Antibacterial, Smooth and silky

 

Hypoallergenic features,adopting the latest technology, makes the blanket more chill than that made of bamboo. This special technology that is studied for several months. The design concept is in line with climate change. As global warming intensifies, countries around the world are focusing on saving energy and easing the heat. SUNTQ weighted blanket makes people cool, which can reduce the use of air conditioning and achieve the effect of saving energy.

Evenly Distributed Filling

Weighted blankets have traditionally been filled with plastic pellets. Although the function of adding weight to the felt is completed, it also causes problems such as rough texture, uneven weight distribution, and shortened life of the blanket.
 
Thus we replace the SUNTQ filling with high quality glass beads. This features Increase durability, Even distribution, seamless texture ,Optimum comfort.


Contrast between Market Weighted Blanket and Our SUNTQ Weighted Blanket

story:
You’ve probably heard it before: this remote can replace all your other remotes. The thing is, that statement has never really been true before as it is right now. When you get OKU, you really can get rid of all your other remotes. This is the last remote control you are ever going to need, taking over the roles of all your other devices – and more!

We all know the situation. Someone walks into the living room, maybe in a huff, and says, “Where’s the remote?” Where is the remote? you wonder.

Never again! OKU puts control of every single one of your devices into a single remote. This includes support for:

  •  IR
  •  Bluetooth
  •  WiFi
  •  Z-Wave+
  •  Zigbee
  •  315Mhz, 390Mhz, 433Mhz & 868Mhz radio frequencies used for light control and for example carage door openers. (Frequencies used depends your location and are selected automatically).

Basically, whatever uses a remote is compatible with OKU. This includes such devices as:

  •  TV
  •  AV equipment
  •  thermostats and other smart devices
  •  HVAC
  •  smart locks
  •  garage door openers
  •  lights

There are over 35,000 devices supported and counting. It even works in conjunction with services like Uber, Lyft, and Uber Eats! You set up the screen, organizing it whichever way suits your needs best, customizing everything through our web service, iOS app, or Android app. The display is user-friendly and fully customizable, putting you in charge of your device experience – once and for all!

Perfect Christmas present

We are already ready for manufacturing and will make sure that you will get your OKU before Christmas 2018. Now it is perfect time to order the best present for this year for your friends, family or to yourself!

Make It Yours

OKU has lots of cool features to make your connected home experience more convenient and enjoyable.

Fully customizable

Customize display to suit you needs. Show only buttons you really need. This make use of OKU simple and fast.

Group your lights together

Do you want to control all your living room lights at the same time? Or maybe specific groupings of lights? No problem! Just open up the OKU app and create custom light groups. It lets you turn on/off, dim or change the color of multiple lights—all at once. 

Create custom scenes

OKU gives you the power to set the mood and control multiple devices at once. Want a little romance in the air? Then bring the lights down low and turn on some music with a single tap. Is it movie night? Then choose your movie scene to fire up your TV and media player and adjust all your lights to the color and brightness you prefer.

Simple Setup

It only takes a couple minutes to get OKU up and running:

  • Download the free OKU Remote app (iOS or Android) 
  • Add devices and services using the app
  • Enjoy

What We Need & What You Get

We have come to you, Indiegogo, in order to raise the start-up capital that we need to manufacture, market, and distribute OKU on a global scale. As a thank-you, we are offering discounts on early bird order of OKU and other discounts on orders of multiple OKU remotes.

Why Order Now

Becoming a backer means that you’ll get exclusive discounts and prices that we’ll never offer again. It also means that you'll be the first to receive and enjoy Smart Remote, months ahead of its availability in retail.

Free shipping

All our perks includes free shipping worldwide! And we cover also VAT & duties so the free shipping actually means free shipping!

Warranty

We stand firmly behind our product and offer a 3 years limited warranty.

Whats in the package

1 x OKU remote

1x Micro-USB or USB-C cable. We send survey after campaign to choose cable type.

The Impact

Imagine a world in which you never lost your remotes. You never had to go rummaging through the couch cushions. The feeling of control would always be yours. You would know that all your devices were just a few button pushes away, right in your pocket. That is the world that we are making possible with OKU. Finally, all the stresses of the remote control will be gone.

Risks & Challenges

Because we are working with manufacturing and distribution partners to get OKU made, there is always a risk of delay. Should we get off schedule or miss a deadline, we will be sure to keep our contributors up to date. We are committed to putting out a world-class product and satisfying our customers. Should any challenges arise, we will figure out a way to overcome them and get OKU out to market.

Other Ways You Can Help

Beyond making a monetary contribution, you can help out with OKU production by sharing our campaign link with anyone you know. Let’s tell the whole world that the future of remote controls is here! Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter are all excellent platforms for spreading the word about OKU.

We appreciate all your support, monetary and non-monetary, and we thank you for taking the time to read about what we are doing.

Got Question?

If you have question during our campaign or after it please send email to support@okuremote.com.

Who we are?

story:
The perfect home shoe. Designed to improve your home experience.

 

High quality, sustainable materials

HOM is entirely made out of full grain leather, the finest, highest quality layer of the hide. The combination of high quality materials with the attention to detail of hand crafted goods, results in leather pieces that lasts a lifetime.

Our leather comes from the finest cattle raised in the open grass of the Andean mountains, complying with the highest environmental standards during the tanning process. 


Leather is a natural material that becomes supple over time and use, naturally adapting to your feet, while developing a beautiful patina.

 

Our hydrofuge technology modifies the pore structure of the hide making it water resistant, giving you time to wipe away any liquid. 


The interior is all breathable suede that controls moisture and keeps the perfect temperature. A Capra distinctive blend of materials.

Your feet will rest on the highest quality quilted suede.

Easy to wear all day long

Perfect to use with or without socks, like shoes or slip-ons. We designed HOM to be the best of both worlds so feel no shame for turning your shoes into slip-ons.

The anti-slip pattern on the outsole will give you just the right grip to keep the grasp on the ground while you walk on clouds. 

 

Comfort is key

We rely on traditional crafting techniques as well as dedicate time to innovate on processes and materials to achieve unique designs. The footbed has four complementary layers.

 

Designed to improve your home experience.

Working, cooking, playing, watching a movie, reading, relaxing... We believe these shoes will make your home experience more natural, comfortable, and safe.

Something simple can make a big difference in how we feel in our everyday life.

 

Help us reach more homes

By referring 1 friend to back up our project we will custom emboss your HOMs. By referring 2 friends to back up our project we'll include a complimentary floor mat.

 

Handcrafted for superior quality and durability

During this five year journey we have crafted-to-order thousands of pieces for our customers in more than 115 countries. Along this time we have invested in the most valuable thing: people. We have an amazing team of experts artisans with decades of experience and craftsmanship heritage.

When a product is hand crafted the attention to detail is acute. The skills developed through years of experience sum up to a piece of art that has the artisans character embedded give soul to the product.

 

 

Packaging

HOM comes with a bag made of 100% organic cotton super soft and with a luxurious feel to the touch. Designed to be recycled or reused. 

 

 

 

Meet the Team

Five years ago, Juan, Product Designer and Diana Industrial Engineer started this dream, crafting each product with their philosophy: Things must be done with happiness and high-quality materials so they can last forever.

Today, Capra has a wonderful team of craftsmen that comes every day to the studio to craft unique and modern leather products with all the attention to detail. With more than 30 decades of experience and a family legacy on this art, each Capra product is a pure unique piece.

Along this time we have invested in the most valuable thing: people. We have an amazing team of experts artisans with decades of experience and craftsmanship heritage.When a product is hand crafted the attention to detail is acute. The skills developed through years of experience sum up to a piece of art that has the artisans character embedded give soul to the product.  PackagingHOM comes with a bag made of 100% organic cotton super soft and with a luxurious feel to the touch. Designed to be recycled or reused.    Meet the TeamFive years ago, Juan, Product Designer and Diana Industrial Engineer started this dream, crafting each product with their philosophy: Things must be done with happiness and high-quality materials so they can last forever.Today, Capra has a wonderful team of craftsmen that comes every day to the studio to craft unique and modern leather products with all the attention to detail. With more than 30 decades of experience and a family legacy on this art, each Capra product is a pure unique piece.

story:
What is this?

It's a train map on a circuit board. It even comes with lights that will make you appear 100% cooler to your train enthusiast friends.

I started thinking about PCB train maps about a year ago. As I was laying down the copper traces on my Lifeclocc, I started thinking, "This kinda looks like a train diagram." and this project was born.

Design

There are 4 separate designs. From smallest to largest, they are:

Singapore 2027, Bay Area, Tokyo JR, and Singapore 2030.

The design elements vary across each board, mostly depending on the size of the board.

You can click on the images for a high resolution render of the board.

This is the first map I designed. I originally wanted to make a 2030 map, but I also wanted to make it exactly 10cm across, so I had to cut it down to 2027. It's small and cute and fits in the palm of your hand. Not in your wallet, unfortunately.

 

Since I live in the bay area, I felt like I should show the train system here some love. It has the BART, Caltrain, and even the Muni and VTA. Since the stations aren't numbered, all the names are spelt out in full.

Tokyo is my favourite place to be, and their train system puts many others to shame. It is also the most satisfying map to look at (in my opinion). This only has the JR lines and the more prominent rivers.

This was designed at the request of someone who wanted a Singapore map that could be framed on the wall. Since it's also much bigger, I could easily fit in the rest of the planned lines till 2030.

 

Other maps

There will be no other map designs for this Campaign, but I will be putting up a poll to vote on the next metro that I will be working on. If you want to be part of this poll, you can back the $2 tier and you'll get a say in what comes next.

 

Electronics

All 4 boards come with back-lit variants. The lighting is powered by a second layer under the first layer which provides the lights (plus 2 more layers). The whole assembly is held together by screws. The different lines are individually controllable and there are buttons on board to control the lighting patterns

 

Lighting layer specifications

  • Micro USB powered
  • Battery Powered (optional addon)
  • On/Off switch
  • 3 buttons for controls
  • ATTINY85/ATMEGA328 microcontroller for lighting logic
  • 74HC595 Shift Register for individual line control
  • 2N7002 MOSFET for power regulation

Here are examples of what it does:

Manufacturing, Assembly and Fulfilment

I have found a factory that will do small batches of PCB assembly, but there will still be some components that will need to be soldered. Fulfilment and final assembly will be handled by myself to reduce the additional overhead in dealing with the logistics of hiring a factory. I do not expect too many issues with the assembly and logistics since I'm expecting to fulfil roughly the same number of units as my previous campaign.

 

Rewards 

 

Backing PCB Only will only give you the Display Layer. Refer above for sizing.

  • Does not come with colours
  • Just the front layer with holes where the stations are.

Backing With Lighting will include the following:

  • All 4 layers: Display / Filter / Spacer / Lighting Layers
  • All components soldered and tested
  • Board fully programmed and functional
  • Minimal assembly required (screwdriver and scissors required)

Addons

Laser Cut Table Stand ($5)

The PCB doesn't stand by itself. You can lean it against the wall, or even use a tablet holder. This is a simple stand that will let you prop the PCB up.

Battery Holder ($6) (Only applicable for Lighting versions)

This adds a battery holder on the back for powering the board with 4x AAA batteries. The primary power source should be a USB cable because the batteries will only last a day or two, but this is useful if you are planning on bringing it around and showing it to people.

Fully Assembled ($9) (Only applicable for Lighting versions)

Without this, there is some basic assembly required. You will need a screwdriver and scissors to piece the different layers together. For an additional $9, it'll come ready to be used.

Micro USB cable (1m) ($3) (Only applicable for Lighting versions)

Most of us have a micro USB cable lying around at home. This is not included to reduce the overall price of the unit, but you can add this on if you want.

Ordering

Regular Orders

If you just want one of the boards listed above, simply choose the level you want and choose your shipping country. Kickstarter will automatically calculate the shipping costs and add them up for you.

At the end of the campaign, you will be sent a survey to fill in your address and any addons you might want.

Custom Orders

If you want more than one piece, you will have the option to purchase more as addons when the survey is sent out.

There are no additional shipping costs.

 

Timeline

 

Development

This project has taken me the better part of this year to make. I've gone through at least 10 different prototypes to figure out the best way to get the lights to work. I will cover the process in more detail in a blog post.

Making the designs was also a tedious process. I've sunk hours Wikipedia hopping and staring at maps just to make these as accurate as possible. That being said, I am still human and can make mistakes. If you see any mistakes in the design, please let me know so I can fix them before I ship them out. You can find the high resolution renders of all my designs here.

It was also quite unfortunate that the software did not support writing Unicode characters, so creating the Japan map was a pretty painful process. 

 

Who am I

I am the creator of Lifeclocc, and this is my second Kickstarter Campaign. I've learnt a lot from running that campaign and I'm applying what I've learnt to this campaign as well. You can expect the same level of communication throughout the project as I did with the previous one.

I'm a Singaporean hobbyist based in the bay area. Designing PCBs was a passion I picked up a few years ago, and I've been throwing random ideas for my PCBs at the wall and seeing what sticks. This one was one of the better ones. (Lifeclocc is still my favourite)

I post the progress of my projects on Instagram if you're interested to also see updates on other things I'm working on. If not, you can be assured I will be updating this campaign frequently.

 

Open Source

I plan on releasing the source code for the lighting layer. If you want to reprogram the lights to do different things, you are free to do so. The boards will either be using an ATTINY85 or an Arduino Pro Mini. Both of these require an additional hardware programmer to program.

Instructions will be provided on how to program the microcontroller on the website once the campaign is over.

story:
Oh, finally!


If you're like me, you may have started off with the best of intentions by investing in a number of carefully chosen containers. Before long though these were joined by take-away boxes, empty food cartons, and pots you'd borrowed from friends. Too pretty to throw away, right?



Fast forward to now and it's all become rather unmanageable - you've no idea where half of the lids are, that 'nestable' feature you bought into just isn't cutting it, and you've now surrendered the biggest cupboard in the kitchen to 'store the storage'.


Well, we made these for you. We made these for us.

 

 

                                "Origami life hacks fit for modern life..."



As Seen On


Features & Dimensions


What you've seen in the video are the prototypes. Success on Indiegogo will see us producing FOLDFLAT by injection moulding with the results being even more spectacular - this is where the product renderings come, they give you a beautifully accurate image of what you can look forward to.



"The perfect lunch box which folds away when empty for easy carriage home"


"Folds down neatly to a third of its size, think of all the free space! Store it vertically like a paper back book or stack it like a plate"


"Nests perfectly into its lid - no more 'lost lids!"

Colours

 

FOLDFLAT is available in two colours: Turquoise and White.


- 'Popped-Up'

 


- Clipped Flat


- Clipped Flat & Stored Inside Lid

 

 

Why Indiegogo?

 

We began working on FOLDFLAT because it was a product we knew would make our lives easier and more pleasurable. Indiegogo lets us connect with and be supported by hundreds of like-minded individuals with whom we will travel this road. This opportunity is so large and full of promise that not attempting it is unthinkable.

story:
As seen On:

Why Rolling In Cash bed linen and beach towels?

  • Our unique extravagant, elegant and bold design supported with high quality natural materials fascinated people around us.
  • And also you might like to bring a touch of luxury in your home. Or maybe you need great gifts to surprise your friends or something fun for yourself? Dreaming about a special decoration for a hotel room (or rooms :) that you could offer to your guests?
  • Are you in search of fulfilling life - needing something to support your motivation and visualization so you could achieve your goals easier?
  • Our products are great companions in all this and more. We believe that. Plus scientists have discovered the great power that images of money possess!


Discover what scientists have to say about money and sleep...

An experiment demonstrated:

  • People who submerged fingers into boiling water and counted the money afterwards felt less pain than those given blank pieces of paper.

By studying the symbolic power of money scientists came to the following conclusion:

“Money has a significant impact on our emotions.”

Doctor Roj Baumaister of the State University of Florida says: People should count money or visualize it in their mind before going to a job interview in order to increase their self-confidence.

  • Those who sleep longer, have better money skills.

According to scientists from the University of San Diego and A. Thomas Perkins, director of Medical Sleep program from North Carolina: “The quality of our sleep affects not only the quality of our life but also our finances!”

Their investigations lead to the following conclusion:

The amount of sleep goes hand in hand with earnings: “We noticed that people who sleep for an hour longer, generally earn 16% more than those who sleep less.”

  • Furthermore, Perkins says that the lack of sleep prevents the brain to process its night “flushing”. Consequently, we are not able to make good enough decisions the next day. Often, these decisions are related to money and finances.

What you get?

A unique design made by our team with special care :)

Inspiring bed linen sets that are fun and also great visualization tools
This unique beach towel is ideal to surprise your friends :)

  • In search of quality materials we selected 100% cotton satin. This ensures a pleasant feeling while allowing a very precise print that is essential for the flawless final look of our products.
  • We selected 100% cotton shared terry for our beach towels. It provides a velvety and soft feeling and allow us high quality of  printed images.
  • We believe in importance of health and environment friendly products.
  • That is why we use a non-toxic safe colors on water basis. This is also supported with official certificate of quality ( see certificate ). And the images are printed not glued. So the color stays on and products provide a pleasant feeling.

At the end of our campaign we will contact our backers to confirm your color and size selection!

Specifics / color and size options:

Pillow case and duvet cover have handy and simple zipper-fly closing.

Our meeting the day before launch

Sometimes we use sheet as table cloth or a sofa cover :)

Our story

  The team: Marjan, Jelka, Siniša, Martin and Rajko

Marjan has always been a man with lots of ideas and plans.
But to materialize his plans he needed money and a big team of co-workers.

Some time ago he came up with the idea to print money on bed linen.

He said:

“At first, I could not find the right motivation to do it. With time, the idea matured and I realized it is now or never.I shared the thought with some people around me and almost everybody was very excited with the idea. But I also needed help since such a project requires knowledge, work, money... And a lot of patience and persistence.”

So we created a team and faced a lot of challenges... How to create a realistic design? Which material to use for bed linen and where to print? How to portray the products on pictures and how to shoot a video… These were just a few of the challenges that we had to overcome.
We are very proud that our project is ready!

PS: Special Thanks also to our camera guys Goran and Bojan!

Our friends commented:


Our Hungarian friend Gabor and his wife received a gift in Thailand:


Our camera guy - Bojan:


Click cc square on lower right side of video - to select English Subtitles.
For more testimonials click here :)


Risks & challenges

We are creating our brand but already collaborating with two existing and experienced companies.

In case of some difficulties we have all their support. This gives us confidence that things would proceed smoothly.

We have already produced a small sample run and some of our friends are already enjoying the products!

But forecasting a demand is an inexact science. In case that orders exceed our expectations we might need some more time to dispatch all the products. So the delivery might need 14 or 30 days more. In such case we would inform all our backers about the new estimated delivery date. In every case we will do our best :)

Help us spread the word!

We will be thankful for your help to spread the word about our project. Your friends and family might have been dreaming about sleeping in money! You can share our campaign via e-mail, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram,...

Visit us on our our webpage: mcvalentino.club

Or Facebook: Rolling In Cash

We will be happy for your like on our Facebook profile. We look forward to hearing from you!

story:
What is FlipMate

We all love our cats, and have even learned to love the mischief they get up to. But one thing we can all agree on, is that we HATE cleaning the cat litter box. It is the one task that almost everyone tries to pass on to someone else in the house. That is why we created FlipMate! We want to make your life easier (including ourselves - we have many cats too) and take the hassle out of cleaning our beloved cat’s litter box.

No more procrastinating until your cat becomes rebellious because FlipMate has made this dreaded chore the easiest task in the house. 

How FlipMate works

It really is that simple! No more digging for clumps. No more wasted cat litter. No more mess.

FlipMate saves you time and money so you can get back to laughing at your cat’s amusing antics even faster!

 

FlipMate is versatile

We know that not all cats are the same. Some like to kick the litter out while digging and some cats likes to spray up high. For those cats, you can attach the litter guard to keep the mess off the floor.

The lid is also completely removable when space is an issue, so you can keep the lid off the box until it is time to clean the litter box.

You can also lay the lid flat and fix the litter guard to trap litter when your cat exits the box.

FlipMate is big

The FlipMate Advantage

Fast cleaning ● No more digging for cat waste ● Covered to control litter dust and waste odor while cleaning ● No heavy sifting filters ● Solid bottom base to prevent leakage ● Separate sifter keeps your cats safe, because unlike the buried sifter type litter box, your cat's paws can't get caught in the sifting slots ● Litter guard (doubles as a spray guard too) prevents cats from kicking litter outside of the box ● Prevents mess from cats that urinate in a standing or semi-standing position ● No mess or spills ● No hard corners to trap litter

 

FlipMate is available in

 

FlipMate design secret

From our hearts to cat lovers everywhere

We have owned more litter boxes than we have had cats in our lifetime, and we interact with them everyday. When we first came up with the idea for FlipMate, we not only wanted something aesthetically pleasing to look at, but a box that also merged the functions of other traditional litter boxes, making FlipMate the best marriage of design and function.

We hope you like FlipMate and support this campaign. None of this would be possible without you. luuup luup
 

Thank You and don't forget to share

Thank you for reading. Please share our campaign with your friends and family using the share tools shown below:

 

Any question?

Need to ask something? Sure just email us here

 

**Last updated : Thursday, 19th February 2017

When we first came up with the idea for FlipMate, we not only wanted something aesthetically pleasing to look at, but a box that also merged the functions of other traditional litter boxes, making FlipMate the best marriage of design and function.We hope you like FlipMate and support this campaign. None of this would be possible without you. luuup luup 
Thank You and don't forget to shareThank you for reading. Please share our campaign with your friends and family using the share tools shown below: Any question?Need to ask something? Sure just email us here **Last updated : Thursday, 19th February 2017

story:
Hello Guys! We are Nadjib and Feddy from Munich and we are proud to present you our first product JM-Lights. We developed a new design for a table and pendant lamp that is already familiar to everyone. We only changed the use of it. Our lamp is simple, timeless and brings joy in everyone´s room, especially in children´s or teenager´s. 

 

The Idea 

One day we wanted to go to a furniture store to buy a new lamp for a children´s room. Unfortunately we didn't like any of these lamps because they were too old-fashioned and boring. Then we came up with the idea of developing a completely new design that doesn't exist yet, that makes people smile and remember it for a long time.

 

Why JM-Lights?

If you, like us, are fed up with old-fashioned designs and want to bring more fun into your room, our lamp is just right for you. Whether young or old, due to its shape and uniqueness, JM-Lights ensures a good mood and a pleasant atmosphere for everyone. And based on it´s timeless design, it never comes out of fashion and is also a perfect present. JM- Lights is the perfect lamp to let your room shine in new light.

 

For whom is JM-Lights 

Our lamp is for children, teenagers and adults who stayed young at heart. It is an excellent gift for children, friends or relatives because it fits in every room. With our lamp, you will surely stand out from the crowd and create astonished faces for your fellow human beings. Especially children will be enthusiastic about it. Due to the design, our lamp brings joy to every room.

 

Which colour do you like? 

JM-Lights will be available in white, blue, green, red, brown, purple, yellow and orange. If you have any special wishes, just let us know and we will try to make it!

What is the investment for?

Our goal is to bring JM-Lights into all households and replace the traditional old-fashioned lamp. To make this goal possible, it is necessary to produce the lamp by injection moulding. Unfortunately, this is extremely expensive. To achieve this and at the same time be able to offer affordable prices, we need an order of at least 1000 pieces.

To reach our goal, we need your help!!!

Please, back our project!!!
