story:
At nextHome, we are passionate about revolutionizing the way people use their lights. We believe that a light bulb should be more than just a typical on and off household electronic device. Lighting is what redefines your personal space, create extraordinary atmosphere and bring joy and excitement into people’s lives.

To bring together this extraordinary range of possibilities of lights, we created nextBulb; a Proximity Sensing Smart LED Bluetooth Light Bulb. Now you will be able to bring your desired lifestyle into reality.


nextBulb uses Bluetooth Low Energy (iBeacon) technology to measure the distance from your smartphone to your lightbulb. You can configure it so that it turns on when you are in range.

Organize the lightbulbs by assigning them into different room so the app can use algorithm to calculate the distance between you and the rooms. 

nextBulb is smart enough to know you which room you are in and turn on the lights in that room. It's the same technology that's used in Indoor navigation.


Do you want to transform the environment you live or work in?  nextBulb will turn your rooms and areas into desired places instantly. Envision waking up in the morning and having a warm cup of coffee, or watching TV under your warm blankets. Maybe you want to host a party or elegant social event, or even enjoying a hot bubbly bath.  No problem. With nextBulb, you will have the freedom to adjust the bright white lights and any colors at any brightness in all of these situations and more!

   




nextHome and nextBulb care for the environment, and replacing your old power consuming light bulbs with nextBulbs will significantly reduce your monthly electricity bill as well as your environmental impact!




Getting started with nextBulb is easy!

No wirings, No special outlets, No hubs required! Just screw in and connect!


Good thermal conductivity for heat dissipation so you have to worry about problems due to overheating.

With a life span of 50,000 hrs, for the average household, nextBulb will run up to 25 year standards.


nextBulb is just the beginning. With your help, we plan to perfect the line of nextBulb lights and develope a series of home automation devices that will all be compatible with our nextHome app on your smart phones. The possibilities are endless, imagine waking up and opening all the curtains through just a touch of a button, walking into the kitchen and see your coffee is made and ready to go, preheating oven to the desired temperature so you won’t have to wait to cook tasty meal and having a hot bubbly bath all prepared before you get home from a long tiring day of work.  We want everyone to experience, at a glance, what the potential of Home Automation would be through nextBulb. 


Questions and Answers
What socket is compatible with nextBulb?
nextBulb is compatible with E26 and E27 only.
Which smartphone can be used to control nextBulb?

At this moment, nextBulb works with all iPhones (later than iPhone 4s). The android version will be coming up really soon.

Do you ship internationally?

Yes we do! International shipping would be $10.

What's the working voltage?

AC 56 - AC 256

story:
Welcome to YourBlunderBox .

     I'm Jeff ,a father, inventor, patent holder, a master plumber and business owner for over 17 years.  I have had this idea for over 10 years due to the need i found while installing and repairing water damage caused by refrigerators  water lines leaking . Usually the damage is more severe because the line hides behind the refrigerator and leaks slowly until the water shows up else were.  Insurance claims average between $8,000 and $15,000 for kitchen appliance water line leaks. The time line from discovery to completion of repairs averages 14 days. Your support can help get this product manufactured here in the United states and help save thousands of home owners from refrigerator water leaks.

     To achieve our goals we will need to raise $27,000 . This will fund the injection mold production and  first run of approximately 2000 units including  shipping . I already have a manufacturer lined up that will make the mold and run production in house locally.

     The MSRP after the campaign will be $28.00 ,but if you contribute now you can pre order one at the low price of $20.00. Want more than one ? No problem each additional one bought at the same time can be had at $15.00 each ( must ship to same address as initial one) What a deal.

     If we don't reach our goal funds will be returned .

     Funding time line .. approximately 30 days after funding we  get mold made and start production run. Next 60 days we take possession of inventory and start shipping.

     Your help reaching this goal will allow the average person get an affordable product that can save them thousands in damage  and help prolong the life of the appliance. I have about 24 of these units installed locally . We already have 3d printed and field tested for proof of concept with no problems .  When shown to other plumbing professionals  the unit has been met with a lot of positive feed back. I personally have my retirement tied up in this project. Just so you know I have everything invested to make this a successful venture.

     If you like this product please invest with me to make it a reality. If an investment is not for you but you can see the value please share this campaign with friends and family. Thank you for your interest.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Who are we and what do we do?

Hi, we are Oxeegen Design based in Leeds, England. Our startup company wants to design awesome stuff that would make everyone's lives a bit easier and Pixel is our very first project.

Our aim is to bring Pixel to every restaurant, store, bank and pretty much every institution, so their customers could get access to Wi-Fi within seconds.

Now we need your support! 

Just like for many young startups, funding would allow us to grow and bring bigger and better projects to life in the future.

We are launching Pixel exclusively on Indiegogo before it appears everywhere else, so you could be our first customers to enjoy this cool product before anyone else does.

 

How does Pixel work?

It uses Near-Field Communication (NFC) technology which allows to for devices such as smartphones, smart watches and basically any other device which has NFC to obtain data from Pixel. The best thing is that YOU DON'T NEED TO CHARGE IT! That's right! No charging! The change of magnetic field in your smartphone inducts a current that powers Pixel. Once you put your password in, you will never ever have to set it up all over again. Please note that Pixel works with all Android phones and all iPhones newer than iPhone 6.

Pixel has a small inbuilt magnet and a sticker (optional) that allows it to stick to any surface.

Why Pixel?

 

 

 

Funding goals

 

 

Choose your color

Risks & Challenges

There is literally no risk at all. We will deliver your Pixel within a week if you are based in Europe. People who live everywhere less will receive it within 2 weeks. The only risk for us is that we will not raise the full amount and our road to success might be bumpier. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We want people to know us, so sharing this campaign on Facebook would help! At the end of this campaign we will select 10 people who will receive a Pixel of your favorite color for free! Wait no longer, sharing is caring!

story:
The household planner table

Donwload the free demo version for english excel table

Donwload the free demo version for deutsch excel table

My story

My name is Zoltan Szimeonov.

I’m from Budapest, Hungary, and I’m an IT student in my final year of university.

During my time at the university, my financial situation has varied a lot.

At the beginning of my studies, I received money from my family from our home savings fund every month, and I had other support from my family and I also took out a student loan.

Unfortunately, at this time I wasn’t really studying, I was just having fun, and by the time I started taking my studies seriously, the funds in the savings account and my family’s intention to help had run out.

From that point on, I lived only on student loan, and at first this meant I had to live in extremely difficult circumstances.

Later, making use of my interest in my profession and my skills, I created an Excel program for personal household budgeting.

I wasn’t expecting much at first, but as I started using it, I was shocked to see that merely by organising my finances I could achieve as much change and stability in my quality of life as I could have with a large amount of money.

When I didn’t have the table, I simply spent my money the way I wanted until it lasted, and, as a result, I spent huge amounts on things that were much less useful in my life compared to spending the same amount on housing fees or meals, or saving it for years to be able to buy a home one day.

Moreover, less usefully spent amounts affected useful spendings directly.

When I had a lot of money, but had no tables, plans or rules, I spent money on a lot of less useful, and a lot of useless things, and at the end of the month I was always short of cash, I was often late with my housing fees, and sometimes at the very end of the month, I could barely buy food.

However, when I had just one third of the money, but I used my tables and had plans, I didn’t have these problems anymore.

Most importantly, I didn’t feel a decrease in my quality of life that I would have expected based on the difference of the available amounts.

The significance of adequate household records, in my experience, comes second, right after the most important factor, i.e. the amount available for the household.

Even though money is a crucial question, and this is just a small table, it is rather important, so it is also important that this household planner should be as good and effective as possible.

Recognising this, I wish to bring to the market my own, Excel-based household budgeting system that I have been developing for many years now, as I believe it will help a lot of households improve.

Currently, there is only a Hungarian version. The aim now is to launch the Hungarian version, which will be followed by the development of the English and German versions of the planner in late 2018.

This tool is basically used for optimizing resources, saving money is not the main point, it is just a part of the method.

When set appropriately, the household planner helps you turn useless or less useful spendings into useful ones (e.g. a nice holiday, or your own home sometime in the future), while also providing a more stable framework for everyday life.

This means the product can be useful for families and living communities, regardless of their financial situation.

What do I need money for?

Primarily, I need money for the AdWords campaign, as right now the major obstacle to sales is that the product is not known.

In addition, there are other expenses related to further development, and later, once the enterprise is operational, I will need money for an office.

Present plans

At present, the company’s foundation is in progress.

The first major objective is the product launch of the Hungarian version, for which serious advertising (e.g. Adwords) is necessary.

The version optimised for British and German conditions, with many extra functions, will be made and launched in the market following the success of this launch.

With the English and German-language versions the target audience will be much larger, which requires a large initial advertising investment; this will be funded from the profit of the first basic version.

There are further plans to develop many similar programs, e.g. to support the administration of studies, or the work and the income of entrepreneurs and freelancers. Another future objective is to develop programs that assist the everyday life and operation of small and medium enterprises.

The product

Household planners on the market are mostly free and simple.

However, if the records are more complex, it means data need to be entered in a complicated way.

One of the greatest advantages of my table is here.

While my table is complex, data input is very simple.

When there is an expense or income in the household, you just enter them, one after the other, in any of the cells in the given month, which is clearly marked with a colour.

On the side, in the drop-down menu, you need to select if it is income or expense, if it is linked to any of the (set) family (or group) members or it is a general expense/income, then select categories and subcategories to accurately identify the transaction.

Just a few clicks, a few seconds.

It is only the next workbook that requires more effort.

Here you have permanent data and data that rarely change.

The third workbook contains data that change monthly or regularly.

Unserer Erfahrung zufolge haben die Art und Technik, wie wir Geld verwenden, eine große Bedeutung im Bezug auf die Lebensqualität.

Riesige Summen können durch die falsche Geldverwaltungstechnik untergehen, während man mit der richtigen Technik viel Geld sparen kann, indem zwischen den beiden Extremen eine viel weniger spürbare Lebensqualitätsänderung erfolgt, als durch die Differenzsumme begründet wäre.

Der zweite bestimmende Faktor in Bezug auf die Lebensqualität neben der Höhe der familiären Einnahmen ist die Art der Geldausgabe.

Sehr viel Geld kann verschwinden, ohne eine der Summe entsprechende Verbesserung der Lebensqualität darzustellen, während man bei Bedarf auch mit ganz wenig Geld ein beinah perfektes Leben gestalten kann.

Wir haben unsere Planer so angefertigt, dass sie leicht verständlich für die Kostenplanung von Haushalten eingesetzt werden können und gleichzeitig ein immer vorhandenes Hilfsmittel darstellen.

Make sure to visit our webshop page as well!

https://www.haushaltplaner.com

Another future objective is to develop programs that assist the everyday life and operation of small and medium enterprises.The productHousehold planners on the market are mostly free and simple.However, if the records are more complex, it means data need to be entered in a complicated way.One of the greatest advantages of my table is here.While my table is complex, data input is very simple.When there is an expense or income in the household, you just enter them, one after the other, in any of the cells in the given month, which is clearly marked with a colour.On the side, in the drop-down menu, you need to select if it is income or expense, if it is linked to any of the (set) family (or group) members or it is a general expense/income, then select categories and subcategories to accurately identify the transaction.Just a few clicks, a few seconds.It is only the next workbook that requires more effort.Here you have permanent data and data that rarely change.The third workbook contains data that change monthly or regularly.Unserer Erfahrung zufolge haben die Art und Technik, wie wir Geld verwenden, eine große Bedeutung im Bezug auf die Lebensqualität.Riesige Summen können durch die falsche Geldverwaltungstechnik untergehen, während man mit der richtigen Technik viel Geld sparen kann, indem zwischen den beiden Extremen eine viel weniger spürbare Lebensqualitätsänderung erfolgt, als durch die Differenzsumme begründet wäre.Der zweite bestimmende Faktor in Bezug auf die Lebensqualität neben der Höhe der familiären Einnahmen ist die Art der Geldausgabe.Sehr viel Geld kann verschwinden, ohne eine der Summe entsprechende Verbesserung der Lebensqualität darzustellen, während man bei Bedarf auch mit ganz wenig Geld ein beinah perfektes Leben gestalten kann.Wir haben unsere Planer so angefertigt, dass sie leicht verständlich für die Kostenplanung von Haushalten eingesetzt werden können und gleichzeitig ein immer vorhandenes Hilfsmittel darstellen.Make sure to visit our webshop page as well!https://www.haushaltplaner.com

story:
INTRODUCING LUMBIENT

LUMBIENT is a beautiful ceiling light with endless design possibilities. LUMBIENT's design flexibility, inspired by human diversity, allows you to show your unique taste and creativity.

LUMBIENT's design is simple: instead of using a single, fixed light shade like most pendants use, LUMBIENT has several light shades that come in different colors and sizes, and are easily replaceable. This lets you personalize LUMBIENT and create something that looks like it‘s yours, not someone else’s.

With 72 positioning points, 4 different shade sizes, and 10 different shade colors* for you to choose from, the number of possible personalizing variations is one with 115 digits. For comparison, the count of atoms in the universe is estimated to be a number with only 80 digits! This makes the LUMBIENT that hangs in your own home or office most likely the only one in the universe with YOUR specific personal combination. How cool is that?!

*This campaign starts with an offer of 7 colors. Want more colors? - support LUMBIENT to help us reach our "Additional Colors" stretch goals!



VERSATILITY

LUMBIENT's design makes it easy to personalize so it fits many room designs, home interiors, and offices. For example:

  • Redecorating? Just replace the leaves in minutes to fit LUMBIENT to the new color scheme.
  • Know anyone who is a sports fan? Get them a LUMBIENT with the colors of their favorite team.

  • Want to create a unified decorating scheme? Keep a consistent look throughout your home by having multiple LUMBIENTs, each with a color scheme to fit your individual room.

  • Decorating a kid's room? Don't worry about their changing taste over time. When time comes, simply replace LUMBIENT's leaves to fit their new taste.

LUMBIENT'S APP

To make personalizing LUMBIENT easy, I have created a web application. The app initially creates a random design, which is changeable up to the last detail meaning you are able to determine each leaf's position, color and size.

Just try it out, it's cool! => LUMBIENT web application

COMMITMENT TO THE ENVIRONMENT

LUMBIENT was created to be environmentally friendly, because no matter how we look at it we have only one planet earth. For that, LUMBIENT is made out of environmentally safe materials that are easily recyclable:

  • LUMBIENT's body materials - birch wood is biodegradable and 100% recyclable, polycarbonate is 100% recyclable.
  • LUMBIENT's leaves - made of polypropylene which is so safe to use that it's a prime component in food containers. Polypropylene is also 100% recyclable.

One aspect of environmentally friendly products is their life cycle: how simple is it to recycle a specific product? Does the product need extensive disassembly and material separation before it can be recycled? When designing LUMBIENT, I insisted on having no glue, bolts or welding points on the final product. This makes LUMBIENT not only easy and quick for you to assemble but also simple to disassemble and separate the different components for easier recycling.


LUMBIENT'S DESIGN

LUMBIENT's design is guided by aesthetics, durability, sustainability, comfort of use, and simple assembly.

  • Central piece: holds the whole luminary together. It's the hub of 8 branches that stretch symmetrically in 8 directions.
  • The branches: arching downwards to give LUMBIENT a classic pendant convex shape, inspired by vintage barn lights. Each branch has 9 positioning points for the leaves, so all branches combined create a total of 72 positioning points.
  • The Leaves: translucent polypropylene in 4 different sizes and 7 magnificent colors. More colors will be available in case the project reaches its stretch goals.

MATERIALS

There are 2 available body materials:

LUMBIENT's shade:

Polypropylene leaves - beautiful translucent colors, large color variety, flexible, light weight and 100% recyclable.

Choose the shade leaves out of the currently offered 7 different colors:
red, orange, blue (dark), yellow, green (dark), purple and white. 

SPECIFICATIONS


THE LUMBIENT CAMPAIGN


INDIEGOGO REFERRAL PROGRAM

Help LUMBIENT become a reality and earn money at the same time by joining the reward program now!

You will get 5% off for each of your referrals' contribution as a refund towards your purchase. In case you earn more money in refunds than you contributed towards the campaign, you will receive a cash refund to your PayPal account*.

How does it work? Simply log into INDIEGOGO to get your personal tracking URL. Press the share buttons or share your unique URL (below the main video at the top of the page). Every time someone contributes using your unique URL, INDIEGOGO counts that as your referral. 

Spread out the word about LUMBIENT to your friends, family, and acquaintances all over the Internet and you'll earn refunds quickly! Track your own progress by visiting your INDIEGOGO "My Profile" page and clicking on "Referrals" button. For a detailed "how-to" see this help page.

*The referral program does not refund payment of shipping perks. The minimum refund amount is $5.

PRODUCTION SCHEDULE


PERKS EXPLAINED


STRETCH GOALS

If the LUMBIENT campaign raises more than initially planned, new leaf options will be made available. With any additional funds raised, I will be able to offer further colors and even printed patterns. The actual patterns will be selected using feedback collected by a survey that will be sent to backers of this campaign. Your feedback will allow me to create patterns that are based on your own preferences.


WHY CROWDFUNDING?

I’ve created LUMBIENT to give people the freedom to influence their own living space. I believe that the right light can make a difference in creating the right ambiance. That’s why LUMBIENT is created with YOU in the center. Crowdfunding empowers you to influence products that you like. Using crowdfunding enables you to be part of LUMBIENT by giving me on-the-fly feedback, thus making LUMBIENT better! This makes me really excited because I made LUMBIENT for you to enjoy.

RECEIVED FUNDS

Funds raised will go into finalizing the product's design, purchasing materials and tooling, manufacturing  and acquiring knowledge relevant to the manufacturing of LUMBIENT.

SHIPPING

Where applicable, LUMBIENT will be shipped in bulk to fulfillment centers around the world to eliminate customs fees & taxes and to keep shipping prices as low as possible.

LUMBIENTs ordered from the US, CA, EU & IL are shipped to backers from within those regions. Backers in countries other than the above will be responsible for applicable tariffs and customs fees.

Please include shipping fees with your order by adding the shipping perk that corresponds to the table below (click here for country codes).


*Western EU: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Luxemburg, Netherlands, Portugal, Spain & Sweden.

**Central EU: Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Estonia, Hungary, Latvia, Lithuania, Poland, Romania, Slovakia & Slovenia.

HOW CAN YOU HELP?

LUMBIENT will come to life only if it gets fully funded. This campaign is set as an all-or-nothing campaign so your support is extremely important - help us by sharing the light!

  • Support LUMBIENT by backing the campaign - The more you contribute, the higher chance that LUMBIENT will become a reality. While $1 earns you my deepest appreciation, higher sums will bring you closer to owning your very own LUMBIENT light!
  • Participate in LUMBIENT's referral program - You will get 5% off for each of your referrals' contribution as a refund towards your purchase. For more information please look at the INDIEGOGO referral program section above. The referral program does not refund payment on shipping perks.
  • Let people know about LUMBIENT - help LUMBIENT become a reality by telling friends and family about this campaign. Follow LUMBIENT on Twitter, Facebook & Pinterest or use the embedded INDIEGOGO share-tool to spread the word.
  • Mailing list - subscribe to the LUMBIENT mailing list and be the first to get LUMBIENT updates.
  • Tell us what you think! - LUMBIENT was created for you to enjoy, so any feedback from you will help improve LUMBIENT and make it better.  See contact details below.

RISKS & CHALLENGES

A lot of time was spent mitigating as many risks as possible, but bringing a new product into the market might still create unexpected challenges. I will always be transparent and inform backers of any potential hurdles along the way.

  • The product - A lot of effort was put into ensuring the delivery of high quality. This includes building dozens of working prototypes, extensive testing, the use of only high grade materials and components that ensure safety and a long lasting product life. Design refinements will only be made to enhance the user experience.
  • Manufacturing - In order to prevent delays related to materials supply and ensure that quality control is implemented to the highest level, LUMBIENT contracted with experienced manufacturers only. A lot of attention was dedicated to ensure that manufacturers fully understand the product, its  specifications and production’s timeline.
  • Shipping date -  To ensure shipping by the projected dates, the manufacturing process and time span were planned together with the manufacturers themselves. You will be informed in case of any delays in the process/shipping.


ABOUT THE CREATOR

LUMBIENT was designed and created by Roy Schuchmann – a maker, product manager and software developer. Leaving a steady and safe job at a renowned software firm, Roy set out to create a pendant light that will change the way people perceive lighting.

Inspired by current trends of personalization and customization in tangible commodities, Roy designed LUMBIENT in a way that allows owners to decide how LUMBIENT should look, to best fit their homes or offices.

What began as a hobby,  quickly became a full time project involving an intensive search for the materials that best fit LUMBIENT. It went on with building 3D models, creating dozens of prototypes, using laser cutting techniques, contacting suppliers for material sourcing  and manufacturers.


CONTACT

Got questions or feedback? - Please share them with me!

Facebook: /Lumbient

Twitter: @Lumbient

Homepage www.lumbientlamp.com

Email: info@lumbientlamp.com


FAQ

WHAT MATERIALS ARE LUMBIENT'S BODY MADE FROM?

  • Wooden body - natural birch plywood, lightweight, biodegradable, inspired by Scandinavian design, 100% recyclable.

  • Transparent polycarbonate (acrylic) body - crystal clear, dazzling light reflections, smart look, 100% recyclable.

WHAT ARE LUMBIENT's SPECIFICATIONS?

  • Diameter: 22" (56cm)
  • Height: 2" (5cm) high without leaves, 13 3/4" (35cm) with the leaves
  • 8 branches
  • 2 central plates
  • Up to 72 leaves, 4 sizes, 7 colors
  • Transparent electrical cable 6.5 ft. (2m) long
  • Light bulb socket: E26/E27
  • Light bulb: LED/CFL max. 30W, not included
  • 4 supporting steel cables, each 6.5 ft. (2m) long
  • For indoor use only

WHAT IS THE CAMPAIGN'S TIMELINE?

  • March 2015: design work, web marketing
  • April: INDIEGOGO campaign (45 days)
  • May: INDIEGOGO campaign (half month)
  • May: Campaign finalization - Money collection, administrative arrangements (half month).
  • June: product finalization
  • July-August: production of body and leaves, early-bird fulfillment
  • September-November: main perk line fulfillment

HOW ARE THE STRETCH GOAL TIERS CONSTRUCTED?

  • $45,000 - 2 additional leaf colors: Orchid pink & Caribbean blue.
  • $55,000 - 2 additional leaf colors: Ivory white & Spring green.
  • $65,000 - Patterns. Select your LUMBIENT leaves from a variety of printed patterns.

story:
FAQ

Why do you need funding?

Your support will prove our idea. All funding will be used for tooling and APP improvement.

Will blue tooth draw my phone battery if it keeps on all the time?

Yes and No, BikeSys use BLE 4.0. If your smart phone use BLE 4.0 or up, you don’t even feel any battery lost. But if your smart phone is using under BLE 4.0, we suggest use Wireless key to unlock, because it use a lot.

Does BikeSys need a data connection to work?

Yes and No, BikeSys need data connection to send you theft warning, SOS message and unlock by BikeSys APP. It makes GPS more accurate also. But don’t worry about the data charge. BikeSys will only send message when you need. We commend getting a SIM with a pay-as-you-go plan, so you only end up paying for it when you see it. On the other hand, BikeSys works without SIM card if you don't need those functions. Proximity unlock will still work as it use BLE 4.0 but not data connection.

Does BikeSys has warranty?

Yes, we provide 1 years warranty.

Do I have to pay taxes for BikeSys?

Yes. VAT is not included in the perk.

How long before I need to recharge BikeSys?

It depends on how you use headlight. It’s the main power consume unit. We can’t tell you how long exactly. It lasts for at least 34 hours of continuous use in dynamic lighting mode. Believe us, it’s more than enough in urban use. If you switch to manual mode and maximum the power output(max.5x brightness of dynamic lighting mode), it last for 6 hours of continuous use.

Does BikeSys contain charger?

No, we don’t want to provide charger for BikeSys. All of us have smart phone(BikeSys need  smart phone to maximize its function). Please use smart phone charger to recharge BikeSys. We have too many charger already. Save the world, protect our  planet.

Do we have to remove the wireless remote (Wheel) every time we lock up our bike? 

The remote(Wheel) can work stand alone without BikeSys. But the supper long battery life means you don’t have to replace battery frequently.

We’re still under research whether the remote controller should be screwed or quick release. Welcome to give us commend at bikesyshk@gmail.com.


Can BikeSys install on my carbon fiber bike frame?

We didn’t try on carbon fiber bike frame currently. So be responsible to our backer,No, you can’t. We have to test it first. We joined “InDemand” program. Leave us a message, we’ll test it later. Once we passed, we’ll announce you.

How do you secure the battery pack?

Once you lock your bike, you lock the battery pack too. That means you have to unlock your bike before release battery pack.

How to lock my bike if I take out my battery pack?

There is a spare battery inside BikeSys. So you still can lock it.

How to contact you?

Feel free to contact us if you have any other questions or suggestions at bikesyshk@gmail.com.

Your support will prove our idea. All funding will be used for tooling and APP improvement.
Will blue tooth draw my phone battery if it keeps on all the time?
Yes and No, BikeSys use BLE 4.0. If your smart phone use BLE 4.0 or up, you don’t even feel any battery lost. But if your smart phone is using under BLE 4.0, we suggest use Wireless key to unlock, because it use a lot.
Does BikeSys need a data connection to work?


Yes and No, BikeSys need data connection to send you theft warning, SOS message and unlock by BikeSys APP. It makes GPS more accurate also. But don’t worry about the data charge. BikeSys will only send message when you need. We commend getting a SIM with a pay-as-you-go plan, so you only end up paying for it when you see it. On the other hand, BikeSys works without SIM card if you don't need those functions. Proximity unlock will still work as it use BLE 4.0 but not data connection.
Does BikeSys has warranty?
Yes, we provide 1 years warranty.
Do I have to pay taxes for BikeSys?
Yes. VAT is not included in the perk.
How long before I need to recharge BikeSys?

It depends on how you use headlight. It’s the main power consume unit. We can’t tell you how long exactly. It lasts for at least 34 hours of continuous use in dynamic lighting mode. Believe us, it’s more than enough in urban use. If you switch to manual mode and maximum the power output(max.5x brightness of dynamic lighting mode), it last for 6 hours of continuous use.

Does BikeSys contain charger?
No, we don’t want to provide charger for BikeSys. All of us have smart phone(BikeSys need  smart phone to maximize its function). Please use smart phone charger to recharge BikeSys. We have too many charger already. Save the world, protect our  planet.
Do we have to remove the wireless remote (Wheel) every time we lock up our bike? 





The remote(Wheel) can work stand alone without BikeSys. But the supper long battery life means you don’t have to replace battery frequently.
We’re still under research whether the remote controller should be screwed or quick release. Welcome to give us commend at bikesyshk@gmail.com.



Can BikeSys install on my carbon fiber bike frame?
We didn’t try on carbon fiber bike frame currently. So be responsible to our backer,No, you can’t. We have to test it first. We joined “InDemand” program. Leave us a message, we’ll test it later. Once we passed, we’ll announce you.
How do you secure the battery pack?
Once you lock your bike, you lock the battery pack too. That means you have to unlock your bike before release battery pack.
How to lock my bike if I take out my battery pack?

There is a spare battery inside BikeSys. So you still can lock it.
How to contact you?
Feel free to contact us if you have any other questions or suggestions at bikesyshk@gmail.com.

story:
the Ice Chalice

Funnel Top, Canister & Cooling Discs

Science = Magic

Use Any Bartender Spout

Cross Section of the Design

 

The Ice Chalice

  • Michael Sorel Jr: college dropout and inventor

  • This is a product over three years in the making, that we haven’t produced yet commercially because of lack of funding.  If this succeeds, we will be able to produce more innovative products.
  • This is a once in a lifetime opportunity to help produce an inventor’s debut product, that will chill coffee to the maximum enjoyable temperature.

What We Need & What You Get

Here’s the basics you need to know about this project:

  • We need X amount of money to start commercially producing the Ice Chalice.  Most of the money will go towards producing the first ones, which will go to our funders/backers.  The rest will be used to jumpstart commercial production.
  • If you fund us, we will make sure you get one of the first Ice Chalices produced.  You’ll be chilling/cooling your coffee to enjoyable temperatures in no time!

The Impact

The Ice Chalice is a chance to be a part of the future of Iced Coffee:

  • We need a way to make cold coffee in a convenient timeframe.  That’s where the Ice Chalice comes in.  The world will no longer depend on coffee shops for cold coffee. 
  • The Ice Chalice is one of the many inventions of Michael Sorel Jr.  It will hopefully be the first to be produced on a commercial scale.
  • We already have a working prototype and have improved the design to streamline usage in the Ice Chalice ver. 2.0.

Risks & Challenges

There are many unknown factors and variables that will dictate how we make our business decisions.  The challenges are namely: driving the ideal sales figures & finding the right manufacturers to use in our supply chain, as well as other facets of the business.

  • We are a resilient team, that always find a way to make things work.
  • Once we have reached a certain amount of funds, we will narrow down our list of manufacturers to see which one(s) can get us the best return on investment.  We will get our supporters/backers what they were promised.

Other Ways You Can Help

Not a fan of cold coffee or just don’t have the $ to support us, but would still like to help us succeed?  Great, all you have to do is;

  • Tell someone who is a fan of cold coffee about this new product and what they can do to help.
  • Post links to this campaign to your social media

  • Use the indiegogo share tools.

Thank you for your interest for our product’s campaign and for reading until the end.

story:
INTRODUCING PHOTOEMOJI

 

Emojis have become a ubiquitous part of our culture, a part of our text messaging and even picking up their own feature film. Some people today read emojis just as they read words, deciphering the faces to create meaning out of messages.

 

  • Cute, enormously influential: they are the perfect decoration topper for any desk, which is why our team has turned them into a collection of PhotoEmojis.

 

That’s is why the PhotoEmojis are perfect for those photos that have provided you with some of the most unforgettable moments in your life and the opportunity to match your pictures to the emojis they best represent.

​​

  • Something funny? Pick the laughing PhotoEmoji. Something with your partner? Heart eyes all the way.

 

The entire collection of PhotoEmoji has been developed with great care and attention, our team worked hard in each detail since the design until the material to reach an excellent product to be on a par with to display your amazing moments of your life.

 

PhotoEmojis are also an excellent choice for a gift, they are original and perfect to give your friends and family. Give a PhotoEmoji Poop to your best friend with the picture of you two or the PhotoEmoji Nerd to your coworkers holding a photo of your entire team, they will surely love it.

 

PERKS AND REWARDS

 

Right now, we are turning to you,  for help raising the initial investment. This start-up capital will cover the costs of manufacturing, marketing, and distributing the initial run of emoji photograph holders. As a thank-you, we have put together some excellent rewards, including a minimum contribution of $16, plus shipping, for which you will receive your choice of three from nine models of the collection.

 

HELP US TO BRING THE EMOJIS

TO THE WORLD BY SHARING OUR CAMPAIGN!

 

You can help out by sharing our campaign with all your friends and family. Please, share the campaign URL on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Pinterest, and any other social media platforms. The more people are aware of what we are doing, the better shape we will be in once the campaign is over.

Your contributions are greatly appreciated. Thank You!

 

 

 

A CLOSER LOOK

story:
Why did we create SmartPan?

Despite the phenomenal strides in technology and development, this problem is still unsolved.

Who likes to keep a watch on milk when we have better things to do?

Boiling milk is a waiting game. And if somehow, you lose your concentration, you will have a mess to clean for yourself.

In many cases, boiled over milk has damaged stoves and in some adverse cases, it has even caused 3rd-degree skin burns.

So we decided to do something about it.

With its minimalistic design, it gets the work done in an efficient manner.

Not only milk, Smart Pan works with tea, soups, pasta, vermicelli and other food items which tend to get boiled over.

About the Smart Pan:

Q- Is Smart Pan safe to use?

Smart Pan and its lid are made of 100% Stainless Steel so it is completely safe to use.  

Q- How do I use Smart Pan?

SmartPan is very simple to use. Just like any other pan, pour the milk and put its lid on the top.The Smart Pan will take care of the rest. Once the milk is boiled, you can keep the lid aside and use the milk.

Q- How does it work?

The milk gets boiled over because of the steam which pushes the milk out of the pan. The Smart Pan is designed in such a way that lets the steam to escape from its lid, keeping the milk intact. Hence, it lets’ the milk to get back into the pan.

Q- Does it work always?

Yes. Even if you boil the milk on high flame or leave it boiling for hours the milk will not boil over.

Q- Does Smart Pan also work for Tea?

Yes. It works with tea, pasta, vermicelli, soups or any other food which tends to get boiled over.

Q- What is the importance of boiling milk?

Before the advent of pasteurisation, milk-borne illnesses like tuberculosis, diphtheria and typhoid routinely killed many people, especially children, in regions of Europe where milk was consumed, according to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention. Boiling milk not only increases the shelf life of the milk but also kills bacteria and other microorganisms that may be present in the milk.

Q- Is it easy to clean?

Yes, It is as easy to clean as any other utensil.

Q- How much milk can we boil at once in Smart Pan?

Smart Pan has the capacity to boil 2 Litres of milk at once.

Q- When will I receive my Smart Pan if place the order now?

Smart Pan will be delivered to you latest by October. We will try to deliver it as soon as possible. You will be one of the first few people to use the Smart Pan.

Q- Does this Smart Pan work on an Induction or Hot Plate?

Yes. The smart pan is smart enough to work on both.

story:
Greetings!

Welcome to the first crowdfunding campaign for the Internet Connection Informant, the ultimate broadband connection monitoring and management system.

 

A Quick List Of Features

Informant is arguably the most comprehensive connection monitor and manager in its price range, with a feature set that goes on and on and on, but the first few features are probably the most critical:

  • Super Easy To Install. Informant's installation process is about as easy as it gets. Plug your modem's AC power cable or adapter into one outlet on the back of the unit, plug your router's power cable or adapter into the other outlet, connect a network cable from the unit to your router, and plug in Informant's power cable. Informant takes it from there.
  • Super Easy To Use. Using Informant for its basic purpose doesn't require networking expertise. In fact, Informant was carefully designed to be as hands-off as possible. Of course, if you want to do more with Informant, you can, but that's entirely up to you.
  • Totally Automatic Setup & Operation. Informant automatically detects your networking equipment and where it resides on your network, automatically configures itself accordingly, and automatically begins testing; your first basic "up/down" connection test will happen within a few moments and your first comprehensive connection test will be on the next quarter-hour.
  • Your Information Is Private. Informant does not send anything out aside from test data such as DNS lookup requests and "pings." Informant does not monitor anything done by the users on a network, only the Internet connection to and from the network. The testing system is open-source, so you can inspect the program code and see for yourself.

 

If those aren't already enough to invite contributing and picking a perk (or two or three), let's get into some of the good stuff:

  • Quick Tests Every 30 Seconds. Informant will perform a simple "is it up or not?" test once every 30 seconds (by default), by performing a "ping" (ICMP ECHO request) against up to five "ping"-friendly IP addresses. If this test fails, Informant logs the failure and restarts your modem and router.
  • Comprehensive Tests Every 15 Minutes. Informant's comprehensive tests check for DNS lookup problems, slow website access, and also whether your modem and router are responsive or lagging. Results are recorded and reported.
  • Latency/Route Monitoring. Informant can regularly test latency and routing (via "ping" and traceroute) up to 32 IP-address/port combinations. Know when a favorite game server, website, etc. is lagging or unreachable.
  • Front-Panel OLED Display. See what Informant thinks of the connection, get status info, and see what the URL is for Informant's built-in website (next item!) directly from Informant.
  • Built-In Mobile-Friendly Website. Informant includes a built-in web server, and the website it serves gives access to test results (see the next feature!), administration and configuration controls such as a one-click "restart modem/router" button, and more. Informant's website is also mobile-aware and responsive, so it works with almost any display size from mobile phone to 4K monitor and beyond.
  • Charts! Charts Everywhere! Informant saves the results of up to 32,768 tests, and presents the data as charts. Check your connection's condition for the last 24 hours, last week, last month, or break tests down by the hour or day to see if your connection does strange things at specific times.
  • Integrated Security. Informant does not send information outside your network except what it requires for testing, and its website won't allow access to outside IP addresses. As an additional safeguard, any device that wants to access administration and configuration controls must register itself with Informant by repeating a security code Informant will display, thus requiring direct physical access to the unit.
  • Power Failure Detection and Recovery. Informant has its own internal power bank that allows the unit to detect a power failure, shut itself down gracefully, watch for the power to be restored, and restart everything once power has stayed up long enough to appear reasonably stable. All of this is automatic.
  • No Subscriptions and No Apps Required. No monthly fees! We plan to offer additional services on a subscription basis at a later date, but these are entirely optional.
  • Open-Source Testing Software. Informant's test scripts are written in Python and a programming API is provided. Inspect the program code yourself! Create your own tests! Try out tests written by others!
  • Aggressive Attention To Safety. Informant includes a number of safeguards and fault detection systems for electrical safety, such as fused AC mains power input, industrial high-power relays, state-change lockouts, and AC mains voltage sensing. Informant also includes temperature sensing with overheat detection.
  • Quiet Operation. With an aluminum chassis and fanless operation, Informant can reside quietly almost anywhere.
  • We Support & Encourage Right To Repair. Informant's schematics, diagnostic and repair information, and testing system source code will all be available from Informant's website, and spare/replacement parts will also be available to keep your Informant up and running.

 

There's a lot more we can get into, as Informant's feature list is already extensive, and we plan to add more features and functionality during and after the campaign

 

Who Informant Is For

For Seniors

Informant's ability to automatically detect and report connection problems, and automatically restart networking equipment as needed, makes modern Internet-connected life a lot easier for Seniors. No need for messing with power cables when something acts up!

 

For the Family IT Person

If you're the "computer person" for your family, just imagine never again having to use the phrase "did you try unplugging it and plugging it back in?" Informant handles this for you. Plus, Informant supports VPN access, so you can reach into the family network from anywhere and monitor and/or manage the connection remotely.

 

For Small Businesses

Informant removes the need to babysit a company's broadband Internet connection. With a basic "up/down" test happening every 30 seconds (by default), Informant eliminates having to worry about unexpected downtime, or worse, not even knowing about the downtime for who knows how long. Stored test results make finding connection problems, and reporting them to your service provider, a lot easier.

 

For Travellers

Let Informant keep your connection up and running while you're not there, so you can reach your home network's servers and services.

 

For Everyone!

If you have a broadband Internet connection, Informant is for you. Informant can work with cable, DSL, or fiber, and supports most of the "officially supported" broadband modems in use throughout North America.

 

Risks & Challenges

This campaign is the gateway to our first production batch for Informant. As such, we've tried to do all of our homework to ensure minimum risk to all involved. Our target goal ensures that we can produce Informants in sufficient numbers to exploit the benefits of economy of scale and thus keep the per-unit production costs low enough to keep the asking price low, and this being a fixed-funding campaign means that we don't receive a cent unless we clear the cost hurdles from the very beginning.

 

Timeline

The process thus far:

  • 29 Mar 2017: The first fully-functional proof-of-concept codebase is developed.
  • 14 Oct 2017: The first fully-functional prototype is built.
  • 11 Feb 2018: The second fully-functional prototype is built.
  • 5 Aug 2018: The third fully-functional prototype is built. (This is the demo model shown in this campaign.)
  • 1 Oct 2018: This crowdfunding campaign begins.

The process yet to come:

  • November-December 2018: Development continues on a pre-production version, and tooling and equipment are acquired.
  • January-May 2019: Certification and safety testing are conducted on pre-production units, and the production design is finalized.
  • June 2019: Mass production begins.
  • July 2019: The first wave of completed units ship to backers.

Naturally, the future plans are subject to change.

 

Stretch Goals

$500,000 Goal

If we reach this level, we'll design and offer three-outlet and four-outlet models in addition to this campaign's two-outlet. Control more devices from anywhere in your network!

 

$750,000 Goal

If we reach this level, we'll design an additional model that can perform separate WiFi connection testing, and can restart a router or WAP as required using a third or fourth outlet. Test your wireless connection as well as your wired!

 

$1,000,000 Goal

If we reach this level, we'll expand Informant from North America AC mains power only to as many other countries as we can.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Of course we welcome any financial support you wish to give to our project. We also welcome any other forms of support you can offer, such as sharing this campaign on your social media accounts, or even telling friends and neighbors about that neat little box that resets your connection for you.

We even welcome the time you've spent reading our campaign information, and thank you for giving us a little bit of your day!

Informant includes a number of safeguards and fault detection systems for electrical safety, such as fused AC mains power input, industrial high-power relays, state-change lockouts, and AC mains voltage sensing. Informant also includes temperature sensing with overheat detection.

Quiet Operation. With an aluminum chassis and fanless operation, Informant can reside quietly almost anywhere.

We Support & Encourage Right To Repair. Informant's schematics, diagnostic and repair information, and testing system source code will all be available from Informant's website, and spare/replacement parts will also be available to keep your Informant up and running.

 
There's a lot more we can get into, as Informant's feature list is already extensive, and we plan to add more features and functionality during and after the campaign
 
Who Informant Is For
For Seniors
Informant's ability to automatically detect and report connection problems, and automatically restart networking equipment as needed, makes modern Internet-connected life a lot easier for Seniors. No need for messing with power cables when something acts up!
 
For the Family IT Person
If you're the "computer person" for your family, just imagine never again having to use the phrase "did you try unplugging it and plugging it back in?" Informant handles this for you. Plus, Informant supports VPN access, so you can reach into the family network from anywhere and monitor and/or manage the connection remotely.
 
For Small Businesses
Informant removes the need to babysit a company's broadband Internet connection. With a basic "up/down" test happening every 30 seconds (by default), Informant eliminates having to worry about unexpected downtime, or worse, not even knowing about the downtime for who knows how long. Stored test results make finding connection problems, and reporting them to your service provider, a lot easier.
 
For Travellers
Let Informant keep your connection up and running while you're not there, so you can reach your home network's servers and services.
 
For Everyone!
If you have a broadband Internet connection, Informant is for you. Informant can work with cable, DSL, or fiber, and supports most of the "officially supported" broadband modems in use throughout North America.
 

Risks & Challenges
This campaign is the gateway to our first production batch for Informant. As such, we've tried to do all of our homework to ensure minimum risk to all involved. Our target goal ensures that we can produce Informants in sufficient numbers to exploit the benefits of economy of scale and thus keep the per-unit production costs low enough to keep the asking price low, and this being a fixed-funding campaign means that we don't receive a cent unless we clear the cost hurdles from the very beginning.
 
Timeline
The process thus far:

29 Mar 2017: The first fully-functional proof-of-concept codebase is developed.
14 Oct 2017: The first fully-functional prototype is built.
11 Feb 2018: The second fully-functional prototype is built.
5 Aug 2018: The third fully-functional prototype is built. (This is the demo model shown in this campaign.)
1 Oct 2018: This crowdfunding campaign begins.

The process yet to come:

November-December 2018: Development continues on a pre-production version, and tooling and equipment are acquired.
January-May 2019: Certification and safety testing are conducted on pre-production units, and the production design is finalized.
June 2019: Mass production begins.
July 2019: The first wave of completed units ship to backers.

Naturally, the future plans are subject to change.
 
Stretch Goals
$500,000 Goal
If we reach this level, we'll design and offer three-outlet and four-outlet models in addition to this campaign's two-outlet. Control more devices from anywhere in your network!
 
$750,000 Goal
If we reach this level, we'll design an additional model that can perform separate WiFi connection testing, and can restart a router or WAP as required using a third or fourth outlet. Test your wireless connection as well as your wired!
 
$1,000,000 Goal
If we reach this level, we'll expand Informant from North America AC mains power only to as many other countries as we can.
 
Other Ways You Can Help

Of course we welcome any financial support you wish to give to our project. We also welcome any other forms of support you can offer, such as sharing this campaign on your social media accounts, or even telling friends and neighbors about that neat little box that resets your connection for you.
We even welcome the time you've spent reading our campaign information, and thank you for giving us a little bit of your day!

story:
Our Story

Founded by Sekou Toussaint, Attract Technologies embodies the American dream. Sekou was born in Guyana, South America, immigrated to New York as a child, earned his BA from Bethune-Cookman University, and later, his MBA from the University of Phoenix. Sekou, inspired by his parents to strive toward becoming the best version of himself, has always been hard-wired to solve problems and make people’s lives better.  

In 2019, he launched Attract Technologies with the mission to create products that solve human problems and to encourage and inspire others in their own creative pursuits. He is committed to giving back to Daytona Beach, through creating new jobs and being an active catalyst for delivering economic greatness in his beloved city of Daytona Beach Florida and across the globe.

The Product

I have lived in many apartment complexes over the years and I'm sure others can attest to the issues that accompany the chore of taking trash to the community compactor. One frustration was that I had no way to conveniently and securely transport my trash bags with my car.

  • If the trash bag was transported inside the vehicle it would sometimes leak or cause a stench to linger
  • If the trash bag was put on top of the trunk or hood it would fall off and sometimes burst open. Not to mention you have to drive like a snail to make sure the bag doesn't fall off before you reach the compactor

Enter the Trash Caddy™!

The Trash Caddy™ is a personal trash bag transport tool that eliminates this frustrations. 

Benefits:

  • Conveniently and securely transport trash bags to avoid spillage
  • No more stinky or leaky trash in your vehicle
  • Easy to use and stowaway in the glove compartment, under the seat or side door

Features:

  • Built to transport two full 15 gallon trash bags at a time
  • Protective rubber material to prevent abrasions on vehicle
  • Lightweight and durable 

The Trash Caddy™ Perks: Limited Amount

  • 20% off of one Trash Caddy™ 
  • Buy 2 get 1 FREE

Your participation in this campaign will enable us to manufacture and deliver the Trash Caddy™ to market, as well as lay the foundation for more products to come.

Our goal is to begin to manufacture and ship the Trash Caddy™ in January 2021. 

Thank you for your support!

Other Ways You Can Help

Unable to participate? No worries. Please help us share this campaign with your friends and family by using the indiegogo share tools.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Our phones, speakers, virtual assistants and appliances have gotten smarter and changed our daily lives for the better. In the wrong hands, they can also be used to steal, attack and invade your privacy, devices and data.

And this is exactly why we made Fortigis.

Fortigis protects you from online threats with an all-in-one package, that includes VPN, Firewall, Intrusion Prevention System, Antivirus, and Anti-malware.

Fortigis allows you to control who is connected to your home network, alerts you when someone is trying to connect and informs you about your connected smart devices' activity.

All these features are managed at your fingertips via an app available on web and mobile!

Statistics are not in our favor, adversaries aren’t either!

We want to safeguard ourselves and others. We’ve seen the impact of being unprotected first-hand and we’ve made it our mission to defend everyday people against online threats so that no more lives are affected.

Installing Fortigis is easy and quick. Easy as 1-2-3 (with a happy bonus 4)!

Adding New Devices - Whenever you add a new device to your network, Fortigis automatically identifies the type of connected device and assigns the relevant security profile without any configuration or downloading special software to the device. Fortigis is a powerful sentry protecting your castle with two incredible weapons at the ready:  the Virtual Private Network (VPN) and the patent-pending AI-powered security cloud. They are always working together in the background to create the ultimate in home (castle) network security.  

The VPN - Cloak of Privacy

Fortigis creates a Virtual Private Network (VPN) to give you online privacy and anonymity by creating a secure and private connection from your home network.
                                                                                                                                           
Having a VPN connection means that your actions on the internet are virtually untraceable. This protects you from being tracked and exploited online.  

The secure connection encrypts all of your incoming and outgoing web traffic so no one, not even your internet provider, can see your online activity. It acts as the cloaking device that hides your IP address from the websites you visit and the services you use.

The Power of the Security Cloud - The All Seeing Wizard

Fortigis connects to a proprietary security cloud to create the VPN. This isn’t just any cloud,  it contains Fortigis’ patent-pending adaptive security system. This utilizes machine learning and artificial intelligence (AI) to powerfully protect your home network. Fortigis deploys real-time threat analysis and security scanning to make sure that all inbound and outbound traffic is always private and clean from any viruses, malware, ransomware, and other threats.

A low-cost monthly subscription is necessary to take advantage of the AI-driven Cloud and the up to 200Mbps VPN. The subscription is in addition to the Fortigis device.



Foritigis comes with a free app (iOS/Android/Web) that allows users to easily manage their network.  

Through the app, you can confirm or deny access to anyone or anything trying to connect to your network. You can also monitor all relevant analytics for all of your devices and network.



The app also provides real-time stats on connected devices such as average internet speeds, devices blocked, total threats and failed connection attempts. There is even a map of where the attacks are coming from.
No need to hide your technology with the Fortigis!

Strength and Beauty - Inspired by the fortifying bricks in castle walls and the clean complexity of the Rubik’s cube, the Fortigis is a patented work of art symbolizing both strength and beauty.

Whisper Quiet - The Fortigis also has no moving parts, so will be whisper quiet while it stands in silence guarding your internet walls.



Having worked at the enterprise security level for many years, we saw the good, bad and ugly of unsecured online networks. A tipping point for us was when Dyn, one of the largest DNS providers, was attacked by 100,000 hijacked smart devices (i.e. smart locks, lights, refrigerators, security cameras and more). That attack almost took down the entire internet.

With hackings getting more and more commonplace each year, we realized that there was a clear and desperate need for the Fortigis around the world. We could no longer stand by in good conscious while millions of people around the world continued to be at risk to attacks. So we jumped into action to provide the same level of security we’ve been involved with for years to everyday people.

Join our campaign and help us stop online attacks once and for all.

Your contribution will help us ensure that your connected home will be protected by the best security service in the world.  With your help, we will finish our development, expand the power of our cloud and perfect our production processes.

The Fortigis team is a band of serial entrepreneurs, hackers, and executives with over 60 years of experience. We’ve founded or co-founded technology companies in the areas of cybersecurity, robotics, IoT, and telecoms. This blend of skills ensures that we are prepared to be successful in both the technology and business sides.

Our team has already sold a successful cybersecurity startup focusing on threat intelligence and behavioral analytics. Most of the team has also participated in TechStars, MassChallenge, and other reputable accelerators.

But most importantly, we are everyday people that use the internet. Our driving passion is to provide you with the same online protection as we would our own family and loved ones.

Our team is well equipped to deliver products we are proud of on time. We have both the technical expertise and the previous business experience required in order to execute the Fortigis project.

With that said, there are several things that we need to overcome in order to succeed:

  • Coordinating with manufacturers to evolve Fortigis from prototype to end product may be challenging.  We have prepared for this by speaking with the manufacturing companies ahead of time in order to get a clear idea of what the process will be like. In this way, most potential issues have already been assessed. Building computer hardware comes with its own inherent risks but given the experience and professionalism of our suppliers, we trust that there will be marginal unforeseen issues.
     
  • We need to optimize the applied software and apps. Our beta products are already equipped for that task, but over the next few months, we will have to improve the software in order to scale and support thousands of homes and connected devices. This is certainly a challenge, but one that we have had a collective hands-on experience to overcome.

How does the Fortigis protect users?
Fortigis is a cloud-enabled, privacy & security wireless, VPN router that checks, controls and manages who connects to a user’s Wi-Fi network. In short, it works with your router to protect all your connected devices.

Can something like a smart refrigerator or a smart teddy bear really be used to hack?
Yes and it’s not difficult! An 11-year-old in Austin, Texas used his teddy bear to hack into Bluetooth devices to manipulate a robotic teddy bear at a cybersecurity conference in the Netherlands.

What could happen if I don’t protect my data and devices?

  • Your privacy being violated
    • IP Cameras, smart TVs, voice assistants and other smart devices can lead to you being tracked, and having your personal and sensitive information held for blackmail
  • Your Identity in someone else’s hands
    • Laptops, desktops or storage devices can be hacked. Shopping from the privacy of your own home isn’t private if you aren’t protected.
  • Your home unlocked without permission
    • Smart locks or doors hacked to open at the touch of a button
  • Your family’s safety is in jeopardy
    • Smart devices in your kitchen, heater, AC, CO monitoring can be hacked and turned off when you need it the most to survive.  Medical devices (e.g. insulin pumps) get hacked and your life is at the mercy of the adversaries!
  • You unknowingly aid in a crime
    • Your connected devices can be harnessed to commit a cyberattack against someone without your knowledge

Do I need to be “techie” to use this device.
You certainly can be, but it’s made for people who want to be protected without fuss or having to learn about complex systems. If you can plug something in, connect it to the internet and use an app, you can use Fortigis!

Does this replace my router?
It is a router that works with your ISP router. It does not replace it.

Is Fortigis simply a Wi-Fi bridge?
No. It is full fledge cloud-enabled, privacy & security wireless, VPN router that checks, controls and manages who connects to a user’s Wi-Fi network. There is no need to bridge your existing router.

Is Fortigis cloud based security or a hardware router?
It’s both! It has a physical router in order to control the WLAN and setup the VPN. It also has a cloud environment where most of the security controls reside for cutting edge intelligence and zero updates for the end-user.

Why does Fortigis need the cloud to operate?
All the heavy lifting of analysis is happening in the cloud so as to have virtually unlimited resources. It also keeps owners of the Fortigis from having to download updates.

What happens if I do not renew the subscription?
Fortigis without the subscription acts as a very well designed router with enhanced WiFi access & connected devices management.

Do you track, collect or sell my data to other companies?
We are a cybersecurity company that takes your privacy extremely seriously. As per our privacy policy (https://www.fortigis.com/privacy-policy/) we DO NOT use your data for anything more than protecting you and the Fortigis community. We only retain your data for 30 days.

Is Fortigis open source?
No. Although it is based on a combination of open source and proprietary technology. We are involved with open source threat intelligence and we do intend to share our findings with the open source community.

Why is the Fortigis inline and not out of path?
It comes down to speed. We want to be able to block the malicious traffic immediately. Out of path sniffers have a delayed reaction that might lead to you been impacted from the malicious traffic.

I have really strong passwords, why would I need something like Fortigis?
Unfortunately you can't do much with passwords if you want to protect your connected devices like Alexa, IP cameras, refrigerators, etc. The only way to defend these devices is to enhance the security of the network they are operating in.

Why do I need a VPN? I have nothing to hide.
It is always good to add another layer of security on your traffic. Even if you have nothing to hide, doesn’t mean we want to make it easy for strangers to see and have the ability to share and publish every aspect of our lives.

As renowned author and journalist Glenn Greenwald said, “...every single time somebody has said to me, 'I don't really worry about invasions of privacy because I don't have anything to hide,' I always say the same thing to them. I get out a pen. I write down my email address. I say, 'Here's my email  address. What I want you to do when you get home is email me the passwords to all of your email accounts, not just the nice, respectable work one in your name, but all of them, because I want to be able to just troll through what it is you're doing online, read what I want to read and publish whatever I find interesting. After all, if you're not a bad person, if you're doing nothing wrong, you should have nothing to hide.'  Not a single person has taken me up on that offer. I check that email account religiously all the time. It's a very desolate place."

Doesn’t VPN kill internet speed?
We are using quad-core Intel Atom processors to avoid noticeable slowdown. Our VPN can reach speeds up to 200Mpbs. This adds a minimal delay to your connection that goes unnoticeable on streaming, browsing and downloading. It is not recommended for competitive e-sports gaming.

Do you support 3rd party VPNs?
No. Currently we only support our own.

This only creates a VPN? How else is it so secure?
We are consuming multiple commercial & open source threat feeds, we have a behavioral engine to spot anomalies and some signature based ones for known threats.

Can Fortigis detect/protect you from sniffers?
Yes, it does! Fortigis device acts as your WLAN gatekeeper and makes sure you have authorized all devices connected to it. On top of that its behavioral engine will alert you if something unusual is happening in your network.

Can this protect you while accessing the deep web?
We can identify and block TOR traffic as well as notify for in & out Deep Web associated IPs

What hardware security specs does Fortigis have?
Most of the security features are provided via our cloud environment. For the physical device itself, we have hardware encryption offloading, tamper proofing & digitally signed firmware. Also, for users we have access lists & firewalls.

Will Fortigis work with different electrical outlets?
Yes, it will work with North America, UK and Europe.

Does the Fortigis come in different colors?
Currently the Fortigis comes in one color, the lovely light beechwood.

How durable is the Fortigis?
Fortigis durability is similar to other electronic devices. We have dropped it from the desk a few times and it didn’t crack or have any dents. The skeleton of Fortigis is built with a robust ABS plastic structure. The device is covered with second ABS cover with wood finish on three sides and the rest is covered with a 3mm thick brushed stainless steel. All connectors used have enforced pins for higher strength. The sandblasted aluminum heat sink at the bottom allows for a continuous high loading of the Fortigis processor.

Is there a warranty?
There is a 1 limited year warranty for the device.

Is shipping included in the price?
Shipping is separate and will be added at checkout.

Who is in charge of paying for taxes and tariffs if my country requires it?
The customer is responsible for any taxes or tariffs.

Who can I contact for additional information?
Email us at hello@fortigis.com for any additional questions or issues.
