Your family’s safety is in jeopardySmart devices in your kitchen, heater, AC, CO monitoring can be hacked and turned off when you need it the most to survive.  Medical devices (e.g. insulin pumps) get hacked and your life is at the mercy of the adversaries!

You unknowingly aid in a crimeYour connected devices can be harnessed to commit a cyberattack against someone without your knowledge

Do I need to be “techie” to use this device.You certainly can be, but it’s made for people who want to be protected without fuss or having to learn about complex systems. If you can plug something in, connect it to the internet and use an app, you can use Fortigis!Does this replace my router?It is a router that works with your ISP router. It does not replace it.Is Fortigis simply a Wi-Fi bridge?No. It is full fledge cloud-enabled, privacy & security wireless, VPN router that checks, controls and manages who connects to a user’s Wi-Fi network. There is no need to bridge your existing router.Is Fortigis cloud based security or a hardware router?It’s both! It has a physical router in order to control the WLAN and setup the VPN. It also has a cloud environment where most of the security controls reside for cutting edge intelligence and zero updates for the end-user.Why does Fortigis need the cloud to operate?All the heavy lifting of analysis is happening in the cloud so as to have virtually unlimited resources. It also keeps owners of the Fortigis from having to download updates.What happens if I do not renew the subscription?Fortigis without the subscription acts as a very well designed router with enhanced WiFi access & connected devices management.Do you track, collect or sell my data to other companies?We are a cybersecurity company that takes your privacy extremely seriously. As per our privacy policy (https://www.fortigis.com/privacy-policy/) we DO NOT use your data for anything more than protecting you and the Fortigis community. We only retain your data for 30 days.Is Fortigis open source?No. Although it is based on a combination of open source and proprietary technology. We are involved with open source threat intelligence and we do intend to share our findings with the open source community.Why is the Fortigis inline and not out of path?It comes down to speed. We want to be able to block the malicious traffic immediately. Out of path sniffers have a delayed reaction that might lead to you been impacted from the malicious traffic.I have really strong passwords, why would I need something like Fortigis?Unfortunately you can't do much with passwords if you want to protect your connected devices like Alexa, IP cameras, refrigerators, etc. The only way to defend these devices is to enhance the security of the network they are operating in.Why do I need a VPN? I have nothing to hide.It is always good to add another layer of security on your traffic. Even if you have nothing to hide, doesn’t mean we want to make it easy for strangers to see and have the ability to share and publish every aspect of our lives.As renowned author and journalist Glenn Greenwald said, “...every single time somebody has said to me, 'I don't really worry about invasions of privacy because I don't have anything to hide,' I always say the same thing to them. I get out a pen. I write down my email address. I say, 'Here's my email  address. What I want you to do when you get home is email me the passwords to all of your email accounts, not just the nice, respectable work one in your name, but all of them, because I want to be able to just troll through what it is you're doing online, read what I want to read and publish whatever I find interesting. After all, if you're not a bad person, if you're doing nothing wrong, you should have nothing to hide.'  Not a single person has taken me up on that offer. I check that email account religiously all the time. It's a very desolate place."Doesn’t VPN kill internet speed?We are using quad-core Intel Atom processors to avoid noticeable slowdown. Our VPN can reach speeds up to 200Mpbs. This adds a minimal delay to your connection that goes unnoticeable on streaming, browsing and downloading. It is not recommended for competitive e-sports gaming.Do you support 3rd party VPNs?No. Currently we only support our own.This only creates a VPN? How else is it so secure?We are consuming multiple commercial & open source threat feeds, we have a behavioral engine to spot anomalies and some signature based ones for known threats.Can Fortigis detect/protect you from sniffers?Yes, it does! Fortigis device acts as your WLAN gatekeeper and makes sure you have authorized all devices connected to it. On top of that its behavioral engine will alert you if something unusual is happening in your network.Can this protect you while accessing the deep web?We can identify and block TOR traffic as well as notify for in & out Deep Web associated IPsWhat hardware security specs does Fortigis have?Most of the security features are provided via our cloud environment. For the physical device itself, we have hardware encryption offloading, tamper proofing & digitally signed firmware. Also, for users we have access lists & firewalls.Will Fortigis work with different electrical outlets?Yes, it will work with North America, UK and Europe.Does the Fortigis come in different colors?Currently the Fortigis comes in one color, the lovely light beechwood.How durable is the Fortigis?Fortigis durability is similar to other electronic devices. We have dropped it from the desk a few times and it didn’t crack or have any dents. The skeleton of Fortigis is built with a robust ABS plastic structure. The device is covered with second ABS cover with wood finish on three sides and the rest is covered with a 3mm thick brushed stainless steel. All connectors used have enforced pins for higher strength. The sandblasted aluminum heat sink at the bottom allows for a continuous high loading of the Fortigis processor.Is there a warranty?There is a 1 limited year warranty for the device.Is shipping included in the price?Shipping is separate and will be added at checkout.Who is in charge of paying for taxes and tariffs if my country requires it?The customer is responsible for any taxes or tariffs.Who can I contact for additional information?Email us at hello@fortigis.com for any additional questions or issues.

story:
Premium Tech UK

High end security at blazing fast speeds, experience our top VPN now!

 

Browse the web with no limitations!

Bypass restricted and location locked content from anywhere!

 

 

     

 

 

 

Super Fast, Super Secure, Easy To Use Service & Instant Set Up!

 

 

 

There are many VPN services out there. However they do require you to run them on specific operating systems, with specific apps, and so on. This is why we decided to create one device, that covers all other devices. You want to use it on your streaming device? No problem. On your phone? No problem! It is as simple as connecting to your existing router. Either connect it via one of the available gigabit Ethernet ports, or connect it to the Premium Tech UK Smart VPN Router WiFi network, and you are set!

 

 

WHY SHOULD YOU CHOOSE OUR SMART ROUTERS ?

 

  • It protects your identity
  • Unlike other providers, that limit the amount of device that can be used with their service – ours allows you to connect ALL of your home devices at the same time
  • We will never log any of your information – even if we get asked by law enforcement to provide any – we simply do not have it.
  • In order to provide everyone with fast connections – we utilize multiple servers around the world. We currently offer over 20+ Countries with the fastest VPN connection.
  • Provides VPN to devices like (MAG BOX, Smart TV’s, Firestick, Zgemma, Enigma and many more)

 

OTHER SMART FEATURES 

 

Wi-Fi CONVERTER:

Wi-Fi is to a great degree mainstream yet at the same time may not be accessible at anyplace. On the off chance that you are as yet utilizing a wired system at inns or bistros, this small scale switch can change over it to a wireless system for sharing the Wi-Fi with every one of your gadgets. Indeed, even in places like bistros or eateries with Wi-Fi, it may not be a smart thought to open your gadgets to the general population arrange straightforwardly. This switch changes over an open Wi-Fi to your own Wi-Fi with a firewall and after that fills in as an operator for securer surfing. The specialist associates every one of your gadgets when switching to 
another Wi-Fi. You don’t need to enter secret key for every one of your gadgets. The switch is additionally ready to change over your telephone tying, or 3G/4G USB modems into a private Wi-Fi

 

LARGER STORAGE & EXTENDIBILITY

The router is equipped with 128MB RAM and 16MB Flash, which can be further extend using external USB sticks. There are 2 Ethernet ports, 1 UART, and 4 GPIOs available for hardware DIY hobbyists. It is an ideal portable gateway for IoT (internet of things) development.

 

  • Mini-router for Virtual Private Networking (VPN). Supports OpenVPN
  • Defeats internet surveillance by encrypting all internet traffic from your home network
  • Based on field tested standards – GL-AR300M OpenWRT, OVPN and our own VPN Service
  • Includes 2 Years VPN Subscription.

 

TECHNICAL DETAILS : 

  • Brand name: Premium Tech UK
  • Item weight : 40.8 g
  • Product Dimension : 58 x 58 x 25 cm
  • Color : Yellow
  • Processor Type : None
  • Processor Speed : 580 MHz
  • RAM Size : 128 MB
  • Computer Memory Type : DDR2 SDRAM
  • USB Interface ; USB 2.0
  • Wireless Type : 802.11abg
  • Voltage : 5V

story:
About Las-Bot

We have created a reliable compact laser engraver that is really simple to use. Now engraving your photo on plywood is as easy as printing it on paper. Moreover, you could engrave on other materials: plastic, leather, rubber, paper and even glass. 

And here it is, take a closer look:

Our designers have taken care of the Las-Bot forms and it can perfectly fit into the interior of your house, studio, garage, workshop or any other place where You would like to use it.

Cute own style wallet, personalized cup, beautiful painting for the wall, homemade shadow play, funny breakfast for family or special board game for kids - these are just a few samples how You could improve things around or simply express Your love to family and friends.

Mini-guide

Las-Bot was specially designed for a simple use and after 2-3 times it would not take more than 5 minutes to prepare image for engraving.

General steps are:

1. Take a photo or download/purchase and image You would like to engrave. 

NOTE: Higher resolution of original image would lead to higher quality of engraving. 

2. Convert Your image into a G-code using our software. Some additional filters could be used before converting to stylize image.

NOTE: Software for Windows is available. Software for macOS, IOS and Android is under construction.

NOTE: You could use third-party software and open source software, as Inkscape, to create G-code. Las-Bot would still work with it.

3. Send ready code to the Las-Bot via USB cable, Bluetooth or SD card. 

4. Drink a cup of coffee while Las-Bot is working on Your image engraving.

Programs, Instructions, FAQ, Tips and Tricks would be available on our website for read and download after fund-raising campaign will finish. We hope You would ask many questions during campaign so that we could make information even more useful.

 

Materials to use

 

 

 What is inside?

With such impressive capabilities Las-Bot is quite small that allows to use it nearly everywhere.

The core hardware is laser with electronics and step engines, all fixed on a durable stainless steel frame. Precise guide and powerful laser give You more possibilities in high-quality  engraving and give scope for the imagination.

The metal frame is hidden under a secure plastic sheath that protects eyes from laser light,  avoids hands and fingers from accidental get to the working space and protects kids and adults from other accidents.

At the top of the housing there is a viewing window that both helps to place the laser on the  work surface and allows to watch engraving process for everyone without any damage to eyesight. Now engraving does not need protective glasses and You do not have to worry that someone would come during the engraving process.

Technical and other Information:

  • Weight: 2,1 kg
  • Power input: AC 12V 2A (Charger is included)
  • Laser power, max: 2500 mW
  • Lifetime Estimation of laser: 10000 hours
  • Traveling speed, max: 12000 mm/min
  • Resolution, min: 50 μm
  • Workspace: 100x150 mm

 

PERK COLOR OPTIONS

Right now we are happy to propose You 4 color options of Las-Bot:

OUR GOAL

We dream to make laser engraving technology  accessible for everyone regardless to age, sex or profession. Such technological revolution has already occurred in photography and printing - we want to bring to a new sphere.

Creating a community that shares result of their work we could create a real database of works and ideas for different parts of our life at home and in work.

The only thing we need is Your support! Only you can decide the fate of this project.
In return, we will give you the opportunity to realize your ideas and dreams with the help of Las-Bot.

 

TIMELINE

MORE INFORMATION AT http://lasearts.com

 

RISKS

We are in pre-production stage now with suppliers and subcontractors who are ready to start. There are no predictable risks that could lead to faire although succeed chances are not 100% still. Even the best plan have weak points at human factor, Force Majeure, delays etc.

Even though we are not ready to propose absolut guarantee - we do believe in what we create and we love it. So You do not have even to doubt that we will do our best and even better to get Las-Bot off the ground and let it make thousands of people all over the world happy.

Las-Bot is what we believe in and hope You would also start share our feelings.

story:
Having The Best Of Both World

WORLD LIGHT is a 2 in 1 decorative ambiance lighting for your space. During the day, it gives the visual impression of a detailed 3D World Map. Come nightfall, the lamp comes to life, illuminating a fabulous view of Earth at Night. 


Inspired by NASA Earth Observatory

Back in 2019, we created the NITELANDING Lamp out of the special connection we had with the view from the airplane window seat at 30,000ft.  Each time when we think about it, it brings a smile to our faces. 

Then when we looked at the sky above and wondered what is it out there in the vastness of space & how will the world look like from there? So out of curiosity, we browse through the available media on space exploration. 

 The more we see Earth's images from NASA satellite & observatory, we felt as though we walked into the most magnificent art gallery. We then came to our realization that we're one of this little gleam of light that this astronaut saw up there. The beautiful collective lights showed human settlements like the saying "where there is light, there is life".

We created the 'WORLD LIGHT' through the eyes of the astronaut viewing Earth at night. We want you to have that same fascination as we have. 

 

WORLD LIGHT by Night  

satellite image from NASA Earth Observatory at night

close up view of WORLD LIGHT resembling the view of Earth at Night

What is it like to view the earth from outer space? The closest thing to experience this magical feeling is the WORLD LIGHT cozy shimmering light dot effect.

Let's Light Up Our Space! When you lay eyes on the WORLD LIGHT, you'll get the warmth & cozy feeling to your living space.  Especially when it's totally dark and you lit the WORLD LIGHT in the darkness of your room. The light dot effect will give you the feeling of being out in outer space.

 

The light dot effect simulated Earth view at night. "Where there's light, there's life"

 

WORLD ART By Day  

Walk into your home or office and be pleasantly greeted by the WORLD LIGHT.  Be it classic, traditional, modern, eclectic, or contemporary.  The WORLD LIGHT design will blend in seamlessly with any decor.

Beautify your home or office with this work of ART and give your space 'the art gallery' look.


 Display it your way

The WORLD LIGHT versatile display capability of wall hang or freestanding, lets you have a piece of mind on how to display in your decor. 

 

 With Precision Comes Beauty

With precision comes beauty, each artwork of the WORLD LIGHT is carefully crafted with the latest state of ART technology in forging micro details as fine as 0.6 mm. Resulting in a 3 Dimensional work of ART.

The WORLD LIGHT embodies a deep appreciation for simplistic beauty and unwavering commitment to craftsmanship.

 

Pick Your Style!

From raw beauty to classic style, to sleek lines, here are 4 styles to choose from!

 

 Geometric Wood

 

 

Geometric White 

 

Classic Wood

 

 Classic White

 

We want to introduce you to a modern style of World Map, blending in intricate patterns and simplicity to give you this unique look.

 

close up detail of the Geometric style of the world at day and world at night look

 

close up detail of the Classic style of the world at day and world at night look

 

Design Detail
 

 

Packaging Design Detail 

Our double-wall corrugated Kraft packaging has been designed to withstand high impact during transportation.  We've gone through several 'drop tests', to ensure that the items and other accessories in the packaging are well protected. 

All these thanks to the high-density foam securing the internal of the corrugated carton box, giving you peace of mind upon receiving your items. 

 

Product Features 

 

Control WORLD LIGHT From Your Fingertips

The WORLD LIGHT comes with a dimmer switch that lets you adjust your lighting in a breeze.  

A simple touch on the power icon to either switch ON/OFF.  If you want to dim the light up or down, simply press and hold it according to your most preferable setting with the step-less dimmer.

What’s great about the dimmer switch is its built-in smart memory chipset, where it intelligently recognizes your last brightness after turned OFF. Perfect for your preferred preset brightness to your bed light level before sleep!

 

Universal power adaptor

Each WORLD LIGHT comes with a universal power adaptor. We will also provide 4 additional changeable plugs consist of US, UK, EU, AU sockets for every set.

The new locking system makes it easy to change the plug according to the different country electrical sockets. Perfect gift for your family and friends who lives in a different country! 

 

 

SHIPPING GUIDE

We're partnering with major shipping providers. We'll use the most reliable delivery method that's suitable for different countries. All orders will be shipped from Singapore with international tracking.

For domestic orders (Singapore), we'll be using our local courier partner to deliver your orders island-wide.

** If you have selected multiple sets, the shipping cost per set will be much lesser. Please message us if you want more than 1 set, we'll calculate the cost & shipping for you.

 

THE TEAM

We’re a group of passionate designers and always dream of creating our very own product that could benefit people from all walks of life. We truly believed with the simple touch of design could make a big impact on society and let them enjoy life to the fullest. 

WORLD LIGHT is a clean & simple art that contains the spirit of our design. This project is all about helping people to light up our lively world. Together let make our world lively again!

 

Risks and challenges

The WORLD LIGHT was not created overnight and we've gone through countless prototypes of various materials, sizes and proportions. We've spent a tremendous amount of time refining the shape and aesthetics design so that you can own a timeless artisan piece. As we believe in the power of design and our experience in design development to reach its finest state. Rest assured that the WORLD LIGHT will be delivered to you the same quality as promised in this campaign. The only challenge for us is depending on the order quantity of the WORLD LIGHT. Despite having a plan in place to ensure a smooth delivery to you. In the event that there is a delay in the manufacturing or shipping, we promise to keep all our backers updated by completely being transparent all the way throughout the end.

The new locking system makes it easy to change the plug according to the different country electrical sockets. Perfect gift for your family and friends who lives in a different country! 

 

 
SHIPPING GUIDE

We're partnering with major shipping providers. We'll use the most reliable delivery method that's suitable for different countries. All orders will be shipped from Singapore with international tracking.
For domestic orders (Singapore), we'll be using our local courier partner to deliver your orders island-wide.
** If you have selected multiple sets, the shipping cost per set will be much lesser. Please message us if you want more than 1 set, we'll calculate the cost & shipping for you. THE TEAM

We’re a group of passionate designers and always dream of creating our very own product that could benefit people from all walks of life. We truly believed with the simple touch of design could make a big impact on society and let them enjoy life to the fullest. 
WORLD LIGHT is a clean & simple art that contains the spirit of our design. This project is all about helping people to light up our lively world. Together let make our world lively again!
 
Risks and challenges

The WORLD LIGHT was not created overnight and we've gone through countless prototypes of various materials, sizes and proportions. We've spent a tremendous amount of time refining the shape and aesthetics design so that you can own a timeless artisan piece. As we believe in the power of design and our experience in design development to reach its finest state. Rest assured that the WORLD LIGHT will be delivered to you the same quality as promised in this campaign. The only challenge for us is depending on the order quantity of the WORLD LIGHT. Despite having a plan in place to ensure a smooth delivery to you. In the event that there is a delay in the manufacturing or shipping, we promise to keep all our backers updated by completely being transparent all the way throughout the end.

story:
The present invention is a rollable hanger that uses a few simple parts.It is intended to be a sort of “all-in-one” hanger where it can be used with almost all types of clothing. The mechanics of this invention is designed to be easy to use. Simply roll one of the arms and insert the other into the collar. Then tilt the hanger left and right until the rolled arm extends.

The product is built with three different parts. There is a turnable middle hook and anchor, the middle connectors and an end piece. Since the simple parts hook together, you can easily set the length to fit whatever clothing you need.


Conventional fixed hangers are normally used to hang many different types of clothing: suits, sweaters, T-shirts, dress shirts, dresses, blouses, and turtle neck sweaters etc. It is particularly difficult to use conventional hangers on some types of clothes, especially in clothes that are fragile and will be damaged due to the stress exerted on the collar. Seams break and linings are stretched, resulting in clothes deteriorating faster than normal. 

Other types of hangers are not ideal for the all situation. 

The use of flexible hangers in the market is minuscule compared to conventional hangers because flexible hangers are either not cost-effective or not reliable in performance.

Some types of collapsible hangers require excessive clothes manipulation to place on such hangers. 

Hangers with shortened arms are also unsatisfactory as other clothes with larger neck-openings can easily fall off. 

This is why we need a sort of “all-in-one” product in the market. One whose cost efficient design does not shorthand the usefulness of the product.

We need your help to make moulds and start production on this product. 
We currently have 1 mould done, but we need 3 more. This is where you guys come in.

If you are unable to contribute and would like to help, please spread this page around.

Thank you

story:
We're turning the cat litter scoop world 'upside down'!

Hi, my husband and I are cat crazy and between us our families have owned over 25 cats! Although we love our little fur balls, we hate cleaning their litter. After a little diggin', we discovered that our main issues with cleaning cat litter trays is shared by most cat owners around the world.

After the smell, dirty litter falling around and back into the clean tray are at the top of everyone's hate list. Stepping in scattered litter bare foot goes beyond annoying into the realm of dangerous, especially for children and pregnant mothers.

We spent years researching the market, but could not find a simple solution for this common frustration. So we decided to create our own solution! After designing and testing various prototypes to target these issues, we innovated a new breed of litter scoop unlike any other product on the market - without the gimmicks, moving or detachable parts, batteries or "lock in" services that force you to buy expensive custom bags.


Our design criteria

  • It must be affordable
  • Effective at targeting both solid AND liquid waste
  • Prevents litter spillage into and around the tray by containing it
  • No detachable parts or lock in services
  • Easy to use and dispose of waste
  • Function-led design
  • Makes a perfect gift
  • Suitable for your everyday litter types

Ok, we appreciate this is a large criteria list, but if we couldn't make a substantial improvement to current scoops, then it wasn't worth anybody's time.



The Simplest Answer is the Best

After several scoop prototypes, we realized the solution was simple. Turn the scoop design upside down! By placing the grill on the roof, it creates a containment in the base of the scoop to prevent wet, fragile clumps falling back in and around the clean litter (cats hate this). In addition, the rounded grill system allows a smooth and controlled sift as you twist (rotate).

No more litter spillage, brilliant!


We're under patent pending

We underwent many iterations to perfect the grill design and its overall shape to maximize the scoop's effectiveness. For example, the grill has two widths so as you twist the scoop it can sift according to your own litter type with greater control.

We then created 3D printed prototypes and invited several cat lovers around the world to beta test the scoop. Once we were all confident our scoop design was perfected, we submitted it for a patent.



'It's a revolution' (literally!)

Twist & Sift is a completely unique design. It's a revolution, literally, because you 'revolve' or twist the scoop to sift the litter. This simple rotation allows you to shovel, rotate and sift out the clean litter, while containing the dirty litter safely in the base of the scoop.

As you may know, cats have extremely sensitive smell so maintaining a clean litter tray helps prevent kitties looking for other places to go around your house.


The Colors

The scoop will come in 6 colors: Ruby Red, Sleek Black, Apple, Lemon, Ocean and Candy.




Check out who is supporting us!

We tested Twist & Sift with cat care professionals from Lady Dinah's Cat Emporium, this is what the owner Lauren Pears had to say...



How your contribution helps...

We're now ready to share Twist & Sift with the world for the first time. Your contribution will help us towards our first production run. This means you'll be the first to get their hands (and paws) on our scoop!

Together with our partners and industrial design experts, Ralf and Simone, we have investigated many different production methods and companies around the world and have narrowed it down to three manufacturers that will do a great job.

Getting molds created for a product is expensive. Our mold will cost £10,000 (about $14,000 USD)  and we'll need an additional £1,500 (about $2,000 USD) to produce enough scoops to cover your rewards. We'll also have some spare scoops to use as samples for shops and distributors.

We'll also need to allow for 5% for Indiegogo's commission. This means our target is £12,000 (a little over $17,000 USD).


Please fund us today! :)

We hope that you're excited by Twist & Sift and choose one of our rewards today. We also appreciate you sharing this campaign with your friends, family and local media so together we can make this campaign a success.

Whether you're in America, Europe, UK, Asia, Brazil, Japan, UAE or Australia, we thank you greatly for your support and look forward to shipping your Twist & Sift scoop to you and your furry friends as quickly as possible! Thank you!

story:
From meat-lovers to vegans, everyone is going to love this e-book, as the burgers are divided in 8 categories which cover all tastes :

  1. Beef - 25 Burgers
  2. Pork - 10 Burgers
  3. Lamb - 10 Burgers
  4. Sausage - 5 Burgers
  5. Chicken - 10 Burgers
  6. Turkey - 10 Burgers
  7. Fish - 15 Burgers
  8. Vegan - 15 Burgers

Do you want everyone to call you “Burger Master” ? Do you want family and friends to be desperately asking for one of your burgers ?

Then you should consider making this 250 page e-book yours. The price of it, exclusively for Indiegogo, is just $1 !


 

 

 


 

The whole book is built as a traditional handwritten recipe notebook. High quality images, info about preparation and cooking times, as well as professionally written ingredients and instructions ensure that reading this book will be an awesome experience.



The main index lets you know the exact pages of each category.



Each category has its own recipe index. This helps you find the exact location of
every single recipe each category includes.


 



On the following images you can see the way the book will be displayed on
each one of the four main devices.







 

 





 

 










 

 







 


 


FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS (FAQ)

 

Why is this book so cheap ? Is it a fraud or the content is rubbish ?

None of the above ! The $1 price is just a promotional offer to celebrate our entrance into the "e-world" since until now we only published books in the traditional, printed way.

Also, the $1 offer exists only on Indiegogo, as in the market the e-book will come with a price around $10.

 

How do I know that the burgers are really that good ?

Chances are that you will love them. These recipes have been selected out of many hundreds of recipes. Not only we tested all these recipes ourselves but also we asked for the opinion of food-related people (chefs etc). They tested the recipes themselves, voted for their favorite ones and those with the best ratings made it to the book !

 

Will I recieve the e-book as a file, or I will have to access it through internet ?

The e-book is built in PDF File format. After you download it from your e-mail you won't need internet to access it. This also means that with just one purchase you can install it on all your devices (PC, Laptop, Tablet, Smartphone).

 

How can I get this e-book ?

All you have to do is back this Indiegogo campaign by choosing one of the two available perks. The "Metric" perk means that you want to recieve the e-book using metric system ( kg, C°, cm), while the "Imperial" perk means that you want to recieve the e-book using imperial system (lb, F°, inches).

After you back the project, you are done ! You will not have to do anything else. The book will be sent to your e-mail 1-3 days after the end of the campaign !

 

I have another question. Is there any way for me to contact you ?

Of course ! We would love to hear from you and answer whichever question you may have. You can contact us using the "Ask a question" option that you will find under the project's Title. 

We are here 24/7 to assist you !

story:
Are you bored by the traditional way to switch a lamp on or off? Are you looking for an innovative desk lamp that still functions like it is supposed to?

Then you should try a new way to break this monotonous life with the HENG Balance Lamp!

 

Introducing the HENG Balance Lamp

Fits in your bedroom...

...Giving you a warm feeling...

...or at your working space!

 

HENG comes with different shapes, colors and material:

 

 

And many more featured articles HERE! Thank you for featuring us!

 

 

HENG lamp has a switch structure of two balls inside the wooden frames with embedded magnets. By moving them, these magnets will attract one another, thereby triggering the switch.

It's a new and interactive way to brighten up your room!

The two balls are the switches of the lamps. By lifting the lower ball up, it will draw the two balls together with each other's magnets inside. First they will flow in the air and when they reach a balance, the light will switch on.

Using the HENG will bring a fun, innovative and interactive twist to your life!

 

The HENG lamp has an attractive curved design, it creates the illusion of light passing through the wooden structure.

The most magical element of this lamp would be the switch. Two wooden balls function as the light switch. Once you pick up the lower ball and put it near the upper one, the two balls will find a balance and levitate in the middle of the lamp. Once the balance is reached, the lamp switches on.

The design has an easy structure, which makes it easy for volume production. HENG is already in the prototype stage and will be ready to be brought into the market.

Because we want you to feel close to nature, we selected high-quality wood to manufacture the Heng Lamp. This will give a warm and natural appearance and is suitable for all types of rooms, like study, bedroom and living room.

Switching the light on in mid-air.

 

 

 

 

Li Zanwen has won the Red Dot Award 2016 with the HENG. He feels that imagination is the secret of a steady stream of inspiration. Innovation can make life more fun!

 

Allocacoc is an industrial design company, aiming to create a different standard. After having successfully launched the award-winning PowerCube around the world, Allocacoc set up this platform, DesignNest. DesignNest provides ambitious designers with guidance from the initial idea to a finished product on the shelves. By working together with designers, we offer them a unique and practical learning opportunity, where they experience every step in the process themselves.

Having these production facilities offers many advantages. Firstly, the production capacity can be increased within a very short time span. This also offers us more flexibility production-wise. Another advantage of having our own factory is that it enables us to offer competitive pricing, as fewer external parties are involved. Lastly, this full control over the production process allows us to closely monitor our products' quality, as the production process can constantly be monitored and tweaked where required. Because of this, we are able to try out innovative production techniques which would else-wise be impossible.

The HENG Lamp will be manufactured and packaged at Allocacoc's factory and production facilities near Shanghai, and will perform the final quality control to ensure that HENG lamp reaches you in the best condition possible.

story:
The Kurl System is the ultimate solution to set-up and take down your tarp easily.

One person can set-up a tarp in just minutes! There is no arguing, no need for a ladder or to stack boxes, or drag that unbelievably heavy picnic table over next to the tree. And, there are no injuries to ruin your holiday from hanging your tarp!


IF YOU LOVE CAMPING, YOU NEED THIS!


       

The Kurl Hook will attach to almost anything and the Deployment Adapter easily fits on any standard thread pole like a broom stick or painting pole. The hook can be deployed using the middle setting on the deployment adapter, and removal is easy with the rare earth magnets, any of the 3 settings will make it easy to disconnect the hook from the tree.




Currently the Kurl Hook is available in Orange with Charcoal accents, in the future there will be additional colors. (Prototypes used in pictures)

The Kurl Hook can grab virtually any branch you can reach and if there are no branches available, go around the tree! With our standard broom stick we are able to reach 12 feet up the tree!

      

        


The Kurl Cleat is easy to install around anything you like with the adjustable strap. The spring loaded arms easily adjust to the thickness of your rope. Use the arms to hang other stuff like marshmallow roasting sticks or wet bathing suits!

       


All of the components used were developed to ensure everything can endure camping weather, from stainless steel springs and aluminum rivets to the glass filled nylon used to make everything else, they will give you years of stress free camping.

The components are light weight, strong, and portable. The kit will fit in your backpack or in your RV storage compartment until you need it!

Technical Specs

Materials: Nylon 66 30% glass, stainless steel springs, solid aluminum rivets, N52 rare earth magnets

Dimensions: Hook 5.6 in (H) x 3.98 in (W), Deployment Adapter 2.86 in (H)x 1.67 in (W), Cleat 6.02 in (H)x 2.61 in (W)

Weight: Total Kit = 2.15 lbs.

Color: Orange and Charcoal




There are a multitude of things you can do with the Kurl System:
  • Hang up a tarp or sunshade over your campsite
  • Hang up a tarp or sunshade over the bleachers at your local kids sporting venue
  • Hang up a tarp or sunshade in your back yard or patio
  • Make a clothes line
  • Hang a sheet or white colored tarp to act as a movie screen outside
  • Use it to hang netting and create your own driving range or batting cage
  • Use it to hang a camouflage netting to act as a hunting screen
  • Use it to hang your food up in a tree to keep animals out


I have created a number of ways for you to help out our campaign, please find the best perk for you and together, we can make the Kurl a reality!




Do you know someone that would love the Kurl? This makes a great gift idea for your favorite camper. We made it easy too, just print off the gift voucher below and you can send it in a card! The Kurl System will put a smile on anyone's face!



When we send out the survey at the end of the campaign, we will have a section where you can advise if you want your perks to go to someone else as a gift.


We are prepared with some bonus items that we will add in to selected perk levels once we achieve certain funding goals. We will announce them as we near the goals in order for the bonus to activate.

Our first bonus is set to activate when we reach our funding goal of $40,000. When we are getting close we will announce it here and in the updates!

I have enjoyed camping my whole life. There were many canoe and camping trips with my friends every summer and we always had a tarp to setup. Setting it up and managing it was always a pain.

I've watched so many people try many different techniques to get a tarp positioned just right over their campsite before they could enjoy their trip. Some brought ladders and milk crates, others moved picnic tables, and some even had their younger brother stand on their shoulders. I've watched people hurt themselves trying to get the tarp up high enough, and I've witnessed epic arguments between couples trying to communicate across the campsite, in the rain. Often, those people were sour for hours all because of the pain in setting up a tarp.

It wasn’t until I had a conversation with a friend of mine that I became inspired and realized there had to be a better way.  I didn’t want a solution that meant damaging the trees, or leaving litter in the campsite.  It had to have zero impact on the campsite and a maximum of efficiency and function.  

The idea for the Kurl was born.

The system was designed to connect to a tree and to secure ropes while making it simple to readjust the tarp height without all the complicated rigging.

I graduated in 2001 from the University of Calgary with a Masters in Environmental Design (Industrial Design). My thesis was the re-design of a neo-natal transport incubator with attention to the user interface. I have designed components for air craft and I specialize in creating ergonomic functionality, this product will do the job it was intended for and is as easy to use as advertised.

My designs have always payed significant attention to human factors and ergonomics.  So it was natural for me to bring these skills into the world of camping.  We went through many iterations to get to the solution seen here.  At last, tarp set-up is a stress-free, fast endeavor, even on the rainiest of days!





I have engaged the help of a company that has a track record for quality production in their products. They have helped to secure the manufacturing requirements with regards to the design and the durable materials I desired.

I have put a down payment on the tooling charges and the manufacturer has already started the setup on what is required. Tooling takes 35 days and at that point I will see samples produced in the material I have chosen. Full production will then take place when I say go.

Shipping delays or port inspection issues can always be a variable that may cause problems. The product will be made overseas to make it feasible to produce.



I have been working on this design for a long time and earlier this year was when I had the big break-through on the design. From there I have been preparing for a crowd-funding campaign and I wanted to have everything ready.

My discussions with the manufacturer have given me the insight on a realistic production schedule, accounting for delivery times and possible issues. It is a very real possibility that everything is done and delivered earlier than June but I wanted to make sure that I was not overlooking delays that could occur. I really want everyone to have their system for camping season 2016 and that is the goal.






The creation of moulds is costly and the manufacturer has minimum production requirements of the all the components. I set the goal of the project to try and help with some of these costs.
The research and development of the system have taken place over time and I have been able to fund these steps on my own.
Shipping the product, and any import duties and fees, will also require funding, and I will use a portion of the funds raised for this as well. 


We completely understand if you are unable to help us by choosing a funding level to support the project. You can still help though! Please share our project with your friends on social media and help us achieve our goal!
Check out the links at the bottom of the page and thank you in advance for your help!


Does the system come in other colors?
  • Our first concern was to make something that was easy to see and find if it gets dropped on the ground. In the future, there may be other colors offered.
How will you ship our perks to us?
  • In the USA we will ship with USPS with tracking, in Canada we will use Canada Post, also with tracking on packages. For those in the EU, we will use Canada Post with the tracking option.
story_txt:
The Kurl System is the ultimate solution to set-up and take down your tarp easily.One person can set-up a tarp in just minutes! There is no arguing, no need for a ladder or to stack boxes, or drag that unbelievably heavy picnic table over next to the tree. And, there are no injuries to ruin your holiday from hanging your tarp!IF YOU LOVE CAMPING, YOU NEED THIS!




       
The Kurl Hook will attach to almost anything and the Deployment Adapter easily fits on any standard thread pole like a broom stick or painting pole. The hook can be deployed using the middle setting on the deployment adapter, and removal is easy with the rare earth magnets, any of the 3 settings will make it easy to disconnect the hook from the tree.

Currently the Kurl Hook is available in Orange with Charcoal accents, in the future there will be additional colors. (Prototypes used in pictures)The Kurl Hook can grab virtually any branch you can reach and if there are no branches available, go around the tree! With our standard broom stick we are able to reach 12 feet up the tree!

      
        
The Kurl Cleat is easy to install around anything you like with the adjustable strap. The spring loaded arms easily adjust to the thickness of your rope. Use the arms to hang other stuff like marshmallow roasting sticks or wet bathing suits!

       

All of the components used were developed to ensure everything can endure camping weather, from stainless steel springs and aluminum rivets to the glass filled nylon used to make everything else, they will give you years of stress free camping.The components are light weight, strong, and portable. The kit will fit in your backpack or in your RV storage compartment until you need it!Technical Specs
Materials: Nylon 66 30% glass, stainless steel springs, solid aluminum rivets, N52 rare earth magnets
Dimensions: Hook 5.6 in (H) x 3.98 in (W), Deployment Adapter 2.86 in (H)x 1.67 in (W), Cleat 6.02 in (H)x 2.61 in (W)
Weight: Total Kit = 2.15 lbs.
Color: Orange and Charcoal







There are a multitude of things you can do with the Kurl System:

Hang up a tarp or sunshade over your campsite

Hang up a tarp or sunshade over the bleachers at your local kids sporting venue

Hang up a tarp or sunshade in your back yard or patio
Make a clothes line
Hang a sheet or white colored tarp to act as a movie screen outside
Use it to hang netting and create your own driving range or batting cage
Use it to hang a camouflage netting to act as a hunting screen
Use it to hang your food up in a tree to keep animals out






I have created a number of ways for you to help out our campaign, please find the best perk for you and together, we can make the Kurl a reality!  









Do you know someone that would love the Kurl? This makes a
great gift idea for your favorite camper. We made it easy too, just print off
the gift voucher below and you can send it in a card! The Kurl System will put
a smile on anyone's face!



When we send out the survey at the end of the campaign, we will have a section where you can advise if you want your perks to go to someone else as a gift.




We are prepared with some bonus items that we will add in to selected perk levels once we achieve certain funding goals. We will announce them as we near the goals in order for the bonus to activate.

Our first bonus is set to activate when we reach our funding goal of $40,000. When we are getting close we will announce it here and in the updates!





I have enjoyed camping my whole life. There were many canoe and camping trips with my friends every summer and we always had a tarp to setup. Setting it up and managing it was always a pain.
I've watched so many people try many different techniques to get a tarp positioned just right over their campsite before they could enjoy their trip. Some brought ladders and milk crates, others moved picnic tables, and some even had their younger brother stand on their shoulders. I've watched people hurt themselves trying to get the tarp up high enough, and I've witnessed epic arguments between couples trying to communicate across the campsite, in the rain. Often, those people were sour for hours all because of the pain in setting up a tarp.
It wasn’t until I had a conversation with a friend of mine that I became inspired and realized there had to be a better way.  I didn’t want a solution that meant damaging the trees, or leaving litter in the campsite.  It had to have zero impact on the campsite and a maximum of efficiency and function.  
The idea for the Kurl was born.
The system was designed to connect to a tree and to secure ropes while making it simple to readjust the tarp height without all the complicated rigging.
I graduated in 2001 from the University of Calgary with a Masters in Environmental Design (Industrial Design). My thesis was the re-design of a neo-natal transport incubator with attention to the user interface. I have designed components for air craft and I specialize in creating ergonomic functionality, this product will do the job it was intended for and is as easy to use as advertised.
My designs have always payed significant attention to human factors and ergonomics.  So it was natural for me to bring these skills into the world of camping.  We went through many iterations to get to the solution seen here.  At last, tarp set-up is a stress-free, fast endeavor, even on the rainiest of days!








I have engaged the help of a company that has a track record for quality production in their products. They have helped to secure the manufacturing requirements with regards to the design and the durable materials I desired.
I have put a down payment on the tooling charges and the manufacturer has already started the setup on what is required. Tooling takes 35 days and at that point I will see samples produced in the material I have chosen. Full production will then take place when I say go.
    Shipping delays or port inspection issues can always be a variable that may cause problems. The product will be made overseas to make it feasible to produce.

I have been working on this design for a long time and earlier this year was when I had the big break-through on the design. From there I have been preparing for a crowd-funding campaign and I wanted to have everything ready.My discussions with the manufacturer have given me the insight on a realistic production schedule, accounting for delivery times and possible issues. It is a very real possibility that everything is done and delivered earlier than June but I wanted to make sure that I was not overlooking delays that could occur. I really want everyone to have their system for camping season 2016 and that is the goal.The creation of moulds is costly and the manufacturer has minimum production requirements of the all the components. I set the goal of the project to try and help with some of these costs.The research and development of the system have taken place over time and I have been able to fund these steps on my own.Shipping the product, and any import duties and fees, will also require funding, and I will use a portion of the funds raised for this as well. 

We completely understand if you are unable to help us by choosing a funding level to support the project. You can still help though! Please share our project with your friends on social media and help us achieve our goal!

Check out the links at the bottom of the page and thank you in advance for your help!






Does the system come in other colors?



Our first concern was to make something that was easy to see and find if it gets dropped on the ground. In the future, there may be other colors offered.

How will you ship our perks to us?


In the USA we will ship with USPS with tracking, in Canada we will use Canada Post, also with tracking on packages. For those in the EU, we will use Canada Post with the tracking option.

story:
A chair that will help you to relax right away!

The Kasera is the first product from techfurno which is an updated form of an easy chair. This is particularly made to give immense relaxation. This is best suitable for office workers, the old generation, the young generation and for all the people who just want to relax.

The Kasera has two powerful speakers near the headrest to give amazing sound effect. It has a music system which has many connecting options such as Bluetooth, AUX, pen drives and micro SD card. Kasera also has an FM radio with auto scan capability. The main feature of Kasera is you can charge your mobile phones along with the music and the best part is it comes with a cup holder, cushion for headrest along with the chair which is portable,  rechargeable and can take it to your favorite destination like poolside, beaches, balcony, this is  a very good gift for aged or retired customers and a very good customer satisfying product for hotels, resorts, institutes . A custom modification is available according to business.

Make this possible by preordering the product. A chair that will help you to relax right away.

.

We are a team of young engineers from SJEC, who want to take the types of furniture into the next level by integrating it with electronics to make the life simpler, with your support by ordering kasera today will help us create this company and to create future products.

we need to reach the goal of  2100 USD to start the production, only by your help and support by purchasing our products will help us start the journey of making wonderful products in future that will stand out, we have set the perks such a way that all can access our products worldwide and have been made cost-effective for Indian customers, and the best part is if we didn't reach our goal all the funds will be refunded.

In case if you cant help us by purchasing our Kasera, we appreciate your interest in our product, please help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign by sharing it with your friends and family.
thanking you
TECHFURNO

story:
ALLDOCK Onlineshop:

ALLDOCK Germany 

ALLDOCK USA

ALLDOCK Australia

Dittrich Design, a start-up company based in Germany, began creating ALLDOCK four years ago. ALLDOCK was conceived as an innovative solution for simultaneously charging multiple devices that’s, compatible with nearly all USB devices. ALLDOCK’s purpose is to enhance the daily life of users so they can be more productive and efficient.

*This is an animated image, please wait a few seconds if it doesn't load automatically.

We are offering both the ALLDOCK HybridX, which offers wireless and wired charging options, and the ALLDOCK To Go, a portable power-bank that offers wired and wireless charging options (further information below). 

 

 

Charge your devices faster!

*This is an animated image, please wait a few seconds if it doesn't load automatically.

Charge your equipment faster without any wasted time. The ALLDOCK HybridX comes with two new fast charging ports that deliver 3.0 amps per port. 

Whether you are searching for a unique or a functional charging station with the latest technology, ALLDOCK is for you!

ALLDOCK is the most compact docking station (14 cm depth, 22 cm width, and 6 cm height) that will charge 5 devices.

We've also optimized the width of the last slot to enable you to dock your phone in its case. ALLDOCK HybridX is the only charging station on the market to charge such a broad spectrum of devices this fast!

 

 

 

We offer two years warranty for all of our products, including the ALLDOCK HybridX, ALLDOCK To Go and each accessory that comes within the sets (like cables, wireless charger, mounts etc.). For more information you can always contact our customer service: support@alldock.de. 

 

Our design in not only about functionality and elegance, it is about your lifestyle! ALLDOCK creates a place that docks and charges all your individual electronic devices. It's a perfect solution for the daily cable chaos in your office or at home. Our design friendly materials, like aluminium and ABS plastic, blend in with any interior’s aesthetic.  

ALLDOCK emulates the timeless product design of Braun ad the famous Dieter Rams. Our design is simple and elegant, and functions in any interior perfectly as a unique accessory. 

 

Charge your devices everywhere with this ALLDOCK power bank. It offers you two possibilities to charge (plug-in or wireless charge).

ALLDOCK To Go is equipped with one USB port and Qi wireless function and can portably recharge your devices up to 2 times. 

True to the ALLDOCK philosophy for better charging design and efficiency, it is possible to dock your ALLDOCK To Go in the ALLDOCK HybridX and enables you the perfect combination of both products. This then allows you to charge a second wireless device in the ALLDOCK HybridX.  

Make your life easier and get through your busy day without worrying that your devices will run out of power and leave you unavailable in crisis situations. 

The slim shape and light weight of the ALLDOCK To Go also allows you to take it everywhere you go. 

The ALLDOCK To Go is the perfect travel companion and always serves full battery, while hitting the road. Always be fully charged in every situation.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Product development has passed through a number of different stages, including improvements to size and material. Nearly 10 prototype have been necessary for an optimized final product. Our product designer team has been working hard to create an easy to use product that best meets your needs. We wanted to develop a sleek and elegant design, which that compliments every interior.

 

To suit each consumer’s individual taste, we offer three different high quality designs.

The ALLDOCK HybridX is available in classic black or white and made of ABS material which has a special rubber surface. As an alternative choose our high-end version, which is made of a solid anodized silver aluminum shell and a polished black top.

 

Exclusively for this campaign, we’re offering backers an all-in-one package at an exceptional price. Our Set includes all the accessories you need to charge all your devices together. Smartphones, tablets, Apple Watches, Airpods, FitBits - all devices find a place in your ALLDOCK. 


ALLDOCK USB Cables

                       

ALLDOCK has developed its own cables to accomplish an efficient and elegant charging possibility. With up to 3 amps, charging is much quicker and more reliable than with the manufacturer's charging cable.

 Thanks to the high-quality materials and their careful processing, the cables are especially long-lasting so that you will never need to return to conventional plastic cables.

We also provide a split cable that enables you to charge one more device in the ALLDOCK HybridX. The ALLDOCK HybridX charger already has 4 USB ports but, with the split cable you have one more place to charge your device. 

 

ALLDOCK AirPod Mount

The ALLDOCK AirPod Mount stores your AirPod capsule while charging your AirPods in a stylish and smart way. 

 

*This is an animated image, please wait a few seconds if it doesn't load automatically.


ALLDOCK Apple Watch Mount

It's very easy to dock and undock your watch into the ALLDOCK HybridX, because of the magnetic connection between the charger and the Apple Watch

*This is an animated image, please wait a few seconds if it doesn't load automatically.

ALLDOCK FitBit Mount

The ALLDOCK Fitbit Mount is compatible with the Fitbit Charge 2 and the Fitbit Alta. Charge your Fitbit fast and elegantly with this perfect extension to your ALLDOCK HybridX.

*This is an animated image, please wait a few seconds if it doesn't load automatically.

ALLDOCK ClickIn Adapter

The ClickIn Adapter was envisioned to simplify the docking process of your digital devices in the ALLDOCK. It enables easy one-hand docking. The adapter is made of black ABS plastic and is engineered to work with the cables provided in the package. The ClickIn Adapter also comes with the flexibility of an inlay that enables you to adjust the height of your cable head when compensating for devices with cases.

 

*This is an animated image, please wait a few seconds if it doesn't load automatically.

 

 

 

ALLDOCK HybridX will be shipped worldwide from Germany, USA, and Australia. You may be responsible for taxes and duties applicable in your country. All ALLDOCK's will be shipped in February.

 

To offer you the best product, we have optimized from different prototypes since April. With this solid experience, we are confident that we will meet our final projected delivery dates. We have determined the schedule with our different partners to be able to ship by the projected date in February. 

 

 

Dittrich Design is a furniture design atelier, which was founded over 25 years ago in Wuppertal, Germany. However, Dittrich Design is not only German; it’s international. The company has a presence in Silicon Valley, Ca., Australia and also many partners around the world. Over the years, Dittrich Design has introduced many successful products to the international market. Passion always drives Dittrich’s designs. Its contemporary and qualified team is challenged every day. Never out of ideas, Dittrich Design is a company that moves with the times.

 

Challenges & Risks 

We always want to offer our customers the best. That’s why we estimate our product delivery for February. If we face any obstacle that puts our expected delivery date at risk, we promise to keep you well informed. We will put 100% of our efforts into delivering you a high-quality product on time. Our product has been tested and optimized and is now ready to be produced! For this last step we just need you. We are really excited to bring our new product to you and appreciate your support!

 

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS 

With which products is the ALLDOCK HybridX station compatible? //

With the two charging possibilities of ALLDOCK HybridX it is possible to charge wireless charging devices and also cable charging devices at the same time, whether it is an Apple or an Android device. Our charging station was made to be universally compatible.


To name a few:

Apple: iPhone 5 / 5C / 5S / 6 / 6 Plus / 6S / 6S Plus / 7 / 7 Plus / 8 / 8 Plus / X / Xs / Xs Max / Xr / iPad Mini / Air / Pro / Apple Watch Series 3 / Series 4 / Nike+ / Hermès / Apple AirPod
Samsung Galaxy: Note 3 / Note 3 Neo / Note 5 / S6 / S6 Edge / S7 / S7 Edge / Note 8 / S8 / S8+ / Note 9 / S9 / S9+

Sony: Xperia Z2 / Xperia Z3 / Xperia Z3 Compact / Xperia  Z3 Tablet Compact / Xperia XZ1 / Xperia XZ2

Huawei: P20 / Mate 10 Pro / Y7 / Y6
HTC: Desire 10 / U11 / U12

FitBit Fitness Tracker

Game Controller
Cameras
E-Book Reader: kindle, tolino

Laptops: MacBook


QI enabled phones:
Apple iPhone: 8 / 8 Plus / X  Xs / Xs Max / Xr

Samsung Galaxy: Note 5 / S6 / S6 Edge / S7 / S7 Edge / Note 8 / S8 / S8+ / Note 9 / S9 / S9+
Sony: Xperia XZ2 / Xperia XZ2 Premium / Xperia XZ3

LG: G3 / G4 / G6 (only the US version) / G7 ThinG / V30
Microsoft Lumia: 920 / 928 / 929 / 930 / 1020 / 1520
Huawei: Mate RS Porsche Design
Google Nexus: 4 / 5 / 6 / 7
Nokia: 8 Sirocco
BlackBerry: Priv

Can I charge only wireless devices? //

No, the special function of ALLDOCK HybridX is that you can charge almost any device, whether it’s your wireless charging phone or your other phones or plug-in devices. It is especially interesting, if you don't yet own a wireless charging device. The ALLDOCK HybridX is the perfect charging station for any future devices.

How many devices can I charge with the ALLDOCK HybridX? //

The ALLDOCK HybridX can charge up to 5 devices simultaneously, including 2 wireless devices for the Large version and 1 for the Medium version.

How fast does the ALLDOCK HybridX charge my devices? //

With its new charger of 5.2V/ 2400 mA, the ALLDOCK HybridX is one of the most efficient charging solutions. The charger also includes two fast charging ports, both with 5.2V/ 3000 mA, and one that can go up to 9V/ 1670 mA. All of our chargers have special safety measures built in to keep your phone from overcharging and overheating. This also includes our wireless chargers that automatically turn off if the heat gets above 60°C, and turns on as soon as it cools off to a temperature of 40°C. In addition, it is made with the fastest charging technology for wireless devices and goes from 7.5W (for Apple devices) to 10W for other devices.

What is the difference between the new charger and the old one? //

The old charger offered 5.2V with only 2.4A. While the new charger has two new fast charging ports! One with a charging speed of 5.2V/ 3000 mA and the other with 5.2V/ 3000 mA. Also, the safety measurements have been tightened to ensure that all devices are safe from overcharging and overheating with our new technology. This means it is also safe to plug devices that do not support fast charging features into the fast charging port.

Is the ALLDOCK HybridX safe for my devices? //

The ALLDOCK HybridX was made to protect your electronic devices from excessive voltage and short circuits. The new safety features are especially advanced so that the voltage is automatically adjusted in the fast charging ports if your device does not support fast charging features.

What is a Click-In Adapter?  //

The Click-In Adapter by ALLDOCK simplifies the charging process of your digital devices. It ends the cable search entirely and enables easy One Hand Docking. This means that, after installing the Click-In Adapter in your ALLDOCK, you can simply press your device on to the connector and have it charge right away.

What is the difference between MFI (Lightning), C-Type USB and Micro USB Cable?  //

The Lightning USB cable by ALLDOCK charges your Apple devices and since we have the official Apple certificate there are no issues with charging breaks or other features. The Micro USB cable made by ALLDOCK charges your Android devices, Blackberrys and Windows Phones quickly and safely. The same goes for the ALLDOCK C-Type USB cable, which can charge the newest digital devices. Check beforehand to see which one is compatible with your devices.

To name a few:
Apple: iPhone 5 / 5C / 5S / 6 / 6 Plus / 6S / 6S Plus / 7 / 7 Plus / 8 / 8 Plus / X / Xs / Xs Max / Xr / iPad Mini / Air / Pro / Apple Watch Series 3 / Series 4 / Nike+ / Hermès / Apple AirPodSamsung Galaxy: Note 3 / Note 3 Neo / Note 5 / S6 / S6 Edge / S7 / S7 Edge / Note 8 / S8 / S8+ / Note 9 / S9 / S9+
Sony: Xperia Z2 / Xperia Z3 / Xperia Z3 Compact / Xperia  Z3 Tablet Compact / Xperia XZ1 / Xperia XZ2
Huawei: P20 / Mate 10 Pro / Y7 / Y6HTC: Desire 10 / U11 / U12
FitBit Fitness Tracker
Game ControllerCamerasE-Book Reader: kindle, tolino
Laptops: MacBook
QI enabled phones:Apple iPhone: 8 / 8 Plus / X  Xs / Xs Max / Xr
Samsung Galaxy: Note 5 / S6 / S6 Edge / S7 / S7 Edge / Note 8 / S8 / S8+ / Note 9 / S9 / S9+Sony: Xperia XZ2 / Xperia XZ2 Premium / Xperia XZ3
LG: G3 / G4 / G6 (only the US version) / G7 ThinG / V30Microsoft Lumia: 920 / 928 / 929 / 930 / 1020 / 1520Huawei: Mate RS Porsche DesignGoogle Nexus: 4 / 5 / 6 / 7Nokia: 8 SiroccoBlackBerry: Priv
  Can I charge only wireless devices? //  No, the special function of ALLDOCK HybridX is that you can charge almost any device, whether it’s your wireless charging phone or your other phones or plug-in devices. It is especially interesting, if you don't yet own a wireless charging device. The ALLDOCK HybridX is the perfect charging station for any future devices.  How many devices can I charge with the ALLDOCK HybridX? //  The ALLDOCK HybridX can charge up to 5 devices simultaneously, including 2 wireless devices for the Large version and 1 for the Medium version.  How fast does the ALLDOCK HybridX charge my devices? //  With its new charger of 5.2V/ 2400 mA, the ALLDOCK HybridX is one of the most efficient charging solutions. The charger also includes two fast charging ports, both with 5.2V/ 3000 mA, and one that can go up to 9V/ 1670 mA. All of our chargers have special safety measures built in to keep your phone from overcharging and overheating. This also includes our wireless chargers that automatically turn off if the heat gets above 60°C, and turns on as soon as it cools off to a temperature of 40°C. In addition, it is made with the fastest charging technology for wireless devices and goes from 7.5W (for Apple devices) to 10W for other devices.  What is the difference between the new charger and the old one? //  The old charger offered 5.2V with only 2.4A. While the new charger has two new fast charging ports! One with a charging speed of 5.2V/ 3000 mA and the other with 5.2V/ 3000 mA. Also, the safety measurements have been tightened to ensure that all devices are safe from overcharging and overheating with our new technology. This means it is also safe to plug devices that do not support fast charging features into the fast charging port.  Is the ALLDOCK HybridX safe for my devices? //  The ALLDOCK HybridX was made to protect your electronic devices from excessive voltage and short circuits. The new safety features are especially advanced so that the voltage is automatically adjusted in the fast charging ports if your device does not support fast charging features.  What is a Click-In Adapter?  //  The Click-In Adapter by ALLDOCK simplifies the charging process of your digital devices. It ends the cable search entirely and enables easy One Hand Docking. This means that, after installing the Click-In Adapter in your ALLDOCK, you can simply press your device on to the connector and have it charge right away.  What is the difference between MFI (Lightning), C-Type USB and Micro USB Cable?  //  The Lightning USB cable by ALLDOCK charges your Apple devices and since we have the official Apple certificate there are no issues with charging breaks or other features. The Micro USB cable made by ALLDOCK charges your Android devices, Blackberrys and Windows Phones quickly and safely. The same goes for the ALLDOCK C-Type USB cable, which can charge the newest digital devices. Check beforehand to see which one is compatible with your devices.

story:
The blind and the visually impaired can't travel or move independently unless they are equipped with the white cane. Sure the traditional cane helps them to avoid obstacles until they are in contact with the obstacle itself, but does it help them be aware of the surroundings they are in beforehand? does it help them get from one point to another? or does it help them look for the objects they use in their day today life ?

That’s where intellicane steps in:

As the name suggests, it is a smart cane equipped with features that are built using simple yet very effective technologies .One such technology is Ultrasonic sensors which could help the visually impaired visualize the objects around them through audio commands, without having to come in contact with the object by being aware of them beforehand. These audio commands from phone app not only guide them along the way but also helps them navigate from one point to the other through the shortest/easiest path using GPS. How easy would it be to reach to the destination without having to worry about the hazzles along their path. And just in case if they are lost or find themselves wandering in unknown neighbhourhood, the Intellicane safety system tells them their current position and even helps them to contact family or a designated friend. 

One of the most compelling features among the others is the object detection.When we ourselves have trouble finding house keys or wallet , it’d be even more challenging for the visually challenged. Using the phone app which collaberates TAG and bluetooth technologies together, it helps lead them to the object through acoustic signals  and thus helps them find the object they are looking for.

These features among the others help the visually challenged overcome their limitation with sensible, practical solutions which are embodied into this Virtual guide called the IntelliCane

Intellicane - A Virtual Guide

Features : 

How is your contribution going to be spent?

1) Infrastructure.
2) Get someone talented on board.
3) Get prototype done.
4) Manufacturing the product.
5) Coffee and more coffee to work, work and work.
6) For the perks which are promised to be delivered.
Perks : 
1) For everyone who donates $100, we give this awesome flash drive.

You can choose which ever model you want.
2) For everyone who donates $300, we give this awesome 4 Channel mini drone with 6 axis gyro.  Can choose between white and red color.

3) For everyone who donates $1000, we give this awesome Waterproof sports Camera 720P, full HD wireless diving mini DV camcorder (GoPro Style)

story:
HardSploit 

Our goal is to design & produce a tool for hardware pentesting  :

  • Internet Of Things 
  • Industrial devices
  • Scada systems 
  • Basic electronic products of everyday life
HardSploit is a Metasploit like tool but for Hardware Hacking.

HardSploit Project is lead by our Company (Opale Security) and its internal teams : 

  • Yann ALLAIN (former CSO of an International Company, CEO of Opale Security, Electronic Engineer, Senior Pentester, BlackHat Speaker & Trainer)
  • Julien M. (Electronic Engineer, Hardware & Software Pentester, BlackHat Speaker & Trainer, Electronic Makers)
  • Gwénolé A. (Software Developper, Open Source Addict, Software Pentester)
How long can we continue to rely on hardware or critical electronic devices without being able to properly assess their security?

The most surprising (disturbing?) fact is  that our industrials and our security experts do not mastered design techniques or audit of hardware systems. There is a gap between the threat and the response capacity of the actors in this field.Therefore the risks of attacks on the processed data increase (personal, supervision process of industrial equipment…).

It is clear that something is needed to help the security community to audit and control embedded systems security.

This is what motivated us to create HardSploit : a complete tool box (Hardware + Software), a Framework which aims to:

  • Facilitate the audit of electronic systems for  security industry  workers (Consultants, Auditors, Pentesters, Product designers etc.)
  • Increase the level of security (and trust!) of new communicating products designed by industry
What we want to achieve with the HardSploit Project

HardSploit Framework features

Hardsploit is a tool with software and electronic items. It is a technical and modular plateform (using FPGA) to perform security tests on electronic communications interfaces of embedded devices. It's a Framework.

All-in-one tool for Hardware pentest ! 

Main Functions (HardSploit modules)

The main Hardware security audit functions are

  • Sniffer, Scanner, Proxy, Interact with electronic bus
  • Dump memory
  • ...

Hardsploit Modules will let Hardware pentester to intercept, replay and/or and send data via each type of electronic bus used by the Hardware Target. The Level of interaction that pen-testers will have depend on the electronic bus features...

HardSploit 's modules enable you to analyse all sort of electronic bus (serial and parallel type)

  • JTAG, SPI, I2C's, 
  • Parallel address & data bus on chip, 
  • and more others to come in the futur (OneWire, UART, etc...)

Assisted visual wiring function

No more stress with that tremendous part of Hardware pen testing : You will know what need to be connected where !

We integrated into the tool an assisted visual wiring function to help you easier connect all wires to the Hardware target: 

  • GUI will display the pin organization (Pin OUT) of the targeted chip.
  • GUI will guide you throughout the wiring process between Hardsploit Connector and the target
  • GUI will control a set of LED  that will be turn ON and OFF to easy let you find the right Hardsploit Pin Connector to connect to your target
GUI and Software associated

The software part of the project will help conducting an end-to-end security audit. It will be compatible (integrated) with existing tools such as Metasploit. We will offer integration with other API in the future.

Our ambition is to provide a tool equivalent to those of the company Qualys or Nessus(Vulnerability Scanner) or the Metasploit framework but in the domain of embedded / electronic devices.

What is the Current Status of the Project?   

  • Hardware design is complete 
  • HardSploit Hardware prototype PCB board is nearly complete (last debugging function in progress)
  • Firmware (FPGA VHDL module and low level API) is in progress
  • GUI and Integration in Metasploit Framerwork just begin
  • More information on http://HardSploit.io to follow all the project steps

But we really need you to 

  1. Be able to create our first volume batch of PCB boards (Volume will reduced the price of the final products)
  2. Be able to buy some (more?) professional assembly equipments dedicated to manufacturing of prototypes, small and medium series. 
  3. To let our team concentrate on this exciting project. The goal is to have a dedicated R&D team for HardSploit.
  4. To create & promote a complete community web site and trainings programs dedicated to Internet of Things Security (a sort of OWASP web site but for security of embedded device)

Why would you be involved?

  • Participate to a project related to Internet of Things & Security
  • Your contribution & name will be associated for ever to this project
  • Have the chance to be able to receive a first Version of HardSploit with its Special PCB board designed only for you !
  • and more ... see our pleges ;-)


Main difficulties to overcome

  • Several HardSploit VHDL modules designed for proxying data through electronic buses will be a tricky low level design to achieved
  • Time & the Security consultant Day to Day business could alter our capacity to progress quickly

But We are optimistic for HardSploit to limit those issues as : 

  • Julien M. (Electronic engineer in charge of Hardware) doesn't sleep so much ;-)
  • As I said (I'm a CEO), A day is complete after the 25th hours of works :-p

Other manners to help ?

  • You can "buzz" about HardSploit via your professional network 
  • Indiegogo social tools could help !

Thanks for all !
