story:
********************************** UPDATES ********************************

GET YOUR REWARD #1: Big AmbiScreen Contest - Win AmbiScreen Limited Edition


Everyone can get 1 point for sharing this contest via Facebook, 1 more for sharing via twitter, 1-3 more points for getting a perk (Perk under 10,- = 1 point, 11,- to 99,- = 2 points, over 100,- = 3 points)

Earn as much points as you can and increase your chance to win! After taking contest, every user has to comment the Facebook and Twitter links. If project gets funded the winner will be drawn by random.org (the more points you have the more times you'll be included in a draw)

facebook link: facebook.com/ambiscreen/photos/747109868754662/
twitter link: twitter.com/ambiscreen/status/681481137525501952


REWARD #2:

More info: see below
*****************************************************************************






Open your eyes and you see light right in front of you. Turn on your TV and light appears again. Push the button on your wall and light comes to life.

AmbiScreen is the most universal open platform for ambient lighting for any display and TV, gaming console, DVD player, set-top box, PC, Mac, PlayStation, Xbox or any other device you have in your home.




 
 
 





You can use AmbiScreen with other devices, or even without it, as an autonomous mood light system. AmbiScreen is the first design micro-computer ever with an ambient lighting controller and an integrated media center simple to use for home users, as well as powerful for geeks. You can customize your own AmbiScreen and change its internal parts and build up a new device.

At AmbiScreen, we believe it always makes you feel better when using light effects everywhere in the house. So we created AmbiScreen. It is not necessary to have it just behind your TV, you can use it in many scenarios in your bedroom (picture light, bed light), bathroom, living room ... and it works with any device or as a standalone box.



AmbiScreen was developed after long years of searching for a suitable device, apt to induce more spectacular light scenes in the household. We were seeking such a device, which would be able to create a lighting atmosphere for chill out; when organizing parties, get the vibrant atmosphere moving; calm the mind down when reading a book or kiss us goodnight on the way to the world of dreams, when falling asleep. 


Easy to use

  • set count of your LEDs on each side of your screen. 
  • AmbiScreen package comes with everything needed to use it out of the box. 52 LEDs 3,6m long are great for every screen size up to 50/55". Larger display? Simply connect LED extension kit with another 52 LEDs (can be multiplied as many times as you want).

Enjoy lights

Static color.
Dynamic colors.
  • blobs (warm, cold - blue, green, red)
  • rainbow moods
Have a party? Use a Strobe effect (blue, white, pink) & Snake effect
Want more? Develop your own effect and share it with community (for geeks)


What can I set?

  • speed of LEDs (rate, great to set it up for quick and slow scenes - update frequency of the LEDs)
  • each R,G,B channel (gamma correction, blacklevel, whitelevel threshold, color saturation gain, color value gain)
  • count of your LEDs
  • or even you can install another operating system and use it as your micro-computer with controller for LED lights


Our goal is to become a platform for making agreeable atmosphere and inducing home comfort by means of light elements. A platform exploited by a wide range of users, from home ones to geeks. 

e.g. Would you like to install your own simple web server? Or automatize another function? You can perfectly achieve this with AmbiScreen. The options are amazing, because it uses a reliable micro computer and software package based on Linux, with which you can do whatever you want. 

We had failed to find such a device on the market, so we decided to design it. 





Your eyes need time to adjust to bright and dark scenes. It is called the "iris" in your eye which is responsible for this. AmbiScreen helps iris to reduce this time so your eyes and eyes of your children are protected while watching.


RESEARCH RESULTS:
"Eyestrain can occur when the eyes are fixed on an object for a long period of time, there is poor lighting," explains John Bullough, Ph.D., lighting scientist at the LRC and lead researcher on the television study. "... Reducing contrasts in perceived brightness between a visual display and its background will result in reduced visual fatigue and eyestrain."   // www.sciencedaily.com

"...when you watch TV in the dark, then the problem is that that is the only lighting in the home. Your eyes are forced to constantly adjust to different levels of lighting which makes the pupils dilate over and over again. Your eyes use more muscles and fatigue those muscles involved."   // www.healthguidance.org














* SCART downsampling usually works just with internal TV tuner (RCA, CVBS), two-way SCART transmits signal from display to AmbiScreen


Ready for large displays

AmbiScreen is for any screen size. Default package comes with LEDs for all screen sizes up to 50"/55".

Do you have a larger screen? Just add "LED extension kit" perk as many times as you need. AmbiScreen is ready for huge displays.  

What if my display is smaller than 50"? That's ok. Turn off unused LEDs via mobile app. So simple.






















Of course this wouldn’t be a crowdfunding effort without goodies to help motivate you to contribute. Here’s a run-down all of the individual rewards we’re offering.

REWARD #1: Big AmbiScreen Contest - Win AmbiScreen Limited Edition


Everyone can get 1 point for sharing this contest via Facebook, 1 more for sharing via twitter, 1-3 more points for getting a perk (Perk under 10,- = 1 point, 11,- to 99,- = 2 points, over 100,- = 3 points)

Earn as much points as you can and increase your chance to win! After taking contest, every user has to comment the Facebook and Twitter links. If project gets funded the winner will be drawn by random.org (the more points you have the more times you'll be included in a draw)

facebook link: facebook.com/ambiscreen/photos/747109868754662/

twitter link: twitter.com/ambiscreen/status/681481137525501952



REWARD #2:

Follow these simple steps and share it with your friends:
1. Sign in to your Indiegogo account (or create one)
2. Share AmbiScreen with your friends with Indiegogo sharing links (social icons on the left side when viewing on computer) 
That's it :)  Please, be signed in to your Indiegogo account when you are sharing these links - so you are be able to track your progress and we can give you rewards.



What are the risks and challenges in making AmbiScreen?
Since January 2014, when we started to bring AmbiScreen to life, we have learned a lot about the whole manufacturing process. We have visited various events and conferences worldwide and learned from communication with our potential customers as well as suppliers. We have few Chinese suppliers and suppliers from Europe, too. We learned a lot during this exciting project. But we know „shit can happen“. We have several component suppliers in factories in China and we want to be correct to you. Y must know troubles can always happen. If any of our suppliers were delayed, our whole batch would be delayed, even if other parts would be ready on time. But what we can say as well is, we are much better in solving problems than we were 2 years ago. The AmbiScreen team is following our internal rules in order to reduce risks to the minimum.


Why is there a $35 shipping fee?
We developed AmbiScreen as all-in-one device and you’ll find all necessary things in your package. Therefore package is bulky and the fee reflects current costs to reliably ship AmbiScreen to you in most regions around the world.


I asked for my Perk to be sent to the wrong address, what should I do?
Please contact us at indiegogo (at) ambiscreen.tv


When will you ship the AmbiScreen ambient light?
We aim to ship the first AmbiScreen pre-orders in March/April 2016


I can't get my payment to work in Paypal, what should I do?
Email the Indiegogo Customer Happiness Team at support@indiegogo.com. They'll be able to track your transaction and help with any issues


I had challenge making a contribution, please help!
If you had trouble making a contribution, please check Indiegogo's common contribution errors.


Want to become a Reseller or purchase in Wholesale quantities?
Please e-mail us at hello(at)ambiscreen.tv


Do I need to configure the device before using?
AmbiScreen has predefined number of LEDs on each side of the screen in standard. If you want to change this as well as some other settings, we recommend to setup your wifi (this is done just once and easily by connecting mouse or keyboard via USB to AmbiScreen and setting up credential for your local network). Then you can set all settings via mobile app (such as colors, effects, number of LEDs, adjust the brightness, gamma colors, etc.).


Does AmbiScreen support HDMI 2.0?
We are working hard to include HDMI 2.0 support in one of the next generations of AmbiScreen. For now, HDMI 2.0 is not included.


Does AmbiScreen support 4K2K?
You can use your display with 4K2K and AmbiScreen together -  to do so, connect AmbiScreen to dual-way SCART connector on your display. Direct connection over HDMI in standard version of AmbiScreen supports 1080p. Higher resolution needs more powerful internal parts. As we stated before, geeks can upgrade part as they want. So yes, there is an option to upgrade AmbiScreen to 4K2K version. In future, we plan to include 4K2K support as a standard feature of all AmbiScreen devices.


Does AmbiScreen support HDCP?
We are using HDMI splitting components with declared HDCP capability from our manufacturers. Currently it supports HDCP 1.3. Later, we are about to support higher versions, too. But we are still working on HDCP support for second component in our device and we expect, we will be able to include HDCP in first release.


What about 3D support?
We used some internal parts with 3D support and software part supports 3D, too. But it is important to say that 3D is just experimental feature for geeks and it is disabled by default (for now, we can’t guarantee full 3D support). 


Does AmbiScreen support CEC/ARC?
We plan to add CEC/ARC capability in one of the next releases. We are working on this feature - it's possible that we solve this soon and final product will have it included. We want to be fair, so we need to say it is 50:50 for now for the first release.


Do you have support for smart bulbs in AmbiScreen?
Not yet, but it is on our To-do-list.


I have a black wall. Will AmbiScreen work with dark walls or any other colo(u)red walls?
Yes, colour effects are nice with dark walls, too. But what’s more, you can adjust all RGB levels according to your wall in our mobile app. Please see our video, where we demonstrate the view „WITH and WITHOUT AmbiScreen“ - wall in this video behind the display is painted black.


What happens if I buy a new TV/display? Can I move it to my new TV?
Yes! LEDs are removable (simply unstick) and you can move it to a new TV in the future. 


What kind of LED do you use in AmbiScreen?
Currently we have the best results with WS2801 LED chain (these are in standard package). But if you are a geek, you can select another type of LEDs in AmbiScreen settings just right now and use it together with AmbiScreen device.


I have smaller/larger display. Will it work?
Yes, you simply set amount of LEDs on each side of your display and you are done! AmbiScreen is for any screen size. For larger displays order more LEDs from our Perks. If your display is smaller than 50" turn off unused LEDs via mobile app. So simple.


Can I connect more leds to AmbiScreen? Let’s say, 100-200 LEDs or more?
Yes, you can! Order more extendable LEDs from our Perks and you can connect as many LEDs as you want. We strongly recommend this experimenting for geeks.


Do you plan to support other LEDs in AmbiScreen?
Yes, in future we plan to support other LEDs than WS2801. You can select other type of LEDs in AmbiScreen settings just right now and use it together with AmbiScreen device.


Will I be able to change type of my LEDs in the future when I buy AmbiScreen now?
Yes, you surely will.


My TV set has USB. Can I connect AmbiScreen directly to it?
No, you can use HDMI or analog inputs on AmbiScreen. AmbiScreen contains USB, but it is just for plugging an external HDD, a mouse, a keyboard, a pen drive, or another device to AmbiScreen.


What diagonals is AmbiScreen device for?
You can use it with any screen. Every package of AmbiScreen contains LED for effective work on the diagonals up to 50 inches (extremely up to 55 inches - because LED chain is 3,6m long), but you can buy additional LEDs for larger screens (see in Perks). Visual effects depend on several characteristics special for your set-up. One of the main characteristics is the distance between your TV set and the wall. The smaller it is, the worse the light diffuses and the chance to see “black holes” between LED modules is higher, so consistence of a spot is lower. Optimal distance between the wall and display is between 5-12cm (2-5in). 


What is optimal distance from the wall?
We recommend 5-12cm (2-5in) distance between the wall and your display for the best experience. We tried up to 20cm (8in), effect was viewable, but we highly recommend 5-12cm (2-5in) distance. The smaller it is, the worse the light diffuses and the chance to see “black holes” between LED modules is higher, so consistence of a spot is lower.


How about displays larger than 50”?
The solution is to extend LEDs with an additional LED chain. You can buy additional LEDs for bigger screens (see in Perks). You will obtain additional LEDs with an additional power supply or one more powerful power supply than is packed in standard edition.


Does it work with my Raspberry Pi?
Can I change Raspberry Pi for more powerful one? Yes, you can. But you will need to rearrange some internal parts.


Can I change Raspberry Pi for more powerful one?
Yes, you can. But you will need to rearrange some internal parts.


Does it work with XBMC, OpenELEC, etc?
AmbiScreen contains pre-installed OpenELEC media center with Kodi. If you are a geek, you can install any operating system or program your own functionalities.


Can I upgrade memory with a microSD card?
Yes, you can use your own microSD with a higher capacity. AmbiScreen contains a microSD card in package, too.


Can I update firmware of device when a new version is released?
Yes, it requires basic knowledge of computers.


Can I upgrade hardware by myself?
Yes. AmbiScreen is modular device, it means - if you are a geek - you can change any component.


Which input sources are supported?
AmbiScreen supports digital and analog inputs - HDMI and RCA video cinch. You can connect video with SCART via RCA, too. Cables, adaptor and connectors are included in package.


Do I need special video converters?
No. AmbiScreen has its own HDMI and analog converter and splitter built-in.


Does this device require a computer to work?
No, you don’t need a computer


What does "Future features" mean?
We want to develop these features in the future. These features are currently not available in our device.  


Will I need a new AC/DC adapter plug in USA, UK, Australia, Europe, etc.?
Don’t worry, it’s already taken into account. We will provide suitable plugs for each country in accordance to a particular delivery state or a backer’s special request.


Where and when can I buy AmbiScreen outside of Indiegogo?

Those who didn’t get to participate in our Indiegogo campaign in time can still get all the information and news updates on when and how to get the device from our official project site www.ambiscreen.tv.


Internal modules are connected together with standard components. Geeks can change internal modules. Software used in AmbiScreen device is open-source and it is up to you what you install (or simply use pre-installed software).
story_txt:
********************************** UPDATES ********************************GET YOUR REWARD #1: Big AmbiScreen Contest - Win AmbiScreen Limited EditionEveryone can get 1 point for sharing this contest via Facebook, 1 more for sharing via twitter, 1-3 more points for getting a perk (Perk under 10,- = 1 point, 11,- to 99,- = 2 points, over 100,- = 3 points)Earn as much points as you can and increase your chance to win! After taking contest, every user has to comment the Facebook and Twitter links. If project gets funded the winner will be drawn by random.org (the more points you have the more times you'll be included in a draw)facebook link: facebook.com/ambiscreen/photos/747109868754662/twitter link: twitter.com/ambiscreen/status/681481137525501952REWARD #2:More info: see below***************************************************************************** Open your eyes and you see light right in front of you. Turn on your TV and light appears again. Push the button on your wall and light comes to life.AmbiScreen is the most universal open platform for ambient lighting for any display and TV, gaming console, DVD player, set-top box, PC, Mac, PlayStation, Xbox or any other device you have in your home.
   
You can use AmbiScreen with other devices, or even without it, as an autonomous mood light system. AmbiScreen is the first design micro-computer ever with an ambient lighting controller and an integrated media center simple to use for home users, as well as powerful for geeks. You can customize your own AmbiScreen and change its internal parts and build up a new device.At AmbiScreen, we believe it always makes you feel better when using light effects everywhere in the house. So we created AmbiScreen. It is not necessary to have it just behind your TV, you can use it in many scenarios in your bedroom (picture light, bed light), bathroom, living room ... and it works with any device or as a standalone box.AmbiScreen was developed after long years of searching for a suitable device, apt to induce more spectacular light scenes in the household. We were seeking such a device, which would be able to create a lighting atmosphere for chill out; when organizing parties, get the vibrant atmosphere moving; calm the mind down when reading a book or kiss us goodnight on the way to the world of dreams, when falling asleep. Easy to use

set count of your LEDs on each side of your screen. 
AmbiScreen package comes with everything needed to use it out of the box. 52 LEDs 3,6m long are great for every screen size up to 50/55". Larger display? Simply connect LED extension kit with another 52 LEDs (can be multiplied as many times as you want).



Enjoy lights
Static color.Dynamic colors.
blobs (warm, cold - blue, green, red)
rainbow moods

Have a party? Use a Strobe effect (blue, white, pink) & Snake effectWant more? Develop your own effect and share it with community (for geeks)
What can I set?

speed of LEDs (rate, great to set it up for quick and slow scenes - update frequency of the LEDs)

each R,G,B channel (gamma correction, blacklevel, whitelevel threshold, color saturation gain, color value gain)

count of your LEDs

or even you can install another operating system and use it as your micro-computer with controller for LED lights



Our goal is to become a platform for making agreeable atmosphere and inducing home comfort by means of light elements. A platform exploited by a wide range of users, from home ones to geeks. 
e.g. Would you like to install your own simple web server? Or automatize another function? You can perfectly achieve this with AmbiScreen. The options are amazing, because it uses a reliable micro computer and software package based on Linux, with which you can do whatever you want. 
We had failed to find such a device on the market, so we decided to design it. 




Your eyes need time to adjust to bright and dark scenes. It is called the "iris" in your eye which is responsible for this. AmbiScreen helps iris to reduce this time so your eyes and eyes of your children are protected while watching.

RESEARCH RESULTS:"Eyestrain can occur when the eyes are fixed on an object for a long period of time, there is poor lighting," explains John Bullough, Ph.D., lighting scientist at the LRC and lead researcher on the television study. "... Reducing contrasts in perceived brightness between a visual display and its background will result in reduced visual fatigue and eyestrain."   // www.sciencedaily.com
"...when you watch TV in the dark, then the problem is that that is the only lighting in the home. Your eyes are forced to constantly adjust to different levels of lighting which makes the pupils dilate over and over again. Your eyes use more muscles and fatigue those muscles involved."   // www.healthguidance.org




























* SCART downsampling usually works just with internal TV tuner (RCA, CVBS), two-way SCART transmits signal from display to AmbiScreen

Ready for large displays
AmbiScreen is for any screen size. Default package comes with LEDs for all screen sizes up to 50"/55".
Do you have a larger screen? Just add "LED extension kit" perk as many times as you need. AmbiScreen is ready for huge displays.  
What if my display is smaller than 50"? That's ok. Turn off unused LEDs via mobile app. So simple.































Of course this wouldn’t be a crowdfunding effort without goodies to help motivate you to contribute. Here’s a run-down all of the individual rewards we’re offering.
REWARD #1: Big AmbiScreen Contest - Win AmbiScreen Limited Edition



Everyone can get 1 point for sharing this contest via Facebook, 1 more for sharing via twitter, 1-3 more points for getting a perk (Perk under 10,- = 1 point, 11,- to 99,- = 2 points, over 100,- = 3 points)
Earn as much points as you can and increase your chance to win! After taking contest, every user has to comment the Facebook and Twitter links. If project gets funded the winner will be drawn by random.org (the more points you have the more times you'll be included in a draw)

facebook link: facebook.com/ambiscreen/photos/747109868754662/
twitter link: twitter.com/ambiscreen/status/681481137525501952


REWARD #2:
Follow these simple steps and share it with your friends:1. Sign in to your Indiegogo account (or create one)2. Share AmbiScreen with your friends with Indiegogo sharing links (social icons on the left side when viewing on computer) That's it :)  Please, be signed in to your Indiegogo account when you are sharing these links - so you are be able to track your progress and we can give you rewards.







What are
the risks and challenges in making AmbiScreen?Since
January 2014, when we started to bring AmbiScreen to life, we have learned a
lot about the whole manufacturing process. We have visited various events and
conferences worldwide and learned from communication with our potential
customers as well as suppliers. We have few Chinese suppliers and suppliers
from Europe, too. We learned a lot during this
exciting project. But we know „shit can happen“. We have several component suppliers
in factories in China and we want to be correct to you. Y
must know troubles can always happen. If any of our suppliers were delayed, our
whole batch would be delayed, even if other parts would be ready on time. But
what we can say as well is, we are much better in solving problems than we were
2 years ago. The AmbiScreen team is following our internal rules in order to
reduce risks to the minimum.



Why is there a $35 shipping fee?We developed AmbiScreen as all-in-one device and you’ll find all necessary things in your package. Therefore package is bulky and the fee reflects current costs to reliably ship AmbiScreen to you in most regions around the world.

I asked for my Perk to be sent to the wrong address, what should I do?Please contact us at indiegogo (at) ambiscreen.tv

When will you ship the AmbiScreen ambient light?We aim to ship the first AmbiScreen pre-orders in March/April 2016

I can't get my payment to work in Paypal, what should I do?Email the Indiegogo Customer Happiness Team at support@indiegogo.com. They'll be able to track your transaction and help with any issues

I had challenge making a contribution, please help!If you had trouble making a contribution, please check Indiegogo's common contribution errors.

Want to become a Reseller or purchase in Wholesale quantities?Please e-mail us at hello(at)ambiscreen.tv

Do I need to configure the device before using?AmbiScreen has predefined number of LEDs on each side of the screen in standard. If you want to change this as well as some other settings, we recommend to setup your wifi (this is done just once and easily by connecting mouse or keyboard via USB to AmbiScreen and setting up credential for your local network). Then you can set all settings via mobile app (such as colors, effects, number of LEDs, adjust the brightness, gamma colors, etc.).

Does AmbiScreen support HDMI 2.0?We are working hard to include HDMI 2.0 support in one of the next generations of AmbiScreen. For now, HDMI 2.0 is not included.

Does AmbiScreen support 4K2K?You can use your display with 4K2K and AmbiScreen together -  to do so, connect AmbiScreen to dual-way SCART connector on your display. Direct connection over HDMI in standard version of AmbiScreen supports 1080p. Higher resolution needs more powerful internal parts. As we stated before, geeks can upgrade part as they want. So yes, there is an option to upgrade AmbiScreen to 4K2K version. In future, we plan to include 4K2K support as a standard feature of all AmbiScreen devices.

Does AmbiScreen support HDCP?We are using HDMI splitting components with declared HDCP capability from our manufacturers. Currently it supports HDCP 1.3. Later, we are about to support higher versions, too. But we are still working on HDCP support for second component in our device and we expect, we will be able to include HDCP in first release.

What about 3D support?We used some internal parts with 3D support and software part supports 3D, too. But it is important to say that 3D is just experimental feature for geeks and it is disabled by default (for now, we can’t guarantee full 3D support). 

Does AmbiScreen support CEC/ARC?We plan to add CEC/ARC capability in one of the next releases. We are working on this feature - it's possible that we solve this soon and final product will have it included. We want to be fair, so we need to say it is 50:50 for now for the first release.

Do you have support for smart bulbs in AmbiScreen?Not yet, but it is on our To-do-list.

I have a black wall. Will AmbiScreen work with dark walls or any other colo(u)red walls?Yes, colour effects are nice with dark walls, too. But what’s more, you can adjust all RGB levels according to your wall in our mobile app. Please see our video, where we demonstrate the view „WITH and WITHOUT AmbiScreen“ - wall in this video behind the display is painted black.

What happens if I buy a new TV/display? Can I move it to my new TV?Yes! LEDs are removable (simply unstick) and you can move it to a new TV in the future. 

What kind of LED do you use in AmbiScreen?Currently we have the best results with WS2801 LED chain (these are in standard package). But if you are a geek, you can select another type of LEDs in AmbiScreen settings just right now and use it together with AmbiScreen device.

I have smaller/larger display. Will it work?Yes, you simply set amount of LEDs on each side of your display and you are done! AmbiScreen is for any screen size. For larger displays order more LEDs from our Perks. If your display is smaller than 50" turn off unused LEDs via mobile app. So simple.

Can I connect more leds to AmbiScreen? Let’s say, 100-200 LEDs or more?Yes, you can! Order more extendable LEDs from our Perks and you can connect as many LEDs as you want. We strongly recommend this experimenting for geeks.


Do you plan to support other LEDs in AmbiScreen?Yes, in future we plan to support other LEDs than WS2801. You can select other type of LEDs in AmbiScreen settings just right now and use it together with AmbiScreen device.

Will I be able to change type of my LEDs in the future when I buy AmbiScreen now?Yes, you surely will.

My TV set has USB. Can I connect AmbiScreen directly to it?No, you can use HDMI or analog inputs on AmbiScreen. AmbiScreen contains USB, but it is just for plugging an external HDD, a mouse, a keyboard, a pen drive, or another device to AmbiScreen.

What diagonals is AmbiScreen device for?You can use it with any screen. Every package of AmbiScreen contains LED for effective work on the diagonals up to 50 inches (extremely up to 55 inches - because LED chain is 3,6m long), but you can buy additional LEDs for larger screens (see in Perks). Visual effects depend on several characteristics special for your set-up. One of the main characteristics is the distance between your TV set and the wall. The smaller it is, the worse the light diffuses and the chance to see “black holes” between LED modules is higher, so consistence of a spot is lower. Optimal distance between the wall and display is between 5-12cm (2-5in). 



What is optimal distance from the wall?We recommend 5-12cm (2-5in) distance between the wall and your display for the best experience. We tried up to 20cm (8in), effect was viewable, but we highly recommend 5-12cm (2-5in) distance. The smaller it is, the worse the light diffuses and the chance to see “black holes” between LED modules is higher, so consistence of a spot is lower.

How about displays larger than 50”?The solution is to extend LEDs with an additional LED chain. You can buy additional LEDs for bigger screens (see in Perks). You will obtain additional LEDs with an additional power supply or one more powerful power supply than is packed in standard edition.

Does it work with my Raspberry Pi?Can I change Raspberry Pi for more powerful one? Yes, you can. But you will need to rearrange some internal parts.

Does it work with XBMC, OpenELEC, etc?AmbiScreen contains pre-installed OpenELEC media center with Kodi. If you are a geek, you can install any operating system or program your own functionalities.

Can I upgrade memory with a microSD card?Yes, you can use your own microSD with a higher capacity. AmbiScreen contains a microSD card in package, too.

Can I update firmware of device when a new version is released?Yes, it requires basic knowledge of computers.

story:
We’re fortunate to live in a community where eating healthy is a bit of a ‘thing’. As far as possible we support food producers and suppliers at local farmer’s markets in our area.
We'd love to grow our own crops, but without the luxury of adequate outdoor space, conventional growing methods needed a re-think. This led us to hydroponics! We were surprised to realise that there weren't any affordable, uncomplicated systems on the market - so we decided to design one! During the past ten months, our team of designers brainstormed and tested multiple designs until we developed a system that's affordable, easy to set up, has a small footprint, and is also environmentally friendly. 

We are extremely proud to present you with The Blue Grow Garden!

 

 

In simple terms, the BlueGrow Garden is a vertical hydroponic plant growing system. Hydroponics is a method of growing various plants in a nutrient-rich water solution, rather than in soil. For the experts out there - our system falls into a sub-category of hydroponics called Nutrient Film Technique (NFT). The main advantage of the NFT system over other forms of hydroponics is that the plant roots are exposed to adequate supplies of water, oxygen, and nutrients.

The BlueGrow Garden is water-wise, energy efficient and has a small surface area. This means that the system is perfectly suited to a variety of environments and can be placed anywhere that gets adequate sun or artificial light.

The impressive part of the BlueGrow Garden (in our opinion, of course!), is the fact that you can assemble it in only nine easy steps in less than ten minutes and with NO tools!

 

 

The BlueGrow Garden takes less than ten minutes to assemble, with no finicky parts or tricky methods. Once assembled, simply place your seedlings into the provided baskets and slot them into any of the spaces along the grow tube. Fill the reservoir with water and selected nutrients - then turn the pump on, and you're growing!

When the pump is switched on (and very importantly, stays on), nutrient-rich water is pumped from the reservoir via the inner tube to the top, and then cascades back down to the reservoir. The continuous circulation of water ensures that your seedlings have all they need to grow into healthy, vibrant plants.

Considerations for growing hydroponic plants includes natural or artificial light availability, nutrient selection, ambient temperature, humidity, and pH level of the water. Once these factors are controlled, hydroponics provides a less time-consuming and superior growing medium than conventional soil. The turn-around time from seedling to harvest can be as short as 15 days depending on what you grow, and an average growth cycle for a variety of herbs and vegetables is around one month. The BlueGrow Garden is also great for growing flowers!

 

Due to its compact size and ease of use, the BlueGrow Garden isn't restricted to just growing at your home. You can place it on balconies making it perfect for small-space living, in restaurants and cafes - chefs now have fresh produce to-hand every day, in schools for supplementary food (and it's also a great educational tool!), and even in shared office spaces for healthy, minimal-waste eating. Instead of buying a whole head of lettuce from the store for a salad, just pick the leaves you need straight from your BlueGrow Garden!

 

 

 

 

 

 

We've spent a fair amount of blood, sweat and tears during the last ten months developing and testing the BlueGrow Garden. The most expensive part in setting up our business is the cost of the moulds and tooling. As is normally the case, the raw material and components (called a bill-of-materials) we need in the production of the BlueGrow Garden are subject to 'economies-of-scale'. Simply, the larger the quantities we buy, the lower the price.

When we reach our goal of $25 000, we'll be able to set up our factory and start producing your rewards. We also have a stretch goal of $50 000 in place; if you help us get there, we'll be able to manufacture most of the components from recycled plastic, making the BlueGrow Garden even more sustainable!

 

 

 

 

 

If you're new to gardening and/or hydroponics, we're probably throwing a lot of words around that you may not be familiar with. Don't worry - we've got you covered! If you've got a question about something - anything at all - leave us a comment, or send us an email at social@bluegrowgarden.com and we'll reply :D

 

 

During our search for suitable suppliers from whom we intended to procure goods and services, we prioritized those who abide by strong ethical practices in relation to their business principles. We ensured that the businesses we're working with adhere to all the relevant acts and regulations. As far as possible, we'll procure local and from enterprises owned by previously disadvantaged members of our society. 

We've applied to become a part of the Arrow Program as offered by IndieGoGo. As soon as we know the outcome of our application,  we'll inform you in the 'Update' section of our campaign. 

 

Did we mention that we'll plant seedlings in the BlueGrow Garden on the day of our launch, and post pictures and video so that you can follow their progress? We'll also post other interesting information, and might even have a surprise or two! You can follow and share our journey here...

                 

Website: http://bluegrowgarden.com/        Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_PWjAixTFGN-E...

                 

 

As a startup, BlueGrow Garden has made every effort to secure a seamless and scalable supply chain, so that all that remains are your contributions! The design, prototype and testing phases are completed - now all we need are your contributions to start production. Let's get healthy food on our tables!

story:
Do you love coffee?

Now, try to extract your coffee with a different way. 

 

I am Sungil Lee, CEO at Magpan Korea. I've been running this company since 1987. Magpan Korea is a company specialized in eco-friendly pots and pans including kitchenwares. With solid creed that "Kitchenwares are as important as food ingredients", we've developed Bochetti Moca Pot for two years of designing and testing.  

 

What's Moca Pot? 

Moca Pot is a coffee extracter which extracts coffee essence by using pressure of boiling steam from the boiling water at the boiler. You can create your own style of Espresso, Americano  at home, camping site and traveling areas as well. Unlike coffee from other coffee machines, you can feel the different oily flavor and taste because the boiling steam dissolves the oil from coffee bean itself. You can extract from Espresso to Americano by balancing the quantity of water and coffee. 

 

Bochetti Moca Pot Parts 

 

Principle of Coffee Extraction by Steam Pressure

 

[Picture of Extracted Coffee to the Container side after 3-4 minutes]

 

How to use Bochetti Moca Pot

 
  • Preparation: Bochetti Moca Pot, Fine Ground Coffee 1-2 Spoon, Water, Gas stove ***Induction, Electronic Stove, Ceran are all good to use***
  • You can extract upto 4 cups of Espresso or 1 cup of Americano.

1.  Prepare Bochetti Moca pot, water and fine ground coffee. 

2.  Fill water up to the limit line inside of the boiler.

3.  Fill with ground coffee into the main filter. (1-2 spoon for Americano / 2 spoon with 1/4 water for Espresso.) You can have your own style of coffee by adjusting quantity of water and coffee.

*** Do not attempt to compress the coffee in the filter. It causes a clog issue. NO coffee tamper***
4.  Put the main filter inside of the boiler.
5.  Screw altogether boiler, main filter, and the container.
6.  Place Bochetti moca pot on the gas stove or induction or electronic stove top.
7.  When water starts to boil, you'll see the coffee extracting in 30 second. When the coffee extracted to the top, turn it off and pour coffee to the cup. 
*** Warining: The moca pot will be hot. Be careful. ***  
8. After using moca pot, wash it with cold water and soft sponge or loofah and then dry the parts seperately. We don't recommend you to use dishwashing soap.  
*** No dish-washing soap ***
 
 

 

Why Bochetti Moca Pot is different? 

 

1. Materials : 100% High-end Stainless Steel 

2. Safety :  User Safety Secured with a Double Safety Valve which has a patent

3. Convenience : No need to exchange filter, Semi-permanent and simple to use

4. Deep Flavor & Rich Taste  : With a extraction way of boiling steam, you can fully enjoy a deep flavor and rich taste

 

Parts in Details

Importance of a Double Safety Valve

  

A cup of coffee from a Moca pot is extracted in 1 atmosphere of pressure. 

However, the pressure inside of boiler sometimes gets higher than 1 atmosphere due to too fine ground coffee. At this point, a double safety valve can maintain 1 atmosphere of pressure inside of boiler constantly. 

When you purchase moca pot, we want you to make sure that it has a double safety valve. We use a double safety valve which has a patent in our all products for the user safety. 

 

Who Needs a Bochetti Moca Pot? 

 

1. Anyone who loves to make a cup of coffee 

2. Anyone who enjoys coffee at home

3. Anyone who would like to have a cup of coffee while Camping, Traveling, and Fishing 

 

Perks

Type 1. Single Kit  

Includes only Bochetti Moca Pot

Type 2. Home Kit

Includes Bochetti Moca Pot and Bochetti Moca Pot Trivet

Type 3. Camping Kit

Includes Bochetti Moca Pot, Bochetti Moca Pot Trivet, and a Camping Bag

 

  • Bochetti Moca Pot Trivet 

 

  • Bochetti Moca Pot Camping Bag

 

Project Schedule

  • 05/23 Funding Starts
  • 06/22 Funding Finish 
  • 06/23 Inspection & Packing 
  • 06/26 Delivery Starts

 

FAQ

1.  Do I have to exchange the main filter regularly?

> No. You don't have to exchange it regularly. Unlike french press, Bochetti Moca Pot has semi-permanent main filter. 

2. What must I know when using Bochetti Moca Pot?

> 1. When water starts to boil, moca pot itself will get very hot. When you open the lid, please open it carefully. Also, as soon as your coffee finishes extracting, turn it off right away. 

2. NO MICROWAVE. However, Induction, electronic stove, gas stove, CERAN all are good to use. 

3. NO COFFEE TAMPER to compress coffee in the main filter

4. NO DISHWASHER for washing moca pot. Just wash with sponge with running cool water and dry it. 

*** You can use it permanently if you keep above things.***

3. Can I change the delivery address? 

> You can change it before the funding is completed. 

4. How can I wash Bochetti Moca Pot? 

Just wash with sponge with running cool water and dry it. We don't recommend you to use dish-washing soap.

 

  • We'll update news regarding the status. We hope to meet precious clients in worldwide.
  • Magpan Korea Website is in Korean language but if you e-mail us or call us, we'll try to answer as fast as we can. 
  • E-mail : magpankorea@gmail.com  
  • TEL : +82-70-4388-7214 (English) 
  • Facebook : www.facebook.com/bochettikorea/
  • Website : www.magpankorea.com

story:
Liquid soap has become a popular method of cleaning anything from hand washing to the local carwash. Modern society and industry have many functions for liquid soap. In many circumstances, it is the only type of soap that can be utilized and various industries have become dependent on liquid soap and many would not exist without it. In fact, many industries and products are completely centered around liquid soap and would not subsist without it.

One of the industries to come out of the advent of liquid soap is the soap dispenser. Soap dispensers come in a great variety of styles and designs and are very convenient for replacing the usual solid, powder or bar soap. Solid or bar soap is very difficult to store once is has been wet. A tray or other device is necessary to prevent the soap from creating a mess and it’s not very practical for use for any purpose other than bathing. The much-preferred method is the liquid soap dispenser and has now become a favorite for bathing also.

Liquid soap for hand washing and for dish washing has been commonly produced in containers that are intended sit by the sink and will typically have a hand pump or some other type of dispensing device included in the container or bottle. Designed to be readily accessible to the sink the bottle of soap will tend to create rings on the sink edge and the use of a pump will usually result in some soap being spilled and either collect around the bottle or drool down the edge of the sink. Wet hands can trail water up to the soap bottle creating a further unsightly disorder. The closer the soap dispenser can be to the water faucet the use of liquid soap becomes more efficient and convenient for the user.

The Tap Faucet Soap Dispenser is a clever and innovative solution the mess and inconvenience that can be caused by bottles of soap sitting by the sink. The product is designed to screw on to the faucets threaded aerator attachment located usually at the end of the faucet pipe. The threads in the center of the product will accept the threaded end of the faucet pipe and tighten to fit snugly on the faucet. A built-in aerator is located in the water flow center of the Tap Faucet Soap Dispenser and allows the normal flow of water through the aerator.

The product is positioned at an extremely convenient arrangement that is accessible yet out of the way. The soap can be accessed through the button that is positioned at the bottom of the device and the button is the entire bottom section. This arrangement will allow a “press anywhere” action on the bottom section for soap. The soap pump is located within the soap reservoir. A pick-up tube attached to the pump assures that the pump will continue to pick-up soap contained within the reservoir when low quantities are present. The soap reservoir contains a large amount of liquid soap but is still small enough to be out of the way while being accessible. A simple press of the pump button will activate the pump and liquid soap will be expelled out the soap dispensing nozzle located underneath the product. A refill access port is located on the top of the reservoir

housing and is covered by an easily accessible lid to prevent any spills or contamination of the stored liquid soap. Accessible and convenient the Tap Faucet Soap Dispenser will keep the sink free of clutter and will help save water by making the soap available at the faucet. No more rings, spilled soap or water marks from reaching for the usual soap bottles.

Unique Functions of Invention:

Compact size yet contains a significant amount of soap

Easily attached and removed

Utilizes existing faucets

Aerator is built-in

Soap pump easily provides desired amount of soap

Entire bottom section is a “press anywhere” button for soap

Keep sinks free of clutter

Reduces water use

Quality construction assures product durability

 

 

We need this money to pay for all the research work, Patent protection and to develop molds for the product. This is just the start we have more products to save more water and keep your sink look beautiful.

story:
Dear Angels,

I am Baker, 30 years old, married with one beautiful daughter, she's turning 5 this month.

I can’t believe she’s turning 5 because, I hardly get see her grow because I am working day and night to save my house.


To cut long story short, I was cheated and betrayed by my very own biological sister.

My late mother died of breast cancer on the 24th of December 2013 at age 67 and my late father had died of pneumonia at age 82 on the 29th of March 2018. My father had a history of dementia and diabetes.

In the year 2011, my mother bought me a house ,with whatever money my mother had left with her, as she was worried that I will be left with nothing if she passes away because my sister has embezzled all my father’s money, my sister tricked my parents and transferred the ownership of my parent’s assets to hers. At the time of purchase of the house, I included my parent’s name to my house as they didn’t have a place to call home, the house was partially paid, and we took a bank loan, and my parent and my sister with her 3 kids were living in my house and she rented out her house. My mother told my sister to make monthly payments for the mortgage loan and to give money for my University fee, but she only made irregular payments.

To the world, my sister created an image, as if she was taking care of my parents, but, she did not. Even after my parents’ demise, there were combined outstanding medical bills amounting to $52,000 for my late parents which my parents were unaware of.

My sister used the money to purchase a car for her husband and set up businesses.

My parents had always been very supportive of me; however, my parents would not dare to talk to me in my sister’s presence.

My mother died 3 months before my daughter was born.

After my mom died, I had to discontinue my bachelor’s degree as my sister stopped giving money and she stopped paying for the mortgage loan.

I had to take odd jobs to finance the mortgage loan and support my family.

From the time my mother died and until November 2014, it was really a hard time because my sister didn’t allow me to store food in the fridge and cook in the house. During this period, she pestered me to remove my ownership from the house, but I stayed strong and did not let that happen.

Soon, I couldn’t afford to pay the mortgage loan and the bank sent notices, instructing us to settle the outstanding loan or evict the house by the stipulated time.

My sister took my dad along with her to another house. The utility bill was due for few months, and the utility service was disrupted. My life was left in darkness.

I spent 2 nights in my house without electricity and my wife and I took turns to fan my daughter while she was asleep. My daughter had eczema, and this made it even worse when the was no electricity as it was very humid and stuffy.

I cried, grieving over my mother’s loss and the situation I was in. I sold whatever things I had, borrowed money from friends to settle the outstanding utility bill.

Thereafter, I had to work even harder, at times I went without seeing my daughter for continuous 6 days as she would be asleep when I get up for work and she would be asleep when I come back late at night.

I was doing cosmetic sales job which required me to stand almost 12 hours a day, and I developed severe varicose veins which causes a lot of discomfort and pain when I walk. My doctor advised me to undergo a surgery, but I can’t afford it till today.

I usually skip lunch, and drink lots of water from the toilet tap water during work in order to save money and to bring food to the table for my wife and daughter. At times, my wife would make Tuna Sandwich for lunch.

It was really a difficult time for me, I had to borrow money from bank again.

Soon, my wife started work and we sent our daughter to Childcare school.

My wife and I hardly get any time to spend quality family time with our daughter and my daughter would always tell us, that she wants a brother to play with since we do not have time to play with her. It breaks our heart to know that we are not there for her when we should and give her the time and love. At times, she will tell my wife that she is sad as she sees her classmates’ parents joining in on school excursion trips, celebrating birthdays in school with their children.

In August 2017, I joined AIA as an insurance agent, but after 6 months into the job, things did not go well. My team at AIA usually does Roadshows to get clients and I was used as a crowd puller, my task was to attract customers with free gifts  to the table where another agent would try to sell insurance products, There was once a customer whom I pulled happened to be a mystery shopper who conducts checks if agent follow the guideline of proper selling, and my co-agent made an infringement which got both of us into trouble and I was slapped with a heavy fine and banned from participating in future roadshows. Roadshows were my main source of income, I wanted to leave AIA as my income was affected, but I couldn’t because I have a bond with AIA for 2 years, if I leave before the bond is completed, I would have to pay back all my earnings I have made in AIA.

It is also hard finding other jobs as I have only done odd jobs.

Now that I have not paid my monthly mortgage loan for several months, the bank has sent notices giving me few months to settle the monthly mortgage loan in full payments or I must leave. I have pleaded and asked for extension from the bank which they approved, and I would need to settle by the end of 2019 and I would need the Funds to be raised by December 2019.

At the same time, I have a passion to start a business and create jobs for others like me. I want to follow my dreams by starting a cosmetic line which uses natural ingredients for the products and are cruelty free. After losing my mother to cancer, my goal is to produce products that are environmentally friendly and products that are safe to use for women. I am now raising fund to start my business.

I will greatly appreciate the love from you guys if you share your love by saving my house, make my dream come true and bring joy to homeless children  .

The Funds raised will go towards settling my mortgage loan and to start my business. I have plans to donate a portion of the profit to the Shadrach Children Home in Myanmar.

Your contribution would mean a lot to me and my family, and it would greatly ease my burden and bring lots of joy not only to my family but also to the needy children in Myanmar.

My family and I will forever be grateful to your love, kindness and generosity.

Love,
Baker

story:
First 2 in 1 Toilet Brush called "Looi"

Time to replace the old Brush with the Samrt Toilet "Brush n Plunger", Snazzy Smart & Clean.

You wanna be relaxed when visiting the Loo, right? Armed with the all-new 2 in 1 LooTool you can now swipe away any splatter and clear the brown trout when it starts spawning using the same tool, a Double Whammy! No more nasty surprises.

Cleaning toilets is a nasty affair and not a topic you would bring up at a party! Until now! Welcome, The Smart Toilet "Brush n Plunger" Combo called "Looi". Through forward-thinking design we have re-invented the old loo brush into a Combo a Brush Plunger - A World First!!

 

 

It's not only a nasty affair to unblock a loo, especially when it's overflowing, but it can be very embarrassing and costly too. The traditional plunger was designed almost 200 years ago! It's only recently that the loo brush changed and it still remains the ugly duck in the closet, not to mention the traditional plunger, no wonder why it is hidden!!

Safe Materials

Apart from the anti-microbial technology within the plastics which is certified to ISO standards, Looi is made of FDA and RoHS certified materials, which means all of its components are  100% non-toxic, safe, and me-friendly.

 

 

Smart Materials

The hydrophobic performance is created by a silica nano-technology, also combined into the plastics, which means water doesn't stick to the surface, so almost completely dry straight after use. The materials used are also UV-Resistant. Looi adopts a different approach that uses a highly sustainable and efficient silicone UPX elastomer material that is both durable and flexible. Needless to say, Looi is Odor Free and won't smell when you sit on the Throne.

Additionally, the brush head and other soft parts are made of UPX silicone/rubber which has a very high tear strength with additional properties like anti-corrosion, UV resistant, water-shedding, and anti-bacterial.

 

 

It's unique durable silicone designed shape combined with split vertical multi-blades and a hollow bottom will not only clean your toilet but will clear blockages and probably save you money and embarrassment. The all-new toilet "Brush n Plunger" Combo. It's the Next-Gen LooTool, Snazzy, Smart, and Clean.

 

Toilet Usage

According to the World Toilet Organization (WTO), the average person uses a toilet 2,500 times year, or six to eight times daily. Imagine 1 Billion people using the loo twice a day without a plunger handy! Imagine how many embarrasing moments Looi can prevent.

 

 

Why Looi is Different

  • Replaces traditional Brush and Plunger sets, combining them into a 2 in 1 Tool!
  • Me-friendly - kid safe materials
  • It's Smart, Clean & Ezy-to-use
  • Complements any bathroom
  • Cleans efficiently 
  • Doesn't Clog-up
  • Is Odor free
  • Dries quickly
  • Washable
  • UV Resistant
  • Non Fading
  • Ezy Grip
  • Saves you embarrassment!!

​

80% of homes only have the traditional toilet brush in the bathroom which is useless if and when the loo (sink, bathtub, or basin) blocks. ​With a Looi, it will complement any bathroom setting and can be used with confidence because it's Snazzy, Smart and Ez-to-use - a complete LooTool, always available when something does go wrong. Actually, it might just save you some embarrassment or a visit from the plumber.

 

 

 

Although the project is only at the concept stage, many design simulations tests have been performed to make sure the product will deliver when manufactured.

Drawings and concept functionality were reviewed and verified by our suppliers and the product is production-ready. We still feel a prototype is essential to ensure our color scheme matches perfectly and the last unknown issues are sorted before commiting to full production.

 

 

Ezy Grip Handle

The handle grip is ergonomically and sturdy designed and ezy on the hands giving you a perfect non-slip grip when used as a brush or plunger. The top is designed to sit snugly in your palm when used for clearing a blockage. The handle is also changeable if required.

 

 

Changeable Handle

The soft grip of the handle as well as the cap is made from the same durable materials as the bottom parts. If required a new handle can be replaced simply by unscrewing and adding the new one, no rocket science.

 

 

Looi's Makeup Summary

 

The design aimed to create something elegant yet simple which is visible in every bathroom

 

  • Plunger Brush  - Blades act as Bristles

    • The blades wipe away grime as opposed to the scratching of current brushes
    • The blades don't get clogged up and are flexible and will not scratch the surface
    • The pointy tips of the blades make "under the rim" cleaning a breeze
    • Blades at the bottom are extended to act as legs when docked, allowing airflow to dry Looi, even inside the plunger

    • The bottom part acts as a plunger and forms part of the brush. The material is flexible to expand when used to unblock the loo. Ezy to use when needed and friendly-me

  • Handle - Ergonomical Ezy on the hand

    • The handle is made of the same material used on the head, providing a soft grip 
    • The "doorknob" top is designed for comfort when used as a plunger
    • Apart from stylish, the handle is designed to sit snuggly in your palm when used for normal cleaning
    • It screws into an insert and can be replaced, either when the head needs replacement or when damaged

  • Holder - Stylish yet Simple

    • The holder is designed around Looi in order to maximize airflow when not in use
    • It has a rigid stand to prevent tip over
    • Easy washable 

 

 

 

Roll n Wrist - Brush

Looi follows the toilet contours and with a simple "Roll n Wrist" action, it will wipe away any marks. The soft material won't scratch the surface of the loo.

The spiky blades on the brush effortlessly reach the underside of the rim by a simple "Roll a Wrist" action. It also rinses clean with a flush so no nasties are left behind on the blades or head.

 

 

Plunger

Regardless of how full the loo is, simply aim at the bottom opening, press down a couple of times, and.... Voilà (Wa-Lah). This anti-germ, multi-purpose design with aligned blades will give you enhanced cleaning and unblocking power. The handle's sturdy design will make using the plunger, unblocking the loo, a breeze!

 

 

 

 

Dynamics

The dock's simple design is elegant yet efficient to allow airflow to naturally dry any water residue after use. Looi is visible from the top and enhances the uniqueness and color of the brush to match the decor. The bottom of the blades acts as "legs" which allows ample airflow while docked.

 

 

Airflow while Docked

While Looi is docked, there is ample airflow through the holder. The blades are perforated to allow air passing through the holder. The blades are extended to act as legs and also to allow air to circulate through the plunger. The holder has elongated vents to allow plenty airflow. The water residue that might collect during use, will soon evaporate in the holder because of free circular airflow. Cleaning the holder is easy.

 

 

 

Under the Rim

While many current brushes have gadgets & gizmo's attached, they still fall short of cleaning under the rim properly. With Looi, you won't have that problem. The pointy blades are designed to get in under the rim with ease.

 

 

 

Color Range

These are currently the 4 colors we intend to use. Research and Decor Consulting shows that these are the most popular color for modern decor. Its possible to add more if there are a demand. 

 

 

Warranty

We offer a 2-year domestic warranty, which covers faults in the product construction, material and assembly if used according to instructions.

 
 

 

 

 

 

Rewards

 

 

 

 

 

 

Rewards Timeline

If our goals are met and this campaign is successful, we will get into it straight away. Manufacturing wiil commence in a couple of months. Although manufacturing is always full of “you won’t believe this” stories, if successful, we feel confident, even with COVID-19 in play, about our ability to deliver early in the New Year.

​In short, a successful funding goal will allow us to start mass production within a couple of months with delivery by latest March 2021. 

With your support, we can make this a reality.

 

​

 

The Birth of Looi

Great inventions have come from the lack of, frustration, or simply being inspired, in this case, embarrassment. This idea began from having a "red-face moment" in the bathroom while visiting friends.

​Standing around helplessly in the bathroom while the loo was filling up, thinking, "if only I had a bomb to hurl down the darn thing, what am I going to say to the crowd out there!" It was so embarrassing. It was days later when the humble Avocado jumped to mind and ultimately became the backbone of the design. The first designs were completed in 2017 and were changed a few times after that, obviously for good reason.

 

 

Risks and Challenges

 

Design

We are negotiating with suppliers who can assist with fast-tracking a prototype for fine-tuning & advise. If this is successful, we'll jump into production immediately.

Testing

With the vast number of toilet designs on the market today it's impossible to test the Looi on all of them.

Manufacturing

We don't foresee any issues with the first production run although QA will have to be managed from NZ which could potentially add some delays because of travel restrictions.

Delivery

With COVID-19 in play and with cross border issues in most countries, it's a hornet's nest to know if we'll be able to deliver as promised, will try our best though!

 

Environmental commitments

 

Long-lasting design

We've designed the product to be durable by using the latest high-performance materials. The plunger head is tough yet flexible enough to handle pressure when used. The sturdy handle is ergonomically designed for a strong & comfortable grip.

Reusability and recyclability

We intend to use only the latest durable materials in all parts which will last for years to come and will probably be recyclable. Both the handle and the brush head is replaceable.

​Our packaging will be plain and simple carton box which is both bio-degradable and recyclable, after all, it's not the packaging that will be doing the job!

Sustainable materials

Lots of research went into finding the perfect combination of materials and low-impact manufacturing. Only the latest durable materials are used in all parts which will last for years to come which will probably be recyclable.

​The brush head and other soft parts are made of UPX silicone/rubber which has a very high tear strength with additional properties like anti-corrosion, UV resistant, water-shedding, and anti-bacterial. The handle and grip are made of Somos, new generation plastic which also supports the above properties.

Environmentally friendly factories

Our manufacturing partners are highly efficient producers and are ISO accredited. Their QA and job execution plans are set up to minimize waste on materials, saving the environment and cutting costs.

Sustainable Distribution

We intend to use Amazon for all our distribution. Amazon has one of the most advanced fulfillment networks in the world. With Fulfillment by Amazon (FBA), they store our products in Amazon's fulfillment centers, they pick, pack, ship, and provide customer service for our products. FBA can scale our business needs and reach more customers.

Something else

By using the plunger instead of nasty chemicals to unblock your loo, we can all help save the environment bit by bit.

story:
It's makan (Singlish for "meal") time.  What is your favourite "Chope" Weapon?

It's makan (Singlish for "meal") time.  In crowded and "kiasu" (this term describe the "afraid to lose-out" mentality of our people) Singapore where looking for a free table can be a nightmare during meal time, having a small item we can use to conveniently reserve aka "chope" a table can mean the difference between a leisurely or rushed lunch or dinner. 

Do you have a "chope" weapon?  What is your favourite?  An umbrella?  A book?  A tissue pack?  More importantly, is it effective?  Take a look and have a good laugh at SAFRA's "chope" weapons test video.


MakanKaki135™

MakanKaki135™ is the ultimate multi-functional meal-time "chope" weapon of choice.

What it does:

  • serves as a hard case for your tissue pack - thus preventing untidy, crushed and crumpled tissue packs in your bag
  • serves as a holder for your cutleries, conveniently and elegantly housing a Western spoon and fork set or an Asian spoon and chopstick set
  • helps maintain hygiene by preventing contact of your cutleries with dirty tables and/or trays
  • "chope" aka reserves your seat while elegantly setting your table with your cutleries

Note: MakanKaki135™ is made of BPA free Polypropylene and may look different from the 3D printed prototype used in the promotional video.


Who We Are

At The Beanstalk Creative Actions Pte Ltd, we are passionate about design, design thinking and "design/made-in-Singapore".  We share this passion with you through our work and training programmes to help you achieve personal as well as work place innovation.

  • Chris Long, director of the company is a landscape architect with 20 years of design experience
  • He was the designer for the Singapore Istana Front Lawn as well as The Singapore Botanic Gardens Tanglin Core
  • He has one active patent (not this product), multiple copyrights, and was a member of one of seven finalists for the Million Dollar Next Generation Container Port Challenge
to find out more about what design thinking is as well as our work and programmes, please visit our website www.magicbeans.com.sg


What We Need and What You Get

We are pre-selling MakanKaki135™.  We seek funds to produce and manufacture MakanKaki135™:
  • For a contribution of 4 USD,
  • we will send and ship to you a ready-to-use MakanKaki135™
  • Funds would be used for production and/or for promotion, patent continuation, trademark registration costs etc.

The Impact

We believe in walking the talk.  We have many crazy ideas and it is time we put one of these out to the most difficult test of all: commercialisation.  We are novice in the world of business and manufacturing and would need all the help we can get, financial or otherwise.

  • We hope you agree with us it is a great albeit quirky product!
  • Be the first backer and impress your friends!  Don't wait until it becomes a runaway success and be a follower.  Set the trend and "chope" your table in style!
  • If this is not uniquely Singaporean, we don't know what is!  On the occasion of Singapore’s 50th birthday let's celebrate our quirky table “chope-ing” culture with the first ever dedicated "chope-table" weapon: the MakanKaki135™.
  • It is also such a uniquely Singapore souvenir!


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, but believe in this product, don't worry, you can help by:

  • getting the word out and make some noise about MakanKaki™ and share our video
  • stocking MakanKaki135™ in your store (physical or e-store)
  • helping to manufacture or find low-cost and reliable manufacturers, packaging (recycled if possible) etc.
  • featuring it in your blog/website
  • featuring it in your magazine
  • hooking us up with TV, Radio or Hollywood (Ellen DeGeneres would be nice)!

story:
The Battery Grip

We are Interior Designers. We want everything in our rooms to be look great and organized. What bothers us the most is seeing unorganized drawers and cabinets.  
There are still many products that require batteries, let's say if you have children, extra batteries are always in need for their toys. Our Battery Grips are small so you can carry around just right amount of extra batteries with you.

Organize and Store

After opening the battery package, The unused battery will clutter your storage space. Organize with Battery Grip is  easy and stylish.

Take'em with you

Are you an Avid photographer or the road warrior? If so, take batteries with you via Battery Grip~ (Combo Grip Shown)

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We have made several revision models and reached to perfectly working, pre-production stage. Physically, there is no moving part, no power consumption and specified a very durable material to avoid getting damaged. (unless damage placed by forcing) Production schedule is well managed. By Now, you must have realized that the Battery Grip is a must have item per house-hold. Please help us to make Battery Grip together.

Specification

 "AAA" Grip: W 0.8" X L 2.8" X H 0.4"  or   W 22mm X L 70mm X H 10mm

"AA" Grip:   W 1.1"  X  L 3.4" X H 0.4"    or     W 28mm X L 87mm X H 10mm

"AA & AAA" Combo Grip:   W 1.1" X L 3.4" X H 0.4"    or   W 28mm X L 87mm X H 10mm

Available Colors

Risks & Challenges

We have went though extensive amount of time to make fitting of battery to perfection and many prototypes. Now we feel confident about our design and This is time for you to help us to bring this neat gadget to reality.

  • Once campaign ends successful, we will move on to full production. (app. 1 month duration)
  • We will make sure to deliver for September.

Specification


 "AAA" Grip: W 0.8" X L 2.8" X H 0.4"  or   W 22mm X L 70mm X H 10mm


"AA" Grip:   W 1.1"  X  L 3.4" X H 0.4"    or     W 28mm X L 87mm X H 10mm

"AA & AAA" Combo Grip:   W 1.1" X L 3.4" X H 0.4"    or   W 28mm X L 87mm X H 10mm
Available Colors



Risks & Challenges
We have went though extensive amount of time to make fitting of battery to perfection and many prototypes. Now we feel confident about our design and This is time for you to help us to bring this neat gadget to reality.

Once campaign ends successful, we will move on to full production. (app. 1 month duration)
We will make sure to deliver for September.

story:
STORY

We would like to introduce you to an innovative security device (patent pending no 2018 / 05824 SA) that will turn ordinary internal doors in your house into effective crime prevention barriers – a simple to use and cost-effective apparatus that will enhance your and your family’s safety at home … and ensure privacy.

                          The new B’SAFE door handle lock.

The door handle lock is a device that locks any lever door inside your house simply and easily by inhibiting the downward motion of the handle – thus effectively preventing the entry of an intruder in case of an emergency.

 

BASIC OPERATION

             

When the latch is in the down position the operation of the door handle is unimpeded.

 

 

        

When the latch is in the up position, it engages the handle and resultantly the door cannot be opened.

 

 

The simplicity of this device ensures that in an emergency you will be able to quickly secure a door with very little effort.

 

 

The latch pivots around a hinge on the dovetail mounting bracket, enabling it to support different handle distances from the door.

 

 

The removable sections of the dovetail prevent a person hitting the latch past the door handle.

 

 

Therefore, the handle lock fits any wooden door and lever configuration.

 

It can also be used with either left or right handed door levers, and on both sides of the door.

 

 

The handle lock can also be fitted to external doors that will restrict entrance without having a key at hand.

 

 

The action of swinging the latch away from the door was chosen so that in the open position the mechanism would be out of the way of the handle and fingers.

 

STRENGTH AND DURABILITY

The handle lock is manufactured from polycarbonate and therefore the device is extremely strong and durable.  As already indicated, the latch prevents the downward action of the lever when in the correct upright position. 

 

Should force be applied on the door handle, such force is transferred vertically to the axle of the fitted door mount instead of horizontally to the door’s lever mechanism.   Downward force on the door handle also tends to drive the latch more securely into its locking position.

 

 

Prototypes of the handle lock have been developed with the assistance of the Product Development Technology Station at the Central University of Technology in Bloemfontein, South Africa. 

 

 

This facility also tested the strength of the handle lock scientifically and came to the following conclusion: ”The results show that the maximum stress caused by the force applied to the device is less than the maximum allowable stress for polycarbonate.” 

 

 

This means that when excessive force is applied, the lever on the intruder’s side of the door will break off long before the handle lock gives in – making the chance of entry even less probable.

 

ADDITIONAL BENEFITS

The handle lock has several additional benefits related to safety and convenience.  These are:

Unlike some other devices, you do not have to change existing locks to fit and use the handle lock.

 

 

When on vacation for example, activating different handle locks in your house can restrict the movements of an intruder to the particular venue of entry.

 

 

In addition to safety considerations, the handle lock can also be used to ensure privacy or when keys have been lost.

 

 

Although the handle lock is robust in construction, it is still aesthetically pleasing and will blend in with the interior design of your home.

 

IN CONCLUSION

The door handle lock can become a very important, yet cost-effective and simple security feature in your home – especially in high risk areas, for example the internal door between your garage and the rest of the house.

 

 

In case of an emergency caused by an intruder, it will buy you invaluable time to summon help or implement self-protection measures.

 

The new B’SAFE Door Handle Lock – its strength lies in its simplicity.
