story:
We have created a minimalist bedside lamp which caters to three senses to provide a restful sleep throughout your night. We rely on a combination of modern sleep improvement techniques to provide an effective sleep solution all in the form factor of a simple lamp.

We provide this technology in the form of a modern bedside lamp. This lamp can function as the primary light source in your room, further tailoring the experience of dynamic lighting. 

We combine the following technologies:

  • Aromatherapy 

  • Dynamic Lighting

  • Sound Therapy

Crescent Lamp pairs with a mobile application. Based on the information you enter into the application, a custom schedule is created which combines the three technologies into one comprehensive experience. 

All of these features combine for an unparalleled sleep experience that you cannot attain from any other sleep aid.

Over time, as you get accustomed to your individualized Crescent Lamp, it gets easier to fall asleep and maintain your sleep cycle. As you become used to the lamp, you become conditioned to the various stimuli of the lamp. 

How does a Crescent Lamp help you fall asleep?

The following stimuli will help an individual fall asleep at night:

  • The scent of lavender to calm you down and increase deep sleep
  • Warm light tones which promote melatonin growth through removal of blue light tones
  • Soothing sounds which enables users to enter sleep

When the combination of smell, lighting, and sound is activated 30 minutes before you sleep, you will begin to feel drowsy as you associate these stimuli with sleep. This is key to maintaining a strong sleep cycle.

Stay asleep at night.

The aromatherapeutic diffuser will release scent either at a default time, or at a variable time to ensure restful sleep throughout the night. Throughout the night, as you get closer to waking up, the scent will change to a revitalizing (lemon) based scent in order to help you wake up. 

Start your day with Crescent Lamps.

As you near you wake up time, the three technologies of your Crescent Lamp will move into a wake up stage, initiating the following:

  • Blue light to suppress melatonin product and beat morning tiredness 
  • A customizable, gentle sound such as a Spotify song, classical music, or a standard alarm tone
  • Revitalizing scents such as mint, eucalyptus and lemon which help you feel refreshed

Perfect for those without stable sleep schedules.

Crescent Lamps are optimized for people traveling and cannot maintain a strict sleep schedule while on the go. Due to the sleek and portable design, this lamp can be taken while traveling to maintain your sleep cycle.

This makes Crescent Lamps perfect for those who live at home and those constantly on the move.

 Enabling all types of customization. 

The Crescent App allows you control over your sleep schedule. By simply entering parameters such as time asleep and time awoken, the Crescent App determines and controls:

  • Frequency and duration of scent release
  • Types of scent emitted
  • Amount of blue light emitted
  • Intensity of light
  • Sound, type, and intensity of sound

Humans have relied on the awakening effects of the bright blue sky to prepare us to start our days and the soothingly orange sunsets to induce rest. To prove the effectiveness of our features, we utilize several studies:

  • The effects of lavender have been tested by a variety of medical establishments, such as the University of Massachusetts Medical School and EBCAM. 
  • One trial from the Wesleyan University showed that with bursts of lavender, young men and women experienced more deep sleep and woke up with more vigor in the morning. 

Why is Crescent Lamps perfect for your room?

In order to create a product which could fit in any setting, we prioritized a minimalist design. This includes a variety of significant features including:

  • A low profile material so the Crescent Lamp can look good in all settings
  • A lightweight build and shape lead to easy transportation
  • Form factor of a lamp to provide functionality in a compact size
  • All controls are through the Crescent App, allowing for a clean display of the Crescent Lamp

We have many plans for future products and features, but one we would like to talk about is the inclusion of biometric data in the process of a customizable lamp. We hope to connect with devices such as FitBits and phones to monitor:

  • Heartbeat
  • Temperature
  • Sleep duration
  • Sleep stages

We know that with funding we can implement these features into our product. This will lead to a much more customized sleep experience. Your Crescent Lamp will dynamically change to fit you. 

With the funding we receive from our backers, we plan to:

  • Implement biometric data from your phone or wearable technology to further customize your sleep experience
  • Test and further refine our current prototype
  • Finalize the design for our final, market-ready product
  • Reach out to design and manufacturing experts to talk about implementing technology in a market-ready product
  • Begin tooling for manufacturing

To better understand where the money will be allocated throughout this process, we developed a timeline which will outline the path we will take to bring our product to you.

Who are we?

Our team members have all been affected by a lack of sleep. We have tried many solutions, all of which only proved slightly effective.

Thus, we decided to form a comprehensive solution which catered to several senses to provide the ultimate sleep experience. We decided to form Crescent Lamps.

We formed Crescent Lamps to create the most effective sleep aid on the market in the modern form factor of a sleek, bedside lamp. 

Since the beginning of our company, we have worked to create our product to ensure as few issues as possible. We are part of a high school startup accelerator called Leangap and have been hard at work on our product. With the guidance of the mentors here, we have created a product which we want to share with the world. We would like for this process to run with no obstacles. However, since we are making a hardware product, there is always potential for setbacks and delays, whether in product development or manufacturing.

We currently have our prototype with aromatherapy, dynamic lighting, and sound functions, connected to the crescent app. Our biggest remaining steps are getting the app on the app store and manufacturing our product.

The largest foreseeable potential delay lies in manufacturing. We currently have a few manufacturing contacts we are working with for potential production when ready. Additionally, we plan to find many more manufacturing contacts through our accelerator.

Once our product is converted to our own parts for manufacturing, we will be ready for production. This conversion may take some time, in terms of obtaining custom materials, but will come along with the manufacturer. Shortage of supply may also be a delay when it comes to production time.

While these are potential delays, we anticipate that we can easily prevent them. Through our contacts and our accelerator, Leangap’s contacts we will be able to find a reliable manufacturing partner fairly easily. Our team has diverse technological and hardware knowledge that will allow us to provide you with a high quality and reliable product, to improve your sleep quality.

story:
4x Stronger, for a fraction of the price... 

SHIPPING IN SEPTEMBER

RETAIL PRICES:

  • 120ML $24.99 (strong as four bottles of the competitor an $80 value!)
  • 240ML $44.99 (strong as eight bottles of the competitor a $160 value!)

I enjoy the flavor of a green bowl, not the taste of burnt resin.

There is nothing like a tasty green bowl and a nice glass of wine or whisky. The flavor matters and nasty resin or bad chemical cleaners can ruin the flavor. The problem is, all the market leading pipe cleaning solutions could never got my pipe, bong or vape really clean. So, I decided to tick my wife off and start experimenting in our garage with botanicals and natural ingredients to figure out how to remove the resin and enjoy the flavor of the bud.  After a spell, I created an amazing cleaner. I've kept it secret for years, but now I'm releasing it to the public.

We use only safe, ALL-NATURAL, non-toxic, botanical ingredients.  Bone Cleaner truly destroys resin, leaving the glass or metal looking like it did when you bought it.  

Only use about 4-6 squirts on a pipe, 4-8 on a bong, or 1-2 on a vape and your device will be squeaky clean.

 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need about $6K in funding to make a large purchase order of our skull bottle with dropper. Plus, sourcing large amounts of botanicals costs a bunch, so we need to raise funds to make a large purchase order of all the ingredients.  We already have an assembly line set up in New Jersey and Colorado, we just need to order the parts and ingredients in mass quantities so we can brew up the solution, fill the bottles and start shipping! 

In order to help us get this launched, we are offering huge "PERKS" in the form of discounts for early adopters.

If we don't reach our final goal, that's ok, we will still fulfill the total orders placed

The Impact

For years, cannabis has not been catering to the aficionado, but today, I know a bunch of you enjoy the flavor of your bud as much as I do.  However, current pipe cleaning solutions don't clean the pipe very well, plus take several ounces of solution to even clean it a little. This cleaner will accomplish what over 4 x 20oz bottles of the leading brand with just one 120ML glass skull dropper bottle.  

You just spent a bunch of money on a pretty glass piece or vape-- So, keep it lookin' like new with BONE CLEANER

Risks & Challenges

Our risks are basically minimal.  We have already secured supply and will just have the normal logistical challenges.  Luckily we have a couple of MBA's helping us out with this stuff.  Right now we just need your support to get the product launched.  After this, we plan to start selling nationwide at your local head shop and online. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Tell your smoking buddies that there is a new cleaner that get products bone clean-- BONE CLEANER!

story:
Aero Craft Panels Ltd

 

Our Story: Johan, aviation, and the panels

Aero Craft Panels was founded just under a year ago by Johan Brand, whose creative ideas have grown from a childhood of aviation, a career as a helicopter pilot with the South African Police, and a lifetime of designing in workshops... 

"I have a great fascination with all things aviation and I love aircraft; I always have and I always will. I love aviation traditions and history.   The stories surrounding great aviators, past and present, form a true inspiration for me.  In addition to this, I have always had a desire to design, create and build.  It is these passions of mine that ultimately led me to creating Aero Craft Panels!" 

Johan never suspected that his design for a drinks panel that looked like the side of an aeroplane would end up being so popular.  With just a few Facebook posts to advertise his new product, Johan was already selling more bar cabinets than he could easily keep up with.  Such a clear demand for the Drinks Panel - Mark ll as well as for the wall art panels (panels that do not open) has been an incredible and welcome surprise.

 

The Products:

Aero Craft Drinks Panel - Mark II

Our exclusive Drinks Panel - Mark II is by far our most popular panel model. Measuring 112cm x 75cm,  it is functional and beautiful. When closed, the panel sits attached to a wall.  Then, with a simple turn of the key, it opens smoothly using gas struts to reveal a one-of-a-kind and ready to enjoy drinks cabinet. All that remains to be done is to dim the LED back lights, pour the drinks…. Bottoms Up!

 

Wall Art Panels

Our unique Wall Art Panels are striking pieces of aviation art.  They can be ordered in various background finishes and with a choice of national roundel, insignia designs and/or identification numbers. Two sizes are available: small measures 57cm x 40cm and large measures 112cm x 75cm.  LED back lighting is optional.
 
 

Workshop and Detail

In our small Pennine workshop, we design and craft these beautiful, bespoke aluminium panels to perfectly represent an aircraft fuselage section.  They are built using the actual aircraft building techniques and methods of 75 years ago, right down to the  aircraft rivets used during assembly.   We put an extremely high emphasis on quality and attention to detail.  Johan puts a great deal of thought and passion into the mechanics and design of our panels to make sure they are both functional for today's world  but also historically authentic.

 
 

Why do we need your help? 

We are completely inspired by how pleased each of our customers is with their panel.  However, our increasing popularity means we have to build the company in order to keep up with demand and to bring our unique products to as many aviation enthusiasts as possible!  We want to continue to uphold our standard of workmanship and quality while expanding our business, so we are asking for your help!

The proceeds of this campaign will be used to fund:

  • Premises:  Our first step will be to find and relocate to a bigger workshop, as each panel is still crafted in Johan's tiny, one room cottage workshop. Johan often comments that, "It is so small in there, I need to step outside to change my mind."  Part of this relocation will also be hiring an apprentice, expanding our small but growing team. 
  • Exhibitions:  Attend a selection of UK air shows and aviation exhibitions, raising our profile and bringing Aero Craft Panels to more and more people!
  • New tools:  Johan is still using his old faithful corded hand drill bought back in the 90's, so he is most definitely in need of an upgrade!  As demand grows, so does the need and use of our tools. These new tools and larger space, will also enable efficient development of new, exclusive products.
  • Website update: Our website is in desperate need of an update.

 

£10,000  Re-location to larger workshop premises from our current one room workshop.

£4,000  Exhibition space at a number of major UK airshows and one American airshow.

£2500  Upgrade of tooling and equipment for existing and exciting new product development.

£2000 Website upgrade and customisation.

 

Our Vision

Our vision is to build a successful company that continually celebrates the world of aviation through the traditional craftsmanship used to make our modern products.  

What do you get?

This is just the beginning for us and we have had a blast creating unique perks to entice you. We hope you find one that sparks your imagination.  Each contribution from you is really important to us, so please check out our perks and many thanks for your support.

Frequent Flyer Annual Membership

The fantastic discounts that you see on this Indiegogo campaign are just like the savings that you can continue to enjoy all year if you become a member of Aero Craft Panels. 

Frequent Flyer Annual Members enjoy exclusive savings on all products featured on our website. Continue to enjoy  fantastic discounts all year after this Indiegogo campaign ends!  We are currently working with a number of organisations to extend our exciting range of aviation-specific  products and events.

VIP Frequent Flyer Annual Membership

As a VIP Frequent Flyer Annual Member, you will be the first to be notified of any new offers from Aero Craft Panels.  We are currently working with a number of creators to extend our exciting range of aviation-specific products. You will also continue to enjoy fantastic discounts all year after this Indiegogo campaign ends!

Testimonials

"Amazing service and great quality.  Absolutely finishes off my man cave.  Johan's made it bespoke for me and I can't thank you enough. 100% recommendation!"  - K Oldershaw

"Stunning craftsmanship and attention to detail.  A must-have for any aviation buff."  - L De Waal

"From initial contact, through project design and completion, the product is well built and unique.  Perfect for the budding aviator or just someone who wants something different in their home or office." - D Lassiter

More panels!

Just in case you aren't convinced yet, here are some more examples of our panels ...

 

Personalisation

You might like to personalise your panel by paying homage to a relative.  For instance, the ROD serial number panel that we featured in our video was commissioned by Rod Lyne who wanted to celebrate and honour his Uncle Fred Fray.  We added bespoke touches to the panel by mounting a small plaque with Fred Fray's Air Force badges and Caterpillar Club badge, as well as a bespoke cork base with the words "Lest We Forget" to the lower shelf section of the panel. 

 

You might opt for a customised bar for your man cave:  a Drinks Panel - Mark ll will transform any wall into your favourite hangout!

 

 A well chosen panel will always be an inspirational conversation piece for visitors to your home, museum or business...

 

Nose-Art

The beauty and authenticity of every Aero Craft Panel makes it the undoubted focal point of any space it inhabits.  Customised nose art is one of our specialities. We love working with our customers to replicate their favourite nose art designs...

 

Our talented UK Nose Art artists are Brian and Ann Freer of Farlam Airframes.  They have 12 years experience of expertly painting  WWll Nose Art in the fashion of Vargas, Elvgren and Petty.

 

Our newest team member is American artist Chad Hill of Django Studios.  His studio specialises in aviation and automotive design as well as marketing and branding. Some of his clients are: The Commemorative Air Force, Collings Foundation, Liberty Foundation, EAA, EAA Warbirds, Warbirds in Review, American Air Power Heritage Museum, Tunison Foundation, Vintage Wings, Western Antique Aeroplane & Automobile Museum, Warbird Digest, as well as Stewart Warner.  Chad's illustration work can be seen at a variety of aviation museums and airshows. His passion for period correct WWII nose art resulted in having painted the: C-47 “That’s All Brother”; C-47 “Do It”; and B-24 “Ol" 927. 

Chad is also the proud designer of Aero Craft Panels' new logo!

 

This 18x24" perk print of Chad's features the 357th  Fighter Group Ace, Bud Anderson, flying his P-51B “Old Crow” in a climbing duel with a Luftwaffe FW-190 as it screams through the sun's rays and the clouds form an elegant frame around both war birds.

 

With your generous support we can achieve this goal and start delivering our exclusive products to you!

 

Additional Details

To signify their unique design, each back lit panel is stamped with tag of origin displaying the panel design and serial number. The design has also been registered with the UK Government Office of Intellectual Property.  The panels are not sold with any of the added contents pictured such as bottles of alcohol, drinks glasses, tonic or fruit.
story_txt:
Aero Craft Panels Ltd
 
Our Story: Johan, aviation, and the panels
Aero Craft Panels was founded just under a year ago by Johan Brand, whose creative ideas have grown from a childhood of aviation, a career as a helicopter pilot with the South African Police, and a lifetime of designing in workshops... 
"I have a great fascination with all things aviation and I love aircraft; I always have and I always will. I love aviation traditions and history.   The stories surrounding great aviators, past and present, form a true inspiration for me.  In addition to this, I have always had a desire to design, create and build.  It is these passions of mine that ultimately led me to creating Aero Craft Panels!" 
Johan never suspected that his design for a drinks panel that looked like the side of an aeroplane would end up being so popular.  With just a few Facebook posts to advertise his new product, Johan was already selling more bar cabinets than he could easily keep up with.  Such a clear demand for the Drinks Panel - Mark ll  as well as for the wall art panels (panels that do not open) has been an incredible and welcome surprise.
 
The Products:
Aero Craft Drinks Panel - Mark II 
Our exclusive Drinks Panel - Mark II is by far our most popular panel model. Measuring 112cm x 75cm,  it is functional and beautiful. When closed, the panel sits attached to a wall.  Then, with a simple turn of the key, it opens smoothly using gas struts to reveal a one-of-a-kind and ready to enjoy drinks cabinet. All that remains to be done is to dim the LED back lights, pour the drinks…. Bottoms Up!

 
Wall Art Panels
Our unique Wall Art Panels are striking pieces of aviation art.  They can be ordered in various background finishes and with a choice of national roundel, insignia designs and/or identification numbers. Two sizes are available: small measures 57cm x 40cm and large measures 112cm x 75cm.  LED back lighting is optional.
 

 
Workshop and Detail
In our small Pennine workshop, we design and craft these beautiful, bespoke aluminium panels to perfectly represent an aircraft fuselage section.  They are built using the actual aircraft building techniques and methods of 75 years ago, right down to the  aircraft rivets used during assembly.   We put an extremely high emphasis on quality and attention to detail.  Johan puts a great deal of thought and passion into the mechanics and design of our panels to make sure they are both functional for today's world  but also historically authentic.

 

 

Why do we need your help? 
We are completely inspired by how pleased each of our customers is with their panel.  However, our increasing popularity means we have to build the company in order to keep up with demand and to bring our unique products to as many aviation enthusiasts as possible!  We want to continue to uphold our standard of workmanship and quality while expanding our business, so we are asking for your help!
The proceeds of this campaign will be used to fund:

Premises:  Our first step will be to find and relocate to a bigger workshop, as each panel is still crafted in Johan's tiny, one room cottage workshop. Johan often comments that, "It is so small in there, I need to step outside to change my mind."  Part of this relocation will also be hiring an apprentice, expanding our small but growing team. 
Exhibitions:  Attend a selection of UK air shows and aviation exhibitions, raising our profile and bringing Aero Craft Panels to more and more people!
New tools:  Johan is still using his old faithful corded hand drill bought back in the 90's, so he is most definitely in need of an upgrade!  As demand grows, so does the need and use of our tools. These new tools and larger space, will also enable efficient development of new, exclusive products.
Website update: Our website is in desperate need of an update.

 

£10,000  Re-location to larger workshop premises from our current one room workshop.

£4,000  Exhibition space at a number of major UK airshows and one American airshow.

£2500  Upgrade of tooling and equipment for existing and exciting new product development.

£2000 Website upgrade and customisation.

 
Our Vision
Our vision is to build a successful company that continually celebrates the world of aviation through the traditional craftsmanship used to make our modern products.  
What do you get?
This is just the beginning for us and we have had a blast creating unique perks to entice you. We hope you find one that sparks your imagination.  Each contribution from you is really important to us, so please check out our perks and many thanks for your support.
Frequent Flyer Annual Membership
The fantastic discounts that you see on this Indiegogo campaign are just like the savings that you can continue to enjoy all year if you become a member of Aero Craft Panels. 
Frequent Flyer Annual Members enjoy exclusive savings on all products featured on our website. Continue to enjoy  fantastic discounts all year after this Indiegogo campaign ends!  We are currently working with a number of organisations to extend our exciting range of aviation-specific  products and events.

VIP Frequent Flyer Annual Membership
As a VIP Frequent Flyer Annual Member, you will be the first to be notified of any new offers from Aero Craft Panels.  We are currently working with a number of creators to extend our exciting range of aviation-specific products. You will also continue to enjoy fantastic discounts all year after this Indiegogo campaign ends!

Testimonials
"Amazing service and great quality.  Absolutely finishes off my man cave.  Johan's made it bespoke for me and I can't thank you enough. 100% recommendation!"  - K Oldershaw
"Stunning craftsmanship and attention to detail.  A must-have for any aviation buff."  - L De Waal
"From initial contact, through project design and completion, the product is well built and unique.  Perfect for the budding aviator or just someone who wants something different in their home or office." - D Lassiter
More panels!Just in case you aren't convinced yet, here are some more examples of our panels ... PersonalisationYou might like to personalise your panel by paying homage to a relative.  For instance, the ROD serial number panel that we featured in our video was commissioned by Rod Lyne who wanted to celebrate and honour his Uncle Fred Fray.  We added bespoke touches to the panel by mounting a small plaque with Fred Fray's Air Force badges and Caterpillar Club badge, as well as a bespoke cork base with the words "Lest We Forget" to the lower shelf section of the panel.  You might opt for a customised bar for your man cave:  a Drinks Panel - Mark ll  will transform any wall into your favourite hangout!  A well chosen panel will always be an inspirational conversation piece for visitors to your home, museum or business... Nose-ArtThe beauty and authenticity of every Aero Craft Panel makes it the undoubted focal point of any space it inhabits.  Customised nose art is one of our specialities. We love working with our customers to replicate their favourite nose art designs... Our talented UK Nose Art artists are Brian and Ann Freer of Farlam Airframes.  They have 12 years experience of expertly painting  WWll Nose Art in the fashion of Vargas, Elvgren and Petty. Our newest team member is American artist Chad Hill of Django Studios.  His studio specialises in aviation and automotive design as well as marketing and branding. Some of his clients are: The Commemorative Air Force, Collings Foundation, Liberty Foundation, EAA, EAA Warbirds, Warbirds in Review, American Air Power Heritage Museum, Tunison Foundation, Vintage Wings, Western Antique Aeroplane & Automobile Museum, Warbird Digest, as well as Stewart Warner.  Chad's illustration work can be seen at a variety of aviation museums and airshows. His passion for period correct WWII nose art resulted in having painted the: C-47 “That’s All Brother”; C-47 “Do It”; and B-24 “Ol" 927. Chad is also the proud designer of Aero Craft Panels' new logo! This 18x24" perk print of Chad's features the 357th  Fighter Group Ace, Bud Anderson, flying his P-51B “Old Crow” in a climbing duel with a Luftwaffe FW-190 as it screams through the sun's rays and the clouds form an elegant frame around both war birds. With your generous support we can achieve this goal and start delivering our exclusive products to you! Additional DetailsTo signify their unique design, each back lit panel is stamped with tag of origin displaying the panel design and serial number. The design has also been registered with the UK Government Office of Intellectual Property.  The panels are not sold with any of the added contents pictured such as bottles of alcohol, drinks glasses, tonic or fruit.

story:
Derx Wipes was created in 2020 by Nukeyia and Derek Pearson because there were no wipes available at our local stores. Nukeyia has always been big on cleaning and cleaning techniques for over 30 years. Using old-school cleaning solutions Nukeyia created the product, and Derek handled the business side. Together we created a brand that had few ingredients that people can use every day. We created something safe for our children and other families. We currently offer surface cleaner in both wipes and spray bottles. The next product we want to tackle is floor cleaning solutions.

 

We need funding for inventory, marketing, promoting, and regulatory testing. If we do not reach our goal, funds will go to advertisements to reach other regions for our current products. Within 6 months of the company launching, we acquired over $11k in sales. The challenges we face are a need for national marketing, new products, and keeping up with customer demand. We are trying to expand the brand to offer more Derx products and eventually be in your local stores. Help us make this a reality by spreading the word and supporting the initiative. You can do this by using the Indigogo share tools.

story:
The newest product from Millea Living, furniture and accessories helping people live an independent and dignified life with style.

 

The Judith Cart is designed to provide a work surface at a bed or chair, but it can also double as a bar serving cart!  A storage area under the table surface can be used to store computers, books, newspapers or other items.  Choose your caddie insert to hold remotes, medications and other items you need close at hand. You can even choose our ice bucket insert! 
 
  • Portable: The lightweight and durable design allows for easy transport throughout the home.
  • Adjustable Height: The Judith Cart can be adjusted for perfect positioning alongside any bed height. 
  • Customizable: Interchangeable storage inserts accommodate a variety of needs. Choose an ice bucket, locking top enclosure, or open insert.  
  • Powered Up: Equipped with standard 120V plug-ins, just plug it in, and The Judith Cart is powered to keep your blender or laptop going strong. Use the Power Port to recharge wireless chargers and power up anything with a USB port.
  • Multipurpose: The beauty of all Millea Living furnishings is their . . . well . . . beauty!  The Judith Cart can also function as a bar cart, work station or side table anywhere in your home.
  • Sustainable and Durable: We strive to use recycled materials that also can be easily recycled, as well as long-lasting materials and components.
  • Easy to Clean: Life can be messy! The non-porous surfaces of The Judith Bench allow easy cleanup of splashes and spills, and the removable inserts are dishwasher safe.  

 

 

 

Too often DLAs can make a home look or feel like a hospital. 

 

Millea Living mixes engineering with artistry to create practical tools that are inspirational rather than institutional.  With this funding campaign, we are planing to prototype and manufacture the first run of the Judith Cart. 

         

    

Please share our campaign or story with who may be interested or positively affected. Use the Indiegogo sharing tools, visit our website http://millealiving.com and sign up for our newsletter, Follow us on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and LinkedIn.  

Reach out to us with questions or suggestions for future products. Share your own story with us.  We want to hear from you!  

Designed on Universal Design principles and to ADA Standards, the Judith Collection provides assistance for transferring to a bath, seated bathing in a shower, seating for putting on and removing shoes, keeping you stable getting in and out of bed, doing work or leisure activities from your bed or chair and giving you peace of mind around your home.

 

 

 

The Baby Boomer generation is one of the largest groups of population and they are turning 65 every eleven-seconds.  The Baby Boomer generation has redefined every thing about American life — the way schools were designed, the way our homes are designed, the structure of the work week and the nature of work itself, the role of fitness in our daily lives and they are going to redefine what it means to age and grow older.  They will not be satisfied with unattractive, function only products.  They have had the largest influence on consumer driven decisions and are often the first adopters of new ideas and technologies.  We are able to keep people living at home whether they are aging or experiencing a disability, and this group of people does not want their home to look or feel like a hospital.  The need for well designed daily living aids that can blend into their surroundings and provide the assistance and safety for those that need them. Millea Living is addressing that need to allow people to live at home with safety, dignity and independence.

 

 

 

Our team has already produced the Judith Bench

The Judith Cart will be engineered and manufactured by our fabricators of the Judith Bench who have been partners in streamlining manufacturing, material selection, and finishing.  They are highly enthusiastic about our company and ready to take on our next challenge! 

 

 

 

 

University of Minnesota's Carlson School of Business - Minnesota Cup Finalist

Millea Living was selected out of 2,000 applications to participate in the 2019 MN Cup.  This competition provided mentorship, classes and experts in all facets of business to assist finalists with their start up businesses.  We made it to the final round and were so grateful for the help and advice we received.  During this competition, we honed our business plan, had a hard look at what it will take to make a viable business with our company and got very clear on the direction and market that Millea Living is working to capture.  We feel that further success is right around the corner and we can use your help getting there!

 

At Millea Living, we believe all people, no matter their life situation, are entitled to dignity, autonomy and well-being. That is why we have designed a family of home products that help people live their lives with pride and purpose. Our products mix engineering with artistry and are practical tools that are deeply personal. They offer beauty instead of bulk, are inspirational rather than institutional, and will help more people lead happy, empowered and independent lives.

 

  
 

Jackie Millea - AIA, ASID, is an award winning architect and interior designer.  She believes the spaces we inhabit should be both beautiful and functional for all ages and abilities.  Her life's work has been dedicated to ensuring just that.  As she became a young designer, her father became a quadriplegic.  She quickly realized that even one step was a barrier to inclusion.  She considers it a designer's social responsibility to design spaces and products that can accommodate and welcome anyone — and remain livable for throughout a person’s a lifetime.

Jennifer Noll, has 30+ years of Business Administration, Sales and Marketing experience. Before devoting her work full-time to Millea Living, she assisted in the start up of a new staffing agency. She has worked to enhance communications between product engineers and manufacturers to bring a better product to market. She has been celebrated for her acumen in increasing revenue across the board through her management and leadership skills. 

 

 

  

 

We have self funded the first three years of Millea Living. During that time, we have created our brand and marketing strategy, designed the entire Judith Collection which includes a bench, a wall-mounted bench, a cart, a bed stability rail, toilet stability bars and grab bars.  We have prototyped and produced the Judith Bench which is available to the public now.  With this funding, we are planing to prototype and manufacture the first run of the Judith Cart. 

We have found that educating the public about the need for better designed assistive products is highly important. There are very few companies focusing on this growing need.  Most people are unaware of the safety and independence issues that many people face. The funding will also be used to take advantage of opportunities to speak, write and educate people on the challenges and opportunities about design for all ages and abilities.

Here's how you can help:

  1. Back it! Look for the Back It button at the top of the page and click to choose a perk! Only one donation level is allowed by the system.  If you have another amount in mind . . . 
  2. Choose a donation amount.  Every dollar counts and we are grateful!
  3. Congratulations! You've just made a significant impact in the lives of others!

We are so grateful for your support!  Please continue to share the love by commenting on the campaign and sharing it with friends.

story:
No one can find out your password. And you will not forget it.

Based on research conducted by Avast, 83% of Americans use weak passwords, and 10% use very weak ones like "qwerty", "123456" or "iloveyou" because it is easy to keep them in mind if they are simple. We in our team have the same problem. If you have a strong enough password it is difficult to keep it in mind and if you have a simple one it is totally unsafe. Does this sound familiar to you?

 

However, we found a solution

This card can keep a lot of passwords. You can easily reconstruct your password from it. There are no ways to hack the card, you don't need electricity, WiFi, or cellular because Mnemocard does not need all of that, it's just a piece of plastic, after all, beautifully designed, and with unique characters on it though.

 

How to use mnemocard:

1. Create a memorable pattern. Try to use symbols from both tables.

2. Make the length of your password to at least 8 symbols.

3. Set your own symbol (digit(s), word(s), character(s)) to "Joker". Keep it in mind and use it among other symbols of your password.

4. Don't draw, scratch, or somehow mark a pattern on your mnemocard.

5. To retrieve your password take your mnemocard and read symbols following your pattern.

And one more thing - you don't really need to hide your mnemocard. Only you know your pattern and thus the password behind it.

And also: In case you lose your mnemocard, remember, there are two of them, and they are identical.

 

Example: How to use mnemocard for different websites. 

 

Our features:

1. Three levels of protection: unique symbols at each card, two separate tables, "Joker" symbol for additional security.

2. Limitless amount of passwords.

3. Tables have colorish and geometry mnemomarks for easy pattern creation and navigation.

4. Each mnemocard has a unique set of symbols.

5. You don't really need to hide your mnemocard.

6. It is the size of a credit card. You can keep it in your wallet.

7.  You don't need Wi-Fi and electricity. Mnemocard is working without

all of it :)

Type of cards:

There are two types of cards available. The first one is a regular mnemocard. It consists of two tables for 2D patterns (40 symbols), and a limitless amount of passwords. Another one is mnemocard+. It consists of four tables on two levels. You can create 3D patterns (80 symbols) and an even more limitless amount of passwords.

 

What is in the "box"

1. Each user will get a unique stylish mnemocard for everyday usage.

2. Plus another copy of your unique stylish mnemocard.

3. Detailed user manual.

4. Special sticker for your laptop.

5. And all stuff is placed in the special opaque secure envelope.

 

 

 

What after crowdfunding:

First of all, we would like to reduce the price of mnemocards and make them even more affordable. If we can raise a certain amount of funds, we can afford to produce them in bulk and reduce the cost of materials and manufacturing.

In the future, we also want to use other more environment-friendly materials for the mnemocards like metal, wood, paper, and carbon. For those materials, we will be needing laser and milling machines. Hopefully, we can get to that place with your support!

 

Our team

We are just friends who don't like to sit around. It is not our first project. We like computer science and that is why we developed several educational mobile games, useful applications for pilots, artists, and authors. As people who like outdoor activities, we created a few sports nutrition products. And now, it is interesting for us to create something in the design field. Each of us is highly experienced in his area of expertise and together we are power.

 

Our next steps

We would like to reduce the price of mnemocards and make them even more affordable. If we can raise a certain amount of funds, we can afford to produce them in bulk and reduce the cost of materials and manufacturing.

In the future, we also want to use other more environment-friendly materials for the mnemocards like metal, wood, paper, and carbon. For those materials, we will be needing laser and milling machines. Hopefully, we can get to that place with your support!

Risks and challenges

There are many challenges in designing and manufacturing process. How many symbols enough for absolute safety? How can we place them in user-friendly order? What type of cards and printer do we need? Developing software for generating unique sets of symbols that fits printer requirements. However, we though all above problems through. And as of now, we do not see risks at all. If only meteor will fall down to the Earth, this year is eventful.
story_txt: No one can find out your password. And you will not forget it.Based on research conducted by Avast, 83% of Americans use weak passwords, and 10% use very weak ones like "qwerty", "123456" or "iloveyou" because it is easy to keep them in mind if they are simple. We in our team have the same problem. If you have a strong enough password it is difficult to keep it in mind and if you have a simple one it is totally unsafe. Does this sound familiar to you? However, we found a solutionThis card can keep a lot of passwords. You can easily reconstruct your password from it. There are no ways to hack the card, you don't need electricity, WiFi, or cellular because Mnemocard does not need all of that, it's just a piece of plastic, after all, beautifully designed, and with unique characters on it though. How to use mnemocard:1. Create a memorable pattern. Try to use symbols from both tables.2. Make the length of your password to at least 8 symbols.3. Set your own symbol (digit(s), word(s), character(s)) to "Joker". Keep it in mind and use it among other symbols of your password.4. Don't draw, scratch, or somehow mark a pattern on your mnemocard.5. To retrieve your password take your mnemocard and read symbols following your pattern.And one more thing - you don't really need to hide your mnemocard. Only you know your pattern and thus the password behind it.And also: In case you lose your mnemocard, remember, there are two of them, and they are identical. Example: How to use mnemocard for different websites.  Our features:1. Three levels of protection: unique symbols at each card, two separate tables, "Joker" symbol for additional security.2. Limitless amount of passwords.3. Tables have colorish and geometry mnemomarks for easy pattern creation and navigation.4. Each mnemocard has a unique set of symbols.5. You don't really need to hide your mnemocard.6. It is the size of a credit card. You can keep it in your wallet.7.  You don't need Wi-Fi and electricity. Mnemocard is working withoutall of it :)Type of cards:There are two types of cards available. The first one is a regular mnemocard. It consists of two tables for 2D patterns (40 symbols), and a limitless amount of passwords. Another one is mnemocard+. It consists of four tables on two levels. You can create 3D patterns (80 symbols) and an even more limitless amount of passwords. What is in the "box"1. Each user will get a unique stylish mnemocard for everyday usage.2. Plus another copy of your unique stylish mnemocard.3. Detailed user manual.4. Special sticker for your laptop.5. And all stuff is placed in the special opaque secure envelope.   What after crowdfunding:First of all, we would like to reduce the price of mnemocards and make them even more affordable. If we can raise a certain amount of funds, we can afford to produce them in bulk and reduce the cost of materials and manufacturing.In the future, we also want to use other more environment-friendly materials for the mnemocards like metal, wood, paper, and carbon. For those materials, we will be needing laser and milling machines. Hopefully, we can get to that place with your support! Our teamWe are just friends who don't like to sit around. It is not our first project. We like computer science and that is why we developed several educational mobile games, useful applications for pilots, artists, and authors. As people who like outdoor activities, we created a few sports nutrition products. And now, it is interesting for us to create something in the design field. Each of us is highly experienced in his area of expertise and together we are power. Our next stepsWe would like to reduce the price of mnemocards and make them even more affordable. If we can raise a certain amount of funds, we can afford to produce them in bulk and reduce the cost of materials and manufacturing.In the future, we also want to use other more environment-friendly materials for the mnemocards like metal, wood, paper, and carbon. For those materials, we will be needing laser and milling machines. Hopefully, we can get to that place with your support!Risks and challengesThere are many challenges in designing and manufacturing process. How many symbols enough for absolute safety? How can we place them in user-friendly order? What type of cards and printer do we need? Developing software for generating unique sets of symbols that fits printer requirements. However, we though all above problems through. And as of now, we do not see risks at all. If only meteor will fall down to the Earth, this year is eventful.

story:
Meet The UVlockr, powering your home’s first line of defense. 

The UVlockr is the next-generation of home locker and safety deposit box which showers items at your home with a powerful UV-C purification technology helping reduce risk of unwanted items entering your home. 

The UVlockr erases worry, sterilizing contaminants within minutes. Place contaminated or exposed items - from takeout food to cellular devices - into the box, turn the system on via the remote access, and the process begins.

UV-C light is one of the most promising technologies found to be an effective agent in reducing COVID-19 and other potentially harmful bacteria. 

The UVlockr at a Glance:

 

Complete Sanitation. Sterilizes via UV light.
 

Durability. Built as a weatherproof defense system.
 

Secure. Powerful, pry-resistant lock, with electronic keypad.
 

Ease of Use. Simply select a setting and receive an alert when items are disinfected.
 

Hands-free. Manage lock, and package handling remotely with The UVlockr App.
 

Prevent UV Exposure. Advanced safety lock and automated tech

 

Our primary goal with UVlockr is aimed at protecting you and your loved ones from potential contaminants and dangerous muck before it enters your home.

By combining UV-C spectrum light and our proprietary enclosure, the UVlockr can help reduce contaminants from surfaces in minutes. The UVlockr enclosure uses cutting edge automation safety measures to ensure that you and your loved ones are never exposed to UV-C light.

 

 

Viruses and bacteria are common in our everyday lives. With the rise of home delivery for everyday items such as take-out, groceries, and toilet paper, its become increasingly important to ensure what enters your home is clean and contaminant-free.

Our first product, The UVlockr Original, will sell for $449. We will be launching differing versions, sizes and options in the near future based on market demand. The UVlockr has been approved by the United States Patent Office for a provisional patent. 

 

What Is Included: Included within The UVlockr Original are the following items.

  • A weather-proof lockable steel enclosure that measures 18. 1"L x 18. 1"W x 22. 63"H
  • A single UV-C lamp, 254nm Wavelength 110Voltage 11W: 10.24 inch * 0.79 inch
  • A single connected power plug
  • A single power strip
  • A single cloud connected video camera
  • Several Mirrors (for light refraction) 
  • A single removable metal rack (for item placement)
  • Proprietary Automation software, accessed via the UVlockr app 

 

Why UV-C:

 

UV-C light has been proven to be a powerful weapon in the eradication of viruses and bacteria by several scientific studies. 

 

 

While still nascent in research, UV-C light has been proven to be an effective agency in killing the COVID-19 virus.

Studies / Articles: 

Fast Company: https://www.fastcompany.com/90549171/is-uv-ligh...

 

American Ultraviolet: https://www.americanultraviolet.com/uv-germicidal-solutions/faq-germicidal.cfml

 

LightTech: https://www.light-sources.com/blog/the-various-uses-for-uv-light/

 

Medical Xpress: https://medicalxpress.com/news/2020-05-ultraviolet-bright-future-covid-.html

 

United States Food & Drug Administration (FDA): https://www.fda.gov/medical-devices/coronavirus-covid-19-and-medical-devices/uv-lights-and-lamps-ultraviolet-c-radiation-disinfection-and-coronavirus

 

Fast Company: https://www.fastcompany.com/90549171/is-uv-light-safe-the-truth-about-disinfecting-air

 

American Ultraviolet: https://www.americanultraviolet.com/uv-germicidal-solutions/faq-germicidal.cfml

LightTech: https://www.light-sources.com/blog/the-various-uses-for-uv-light/

Medical Xpress: https://medicalxpress.com/news/2020-05-ultraviolet-bright-future-covid-.html

story:
You supply your mattress, we'll provide Sanctuary!

One of the things that we all do, every day, is sleep.

Yet, for many reasons, we do not get the restful and fulfilling sleep that we need;

The cost to us personally and as a society is high; from medical ailments to poor performance at work.

Further, approximately 10.2 million couples sleep apart, in separate beds or separate rooms.

Some people even buy expensive mattresses, only to end up sleeping on the couch. 

Why is that?

Perhaps it's not the mattress but the sleep environment that makes the difference.

_____________________________________________________________________________

Hi, my name is David. I am the founder and CEO of Foundation Planning Corp. My partners and I have been working a long time on this project. Milestones that we have accomplished include: design, engineering, construction of a working prototype, patent applications and the securement of a manufacturing facility.

I want everyone to join the revolution and help change bed design forever!
_____________________________________________________________________________

What is Sanctuary?

We created a revolutionary* bed that when needed or desired, can easily transform from a standard open, exposed mattress to a covered mattress.

In the Standard position, the cover stores under the bed and can be rotated over the bed at any time to form a covered position.

Serenity and Harmony both accomplish this but Harmony goes one step further as the beds can separate to form more positions (Reading, Privacy & Total Privacy) or join to form one covered position (Tatami).

Sanctuary - it's time to ensconce yourself in a unique, relaxing and sleep-inducing environment.

* Patent Pending; U.S., Canada & International PCT (has been approved).


Harmony offers the flexibility of sleeping with your partner in the same standard open bed while being able to, at any time, transform to any of 5 unique positions, each providing a solution to a problem.

  1. Standard Position - Sleep with your partner in the same Standard open bed....

        Reading Position - Read late into the night while your partner drifts to sleep               undisturbed.... 

3.

        Privacy Position - Get up in the morning, turn on the lights and get dressed                 without disturbing your partner!

4.

        Total Privacy Position - Enjoy peaceful sleep, no matter how loud your partner         snores....

5. 

       Tatami Position - For intimate times........make it Tatami time.


       

      (inside Tatami - choose your favorite surrounding) 

Serenity is great for singles and couples (Serenity 60")!      

Serenity provides the flexibility of sleeping in the Standard exposed, open bed with the ability to easily transform to a position that blocks out disruptive noise and light......ensconcing you in a unique, relaxing and sleep-inducing environment.

Serenity is available in every U.S., U.K. and Canadian mattress width: 30" - 60". You can use your existing mattress so there is no need to shop around for another expensive mattress!
Sleep issues affect us all; from outside noise to the effects of shift work to snoring;

For example, the list of celebrities who snore loudly is extensive including Matt Damon, Prince Harry, Kaley Cuoco........Tom Cruise and Judge Judy reportedly have snore rooms in their homes.

Incredibly, the National Association of Homebuilders has predicted that 60% of new homes will be designed with “dual master bedrooms.”


Sanctuary's Features and Options


  • Sanctuary offers up to 5 feet of clearance when the cover is overhead!

    Inside, lots of fresh air flows continuously as Sanctuary is NOT air tight and in addition, has air infiltration and exfiltration outlets located in the walls and ceiling.

  • Sanctuary provides the option to tilt the mattress up to 18 degrees which has many proven health benefits. Sleeping with your upper torso inclined reduces puffy eyes and face. In addition, there is no need to buy an expensive bendable adjustable mattress!

  • Sanctuary features optional, built-in 3.5mm bluetooth speakers!

  • Sanctuary features an optional internal climate control system that allows you to cool or heat JUST your personal sleeping space.

    Save up to 20% on your energy bill instead of wasting money heating or cooling your entire home during the night.  



  • Sanctuary features an optional Sunlight Lamp.

    Instead of waking to an abrupt alarm or radio station, wake up naturally and slowly with the sun...proven to be healthier, giving you more energy throughout your day! 

  • Sanctuary features an optional starlight projector...peacefully drift asleep under the light of a thousand stars.



    •                   (Go to sleep under the stars.....)




  • Sanctuary provides an optional TV riser attachment so that you can enjoy all your favorite t.v. shows, movies and even play video games within the comfort of Sanctuary!


Competition


Sanctuary's Customizability

Sanctuary is completely customizable from its functionality to its options, design and configuration! You choose what kind of Sanctuary you want!
Wallboards
Customize the look of your Sanctuary with our Wallboard displays! Choose an image that's important to you OR upload the personal photos that are important to you and we will print it to size!
Here are some examples of Wallboards.....

Why? - The Benefits of Sanctuary
Noise & Light
  • Greatly reduces noise originating from outside the bedroom and home.
  • Greatly reduces the noise of your partner's snoring so that you can get a consistent high quality sleep.
  • No need for blackout blinds as you will be able to sleep in total darkness while your room is lit by bright sunlight.
Transformability
  • Harmony offers 5 different and effective positions, each one addressing and providing a solution for a different bed partner issue.
  • Harmony allows you and your bed partner to sleep together in the same traditional open bed but when the need arises, Harmony can quickly and easily transform to a different position that suits your current situation.
  • Serenity transforms from the traditional open bed to a covered position to block out disruptive noise and light originating from outside the bedroom or home. 
Health and Relationship 
  • Enjoy consistent and uninterrupted sleep...every night.
  • Greatly reduce the chance of waking up due to your partner, others in the house or noise originating from outside your home.
  • Waking up well rested greatly optimizes your mood, energy level and productivity for the day ahead.
  • A well-rested couple, without suffering from each other's sleep issues, is a happy couple!
  • Sanctuary can be optionally tilt-enabled. This reduces puffy eyes and puffy face when waking up in the morning. The entire mattress can be tilted so that you do not suffer gradual neck or back pains.
  • Sanctuary's optional sunlight lamp can be programmed to gradually brighten to coincide with your wake-up time. Why set an abrupt and piercing alarm or radio station when you can wake up slowly and naturally with the sun...which is proven to be healthier and more rejuvenating.
Comfort
  • Harmony's patent-pending design means no more compromising on the room temperature at night...Sanctuary's internal climate control allows you and your partner to set different temperatures (in the Total Privacy Position)
  • Each partner can sleep on a different mattress style and firmness! You can sleep on a softer mattress while your partner sleeps on a harder mattress.
Intimacy
  • Harmony's Tatami position offers a uniquely relaxing and intimate environment with optional Wallboards, mood lighting and recessed speakers. Take a mental break during the day or at night and enjoy the relaxation and environment the Tatami Position provides.
  • Lay with your partner under a combined, large enclosure surrounded by a beautiful landscape while you listen to your favorite music under soft, slowly changing mood lights. For intimate times...make it Tatami time.
Savings/Environmental
  • Save up to 20% on your energy bill! Sanctuary's optional internal climate control heats or cools JUST you and/or your partner's individual sleeping space(s).
  • Why heat or cool your entire home at night when you can just heat or cool your own individual sleeping space for substantially less......Sanctuary actually pays for itself over time!
Security
  • Sanctuary provides earthquake protection! It is built strong and can withstand falling debris in the event of an earthquake!
  • Sanctuary is optionally locking-enabled (from the inside). You will have piece of mind knowing that you can be sleeping in a secure and protected environment at any time.
A Look Back...

We've been through a long creative process, from early concepts and sketches to 3D wireframes and animations to Sanctuary. 

< The 1st prototype...way back when... 


Use of Funds

For years, we have been working to develop Sanctuary with the goal of enhancing your sleep experience no matter what your situation is.

Please - join us and be a part of this project.

Pledges received during this pre-order campaign will help us place orders with suppliers, facilitate final design engineering to production and ship your Sanctuary as soon as possible!

We will ship Sanctuary from our fulfillment center in Texas to anywhere in the U.S., Canada and the U.K.  

We will post frequently on our Indiegogo page to keep you informed of our progress.


Some of Our Perks!

Thank you - All of our supporters, with their permission, will have their name and city listed on our website's Founder's Page at the end of the campaign.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Risks & Challenges
No one wants to see a good idea executed poorly, especially one that is the World's 1st anything. We have worked diligently to prepare this product for Indiegogo, manufacturing and fulfillment, but there are inherent risks you should consider:
Product Adjustments: As Sanctuary gets ready for production, there will likely be some adjustments to improve the final product and ultimately benefit you, the consumer! Therefore, the actual product delivered may not be exactly as shown or described. Remember, you are contributing to a work-in-progress.
Estimated Shipping Time: A product like Sanctuary requires sourcing various components from a variety of manufacturers. Therefore, if one manufacturer is late on shipping materials/components, it could delay the shipping process. HOWEVER, as a precaution, we will endeavor to have backup suppliers so as to minimize the risk of late shipment.

FAQ

  1.  What are Sanctuary's dimensions?

    Serenity

    Available in U.S., U.K. and Canadian sizes.

    Width: 30", 36", 39", 48", 54" 60"

    For operating width, simply add an extra 1' 6" to any size above.

    Length: 80" (if your mattress is less than 80", a mattress extension is available).

    Harmony

    Width: It depends on the 2-bed size combination that you choose.

    For operating width, simply add an extra 2' to the sum of your chosen combination.

  2. Do you sell mattresses?

    No, we do not sell mattresses.

  3. Will I have to pick up my Sanctuary myself?

    No. Exclusive to our Indiegogo supporters, shipping is free and will be delivered right to your home, within the U.S., U.K. and Canada. 

  4. How can I order Sanctuary?
    The only way to purchase Sanctuary at these pre-order prices is during this Indiegogo campaign. People who back the project get to take advantage of very substantial savings on future retail prices and enjoy the very first Sanctuary Bed. Just click on the "Contribute" button on the right hand side of the campaign page.

  5. How do I choose more than 1 perk?

    The Indiegogo system is not set up to choose multiple perks. If you would like to choose more than one perk, you will simply need to start a separate process. If you encounter difficulties, please email info@fpcinnovation.com and use "NEED HELP WITH ORDERING" as the subject line.

  6. I can't get my payment to work in Paypal, what should I do?

    Email the Indiegogo Customer Happiness Team at support@indiegogo.com. They'll be able to track your transaction and help with any issues.

  7. I don't see my answer here? Who can I contact?

    For any questions that aren't answered here, please contact info@fpcinnovation.com and use "QUESTION" as the subject line.


Other Ways You Can Help

Even at the $8 level, every contribution matters! Please help us by using the Indiegogo share tools and share this campaign with your friends and family! 

Also follow us on Facebook and Twitter! 

THANK YOU!


*fpcinnovation, a div. of Foundation Planning Corporation

Savings/Environmental



Save up to 20% on your energy bill! Sanctuary's optional internal climate control heats or cools JUST you and/or your partner's individual sleeping space(s).
Why heat or cool your entire home at night when you can just heat or cool your own individual sleeping space for substantially less......Sanctuary actually pays for itself over time!

Security



Sanctuary provides earthquake protection! It is built strong and can withstand falling debris in the event of an earthquake!
Sanctuary is optionally locking-enabled (from the inside). You will have piece of mind knowing that you can be sleeping in a secure and protected environment at any time.


A Look Back...


We've been through a long creative process, from early concepts and sketches to 3D wireframes and animations to Sanctuary. 




< The 1st prototype...way back when... 

Use of FundsFor years, we have been working to develop Sanctuary with the goal of enhancing your sleep experience no matter what your situation is.

Please - join us and be a part of this project.
Pledges received during this pre-order campaign will help us place orders with suppliers, facilitate final design engineering to production and ship your Sanctuary as soon as possible!
We will ship Sanctuary from our fulfillment center in Texas to anywhere in the U.S., Canada and the U.K.  
We will post frequently on our Indiegogo page to keep you informed of our progress.

Some of Our Perks!
Thank you - All of our supporters, with their permission, will have their name and city listed on our website's Founder's Page at the end of the campaign.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------






------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------




------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Risks & Challenges

No one wants to see a good idea executed poorly, especially one that is the World's 1st anything. We have worked diligently to prepare this product for Indiegogo, manufacturing and fulfillment, but there are inherent risks you should consider:


Product Adjustments: As Sanctuary gets ready for production, there will likely be some adjustments to improve the final product and ultimately benefit you, the consumer! Therefore, the actual product delivered may not be exactly as shown or described. Remember, you are contributing to a work-in-progress.


Estimated Shipping Time: A product like Sanctuary requires sourcing various components from a variety of manufacturers. Therefore, if one manufacturer is late on shipping materials/components, it could delay the shipping process. HOWEVER, as a precaution, we will endeavor to have backup suppliers so as to minimize the risk of late shipment.

FAQ 

 What are Sanctuary's dimensions?SerenityAvailable in U.S., U.K. and Canadian sizes.Width: 30", 36", 39", 48", 54" 60"For operating width, simply add an extra 1' 6" to any size above.Length: 80" (if your mattress is less than 80", a mattress extension is available).Harmony Width: It depends on the 2-bed size combination that you choose. For operating width, simply add an extra 2' to the sum of your chosen combination.
Do you sell mattresses?No, we do not sell mattresses.
Will I have to pick up my Sanctuary myself?No. Exclusive to our Indiegogo supporters, shipping is free and will be delivered right to your home, within the U.S., U.K. and Canada. 
How can I order Sanctuary?The only way to purchase Sanctuary at these pre-order prices is during this Indiegogo campaign. People who back the project get to take advantage of very substantial savings on future retail prices and enjoy the very first Sanctuary Bed. Just click on the "Contribute" button on the right hand side of the campaign page.
How do I choose more than 1 perk?The Indiegogo system is not set up to choose multiple perks. If you would like to choose more than one perk, you will simply need to start a separate process. If you encounter difficulties, please email info@fpcinnovation.com and use "NEED HELP WITH ORDERING" as the subject line.


I can't get my payment to work in Paypal, what should I do?Email the Indiegogo Customer Happiness Team at support@indiegogo.com. They'll be able to track your transaction and help with any issues.

I don't see my answer here? Who can I contact?For any questions that aren't answered here, please contact info@fpcinnovation.com and use "QUESTION" as the subject line.


    Other Ways You Can Help Even at the $8 level, every contribution matters! Please help us by using the Indiegogo share tools and share this campaign with your friends and family! 
Also follow us on Facebook and Twitter! 
THANK YOU!

*fpcinnovation, a div. of Foundation Planning Corporation

story:
To celebrate 110 years of the famous Titanic, we would want to hand-build 110 units of this historic lifeboat model. They will be available in 2021 or could be earlier depending on your funding.

The RMS Titanic’s lifeboat model will surely bring back the memory of the most tragic sea disasters in modern history. Lifeboat 7 was a wooden starboard lifeboat and the first one to be lowered from the sinking Titanic. Although there was a capacity of 65 people, it left with only 28 people on board, thus with 37 empty seats. The reason why was that many women and children were reluctant to enter a small wooden lifeboat and preferred to stay on the massive ’unsinkable’, but sinking, Titanic.

Our model is beautifully hand built from scratch using ’plank on frame’ construction method using the highest grade of western red cedar. It features intricate details such as wooden paddles, footings, thwarts, braces, ropes, flotation devices, rudder, tiller, lifelines, and much more. The model comes with a detachable wood stand and high precision laser engraved nameplate of Liverpool with star line flag and SS Titanic name on the model stern and front bow. Fund us now and take advantage of the low price that we offer exclusively in this campaign. 

Model DimensionL: 22.5 W: 7.25 H: 6 Inches

story:
Our company 3D Innovation Technology deals with research and development of innovative machines for the Foood sector to print on cappuccino (Cino Printer) , today make new Innvotive Product "mast", the new innovation hot cup, is the idea that takes the form of having both a furnishing accessory for your kitchen or business that can be a functional element to heat your cups without burning your lips as happens with the many cup warmers on the market thanks to the internal induction heating system. 
 
                                                      

 

Thanks to the use of this cup warmer you can have:

  1.  Do not buy plastic or paper cups
  2. do not burn your lips as the edge of the cup is not heated directly 
  3. have an element of furniture
  4. minimum electricity consumption
  5. do not change the aroma of the coffee thanks to the heating of the cup

 

 

 

 

 

Risks 

We are aware that we have created a product that will enter all homes and businesses, which is why we have hired more collaborators for mass production throughout the year 2021, we will be able to correctly complete the rewards, we have also evaluated the partnership with large distribution companies that will be able to support us.

story:
Polimind is a creative design startup based in Lisbon, Portugal. Co-founders Dusan Cvetkovic and Andreia Cabanas, both architects, are the creative minds behind these papercraft models. As passionate architects with a shared love for conceptual art, 3D models, interior decoration and puzzles, they joined forces with a vision to transform homes all around the world with their DIY papercraft designs.

These unique objects come in various sizes depending of the design, function and have also dozens of colors to choose from. Made from high quality durable paper (240gr-300gr), they are perfect for DIY and crafts fans as well as anyone interested in making their living area inspiring and alive. There is no age restriction, but a certain level of patience and coordination is definitely a plus. Polimind papercraft designs are intended for anyone

All models are made from paper pieces that one gets to assemble similar to puzzles, but this time in 3D. There’s a couple of models to choose from: Dragon Head, World Map, Bow Tie, Owl Mocho, Dragon Body, Alien Osiris and the Statue. Extended goals would unlock additional models including Letters, Eiffel Tower, Modular Pattern, Lamp Shade.

These are some design requests that we have received from you and we will make sure to bring them to life in the future: Dog, Deer, Flamingo, Iguana, Fox, Rabbit, Cat, Unicorn, Airplane, T-shirts with Polimind art.




One of the most iconic neoclassical structures in the world. Located in New York, it was a gift from France to America in 1886. Idea behind this piece was to envision the statue through low poly filter, but keep its recognizable shape and posture.

Statue Specs
Height: 45cm / 1'5"
Width: 12cm / 4"
Depth: 16cm / 6"
# of parts: 36



Take a model for a spin in 3D environment:
rotate - left click + drag
pan - right click + drag
zoom - scroll


 


Are you a night owl? Mocho certainly is and we are as well. He is one of our initial models and has a special place in Polimind’s collection. If there’s enough interest, he might even get a girlfriend in the future. We’re thinking about Hedwig from Harry Potter :)  

Mocho Specs
Height: 35cm / 1'1"
Width: 23cm / 9"
Depth: 19cm / 7"
# of parts: 40



Take a model for a spin in 3D environment:
rotate - left click + drag
pan - right click + drag
zoom - scroll

 



You may have noticed by now that we like dragons a lot. They appear everywhere, video games, TV shows, movies so we thought why not appear in your living room?! Dragon head has two color options and you can mount it easily using just a single nail on the wall or some custom back board of your choice.  

Dragon Head Specs
Height: 50cm / 1'7"
Width: 35cm / 1'1"
Depth: 31cm / 1'
# of parts: 80
 



Take a model for a spin in 3D environment:
rotate - left click + drag
pan - right click + drag
zoom - scroll


 

Imagine you could have a real baby dragon at home. This is the perfect opportunity and you get to build the dragon yourself! There are multiple options of mounting the model on the wall with different rotation angles. It’s possible to have the dragon just laying down on horizontal surface as well.


Dragon Body Specs
Height: 80cm / 2'7"
Width: 76cm / 2' 6"
Depth: 21cm / 8"
# of parts: 67



Take a model for a spin in 3D environment:
rotate - left click + drag
pan - right click + drag
zoom - scroll


 


The origin planet of Osiris is still unknown but he is desperately searching for a host family on Earth. Osiris can firmly stand on his feet or take a nap from time to time. There are two color codes (eyes and body).

Osiris Specs
Height: 80cm / 2' 7"
Width: 36cm / 1' 2"
Depth: 24cm / 9"
# of parts: 77




Take a model for a spin in 3D environment:
rotate - left click + drag
pan - right click + drag
zoom - scroll


This piece requires a wall surface of around 1m x 2m (3.2’ x 6.5’). It’s mounted on the wall in pieces by using double sided glue tape. Currently you can get 3 color combinations:
1. Single color of your choice - https://skfb.ly/Zo7M
2. Each continent in different color of your choice - https://skfb.ly/Zo7q
3. Custom colors as presented on the images bellow

We are open to suggestions if you wish to have some other color combination. In the future, we have plans to create these kind of wall maps for each individual country with more details.

World Map Specs
Height: 100cm / 3'3"
Width: 200cm / 6'6"
Depth: 5cm / 2"
# of parts: 175



Take a model for a spin in 3D environment:
rotate - left click + drag
pan - right click + drag
zoom - scroll

 





Are you a blogger or a journalist?
If you're interested in sharing Polimind story with the world, here's a press kit that contains all necessary files and additional information. You can contact us at info@polimind.com

 



 



There are two types of perks available: digital and physical.

Digital perks will be delivered via email in PDF format after the campaign ends in April 2017. The paper format is A4. We recommend printing the templates on thicker paper (around 250-300gr). The instructions are included.

Physical perks include a package with already pre-cut and pre-creased paper pieces with the color of your choice, glue strips and visual instructions. All packages will be shipped to your mailing address as soon as manufacturing process is finished in September 2017.
 




There are currently 24 colors available. Paper thickness varies from 250-300gr depending on the model. Please note that the colors on screen may be slightly different than in reality. This is an image of the paper colors.

 

 

Since we wanted to bring you free shipping world wide, the biggest amount of the funds will be used for campaign fulfillment and distribution. The rest of the funds will be used for equipment, materials and tools such as professional paper cutting machines and large format printers. Part of the funds will be dedicated to renting an office space, setting up the production and other legal paperwork. Lastly, the rest is for Indiegogo fees  and financial transaction fees.




Shipping of all Polimind products will be FREE for all backers regardless of your location. All packages will be shipped from Portugal which means that all backers from EU countries won't have any additional costs.

We have already shipped some of our products to the USA and Australia with no additional costs for the recipients, but we cannot guarantee this since it doesn't depend on us. Each country has their own import duty and tax rules, so if you have already ordered something from Europe in the past, this will be similar experience for you.

If case you choose a PDF template, it will be delivered to you digitally at the end of the campaign.

 

​

I am new to Indiegogo platform.
How does this work? How can I support this project?
Please take a look at detailed explanation on this page. 

How can I choose the color of my model(s)?
Once the campaign is finished, we will send you a survey so you can choose the colors for your model(s).

How can I get two or more perks of the same model type?
1) Get a single perk of your choice and finish the transaction. (for example Dragon Head - €39) 
2) Go to the campaign page again https://igg.me/at/polimind and click on the button ‘BACK IT’ 
3) Type the amount of your perk. For example, Dragon Head is 39€, so you would type 39€ 
4) Finish the transaction and send us an email at info@polimind.com letting us know about your perks purchase
Here is a visual explanation. 

If the campaign doesn’t get funded, what happens with my money?
Our campaign has Fixed Funding type (all or nothing). This means that if we don’t reach our goal, your money will be refunded to you by Indiegogo within 5-7 business days after the campaign is finished.

Can I ask for a refund?
Absolutely, we will refund you as soon as you contact us with such request as long as it is within Indiegogo refund policy.

How can I communicate with you directly?
You can contact us directly at info@polimind.com 
 






Please help us in spreading the word about Polimind  on social media so that we can bring your design ideas to life! If you happen to know some journalists or bloggers, we'd appreciate a lot if you could send us a hint at info@polimind.com
