story:
1. Products will be ready to deliver right after the campaign. You won't have to wait for months, or ... years. 
  2. We will add 30+ Lamplay's designs on the last day, and keep adding 1 new design weekly. You can choose any of our designs, or submit your own design (for those who grab Customized Lamplay's perks).
  3. All Lamplay come with 2 years warranty. Should there be any problem, we exchange a new product at no additional cost. 
  4. Each products is hand-crafted and double-checked before shipping. We do not compromise on product quality.
  5. After the campaign, we will send you an email survey asking for your choice (design, light color, size). Do not worry. 

Lamplay is a picture of a playful lamp perfectly printed on a canvas, from which people will not only embrace the arts, but also appreciate its useful function. It is such a trompe-l’œil! (French for “deceive the eye”)

Lamplay includes:

  • a canvas print stretched on a wooden frame
  • a LED light panel. The light power has been calculated to ensure safety and brightness
  • electrical parts and components (driver, cord, plug ...)

Products will be tested and carefully packaged before delivery. 

Salut, I am Johny (the Dark Lord's foe). When I was a child, I burned my grandma's art with an unwavering belief that light would bring wonder to the boring piece of art. I was right ... for a brief moment, before it turned into ashes.

Growing up, I found a team of like-minded people to set up a canvas printing business. Apart from traditional products, we spent weekends building creative projects like modular wall art, city-shaped canvas print, .... and Lamplay.

The success of this campaign will give us a real chance to introduce more of our innovative ideas to you. 

Easy installation

Each Lamplay comes with a 2-meter power cord and a hanger. You can easily hang it on any wall. Just make sure there is an electric socket nearby to power the Lamplay. Tip: Extension cord will be useful. 

You also may like to put it on your desk or on a bookshelf. The light is bright enough for you to read books and do other activities. 

Highly customizable

  • Design: The image printed on our canvas can be anything from your childhood lamp to a yellow Dachshund wearing a Santa hat. Simply let us know where you want to put the lighting source (for example, on the Dachshund's nose). 
  • Size: We understand that Lamplay has to fit perfectly in your house, so size really matters. Fortunately, whether you want it 23 x 37.1 (cm) or 40 x 60 (cm), we can custom made for you. Right now, we ship Lamplay with size equal or smaller than 80 x 80 (cm). 
  • Light color: We currently use 2 colors (White or Warm White). After reaching the Stretch Goal, we will add an upgrade to multi-color LED panel light for you at no additional charge. You simply turn on and off the light to switch between colors (White, Warm White and Yellow). 

Ready to ship worldwide

Our team has spent a great deal of time to conceptualize, build and rigorously test the product. Lamplay is now ready to ship to your doorsteps. 

Packaging: 

Lamplay will be label printed (brand name: Artfini) on a side and covered by 3 layers of protection.

  1. Corner protectors
  2. Bubble and plastic wrap
  3. Carton box

Build to last

  • Our bright white, consistent poly-cotton blend matte canvas features an acid-free, neutral pH coating without any additives or agents. The canvas prints are designed to last well over 50 years, guaranteeing you will treasure your prints for a lifetime.
  • Canvas frame has gone through a drop test. It won't break on delivery or after that. 
  • Each Lamplay includes a free CE-certified LED light panel, which can last up to 10,000 hours. You can easily change the light panel if needed. Buy a Lampodium's perk on the right to have an extra light panel whenever you need. 

At Artfini, we believe in the power of imagination. By integrating functionality to art, we strive for something fun, new, and highly customizable that people can use to create their own personalized and meaningful home décor.

Lamplay is also created to fulfill our desire to bringing more innovative ideas to the world. We set up this campaign to raise fund for equipment, production and R&D. With your help, we can share this amazing work to the world, and prove that everything can be achieved together ... even for our wildest dream. 

There are total 12 steps from start to finish.

Each and every Lamplay is handcrafted. Our skilled team members hand-stretch and meticulously inspect each piece to ensure your Lamplay is perfect. You’ll even find the name of the craftsman who brought your Lamplay to life, included on a removable sticker inside the frame.

We like to keep it personal that way.

  • $100,000: Free upgrade to multi-color LED panel light (white, warm white, yellow)

1. Q: In a nutshell, what makes Lamplay different? 

A: A customizable art that can light up! We didn't see anything like that before. The customization part is a BIG plus. 

2. Q: What do I get for each Lamplay?

A: You will get a stretched canvas print, and a CE-certified LED light panel with electrical components and parts. 

3. Q: Why should I buy a Lamplay?

A: It's generally cheaper and cooler than buying a normal canvas print at stores. Lamplay is handcrafted, custom-made, and more importantly, it is a genius idea that will add fun and personality to your house and your life. Also, you have backed a good cause.

4. Q: When will I receive my product?

A: We will start to deliver your Lamplay right after the end of this campaign. We know it's horrible to wait for something we love. Instead of launching on Indiegogo months ago and letting you wait, we diligently prepare our works until today. 

5. Q:  What is the LED light panel's power?

A: 6 Watt. It is safe to use while providing enough brightness and decoration. 

6. Q: What should I do if I have bought one Lamplay and want to buy one more?

A: Please simply contribute to one more perk. Or buy a perk with bundle discount. 

7. Q: Do I get a discount on the price/shipping fee if I buy more than one Lamplay?

A: Try to be an Early Bird and grab steep discounts. For shipping, we already ate up part of the cost to save you money. Please show your support by paying for the shipping cost. There will be a surprise gift in each and every package. 

8. Q: What color is the light?

A: We offer 2 colors (White and Warm White). We will send out a survey for you to choose soon. 

9. Q: What is the Lamplay's size?

A: Lamplay's size can be customized to your needs. However, we suggest familiar sizes of 30 x 30 (centimeters), 30 x 40, 40 x 40, 40 x 60, 60 x 60, 60 x 80 ... These sizes have been proven to be all-time favorites. The height will be from 3 to 4 centimeters, depending on the size of Lamplay.

10. Q: What type of voltage and plug is it for Lamplay?

A: The LED light panel's voltage ranges from 85 to 256V and Lamplay uses two-prong plug. Since the plug and voltage condition vary in different countries, please prepare your own plug adapter and converter if needed. 

11. Q: How long is the cord of Lamplay?

A: It's 2 meters (6.56 feets)

12. Q: Can I change the LED light panel at the back of Lamplay?

A: Absolutely! It's an easy process and will not cost you more than 90 seconds. 

13. Q: Can I wash Lamplay?

A: You can wash the canvas print's surface by using soft fabric to wipe gently with water.

14. Q: Will Lamplay be damaged in the shipment process?

A: Each Lamplay is covered by 3 layers of protection to minimize damage possibilities:

  1. Corner protectors
  2. Bubble and plastic wrap
  3. Carton box

And we have a policy to exchange a new product if you receive a Lamplay in an undesirable state.

15. How many designs that I can choose from?

A: After the campaign, we will send out an email survey with 30+ designs and we continuously add new designs weekly. 

In case that you contribute a Customized Lamplay's perk, we'll quickly send an easy-to-follow guide for you to submit your own design. What can be cooler than having your own personalized Lamplay?

16. A. Why does it take 1 year to make Lamplay? 

Although the result may look simple, we have invested over a year to conceptualize, design, experiment and test the product. Simplicity is elegant. Achieving it is a real struggle. 

17. Q: Where is Lamplay made?

A: We design and develop Lamplay in Paris (France). The production takes place in Ho Chi Minh City (Vietnam). 

18. Q: I'm a business owner/wholesaler/distributor and would like to sell Lamplay?

A: Please contact us at inquiry@artfini.com

19. Q: My question is NOT listed here, what should I do?

A: Send it to us at inquiry@artfini.com. We love to help.

20. Q: ..... [for upcoming questions]
story_txt:
Products will be ready to deliver right after the campaign. You won't have to wait for months, or ... years. 
We will add 30+ Lamplay's designs on the last day, and keep adding 1 new design weekly. You can choose any of our designs, or submit your own design (for those who grab Customized Lamplay's perks).
All Lamplay come with 2 years warranty. Should there be any problem, we exchange a new product at no additional cost. 
Each products is hand-crafted and double-checked before shipping. We do not compromise on product quality.
After the campaign, we will send you an email survey asking for your choice (design, light color, size). Do not worry. 
Lamplay is a picture of a playful lamp perfectly printed on a canvas, from which people will not only embrace the arts, but also appreciate its useful function. It is such a trompe-l’œil! (French for “deceive the eye”)Lamplay includes:
a canvas print stretched on a wooden frame
a LED light panel. The light power has been calculated to ensure safety and brightness
electrical parts and components (driver, cord, plug ...)
Products will be tested and carefully packaged before delivery. Salut, I am Johny (the Dark Lord's foe). When I was a child, I burned my grandma's art with an unwavering belief that light would bring wonder to the boring piece of art. I was right ... for a brief moment, before it turned into ashes.Growing up, I found a team of like-minded people to set up a canvas printing business. Apart from traditional products, we spent weekends building creative projects like modular wall art, city-shaped canvas print, .... and Lamplay.The success of this campaign will give us a real chance to introduce more of our innovative ideas to you. Easy installationEach Lamplay comes with a 2-meter power cord and a hanger. You can easily hang it on any wall. Just make sure there is an electric socket nearby to power the Lamplay. Tip: Extension cord will be useful. You also may like to put it on your desk or on a bookshelf. The light is bright enough for you to read books and do other activities. Highly customizable

Design: The image printed on our canvas can be anything from your childhood lamp to a yellow Dachshund wearing a Santa hat. Simply let us know where you want to put the lighting source (for example, on the Dachshund's nose). 

Size: We understand that Lamplay has to fit perfectly in your house, so size really matters. Fortunately, whether you want it 23 x 37.1 (cm) or 40 x 60 (cm), we can custom made for you. Right now, we ship Lamplay with size equal or smaller than 80 x 80 (cm). 

Light color: We currently use 2 colors (White or Warm White). After reaching the Stretch Goal, we will add an upgrade to multi-color LED panel light for you at no additional charge. You simply turn on and off the light to switch between colors (White, Warm White and Yellow). 
Ready to ship worldwideOur team has spent a great deal of time to conceptualize, build and rigorously test the product. Lamplay is now ready to ship to your doorsteps. Packaging: Lamplay will be label printed (brand name: Artfini) on a side and covered by 3 layers of protection.
Corner protectors
Bubble and plastic wrap
Carton box
Build to last
Our bright white, consistent poly-cotton blend matte canvas features an acid-free, neutral pH coating without any additives or agents. The canvas prints are designed to last well over 50 years, guaranteeing you will treasure your prints for a lifetime.
Canvas frame has gone through a drop test. It won't break on delivery or after that. 
Each Lamplay includes a free CE-certified LED light panel, which can last up to 10,000 hours. You can easily change the light panel if needed. Buy a Lampodium's perk on the right to have an extra light panel whenever you need. 
At Artfini, we believe in the power of imagination. By integrating functionality to art, we strive for something fun, new, and highly customizable that people can use to create their own personalized and meaningful home décor.Lamplay is also created to fulfill our desire to bringing more innovative ideas to the world. We set up this campaign to raise fund for equipment, production and R&D. With your help, we can share this amazing work to the world, and prove that everything can be achieved together ... even for our wildest dream. There are total 12 steps from start to finish.Each and every Lamplay is handcrafted. Our skilled team members hand-stretch and meticulously inspect each piece to ensure your Lamplay is perfect. You’ll even find the name of the craftsman who brought your Lamplay to life, included on a removable sticker inside the frame.We like to keep it personal that way.$100,000: Free upgrade to multi-color LED panel light (white, warm white, yellow)1. story:
Homeless & Orphan Pets Exist (H.O.P.E.)

Homeless & Orphan Pets Exist - H.O.P.E. is a non profit and non-governmental organization which is currently located at Pekan Nanas, Johor. H.O.P.E. was established in April 2008 and was officially registered with the Registry of Societies of Malaysia on August 2009. H.O.P.E. is a 100% NO KILL animal shelter for all breeds of dogs and cats. We are currently sheltering over 2000 homeless cats and dogs. Now, we need a total of 80 bags of 15kg dog food to feed our doggies per day, a total of 2400 bags of 15kg dog food/month! That’s means we have to spend over 40k$ per month for the expense of food itself and also approximately 4k$ – 8k$ on medical bills.

Vision And Mission

Our four core missions – rescuing, re-homing, sterilisation and increasing public awareness of pet ownership and responsibilities. An enormous amount of love and care is given to ensure that the animals are happy and healthy. Apart from food and water, like any pet kept in your home, the animals in H.O.P.E. Receive an adequate amount of medical care. All the animals in H.O.P.E. Are sterilised and given regular vaccinations. Our vision is to reduce suffering in the world and advocate humane behaviour through education and provision of rescue, rehabilitation, and shelter to abandoned, neglected, and abused dogs. Hope the Government to have a more stringent legislation to protect and rescue stray pets. Establish a harmonious relationship between man and animals.

Future Plan

We planned to build a school rooms and lecture halls where the public and schoolchildren can come to learn about our furry friends, a shop where the public can purchase anything they want for their furry friends. There will be electricity, fresh water and shady places.

Words From The Founder

Thought the years we adhere to sterilization our shelter regularly, We Promote TNRM (Trap - Neutered - Release - Management) because we do not want to have abandoned the newborn kittens and puppies. Meanwhile we also hope to contribute in control the number of stray dogs and cats.
- Aunty Jia

story:
Our Mission is Simple: Make your “Smart Home”, well, Smart.

Technology is evolving exponentially, so why shouldn’t the way we control it?

We had remotes. We had universal remotes. Great! So, whats next?

We’re giving you the next form of Home Automation and Control: a universal remote that knows exactly what room you’re in, what devices you will want to be using, and it will be readily available on a device you were carrying with you anyway.

The Palm isn’t just our mod, it is yours. It has been crafted with intuition, innovation, and automation in mind. Utilizing the same Pulse Room Sensors (Did I mention you get 2 minimum with each mod?!) that power our Pulse Home Automation system, you now get added functionality thanks to Motorola's MotoMod Platform. 9 user-defined buttons, IR Blaster to control even your non-smart devices, and Qi Wireless Charging. While 9 buttons might not sound like a lot, don't forget 1 button can control an almost infinite number of devices in separate rooms. 

The Palm will be launched with initial support for the following smart home applications: WINK, SmartThings, Philips Hue. You will also be able to set a button to launch an Android Shortcut, and program a button to utilize the IR Blaster.

What are the Pulse Room Sensors?

The Pulse Room Sensors are what makes all of this possible. They provide the heartbeat of your home that The Palm picks up on to know where you are. Utilizing Bluetooth LE and Mesh Networking, they provide you with basic room information: Temp, Humidity, Occupancy Status, and Occupancy Schedule. Each sensor is equipped with a 32-Bit ARM Cortex M4 processor, allowing them to perform all of these tasks in the background. You can now visualize when you are in each room, when your home is the hottest, coolest, and when you loose the most heat. This allows you and your home to work smarter to save energy, time, and money. 

 

Investment in your Home, not your Phone

Would this be that special if it was only available for 1 device? I'll give you a hint: Probably not. That's why we have done the legwork to make the product work for you, on any device. 

The Pulse Home Automation system will work with all Android, iPhone, and Windows devices created after 2012. That's right, even your old phone had support for this functionality. When the product is released, you can download the app on any supported device, and have the option to sync your configurations across them. Now your whole family will be able to enjoy almost the same level of control. 

 

 

 

Help us, Help You

The Vision? Check. The Concept? Check. The Prototype? Check.

The Production? Well, we’d love nothing more.

Please allow us to reiterate just how much your support is paramount to our success. Without you, there is no us. We love our product and we stand behind it, but it means nothing without your vote of confidence. All contributions, monetary, emotional, or otherwise, are all valuable and we appreciate every bit of it.

In return for your help, you will be provided with your pick of perks offered here. We are offering discounts and deals to early adopters, as it only seems fair that we reciprocate your vote of confidence with our own token of appreciation.

Baby Steps.

The Palm isn’t an all-inclusive project. If we made oodles of money from this project, it would simply mean we would have oodles of money dedicated to research and reinvestment. This isn’t some type of fleeting task to appease our boredom; this is passion. We’ve been blessed with technology that is advancing at an exponential rate, and we want to enable everyone to grow with it. It doesn’t have to be terrifying, and we want to prove that.

At Upper Story Technologies, we are working diligently to develop solutions that will work hand-in-hand with our controller, and we believe that we can develop and implement devices that currently exceed anything available in the public market. I cannot ask you to trust us implicitly, but I’d be lying if I told you our hands and minds were ever sitting idle (Well, minus sleep. That isn’t fair).

No Moto? No Problem.

Don’t have a Moto-Z? Shame on you.

Oh wait. That seems perfectly reasonable.

We understand that not everyone will have the appropriate technology to mesh with our product.

We understand that not everyone is monetarily prepared to invest in any project at any given time.

That is perfectly fine.

Regardless if you were sold or not, we appreciate you taking the time to take a look at our project. If you’re reading this section, I assume you’ve read or at least skimmed the majority of our information. We appreciate that more than we can express. If you were intrigued by this project and want to help us, well, that would just warm the cockles of our heart. Every share, every discussion, every last bit of exposure is vital to our success, and we are far better off just from you simply taking the time to check us out.

story:
As a prototype, we used a drawing from the popular computer game DotA 2. This knife will not only be a great kitchen assistant  but also the best gift for real fans of the game. 

This knife is central to your kitchen. He will be the chief assistant in shredding and cutting. Cheap knives are dull quickly. Finding the right blade can be a frustrating experience, but we don’t think that needs to be the case. This knife is exactly what you need!

A good knife for a worthy price...

The world of knives is in decline. Really good knives are no longer produced. The price policy is based on payment for a trademark that inflate the price of knives sold at a retail store. We did not spend extra money on advertising for making a knife. We have created a great knife for a fraction of the price. 

Get the one knife you’ll reach for again and again. Don’t waste your money on a knife block filled with knives you’ll never use. 


We have created and developed something perfect and new. A perfect half-moon blade and a comfortable grip make the experience of using a knife unforgettable. A knife that takes the best elements of eastern knifemaking. An incredibly sharp blade that feels right at home in your hand.

The contour of the grip makes it feel secure regardless of your preferred grip style or the size of your hands. Walnut – the best wood for the grip knife. We covered it with gun paint which is not washed off,  is not toxic and not allergenic. “DuraCoat” is something completely new in the knife industry.

The main advantage of a thin and sharp blade. Our blade has a cutting core made of Japanese VG-10 steel. This high-carbon stainless steel holds an incredible edge and won’t corrode like other high-carbon steels. The blade is then tapered to a 15 degree edge angle, allowing you to glide through even the toughest of root vegetables. 

Methods of trial and error production…

Six months we’ve tested our knife with chefs and home cooks. We have finally created the perfect product. A lot of revisions have helped us to develop a knife we can’t wait to share with the world.

We need your help…

Our knife is ready for production - now we need to funds for the first production run. We have the suppliers and manufacturers ready to go, we just need your help to bring the blade to life.

story:
Bamboo Box started when I thought about how environmentally damaging my plastic cotton buds were. Every single one, would end up in landfill. Taking hundreds of years to decompose, releasing micro plastic into our oceans, passing down the food chain, right back to me.

I teach my kids at school how much we need to be saving the planet, reducing our Carbon emissions, recycling and commuting less. But here I am using plastic cotton buds. Bit hypocritical right?

So I ordered some Bamboo cotton buds. Bamboo is 100% biodegradable and natural. It absorbs carbon dioxide and releases over 30% more oxygen into the atmosphere compared to an equivalent mass of trees. It grows crazy fast, requiring no irrigation and is a mature tree within a matter of years, unlike standard trees taking decades.

 I felt better making my one little change. But it got me thinking, what else can I replace to minimise my waste?

Well it turns out, pretty much anything can be made of Bamboo! Cups, plates, sunglasses, sponges, clothing, you name it, there's a Bamboo version. This is a huge untapped industry I was completely unaware of.

So I want to share my Bamboo revolution with the world. Creating boxes filled with Bamboo products to reduce everyday waste. Items for the bathroom, kitchen or make-up routines. I want to help everyone make small everyday changes to make their impact on our environment, a positive one. 

I aim to include Bamboo seeds in every box for you to grow your own at home, and also plant a tree to contribute towards lowering everyone's Carbon footprint, one box at a time.

I started this business with money I had in my savings, but I now need investment to really get it off the ground. Stock is required in excess so that boxes can be sent out quickly. Advertising to increase brand awareness. Excess boxes to actually send the goods out!

In recent month, we have seen how much of an impact Human's have on the Earth. With national lock-downs, greenhouse emission have plummeted. Now we all venturing back out into the world, but we are looking at it in a new light, a greener light. 

Governments around the globe are starting 'green economic boost plans' to protect our planet by investing in renewable technologies.  It's a matter of time before this starts to enter our everyday life and goods.

So would you like to make one little change today?
story_txt: Bamboo Box started when I thought about how environmentally damaging my plastic cotton buds were. Every single one, would end up in landfill. Taking hundreds of years to decompose, releasing micro plastic into our oceans, passing down the food chain, right back to me.I teach my kids at school how much we need to be saving the planet, reducing our Carbon emissions, recycling and commuting less. But here I am using plastic cotton buds. Bit hypocritical right?So I ordered some Bamboo cotton buds. Bamboo is 100% biodegradable and natural. It absorbs carbon dioxide and releases over 30% more oxygen into the atmosphere compared to an equivalent mass of trees. It grows crazy fast, requiring no irrigation and is a mature tree within a matter of years, unlike standard trees taking decades. I felt better making my one little change. But it got me thinking, what else can I replace to minimise my waste?Well it turns out, pretty much anything can be made of Bamboo! Cups, plates, sunglasses, sponges, clothing, you name it, there's a Bamboo version. This is a huge untapped industry I was completely unaware of.So I want to share my Bamboo revolution with the world. Creating boxes filled with Bamboo products to reduce everyday waste. Items for the bathroom, kitchen or make-up routines. I want to help everyone make small everyday changes to make their impact on our environment, a positive one. I aim to include Bamboo seeds in every box for you to grow your own at home, and also plant a tree to contribute towards lowering everyone's Carbon footprint, one box at a time.I started this business with money I had in my savings, but I now need investment to really get it off the ground. Stock is required in excess so that boxes can be sent out quickly. Advertising to increase brand awareness. Excess boxes to actually send the goods out!In recent month, we have seen how much of an impact Human's have on the Earth. With national lock-downs, greenhouse emission have plummeted. Now we all venturing back out into the world, but we are looking at it in a new light, a greener light. Governments around the globe are starting 'green economic boost plans' to protect our planet by investing in renewable technologies.  It's a matter of time before this starts to enter our everyday life and goods.So would you like to make one little change today?

story:
It all started pretty simply and honestly.  

After much searching, I found a supplier who would sell me awesome knives without the handles. I bought six, and figured if I made them up and sold a few, I would get a free knife to use at work. So I did just that. 

I posted them up on Facebook marketplace on a whim, and by the next day, I had received 70 messages asking for them. 

I bought another 20 after that, and they were gone within two days, which is when I decided I could seriously do something special with these. 

 So why do I need Indiegogo?

I want to expand my range to a full set of knives with custom designed handles. The chef's knife has been a really well received product and I have had requests to expand on that range as one chef's knife wasn't enough. 

Sadly large suppliers will only sell to me if I can get enough orders to justify their production runs. I managed to get a few production samples which I experimented with and I was very happy with the quality of the blade. I am excited by the opportunity to create unique handles in all shapes and sizes for every variety of knife. 

With your help, I can order in Nakiri, Santoku, Utility, Boning and Bread knives. Then I can make up matching knife sets with unique handles that will make everybody jealous!

So what makes these knives so special? 

I'm a chef, been at it for 18 years now, and I've gone through many knives. The biggest issue I had found was edge retention. You want your knives to stay sharp as long as possible, and after much research I found the magic metal - VG10. 

It is a stainless steel with a high carbon content containing 1% Carbon, 15% Chromium, 1% Molybdenum, 0.2% Vanadium, 1.5% Cobalt, and 0.5% Manganese.

Basically, that means that it has all the properties of high carbon steels used in high end forged knives without the rusting and maintenance issues. The best of both worlds. 

With your backing, these are what I plan extend my range to:  

Now comes the fun part.  

I think a knife handle should reflect the user and not be identically mass produced. What I love won't be what somebody else will love. And for something you want to show off, it needs to be awesome!

Choose your favourite, and add your customisation in the notes during checkout.

 

The chef's knives had been my trade, and I thought I should show off a few comments I found online of them.

 

Risks and challenges

I think the biggest challenge will be depending on how many orders I receive. Handles like the blue/yellow/black resin I can make an unlimited amount of. However, the raw timbers are limited to material availability. So if I receive 1000 orders for just Olive timber, I may need to write down out of stock on it.

I will also adjust the delivery date after a certain amount of orders come in, so I can keep within the promised delivery date.

Apart from that, I've got a system set up to make them, and have gotten a fair chunk of practice at it now, so I can pump out whatever handles you love!

story:
Hi, I am Leafy!

Leafy is a modular flower pot to realize different sizes of wall greenings fast and easily, whether it is indoors or outdoors.

Why Leafy?

Most existing planting systems for wall greening are bulky, difficult to install, expensive, or not expandable.
With Leafy, we have solved these problems: you only need two screws to install the first Leafy pot on your wall. You can attach up to 3 more pots to this pot – simply without drilling. Thanks to the water tank, your plants are supplied with water up to three weeks. Wall greening has never been easier - with Leafy.


 

Why greenery?

Plants have a significant influence on your health and life:

  • they have a relaxing and stress-reducing effect
  • increase performance and concentration
  • and simply make happy

They also have proven effects on their environment:

  • they filter pollutants from the room air
  • bind carbon dioxide
  • produce oxygen
  • and increase humidity

Following studies underline these arguments:

NASA

Plants can remove toxins from the air - up to 87 percent of volatile organic compounds every 24 hours (NASA research)

Texas A&M University

"People who keep flowers in their home feel happier, less stressed and more relaxed. As a result of the positive energy they derive from the environment, the chances of suffering from stress-related depression are decreased as well." (study)

Nursery & Garden Industrie Australia"Staff who had plants placed in their offices showed reductions in stress levels and negative feelings of a magnitude of 30 to 60%, while those with no plants recorded increases in stress and negativity of 20 to 40%, over the 3-month test period" (study)

 

Why wall mounted?

Whether living room, kitchen or balcony, wall greening is possible almost everywhere. Our wall greening system is more space-saving than most other planting options and enriches smaller rooms thanks to its flat design.


 

Easy installation

Create your personal wall greening in three simple steps:

  1. Drill two holes into the wall. The best way to do this, is to use the bracket as a template. Make sure that the bracket is almost straight.
     
  2. Now attach the bracket to the wall with the supplied screws. Depending on the wall material you may need different dowels. You can use the mini water level for alignment. It's included in every Leafy set.
     

  3. Attach the first pot to the bracket. To add another pot simply attach the corresponding bracket to the already mounted pot and hang the next pot onto this bracket. The video below demonstrates how it works. That's it!

 

Design

FORM: The simple, rounded design and the concealed bracket keeps Leafy discreetly in the background and puts your plants in the spotlight. 

FUNCTION: The integrated 500 ml water reservoir and the included water level indicator provides you with a simple and practical way of greening your home. For hanging Leafy outdoors, you may use the overflow, so your plants are save even from heavy rain. 

FILL: We recommend to use a mineral plant substrate instead of soil to keep your maintenance effort low and your home clean.

FUTURE: We care for our environment! Therefore we use high quality Poplyprophylene (PP) for the production of Leafy. PP is one of the most commonly used plastics worldwide.

  • It is durable
  • has a long service life
  • and is 100% recyclable.

What is included?

Everything you need to start greening your home! Each set contains:

  • 1 pot
  • 1 mount
  • 1 separator to form the water reservoir
  • 1 water level indicator
  • 1 plug to close the overflow
  • 2 screws with dowels for mounting.

We have some awesome perks that all contain different numbers of our Leafy sets.
If something is missing or if you need a custom perk please feel free to contact us: hi@iamleafy.com

Do you want to sell Leafy at your local store or webshop? Do you want to green an entire department of your company? Please contact us for business corporation: hi@iamleafy.com
 

What is Crowdfunding

With crowdfunding you contribute to the implementation of a project or idea. In our case we finance the production of Leafy by selling various pot sets (called "Perks", find them in the top right-hand corner) in advance. For this we need at least 109.000€, this is the so-called "funding threshold". The amounts paid are collected until we reach the funding threshold. If we do not reach this amount, all supporters will get their entire money back and Leafy will not be able to be implemented.

At the moment support is only possible by credit card (for EU: only Visa, MasterCard or American Express).
 

Why we need you

After 1,5 years of designing, developing and prototyping, we are now ready for the next, and most important step. However, we need your help to do so! By supporting us, you will enable us to produce the first batch of our Leafy pots and build the basis for the next generation of wall greenery.

Are you ready to take this step with us? Then support our campaign and share the idea with your family and friends! You can contribute a lot with just a few clicks!


 

Timeline  

WHAT´S THE MONEY FOR

We would like to give you an overview of what we need the money for:

Impressions


 

FAQ

What do i get when i order?

A small set contains 2 Leafy pots, a medium set contains 3 Leafy pots, and a large set contains 4 Leafy pots. Each Leafy pot comes with a mount, a separator to form the water reservoir, a water level indicator, a plug to close the spillover for indoor use, and two screws for mounting (dowels are not included).

What are the dimensions of Leafy?

The dimensions are: height 29,5cm x width 30,2cm x depth 12,7cm.


How does Leafy work?

Install the mounting bracket to the wall and attach the first pot to the bracket. If you want to add another pot, you can simply attach the corresponding bracket to the already mounted pot and then attach the next pot to this bracket.

Where can I use Leafy?

You can use Leafy nearly everywhere: at home, in your garden, your Office…

When does shipping begin?

End of 2018.

How much is shipping?

Shipping costs 7€ to Germany, 15€ to the rest of EU and 36€ to everywhere else.

Is there the possibility for a distribution partnership?

Of course! Please contact: hi@iamleafy.com

Do I have to pay VAT / GST?

Yes, when you live outside the EU

Is there a warranty?

Every Leafy pot comes with a two-year warranty.

What is your refund policy?

Refunds are available through Indiegogo at any time during the crowdfunding campaign. After the campaign ends, you will need to email us at hi@iamleafy.com for refunds on a case-by-case basis.

What is your return / exchange policy?

If you are not satisfied with your product you may exchange it for a new one within 30 days, shipping & handling fees are not included.

How can I choose more rewards?

You need to make a new contribution for each perk.

If I have other questions, who should I contact?

If you have any other question, please send an email to hi@iamleafy.com


Hi, ich bin Leafy!

Leafy ist ein modularer Blumentopf mit dem du schnell und unkompliziert verschiedenste Arten von Wandbegrünungen realisieren kannst, egal ob im Innen- oder Außenbereich.

Warum Leafy?

Die meisten auf  dem Markt erhältlichen Begrünungssysteme sind unhandlich, aufwendig zu installieren, teuer oder nicht problemlos erweiterbar.
Mit Leafy haben wir diese Probleme gelöst: Du benötigst nur zwei Schrauben, um den ersten Leafy-Pflanztopf an deiner Wand zu befestigen. An diesem Topf kannst bis zu 3 weitere Töpfe anbringen - ganz einfach und ohne zu bohren. Dank des integrierten Wassertanks sind deine Pflanzen bis zu 3 Wochen mit Wasser versorgt. Noch nie war die Begrünung von Wänden so einfach - mit Leafy.


 

Wozu dient eine Begrünung?

Pflanzen haben einen erheblichen Einfluss auf deine Gesundheit und dein Leben:

  • Sie wirken entspannend und stressmindernd
  • steigern deine Leistung und Konzentration
  • und machen glücklich

Sie haben zudem nachweislichen Einfluss auf ihre Umwelt:

  • Sie filtern Schadstoffe aus der Raumluft
  • binden Kohlendioxid
  • produzieren Sauerstoff
  • und erhöhen die Luftfeuchtigkeit

Die folgenden Studien belegen unsere Argumente:

NASA

Plants can remove toxins from the air - up to 87 percent of volatile organic compounds every 24 hours (NASA research)

Texas A&M University

"People who keep flowers in their home feel happier, less stressed and more relaxed. As a result of the positive energy they derive from the environment, the chances of suffering from stress-related depression are decreased as well." (study)

Nursery & Garden Industrie Australia"Staff who had plants placed in their offices showed reductions in stress levels and negative feelings of a magnitude of 30 to 60%, while those with no plants recorded increases in stress and negativity of 20 to 40%, over the 3-month test period" (study)

 

Warum macht eine Wandmontage sinn?

Ob Wohnzimmer, Küche oder Balkon, eine Wandbegrünung ist fast überall möglich. Unser Wandbegrünungssystem ist platzsparender als die meisten anderen Bepflanzungsmöglichkeiten und findet durch seine flache Bauweise selbst in kleineren Räumen platz.


 

Einfache Installation

Drei einfache Schritte sind notwendig, um deine persönliche Wandbegrünung zu erstellen:

  • Bohre zwei Löcher an der Stelle in die Wand, an der du den Pflanztopf aufhängen willst. Nutze hierzu die Halterung als Schablone, damit die Löcher an der richtigen Stelle sind. Achte darauf, dass die Halterung nahezu gerade ist.
     
  • Befestige nun die Halterung mit den mitgelieferten Schrauben an der Wand. Je nach Wandmaterial benötigst du eventuell andere Dübel, die du problemlos in jedem Baumarkt erhältst. Nutze die mitgelieferte Mini-Wasserwaage um die Halterung exakt gerade auszurichten.
     
  • Befestige nun den ersten Topf an der Halterung. Wenn du einen weiteren Topf hinzufügen möchten, kannst du einfach die entsprechende Halterung an dem bereits montierten Topf anbringen und dann den nächsten Topf an dieser Halterung aufhängen. Das Video unten zeigt, wie es funktioniert. Das war´s!


     

Design

Form: Das schlichte und unauffällige Design sowie die verdeckt liegende Wandhalterung lässt Leafy dezent im Hintergrund erscheinen und setzt dabei deine Pflanzen perfekt in Szene. 

Funktionen: Das integrierte 500 ml Wasserreservoir sowie der zugehörige Wasserstandsanzeiger bieten dir eine einfache und praktische Möglichkeit dein zu Hause zu begrünen. Um Leafy außen zu nutzen, öffne ganz einfach den Überlauf, so sind deine Pflanzen auch bei starkem Regen vor Staunässe geschützt. 

Bepflanzen: Wir empfehlen dir anstelle von Erde ein mineralisches Pflanzensubstrat zu verwenden, so hältst du den Pflegeaufwand gering und dein zu Hause sauber.

Zukunft: Unsere Umwelt ist uns wichtig! Deswegen nutzen wir für die Herstellung von Leafy hochwertiges Polyprophylen (PP). PP ist einer der meistgenutzten Kunststoffe weltweit:

  • Es ist widerstandsfähig
  • hat eine hohe Nutzungsdauer
  • und ist zu 100% recyclebar.

Was ist enthalten?

Alles was du zum Start benötigst! Jedes einzelne Set enthält:

  • 1 Pflanztopf
  • 1 Halterung
  • 1 Zwischenboden um das Wasserreservoir zu bilden
  • 1 Wasserstandsanzeiger
  • 1 Stopfen um den Überlauf zu verschließen
  • 2 Schrauben mit Dübeln für die Wandmontage

Wir haben insgesamt 5 Perks mit verschiedenen Setgrößen für dich zusammengestellt. Falls dir ein bestimmtes Set fehlt oder du eine größere Anzahl an Leafy-Töpfen haben möchtest kontaktiere und bitte unter: hi@iamleafy.com

Du möchtest Leafy gerne in deinem Laden oder Webshop anbieten? Du möchtest in deiner Firma gerne die gesamte Abteilung begrünen? Bitte kontaktiere uns hierzu unter hi@iamleafy.com
 

Was ist Crowdfunding überhaupt?

Beim Crowdfunding Finanziers du mit deinem Beitrag die Umsetzung eines Projektes bzw. einer Idee. In unserem Fall finanzieren wir durch den Vorverkauf verschiedener Topfsets (genannt „Perks“ , zu finden oben rechts) die Herstellung von Leafy. Hierzu benötigen wir mindestens 109.000€, dies ist die sogenannte „Fundingschwelle“. Die gezahlten Beträge werden gesammelt bis wir die Fundingschwelle erreichen. Erreichen wir diesen Betrag nicht, erhalten alle Unterstützer ihr gesamtes Geld zurück und Leafy wird nicht umgesetzt werden können.

Zur Zeit ist die Unterstützung leider nur per Kreditkarte (Visa, MasterCard, American Express) möglich.
 

Warum wir dich brauchen

Nach 1,5 Jahren Designarbeit, Entwicklung und Prototyping sind wir nun bereit für den nächsten und gleichzeitig wichtigsten Schritt. Hierzu benötigen wir deine Hilfe!
Indem du uns unterstützt, ermöglichst du uns, die ersten Leafy-Pflanztöpfe produzieren zu lassen und so die Basis für eine neue Generation von Wandbegrünung zu schaffen.

Bist du bereit, diesen Schritt mit uns zu gehen? Dann unterstütze unsere Kampagne und teile die Idee mit deiner Familie und deinen Freunden! Du kannst mit nur wenigen Klicks einen großen Beitrag leisten!


 

Zeitstrahl  

Wozu wird das Geld benötigt?

Wir möchten dir einen Überblick geben, wofür wir das Geld nutzen:

Impressionen


 

Oft gestellte Fragen

Was genau bekomme ich bei einer Bestellung?

Ein kleines Set enthält 2 Leafy-Pflanztöpfe, ein mittleres Set enthält 3 Leafy-Pflanztöpfe und ein großes Set enthält 4 Leafy-Pflanztöpfe. Jeder Leafy-Pflanztopf wird mit einer Halterung, einem Zwischenboden, einem Wasserstandsanzeiger, einem Stopfen zum Verschließen des Überlaufs für den Innengebrauch und zwei Schrauben inklusive Dübel zur Montage geliefert. Pro Set erhältst du zudem eine Mini-Wasserwaage um die Halterung exakt ausrichten zu können.

Welche Abmessungen hat Leafy?

Ein einzelner Pflanztopf hat folgende Abmessungen: Höhe 29,5cm x Breite 30,2cm x Tiefe 12,7cm.


Wie funktioniert Leafy?

Montiere die Halterung an der Wand und befestige den ersten Topf an dieser Halterung. Wenn du einen weiteren Topf hinzufügen möchtest, kannst du einfach die entsprechende Halterung an dem bereits montierten Topf befestigen und dann den nächsten Topf an dieser Halterung anbringen.

Wo kann ich Leafy überall verwenden?

Du kannst Leafy fast überall einsetzen: zu Hause, im Garten, im Büro....

Wann beginnt der Versand?

Voraussichtlich Ende 2018.

Was kostet der Versand?

Die Versandkosten innerhalb deutschlands betragen 7 Euro. Außerhalb Deutschlands betragen die Versandkosten 15€ in die EU und 36€ in alle anderen Länder.

Gibt es die Möglichkeit einer Vertriebspartnerschaft?

Natürlich! Melde dich hierzu bitte per Mail unter hi@iamleafy.com bei uns

Gibt es eine Garantie?

Auf jeden Leafy-Pflanztopf gibt es zwei Jahre Garantie.

Wie sieht es mit einer Rückerstattung aus?

Rückerstattungen sind jederzeit während der Crowdfunding-Kampagne über Indiegogo  möglich. Nach Beendigung der Kampagne sende uns bitte eine E-Mail an hi@iamleafy.com, damit wir deine Anfrage zur Rückerstattung bearbeiten können.

Wie sieht es mit einem Umtausch aus?

Wenn du mit deinem Pflanztopf nicht zufrieden bist, kannst du ihn innerhalb von 30 Tagen gegen einen neuen Pflanztopf eintauschen, Versandkosten sind nicht inbegriffen.

An wen kann ich mich wenden, wenn ich weitere Fragen habe?

Wenn du weitere Fragen hast, sende uns bitte eine E-Mail an hi@iamleafy.com

For this we need at least 109.000€, this is the so-called "funding threshold". The amounts paid are collected until we reach the funding threshold. If we do not reach this amount, all supporters will get their entire money back and Leafy will not be able to be implemented.At the moment support is only possible by credit card (for EU: only Visa, MasterCard or American Express). Why we need youAfter 1,5 years of designing, developing and prototyping, we are now ready for the next, and most important step. However, we need your help to do so! By supporting us, you will enable us to produce the first batch of our Leafy pots and build the basis for the next generation of wall greenery.Are you ready to take this step with us? Then support our campaign and share the idea with your family and friends! You can contribute a lot with just a few clicks! Timeline  WHAT´S THE MONEY FORWe would like to give you an overview of what we need the money for:Impressions FAQWhat do i get when i order?A small set contains 2 Leafy pots, a medium set contains 3 Leafy pots, and a large set contains 4 Leafy pots. Each Leafy pot comes with a mount, a separator to form the water reservoir, a water level indicator, a plug to close the spillover for indoor use, and two screws for mounting (dowels are not included).What are the dimensions of Leafy?The dimensions are: height 29,5cm x width 30,2cm x depth 12,7cm.
How does Leafy work?Install the mounting bracket to the wall and attach the first pot to the bracket. If you want to add another pot, you can simply attach the corresponding bracket to the already mounted pot and then attach the next pot to this bracket.Where can I use Leafy?You can use Leafy nearly everywhere: at home, in your garden, your Office…When does shipping begin?End of 2018.How much is shipping?Shipping costs 7€ to Germany, 15€ to the rest of EU and 36€ to everywhere else.Is there the possibility for a distribution partnership?Of course! Please contact: hi@iamleafy.comDo I have to pay VAT / GST?Yes, when you live outside the EUIs there a warranty?Every Leafy pot comes with a two-year warranty.What is your refund policy?Refunds are available through Indiegogo at any time during the crowdfunding campaign. After the campaign ends, you will need to email us at hi@iamleafy.com for refunds on a case-by-case basis.What is your return / exchange policy?If you are not satisfied with your product you may exchange it for a new one within 30 days, shipping & handling fees are not included.How can I choose more rewards?You need to make a new contribution for each perk.If I have other questions, who should I contact?If you have any other question, please send an email to hi@iamleafy.comHi, ich bin Leafy!Leafy ist ein modularer Blumentopf mit dem du schnell und unkompliziert verschiedenste Arten von Wandbegrünungen realisieren kannst, egal ob im Innen- oder Außenbereich.Warum Leafy?Die meisten auf  dem Markt erhältlichen Begrünungssysteme sind unhandlich, aufwendig zu installieren, teuer oder nicht problemlos erweiterbar.Mit Leafy haben wir diese Probleme gelöst: Du benötigst nur zwei Schrauben, um den ersten Leafy-Pflanztopf an deiner Wand zu befestigen. An diesem Topf kannst bis zu 3 weitere Töpfe anbringen - ganz einfach und ohne zu bohren. Dank des integrierten Wassertanks sind deine Pflanzen bis zu 3 Wochen mit Wasser versorgt. Noch nie war die Begrünung von Wänden so einfach - mit Leafy. Wozu dient eine Begrünung?Pflanzen haben einen erheblichen Einfluss auf deine Gesundheit und dein Leben:
Sie wirken entspannend und stressmindernd
steigern deine Leistung und Konzentration
und machen glücklich
Sie haben zudem nachweislichen Einfluss auf ihre Umwelt:
Sie filtern Schadstoffe aus der Raumluft
binden Kohlendioxid
produzieren Sauerstoff
und erhöhen die Luftfeuchtigkeit
Die folgenden Studien belegen unsere Argumente:NASAPlants can remove toxins from the air - up to 87 percent of volatile organic compounds every 24 hours (NASA research)Texas A&M University"People who keep flowers in their home feel happier, less stressed and more relaxed. As a result of the positive energy they derive from the environment, the chances of suffering from stress-related depression are decreased as well." (study)Nursery & Garden Industrie Australia"Staff who had plants placed in their offices showed reductions in stress levels and negative feelings of a magnitude of 30 to 60%, while those with no plants recorded increases in stress and negativity of 20 to 40%, over the 3-month test period" (study) Warum macht eine Wandmontage sinn?Ob Wohnzimmer, Küche oder Balkon, eine Wandbegrünung ist fast überall möglich. Unser Wandbegrünungssystem ist platzsparender als die meisten anderen Bepflanzungsmöglichkeiten und findet durch seine flache Bauweise selbst in kleineren Räumen platz. Einfache InstallationDrei einfache Schritte sind notwendig, um deine persönliche Wandbegrünung zu erstellen:
Bohre zwei Löcher an der Stelle in die Wand, an der du den Pflanztopf aufhängen willst. Nutze hierzu die Halterung als Schablone, damit die Löcher an der richtigen Stelle sind. Achte darauf, dass die Halterung nahezu gerade ist. 
Befestige nun die Halterung mit den mitgelieferten Schrauben an der Wand. Je nach Wandmaterial benötigst du eventuell andere Dübel, die du problemlos in jedem Baumarkt erhältst. Nutze die mitgelieferte Mini-Wasserwaage um die Halterung exakt gerade auszurichten. 

Befestige nun den ersten Topf an der Halterung. Wenn du einen weiteren Topf hinzufügen möchten, kannst du einfach die entsprechende Halterung an dem bereits montierten Topf anbringen und dann den nächsten Topf an dieser Halterung aufhängen. Das Video unten zeigt, wie es funktioniert. Das war´s!
 

DesignForm: Das schlichte und unauffällige Design sowie die verdeckt liegende Wandhalterung lässt Leafy dezent im Hintergrund erscheinen und setzt dabei deine Pflanzen perfekt in Szene. Funktionen: Das integrierte 500 ml Wasserreservoir sowie der zugehörige Wasserstandsanzeiger bieten dir eine einfache und praktische Möglichkeit dein zu Hause zu begrünen. Um Leafy außen zu nutzen, öffne ganz einfach den Überlauf, so sind deine Pflanzen auch bei starkem Regen vor Staunässe geschützt. Bepflanzen: Wir empfehlen dir anstelle von Erde ein mineralisches Pflanzensubstrat zu verwenden, so hältst du den Pflegeaufwand gering und dein zu Hause sauber.Zukunft: Unsere Umwelt ist uns wichtig! Deswegen nutzen wir für die Herstellung von Leafy hochwertiges Polyprophylen (PP). PP ist einer der meistgenutzten Kunststoffe weltweit:
Es ist widerstandsfähig

hat eine hohe Nutzungsdauer

und ist zu 100% recyclebar.
Was ist enthalten?Alles was du zum Start benötigst! Jedes einzelne Set enthält:
1 Pflanztopf
1 Halterung
1 Zwischenboden um das Wasserreservoir zu bilden
1 Wasserstandsanzeiger
1 Stopfen um den Überlauf zu verschließen
2 Schrauben mit Dübeln für die Wandmontage
Wir haben insgesamt 5 Perks mit verschiedenen Setgrößen für dich zusammengestellt. Falls dir ein bestimmtes Set fehlt oder du eine größere Anzahl an Leafy-Töpfen haben möchtest kontaktiere und bitte unter: hi@iamleafy.comDu möchtest Leafy gerne in deinem Laden oder Webshop anbieten? Du möchtest in deiner Firma gerne die gesamte Abteilung begrünen? Bitte kontaktiere uns hierzu unter hi@iamleafy.com Was ist Crowdfunding überhaupt?Beim Crowdfunding Finanziers du mit deinem Beitrag die Umsetzung eines Projektes bzw. einer Idee. In unserem Fall finanzieren wir durch den Vorverkauf verschiedener Topfsets (genannt „Perks“ , zu finden oben rechts) die Herstellung von Leafy. Hierzu benötigen wir mindestens 109.000€, dies ist die sogenannte „Fundingschwelle“. Die gezahlten Beträge werden gesammelt bis wir die Fundingschwelle erreichen. Erreichen wir diesen Betrag nicht, erhalten alle Unterstützer ihr gesamtes Geld zurück und Leafy wird nicht umgesetzt werden können.Zur Zeit ist die Unterstützung leider nur per Kreditkarte (Visa, MasterCard, American Express) möglich. Warum wir dich brauchenNach 1,5 Jahren Designarbeit, Entwicklung und Prototyping sind wir nun bereit für den nächsten und gleichzeitig wichtigsten Schritt. Hierzu benötigen wir deine Hilfe!Indem du uns unterstützt, ermöglichst du uns, die ersten Leafy-Pflanztöpfe produzieren zu lassen und so die Basis für eine neue Generation von Wandbegrünung zu schaffen.Bist du bereit, diesen Schritt mit uns zu gehen? Dann unterstütze unsere Kampagne und teile die Idee mit deiner Familie und deinen Freunden! Du kannst mit nur wenigen Klicks einen großen Beitrag leisten! Zeitstrahl  Wozu wird das Geld benötigt?Wir möchten dir einen Überblick geben, wofür wir das Geld nutzen:Impressionen Oft gestellte FragenWas genau bekomme ich bei einer Bestellung?Ein kleines Set enthält 2 Leafy-Pflanztöpfe, ein mittleres Set enthält 3 Leafy-Pflanztöpfe und ein großes Set enthält 4 Leafy-Pflanztöpfe. Jeder Leafy-Pflanztopf wird mit einer Halterung, einem Zwischenboden, einem Wasserstandsanzeiger, einem Stopfen zum Verschließen des Überlaufs für den Innengebrauch und zwei Schrauben inklusive Dübel zur Montage geliefert. Pro Set erhältst du zudem eine Mini-Wasserwaage um die Halterung exakt ausrichten zu können.Welche Abmessungen hat Leafy?Ein einzelner Pflanztopf hat folgende Abmessungen: Höhe 29,5cm x Breite 30,2cm x Tiefe 12,7cm.
Wie funktioniert Leafy?Montiere die Halterung an der Wand und befestige den ersten Topf an dieser Halterung. Wenn du einen weiteren Topf hinzufügen möchtest, kannst du einfach die entsprechende Halterung an dem bereits montierten Topf befestigen und dann den nächsten Topf an dieser Halterung anbringen.Wo kann ich Leafy überall verwenden?Du kannst Leafy fast überall einsetzen: zu Hause, im Garten, im Büro....Wann beginnt der Versand?Voraussichtlich Ende 2018.Was kostet der Versand?Die Versandkosten innerhalb deutschlands betragen 7 Euro. Außerhalb Deutschlands betragen die Versandkosten 15€ in die EU und 36€ in alle anderen Länder.Gibt es die Möglichkeit einer Vertriebspartnerschaft?Natürlich! Melde dich hierzu bitte per Mail unter hi@iamleafy.com bei unsGibt es eine Garantie?Auf jeden Leafy-Pflanztopf gibt es zwei Jahre Garantie.Wie sieht es mit einer Rückerstattung aus?Rückerstattungen sind jederzeit während der Crowdfunding-Kampagne über Indiegogo  möglich. Nach Beendigung der Kampagne sende uns bitte eine E-Mail an hi@iamleafy.com, damit wir deine Anfrage zur Rückerstattung bearbeiten können.Wie sieht es mit einem Umtausch aus?Wenn du mit deinem Pflanztopf nicht zufrieden bist, kannst du ihn innerhalb von 30 Tagen gegen einen neuen Pflanztopf eintauschen, Versandkosten sind nicht inbegriffen.An wen kann ich mich wenden, wenn ich weitere Fragen habe?Wenn du weitere Fragen hast, sende uns bitte eine E-Mail an hi@iamleafy.com

story:
THE PROBLEM

 

55% of housing in Puerto Rico is informally constructed.  

 

Safe and secure housing is not economically accessible to most in the island: 

 

Think about it, if you earn 20K a year, you have less than 2K a month to pay for your food, electricity, water, car on top of your mortgage. This is not OK. 

We believe security should not be a matter of income. 

 

OUR SOLUTION: 

HiveCube focuses on manufacturing homes in Puerto Rico utilizing shipping containers as a base structure.

 

The use of shipping containers allows us to build hurricane resistant homes, cut construction time to less than three months and generate jobs in Puerto Rico.

 

 

 

The Impact

We propose an economic solution that can be built fast and, most importantly, right for the community and the environment. This revolutionary concept will help revitalize the local economy and provide more than an option; a solution in the local market.

 

 

Our sustainable homes are prefabricated to be fully off-grid using solar energy and rainwater collection and distribution systems, as well as  gray and black water treatment systems that use plant and bacteria based technology. We also include options for efficient and space conscious bedroom furniture and a fully equipped ADA accessible bathroom.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

 

Manufacturing problems – Manufacturing can require a lot of expensive trial and error, with cost of materials and availability of essential tools changing regularly. This is why we've built in a large margin for error into our crowdfunding goal. To make sure that our suppliers meet the demands. 

 

Design flaws – While we have gone to every effort to predict how our homes will work in the real world, the reality is, we're Kickstarting this because it's never been seen before. That means that unpredictable problems with the design will likely come up. There is a risk, that one of these could be problematic, however, by using the most advanced computer-aided design techniques, we've minimized this risk to the level that any company can. We've worked through many issues before and don't plan on stopping if we hit a road bump. We will always keep you updated of new developments. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Volunteer!

Volunteering gives you a way to actively contribute to sustainable development and help build your community. With your help we can improve and transform neighborhoods while helping families gain the independence and stability they need to rebuild their lives.

story:
The CoffeeClip, Spoontula, and TeableSpoon XL6 are three multi-tools with teaspoon and tablespoon measurements incorporated into each product, designed to eliminate the need for extra utensils while cooking.

After a successful campaign with the TeableSpoon XL, we are so excited to bring you the TeableSpoon XL6 with a slimmer, streamlined design.

With the CoffeeClip, Spoontula, and TeableSpoon XL6, you’ll save time cooking, simplify your kitchen, and make cooking a more enjoyable and seamless experience!

 

The CoffeeClip conveniently doubles as a coffee scoop to seal and measure your coffee with just one tool. Equipped with one teaspoon and one tablespoon, CoffeeClip is perfect for measuring out your coffee, sugar, or other bagged goods.

The writing for the measurements is not written in ink. It is part of the injection mold and will never fade.

The CoffeeClip fits into most spice jars too!

Measure, mix and flip!

Baking has never been easier with the Spoontula. This all-in-one measuring spoon and spatula is the perfect tool for measuring, mixing, wiping and flipping.

The durable silicone head features a flexible curved edge to scrape bowls clean, while the wooden handle  creates rigidity for thick batters and doughs. Spoontula’s handle provides a comfortable grip, making it perfect for mixing, folding, serving, spreading, scraping and flipping.

 

With the updated TeableSpoon XL6, you can portion out pasta, measure spices, and stir sauces or soups, all with one spoon. TeableSpoon’s handle has a hole for measuring one serving of pasta, and is for convenient hanging in any space – big or small.

With TeableSpoon XL6, you’ll only need one measuring and stirring spoon for most recipes. Reduce the time spent searching for different tools and cleaning up!

 

The CoffeeClip, Spoontula and TeableSpoon XL6 are made with strong, durable materials to bring you the highest quality cookware.

The CoffeeClip is top-rack dishwasher safe and the Spoontula is dishwasher-safe for easy cleaning. Additionally, Spoontula’s soft-touch silicone will not scratch cast iron or nonstick pans.

 

The CoffeeClip, Spoontula and TeableSpoon XL6 have been over two years years in the making. I’ve put in countless hours researching, designing and testing to achieve the perfect products that are strong and long-lasting, as well as functional. I knew that I needed to find the highest-quality products and design techniques to bring the CoffeeClip, Spoontula and TeableSpoon XL6 to life.

The CoffeeClip is made of polypropylene (number 5 recyclable plastic) to ensure that it is long-lasting, and it is injection molded to keep its shape and to keep the writing from fading.

The head of the Spoontula is also injection molded and is made from food-grade silicone. I crafted the handle from hardwood, and it is laser engraved to prevent the writing from fading.

The TeableSpoon XL6 is designed with hardwood and is laser engraved. It is CNC machined to ensure true quality.

story:
Featured on

 

Sugar device is a revolutionary tool to control AC Voltage applications,With beautiful design ,and simple connection and control,Sugar is the best tool for a wide range of users such as makers,engineers,students and teachers to learn and build different AC voltage applications projects.

Working with AC voltage is very dangerous, connecting AC wire inappropriately may cause electrical shock which could cause death in the worst case.

To make it more safe and easy for everyone to control AC voltage application,we designed Sugar to feature an unique mechanical case,offering full protection for the users.

 

Sugar can control AC Voltage in 2 different ways:

  1. As an ON-OFF switch, you can for example turn on/off  an AC  lamp.
  2. As an AC output voltage Control  applications of sugar includes  AC Dimmer,AC Motor speed control,AC Heaters temperature control and more.

 

 Sugar device Hardware

 

 

 

 Sugar device Features 

 

 

                           

 

  • Sugar device works with 110V and 220V,sugar also  comes with an internal AC-DC power circuit to power the controlling Circuit inside Sugar device.
  • Sugar works with 50Hz and 60Hz as well,this is an important feature for AC output control for an applications like AC dimmer Lamp.
  • With it's protection case,Sugar offers a full protection from high voltage components and makes it easy for  everyone to build their own projects.

 

                              

  • To control Sugar device all you need to do is to connect it with your development platforms using RJ12 cable,no need to worry about faults like short circuit any more.
  • To control Sugar device , you need to send PWM (Pulse width modulation) from your development platforms, that's make controlling AC Voltage so simple and easy to integrate with any development platforms (Arduino,Raspberry pi,Ti,etc).
  • The data signal can be either 3.3V or 5V so you can control it from 3.3V development platforms like Raspberry Pi or from 5V development platforms like Arduino Uno,Mega .. etc.

                                    

 

  • Sugar device works with many AC applications such as,AC lamps,dimmer lamps,AC induction motors,AC water heater,AC wall adapter and more.

Meet the Sugar device family

Sugar device comes with 2 different types to meet different project requirements:

  • Sugar 300 : With white color,can control up to 300W,ideal for beginners and educational purpose.
  • Sugar 1000 : With black color , can control Up to 1000W,ideal for makers  and professional with advance applications
     

         

 

 

Sugar is designed for :

 

 

Sugar  is made for everyone! Educational institute , college students, hobbyists, teachers, instructors , working professional, engineers or anybody who loves building and developing DIY projects , Sugar is an ideal tool for  creative projects , it is cost effective but most importantly it keeps you safe.

 

 

Sugar works with many electronics development platforms

                      

              

See how Sugar control AC Lamp and control it in different way .

                            
 
 
                             

 

Sugar can  easily work  with your favorite platforms and create many useful projects .

for more easy to connect , we designed a RJ Connector breakout which allow you to connect Sugar easily with your Development platform,we will provide it in all the kits we will offer it here.

Perks

 

 

 

Meet the Sugar team

 

 

Sugar is a fruit of cooperation with Fablab dynamic - Taipei - Taiwan,they offered for us a free space to work,equipments,3D printers,developers we need for our project,component suppliers and manufacture in Taiwan.

                                          

 

     

 

 

Sugar is a project  built to be an easy tool to control AC Voltage for everyone, Before Sugar, Controlling AC voltage application was very dangerous,and it was  not easy to control the  AC output voltage control for advance applications like AC Lamp dimmer,AC induction motors , PID Controller for AC Heater temperature control.

 

Sugar took a long time to move form a concept,to its first prototype,and finally the final prototype,We tested many applications and using different platforms to ensure that Sugar is safe,practical and easy for everyone to use.

 

 

Sugar become a real device,working prototype is ready and we contacted with our manufacturing partners For PCB fabrication & assembling, molding to prepare the manufacturing process and time estimation for that, we are ready to move to Mass production.

 

We need your help and support to move to mass production and offer sugar to everyone to improve their projects , simplify the electronics education and improve electronics project based on AC Voltage applications 

With Your support we can provide more  tutorials , projects for sugar device , and offer full  support for different development platforms 

Shipping

 

for all Sugar kits,we will ensure that every perks shipment will provide a tracking number and contact with all our backers to confirms the addresses and let them Know when we will ship it and track it.

 

Follow us on our social networks accounts

               

 

FAQ:

  1. is sugar works with 3.3V development boards like arduino Due and raspberry pi ?
    yes , sugar compatable with 3.3V Or 5V development boards.

  2. is sugar need any external DC power supply to power on ?
    No, Sugar contains internal AC-DC Converter to power on the Controller circuit inside sugar.
  3. what is the dimensions of Sugar devices
    150 x 120 x47 mm.
  4. How can I know of my developments boards can control Sugar devices ?
    ​any development boards have PWM pins output can control Sugar, so wide range of development boards support PWM like Arduino boards, Raspberry pi , and more.
  5. Can I connect and control Sugar using Bluetooth or WiFi module ?
    Yes you can , for example esp8266 can directly control Sugar device , esp8266 have PWM output with Frequency of 1KHz, which can control Sugar easily.
  6. Where are the software and tutorials  files available?
    You can see our tutorial from our website directly Here  and see how to connect and control sugar device, and soon we will upload all the code files to Github. 
  7. Can sugar take an input of 110V and give an output of 220V ?
    once sugar is a device to control AC Voltage , sugar is unable to work as a step up device from 110V to 220V. 
  8. I have some problems in checkout process ?
    for any help please don't hesitate to send to us SugarWorldteam@gmail.com and contact with us on our Facebook account.

With it's protection case,Sugar offers a full protection from high voltage components and makes it easy for  everyone to build their own projects.
                               
To control Sugar device all you need to do is to connect it with your development platforms using RJ12 cable,no need to worry about faults like short circuit any more.
To control Sugar device , you need to send PWM (Pulse width modulation) from your development platforms, that's make controlling AC Voltage so simple and easy to integrate with any development platforms (Arduino,Raspberry pi,Ti,etc).
The data signal can be either 3.3V or 5V so you can control it from 3.3V development platforms like Raspberry Pi or from 5V development platforms like Arduino Uno,Mega .. etc.
                                     Sugar device works with many AC applications such as,AC lamps,dimmer lamps,AC induction motors,AC water heater,AC wall adapter and more.Meet the Sugar device familySugar device comes with 2 different types to meet different project requirements:

Sugar 300 : With white color,can control up to 300W,ideal for beginners and educational purpose.

Sugar 1000 : With black color , can control Up to 1000W,ideal for makers  and professional with advance applications 
           Sugar is designed for :  Sugar  is made for everyone! Educational institute , college students, hobbyists, teachers, instructors , working professional, engineers or anybody who loves building and developing DIY projects , Sugar is an ideal tool for  creative projects , it is cost effective but most importantly it keeps you safe.  Sugar works with many electronics development platforms                      
              
See how Sugar control AC Lamp and control it in different way .
                            

 
 

                             

 

Sugar can  easily work  with your favorite platforms and create many useful projects .for more easy to connect , we designed a RJ Connector breakout which allow you to connect Sugar easily with your Development platform,we will provide it in all the kits we will offer it here.Perks  
 Meet the Sugar team  Sugar is a fruit of cooperation with Fablab dynamic - Taipei - Taiwan,they offered for us a free space to work,equipments,3D printers,developers we need for our project,component suppliers and manufacture in Taiwan.                                          
        Sugar is a project  built to be an easy tool to control AC Voltage for everyone, Before Sugar, Controlling AC voltage application was very dangerous,and it was  not easy to control the  AC output voltage control for advance applications like AC Lamp dimmer,AC induction motors , PID Controller for AC Heater temperature control. Sugar took a long time to move form a concept,to its first prototype,and finally the final prototype,We tested many applications and using different platforms to ensure that Sugar is safe,practical and easy for everyone to use.  Sugar become a real device,working prototype is ready and we contacted with our manufacturing partners For PCB fabrication & assembling, molding to prepare the manufacturing process and time estimation for that, we are ready to move to Mass production. We need your help and support to move to mass production and offer sugar to everyone to improve their projects , simplify the electronics education and improve electronics project based on AC Voltage applications With Your support we can provide more  tutorials , projects for sugar device , and offer full  support for different development platforms Shipping for all Sugar kits,we will ensure that every perks shipment will provide a tracking number and contact with all our backers to confirms the addresses and let them Know when we will ship it and track it. Follow us on our social networks accounts                FAQ:
is sugar works with 3.3V development boards like arduino Due and raspberry pi ?yes , sugar compatable with 3.3V Or 5V development boards.

is sugar need any external DC power supply to power on ?No, Sugar contains internal AC-DC Converter to power on the Controller circuit inside sugar.

what is the dimensions of Sugar devices150 x 120 x47 mm.

How can I know of my developments boards can control Sugar devices ?​any development boards have PWM pins output can control Sugar, so wide range of development boards support PWM like Arduino boards, Raspberry pi , and more.

Can I connect and control Sugar using Bluetooth or WiFi module ?Yes you can , for example esp8266 can directly control Sugar device , esp8266 have PWM output with Frequency of 1KHz, which can control Sugar easily.

Where are the software and tutorials  files available?You can see our tutorial from our website directly Here  and see how to connect and control sugar device, and soon we will upload all the code files to Github. 

Can sugar take an input of 110V and give an output of 220V ?once sugar is a device to control AC Voltage , sugar is unable to work as a step up device from 110V to 220V. 

I have some problems in checkout process ?for any help please don't hesitate to send to us SugarWorldteam@gmail.com and contact with us on our Facebook account.

story:
Flip Flop Spatula

We have designed a new flip flop product. The Flip Flop Spatula. We have taken this product through the design and prototyping phase and need your help to bring this project to life.

  • All About Flip Flops is the largest community of flip flop lovers in the world.
  • The Flip Flop Spatula is a new product that we will sell online and in retails stores nationwide.
  • You will be part of this exciting new product launch!

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need $15,000 to create the mold for this product and create our first 10,000 units (2500 each of four colors).
  • We will send you a set of 4 spatulas (one of each color) once production is complete for you to use and share.
  • If we do not reach our goal we will be subsidizing this project out of our own pocket to the best of our ability.
  • Thank you for your consideration of the exciting product launch from All About Flip Flops!
  • Visit our website at www.allaboutflipflops.com to learn more.

story:
Super Strong Adsorption

If you found the critical problem of existing suction bowls, it must be an adsorption issue. Once the bowl is tipped over, your baby loses a chance to learn self-feeding. So... Still looking for baby bowls with SUPER SUCTION?? You are so lucky that you met ICEMY :):):) The suction cup at the bottom prevents ICEMY from sliding or flipping over. Now you see how strong the suction is. ↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓↓

The super suction cup was created after numerous trials in forming the best geometrical design. It attaches not only onto glass but also plastic and even wood. It’s great for using them on highchairs or tables.

 

 

Does my baby really need their own bowl?

☞ Absolutely, YES!!

Teaching self-feeding is very important. By six months of age, most infants will have developed sufficient motor skills to be able to feed themselves rather than needing to be spoon-fed by an adult (Daniels, L. et al., 2015). In 2002, the World Health Organization (WHO) recommends that the best age for starting complementary feeding should be at six months. The majority of babies who were able to self-feed with a spoon at an earlier age (9-11 months) had higher intake of energy, macronutrients, thiamin, vitamin B-6, magnesium, and zinc in comparison than those who did not (Carruth, B. R. et al., 2004). Therefore, your six month old baby should have a bowl and spoon of their own.

 

 

Then, does the bowl must have suction cup?

☞ For your baby's better growth, SURE. 

It MUST!!

The most frustrating part of self-feeding training that occurs too many times is when bowls are tipped over or thrown. Once the bowl is flipped over, your baby loses a chance to learn self-feeding.  Do not miss the valuable opportunity to learn self-feeding. ICEMY will be a tool for your child to work towards mastering the skill of feeding themselves.


References
Carruth, B. R. et al. (2004). Developmental Milestones and Self-Feeding Behaviors in Infants and Toddlers. The American Dietetic Association, 104, 1.
Daniels, L. et al. (2015). Baby-Led Introduction to SolidS (BLISS) study: a randomised controlled trial of a baby-led approach to complementary feeding. BMC Pediatrics, 15, 179.
World Health Organization (WHO) (2005). Guiding principles for feeding non-breastfed children 6-24 months of age. Geneva: World Health Organization, pp. 1-40.

 

 

For Better Growth

ICEMY helps parents introduce their baby to solid foods during the baby-led weaning stage. After the baby-led weaning stage, they will be able to transition to self-feeding.

With ICEMY, encourage your baby to learn to eat on their own for better growth.

 

 

The Most Thoughtful and Optimized Design

 

 

Baby Safe Material

ICEMY is crafted from 100% FDA approved silicone which is free of BPAs, PVCs, Phthalates, and leads and contains no harmful chemicals.
You don't need to worry even if your baby puts the spoon in their mouth for a long time.
Also, it never leaves an odor or taste on the food.

 

 

Convenience

After mealtime, just clean ICEMY with soap and water or directly place it on the top rack of the dishwasher. You can disinfect ICEMY by putting it in boiling water. ICEMY is microwave safe and freezer safe.

 

 

Specification

 

 

Colors

 

 

Rewards

 

 

Timeline

 

 

Research & Survey

A lot of time was spent doing research and surveys for this new product. We not only analyzed the needs and responsibilities of parents, but also other products that are on the market. In doing so, we noticed a repetitive pattern of parents having to put a lot effort into mealtime with their infants to prevent messes. Parents need a bowl that their child can use and know they don’t need to worry about having a big mess. Therefore, we took the time to survey other suction bowls and learned that many of them have a weak absorption power.

With all of this in mind, we constructed a new design for the suction cup. This will lead to a stronger hold in comparison to the other products on the market. Apart from the silicone bowl, we also designed a silicone spoon to make eating time a fun and safe learning experience.

More than anything, we want parents to have a relax and enjoyable time having mealtime with their infant. For these reasons, ICEMY is the ideal choice for you and your child.

 

 

Partnership & Future Process

We have been in contact with many factories and partners to supply ICEMY. We have evaluated their manufacturing, processing, and stability skills. We are confident that with our strict criteria we will be able to offer high quality products. It is important to us to have an active conversation with our supplier and factory to a safeguard for production and the delivery process. Our suppliers and factory partners as standing by ready to have this product go into production. We will keep our supporters updated throughout the process when the project is launched.
