story:
Smart, Affordable and Elegant.  The Firefly Outdoor Smart Light is the right package for your outdoor lighting needs.  With 16 million colors to choose from, you can change the light to any color for any special occasions or mood.

 

Weather Proof

Our smart light system is completely weather proof with IP 65 rated lighting enclosure and waterproof power connector ensuring the safety of the system.  The power supply has an output of 12V and 48watt.  Each connector has an outer protective cap with a silicone o-ring inside.

 

16 million colors

With the 8 watt RGB led chip inside, you can choose up to 16 million colors with one touch.  The five preset button lets you change to the same color every time.

 

 

Smart Phone Control

IFTTT Comptaibility

Firefly Light uses wi-fi based controller and therefore a hub is not required.  Our app lets you create custom lighting sequence.  It can also be control remotely with your cloud account.  It is compatible with Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant and IFTTT for more advanced control.  You can have the lights on automatically at sunset and turn it back off at sunrise or if you want to change the light color based on triggered event.  They can all be accomplished.

 

Amazon Alexa Voice Command

 

 

Firefly Light vs. Philips Hue Spot Lily

Firefly Light offers more vivid and brighter colored lighting and can easily control the light intensity. 

 

Three Lighting Fixtures tailored to all outdoor lighting need

 

Pathway Light

For path and deck lighting.  Perfect for mood creation and ground lighting

 

Spot Light_A

Suitable for all general needs with wide spread spot lighting.  Ideal for lighting up your house and close objects.

 

Spot Light_B

Focused Lens for object oriented lighting with concentrated beam.  Best for taller or distanced object

story:
A Motor Rescue Project
Gone Terribly Wrong Well

People like many things. Cars. Coffee. Climbing. Watches.

I like electric motors. They can be found in almost every electric device and I take out every single one from every device after it dies (or even sooner).

One fine day I decided to reuse some of them. I decided to make an insanely common thing with a slight twist. This is what happened.

The Clock

Chaotic-Tock is a clock. It shows time, just like any other clock in the world. It does that using numbers and hands.

Unlike any other clock in the world, its numbers are shuffled randomly but its hands are fixed. Two motors move huge gears with numbers around in a rather odd manner. Reading the time is still very simple - the hands point to the current hour and minute just like they do on any clock.


This is a new, witty and funny version of something that's been around since the beginning of time. It looks sleek and elegant and makes your brains tingle. It also makes your mouth smile while watching others struggle with it.

It's a big thing: 35 cm wide x 29 cm high and about 5cm thick (that's about 14 x 12 x 2 inches). If you plan to mount it on a wall, the holes are exactly 300mm apart (11 13/16 in).

The Team

We are Damogran Labs, a young startup company from Slovenia. There's us, the two brothers - mechanical and electrical engineer, a designer and a marketing guy.

Chaotic-Tock is one of the projects we have been working on for the last 3 years. We have other cool projects, but this is the most evolved and we chose it to start our business.

The Deal

It's all very simple on your side. Here are your options:

  • €2: Chaotic Contributor.
    Thank you for supporting us and all the pleasant chaos we are about to unleash upon the world with the clock. Your name will be listed in an online memorial page. Forever.
  • €25: A T-Shirt.
    You get this cool T-shirt with a precise drawing of the planet Damogran and its orbit around something. You won't only look supercool wearing it, you'll also be a part of our story with this project and others as well.

  • €100: An Early Bird!*
    Get your own Chaotic-Tock at a special, early bird price. Only the first 20 contributors get this price!
  • €140: A Chaotic-Tock.*
    A very, truly yours Chaotic-Tock, assembled by hand and with love in Damogran Labs, Slovenia. You can choose the color as well!
  • €180: A Customized Chaotic-Tock.*
    There is a certain degree of freedom when cutting base plate and gears. We'll do it for you for a little extra gravy - check out the customization page on the site!

Here on our side, it's a bit more complicated. We need your support to prepare Chaotic-Tock for mass production and there are other expenses as well:

  • Have budget for larger orders of plexiglass and other materials. That would make our product cheaper.
  • Pay-it-back. We've been doing everything with almost no budget whatsoever. We were lucky to have people around us that were willing to do their awesome part for free. If this campaign is successful, we have unwritten obligations to reward their effort and pay for their expenses.
  • Buy our own tools. We do everything without even the most basic tools like a multimeter or oscilloscope. We don't even have a decent camera to make pictures of our products - we had to borrow one to share Chaotic-Tock with you.


The Risky Bits

Our chaotic-prototype has been running since the beginning of May 2015 and is still turning very happily.
That said, there's not many things that could wrong to prevent you from getting what you crave. There could be a delay if we somehow got too many orders, but that's just a delay - it wears out sooner or later.

The Timeline

There is no timeline. You get your rewards a month after a successful campaign. It couldn't get much simpler.

OK, OK, if you really want a timeline, it's something like this:

  • August 17: Campaign starts
  • September 30: campaign ends
  • October 31: your reward is on the way.


Frequently Asked Questions

  • Do you use old motors in every new clock?
    No. We only used salvaged motors in the first, wooden prototype. The new clocks use a pair of new, more reliable and very common stepper motors.
  • Can I power this clock with batteries?
    No way! You would have to change them at least once a week. The clock comes with a 3m long white cable. The cable plugs in on the back side of the clock which means it can be totally invisible if properly installed.
  • How do you set the time?
    That's what the three buttons labeled H M C are for. For more info, check the user manual on the official website. In the future, we have plans to make it radio controlled, but that wouldn't work everywhere in the world.

Enough Chaos Already?

If you like the Chaotic-Tock but for some reason won't participate in this campaign, please feel free to share it among your friends and people that might be interested.

You might even dislike it! But we would never believe such a nonsense.

Video: APK, Klemen Premrl

story:
We have temporarily withdrawn our campaign

We are taking a break to make some important adjustments and hope to relaunch in the near future.

We have refunded all our backers and thank each and every one of you for your support! It's been truly humbling to have such a fantastic group of supporters.

Stay tuned, we'll be back soon!

story:
Brother and Sister Team Up

We received our first shipment of Go Green Grill Brushes on Dec. 12th and launched at local non-profit festival to raise money for Deck the Chairs, sponsored by Beaches Go Green.

The reason we created this campaign is to fill the pipeline before we launch on Amazon. We are approved to sell but don't have enough inventory to ship to fulfillment centers. It is on the way.

The worst thing that could happen is if the demand exceeds our available inventory. 

We are listing GoGreenGrillBrush on TheGrommet.com, which is owned by ACE Hardware. We have product being sold at a few of the 5,100 ACE Hardware stores, globally.

Who we are and why are we doing this:

  • Everette Brown and his sister, Teresa have been in the food service business for many years. Everette builds roads, clears land and builds houses.
  • His company paid for his passion, grilling out. He competed in BBQ cook-off competitions until the 2008 crash.  
  •  

What We Need & What You Get

100% of the money we raise goes to manufacturing our next order:

  • We are seeking $25,000 to finance 50,000 Go Green Grill Brushes. Everette financed the first 25,000 brushes which will be here mid-February 2020.
  • Since we are offering terms to major retailers we have to place another order before we get paid for the first 25,000.
  • We most likely will have to run another campaign and order 100,000 brushes.

No Environmental Downsides

The only comparable wood scrapers are made from cutting down a tree and shaping it into a piece of wood that requires hours of burning grooves. They cost a minimum of $8 with many over $30.

  • Bamboo is Good for the Planet. No tree has to die. 

No Risks

We will have inventory to send for perks. Our Goal is building up our inventory for the expected demand.

  • Bamboo is native to China and the entire project has to be made at the source of the most abundant wood resource on the planet. 

Production Video

If you don't grill out you probably know people who do who would appreciate hearing about this unique grilling accessory.

Please share this offering on Social Media.

  • You can use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.
story_txt:
Brother and Sister Team Up

We received our first shipment of Go Green Grill Brushes on Dec. 12th and launched at local non-profit festival to raise money for Deck the Chairs, sponsored by Beaches Go Green.

The reason we created this campaign is to fill the pipeline before we launch on Amazon. We are approved to sell but don't have enough inventory to ship to fulfillment centers. It is on the way.
The worst thing that could happen is if the demand exceeds our available inventory. 
We are listing GoGreenGrillBrush on TheGrommet.com, which is owned by ACE Hardware. We have product being sold at a few of the 5,100 ACE Hardware stores, globally.

Who we are and why are we doing this:

Everette Brown and his sister, Teresa have been in the food service business for many years. Everette builds roads, clears land and builds houses.
His company paid for his passion, grilling out. He competed in BBQ cook-off competitions until the 2008 crash.  
 


What We Need & What You Get
100% of the money we raise goes to manufacturing our next order:

We are seeking $25,000 to finance 50,000 Go Green Grill Brushes. Everette financed the first 25,000 brushes which will be here mid-February 2020.
Since we are offering terms to major retailers we have to place another order before we get paid for the first 25,000.
We most likely will have to run another campaign and order 100,000 brushes.


No Environmental Downsides
The only comparable wood scrapers are made from cutting down a tree and shaping it into a piece of wood that requires hours of burning grooves. They cost a minimum of $8 with many over $30.
Bamboo is Good for the Planet. No tree has to die. 

No Risks
We will have inventory to send for perks. Our Goal is building up our inventory for the expected demand.
Bamboo is native to China and the entire project has to be made at the source of the most abundant wood resource on the planet. 

Production Video

If you don't grill out you probably know people who do who would appreciate hearing about this unique grilling accessory.
Please share this offering on Social Media.
You can use the Indiegogo share tools!
And that's all there is to it.

story:
Please note: The prototypes in some of the photos uses a smaller area of the mirror with a dimmer image than will be in the final product.

The Axiom Smart Mirror allows you to place information "widgets" in areas of the mirror, those widgets are selected from a palette of available widgets using the mobile phone app. Add into the mix the surround LED’s that you can customize in so many ways!

Installing the Axiom Smart Mirror is extremely easy. With the included installation kit you get the template, leveler and tools to mount the hanger on your wall. You even get different mounting screws for different walls. It’s as simple as hanging a picture.

Setting up the Axiom Smart Mirror is an easy step-by-step process guiding you from the free mobile app. You will be guided to connect the mirror to your home WiFi and then onward!

Using the Axiom Smart Mirror is a breeze. It takes care of itself and is always up to date!

Customizing the Axiom Smart Mirror is simple! Open the app on your mobile phone and choose which features, widgets and lighting you want to see.

Owning an Axiom Smart Mirror means owning a piece of cutting edge technology matched with an elegant design. It soon becomes natural place to glance for great information. At 22.8” x 30.8” x 1.8” (580mm x 780mm x 45mm) it's a robust size but floats on your wall.

note: An active WiFi connection is required for correct operation and connection to the cloud.

With location specific and integrations to popular services like calendars, you can personalise the information shown. And don't forget to set the beautiful surround lighting to a scene of your making, maybe even have different scenes at different times of the day!

note: the prototype shown is using a smaller and dimmer screen than production will use

The Axiom Smart Mirror already comes with a great selection of widgets to place where you want; Clocks, Moon phase, Weather conditions, weather forecasts, messages, calendar... the list goes on. But it doesn't stop there because we will be adding widgets that you have access to for free. You'll receive a notification in your Axiom Smart Mirror mobile app when new widgets become available.

note: the mobile app shown is a functional prototype and does not have the production graphics

Installing the Axiom Smart Mirror could not be easier. With the installation kit that comes with every mirror, you can be sure to get a level and solid wall fixture in place. Then simply slot the mirror onto the fixture! Easy as that!

Plug the mirror into the power and with the aid of our mobile application guiding you, you’ll be up and running in no time. You even get to select the color of your power cord!

Some technicals:

The mirror is 22.8” x 30.8” x 1.8” (580mm x 780mm x 45mm).

Full operation of the mirror’s features requires a WiFi signal to the internet.

The mirror requires a 100-240V AC power connection.

 

 

 

            

 

PRE-ORDER TODAY AND SAVE!

 

 

 

We will be shipping globally. The charges for this are being worked out for the best price and most secure shipping methods. More information will be added here as soon as possible.

Please also remember that due to the varying import and taxation laws of different countries, there may be import duty to pay on you Axiom Smart Mirror.

My name is Chris Worton, I am an Englishman settled in Finland and I’m the founder of Boxapixels, a small Finnish company.  I have a long history in technology and product development and I am leading this great team in designing and developing the Axiom Smart Mirror - bringing together excellent technology, design and media specialists. As a team we have been able to prove that we can build the prototypes with spectacular results and lasting friendships. 

I have opened this Axiom Smart Mirror campaign because after making one for our home, my wife and I love having it there, and we know you will feel the same way about yours.

Together, with your help, we can bring the Axiom Smart Mirror into production and to a wider audience, enabling them and you to really benefit from having one in your homes.

We are looking for 150’000 Euros to bring the Axiom Smart Mirror to the public. This fund will allow us to do the product development needed for a safe, reliable and secure product for people’s homes. By achieving this significant campaign goal I can employ this amazing team to write the best code, use the best electronics, design the best casing and test the correct matierials and software to ensure the best possible experience for the owner. 

 

We are offering: 

  • 50 mirrors with an Early Bird discount of 40%, that’s €299 
  • 50 mirrors with a Not So Early Bird discount of 20%, that’s €399 
  • 800 mirrors for €499 each 
  • 100 pairs of mirrors for €899, that’s a 10% discount 

 

In the unfortunate case that we don’t meet our campaign goal, all contributions will be fully refunded. But let’s not make that happen!

By ordering your Axiom Smart Mirror you are contributing to the success and the livelihoods of a small group of talented and creative people that really dream and wish to launch a cool product to the world - and to see you, the end users happy with that product. 

It's always a challenge to bring a project through to production, but we have experienced product managers and industrial designers on our team that are familiar with the processes of production. That said there are always surprises and we will endeavour to meet the challenges that we face and keep our backers informed. We strive for excellence and will make sure that every effort is made to deliver the premium product that we envisioned.

Some challenges and considerations are, screen brightness or rather contrast. The screen backlight visibility. Availability of frameless panels of a good size, say 22". Getting the reflective coating of the mirror just right so that it lets enough of the screen image through, but not too much, and still looks like a good mirror for everyday use. These and other things are challenges we are working on with a positive attitude to getting the product as good as possible.

Thank you for your support!

story:
WAPP

The device is known as the automatic smart fresh air and ventilation system,  that fits any windows.

WAPP is developed by Device & App LLC company based in US and testing laboratory in EU.

Start your day with fresh air!

We have developed absolutely unique product you have never seen before. WAPP is a great start to change your daily habits and to add more fresh air into your premises without pulling windows handle manually.

What really WAPP does?

We have created WAPP to simplify your life. WAPP is going to open and close your windows in according with your preferences.

WAPP has 3 modes: automatic, manual and semi-automatic.

In automatic mode you can set up your comfort temperature. For example, WAPP will close the window if the temperature is below 18 0C or open it if the temperature is above 23 0C. Or any other temperature limits you set. As a extra advantage we have built-in CO2 sensor and WAPP will open windows when air pollution level in premises is too high.

In semi-automatic mode you can set opening and closing time for each of your window.

You can operate your window manually at any time.

So easy to set up!

It takes only 3 minutes to set up WAPP system. Turn on the WAPP router.

Download mobile application (iOS and Android) and connect WAPP router with local WiFi network.

Install window accessory to window with only two screws.

Connect WAPP router and your window using app.

That's it!

One WAPP router and many windows!

One WAPP router can control all your windows!

Additional features of WAPP!

Despite the fact that WAPP is amazing gadget it still serves as your daily assistant:

- built-in wireless charger on the top of WAPP router gives you an opportunity to charge you mobile phone and windows' accessories batteries using regular Qi protocol;

- WAPP router also is able to extend your local WiFi network.

Great design!

You can choose 1 of 4 modern designs suitable for various interior styles.

Owner of your sleep and health!

Stop constant jumping from bed to the window and back. WAPP will do everything instead of you.

Perks for our Indiegogo friends!

Of course, there are perks for you! Our featured perk is extremely useful WAPP kit with router and five accessories to cover all of your rooms. As also other options available!

Cheapest way to be healthy! Let's mass-production!

WAPP has been developed as a gadget to take care of your health. Simple ventilation of your indoor environment is known as the cheapest and the most effective tool in fight off invading bacteria and viruses such as COVID-19.

To create the prototype, we invest a lot of private funds. Today we are confident in the viability and usefulness of the product, and we are ready to produce it.

Today, we are looking for your support and help to raise necessary amount to start mass-production of WAPP.

 

We will be happy if you will share our idea with others and going to support our Indiegogo campaign!

 

Follow us!

https://web.facebook.com/deviceandapp

https://instagram.com/deviceandapp

https://www.deviceandapp.com

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IfRu3Al5KHg

What's in the box?

Purchasing WAPP you will receive a box with WAPP router, windows accessories, power unit with wire, re-chargeable batteries, manual and a lot of positive emotions!

Main technical data.

WAPP station/router:

Power DC 5V

Wireless charging on the top (both cellphones and batteries)

LED indicator under body

Temperature and humidity sensor 

CO2 sensor

Barometric pressure sensore

Remote control (WiFi)

Dimensions (l*w*h): 10.5/10./9.5 cm (4.13/4.13/3.74 inch)

Window Accessories (1/3/5 pcs.):

Battery (rechargeable) AA-type 5400 to 7500 mAh

Wireless charging (batteries) - Qi protocol

Temperature, humidity and CO2 sensor

Remote control (WiFi)

Dimensions (l*w*h): 3/6.5/15 cm (1.18/2.56/5.91 inch)

story:
Introduction / (THE PROBLEM): 

My name is Bill Sagona, I am the Founder, President and CEO of Sunshine Network Homes, Inc. (A Delaware C corporation) The reason I started this company, a highly scalable truly affordable and sustainable housing model was for multiple reasons. First, because I was appalled at the number of people in this country whom are either living in their cars and or are homeless living on the streets out in the cold. Another main reason was because I did not see any viable solutions out there that could solve our affordable housing crises at scale fast. In addition, too many people; America's work force, incomes are not keeping pace with the high cost of housing and overall living expenses. And lastly, because I personally could not find any decent, affordable housing in my own home town of Bend Oregon where the average cost of a home is $575,000 - $3,400,000. 

 

PURCHASE COTTAGE HOME KIT NOW:

 

People Are HUNGRY, SCARED & HURTING:

There are 38,000,000 people are on food assistance programs within the U.S. This number is obviously much greater now due to our global pandemic COVID19. Approximately 60,000,000 people in the U.S alone have now filed for unemployment government assistance due to our economy being shut down. In addition, we are still seeing approximately 850,000 people filing for unemployment claims every week.

 

Tragedy unfolding:

 

While HUD said "it counted 114,829 homeless kids younger than 18, the Education Department reported 1.3 million homeless children in public schools during the same time in the 2016-2017 school year"

 

 

 
 

​People line up for miles, waiting hours in their cars just to get food to feed their families

People standing in long lines waiting hours to apply for unemployment insurance

 

Learn how to help others in need while helping your own family with our new INCOME OPPORTUNITY. See Building Partnership page Phase I & Phase II for details.

 

The COVID19 Pandemic has greatly increased the need for truly affordable homes.

 

We are a triple bottom line company with values in order of priority; people first, planet, profits last​.​

 

Our Homeless Neighbors Desperately Need Our Help:

*United States Statistics:

*372,417 homeless individuals.

*180,413 homeless people in families.

*96,913 chronically homeless individuals.

*37,878 homeless veterans.

*36,361 homeless youth.

*552,830 overall homeless.

*Seattle's Cost Of Homelessness Other U.S. cities experiencing similar cost.

*Portland homeless.

*KIDS SLEEPING ON BUSES AND FLOORS!!

 

WE CAN EASILY SHIP OUR EARTH FRIENDLY, TRULY AFFORDABLE, DELUXE COTTAGE HOME KITS TO THE MOST REMOTE REGIONS OF THE WORLD:

 

 

Our company is positioned to help all of North America U.S. work force, including Canada and millions of people around the world.

 

Including . . .

 

Teachers, Fire fighters, Nurses, Police, Service workers and many more, whom incomes are not keeping up with the cost of todays housing and overall living expenses.

 

This funding campaign is very important because your generous support will help many people to realize truly affordable, earth friendly housing and food security including, peace of mind and hope for a much brighter future.

 

PURCHASE COTTAGE HOME KIT NOW:

 

OUR INSPIRATION:

Our timely and highly scalable business model is very unique compared to all other housing models in existence. Inspired by the SEARS & ROEBUCK kit home ,Henry Ford Model-T assembly line and  . . .

. . . Dick and Mack McDonalds brothers whom built the worlds first fast food restaurant, that was located at 14th & E street in San Bernardino CA, just 2-blocks from my grandmothers home located at Evans & E street three houses down on left side of street, a CA bungalow style. ("A hamburger in 30-seconds not 30-minutes") We ate there regularly when my sisters and I would visit our grandmother from our home in the city next door, Rialto. The fries then were extra yummy, because they were fried in chicken fat, great for the taste buds, but bad for the heart. See movie The Founder / true story.

 

All our NEW homes will be sold BELOW MARKET, at WHOLESALE  PRICES!

 

WE WILL ALSO CREATE POTENTIALLY MILLIONS OF NEW JOBS:

Your support will ALSO help to create thousands to literally hundreds of thousands & potentially even millions of good paying jobs ($20 - $25 hr) for the 13-residential home building trades / sub contractors INCLUDING APPRENTICHIP TRAINING that will be involved in the construction of our Cottage Homes & SUNSHINE Cottage Home Communities.

 

What We Need From You / (THE SOLUTION):

We now need your help to raise $3,564,128 to fund the 1st of 15 acre phases (14-cottage homes per 1-acre are planned) of our pre-built pilot development called SUNSHINE Cottage Home Community planned for one of three sites in Oregon. These funds will be used to pay for horizontal and vertical construction cost and thus get us on our feet where we will then be enabled to leverage building out the remaining 14-acre phase completely on our own.  

At the end of the 15-acre development we will have built and sold a total of (15-acre x 14-cottage homes per 1-acre will = 210 homes people can truly afford). Then our company balance sheet will be strong enough to repeat this development process again on our own, while leveraging construction loans for each new buyer via our preferred banker UMPQUA Bank whom will be funding multiple development projects in multiple western states. 

This pilot community will consist of 14-SUNSHINE Cottage Homes zoned medium to high density per 1-acre, offered in four unique cookie cutter home themes built utilizing our two floor plans Model A-600 & Model B-468, we will call 1) Monterey Pacific 2) Western Ranch 3) Spanish Santa Fee 4) Early Colonial. Each of these home themes will have their own unique and distinctive flavor of interior and exterior deigns, including unique landscaping. 

 

Complete Deluxe Cottage Home KIT only (price does not include land / labor / excavation / foundation / permits.) Does includes all building materials, appliances, fixtures, windows, doors, insulation and so on. Home KITS can be shipped anywhere world-wide. Includes literally everything you will need (These are not empty SHELL homes) Currently priced at Model B-468 sf $56,408 & Model A-600 sf $64,445.

 

Our Cottage Homes and SUNSHINE Cottage Home Communities are deliberately and thoughtfully designed "cookie cutter" in order to take great advantage of predictable redundancy and muscle memory during the building process - HUGE VALUE.

 

They are also designed to enlist community FREE, volunteer labor too, that will help lower the cost of labor even further.

 

Predictable redundancy and muscle memory will play a huge part in greatly lowering the construction of SUNSHINE Cottage Home Communities and Cottage Home KITS to include speeding up building permits. 

 

PURCHASE COTTAGE HOME KIT NOW:

 

Community common area site plan concept:

 

We are planning on a total of 15-acres to build on here in Oregon which represents a grand total of #210 truly affordable and sustainable homes that will be attractively priced under market, at wholesale pricing. ($289,777 Model A-600) and ($285,997 Model B-468). The national average home price is Q3 2020: $387,000. The average home price in Portland Oregon metro area is $419,600. In addition, all our homes will be pre-sold requiring a modest ($100 fully refundable, reservation, hold order deposit) where all homes will be sold on a first come first serve basis / PERIOD!

 

Traditional row home site plan concept:

 

WE WILL NOT PERMIT ANY HOUSING INVESTMENT COMPANIES OR INDIVIDUAL CASH BUYERS TO OUTBID OUR CHERISHED CUSTOMERS OR TO PURCHASE ENTIRE SUNSHINE COTTAGE HOME COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENTS AT ANY PRICE / PERIOD!

 

We promise to maintain 100% control of keeping our home prices low and truly affordable for our cherished customers, which are families in need of true housing and food security.

 

Model A-600 sf two bedroom, one full bathroom, one full size kitchen:

Model B-468 sf one bedroom, one full bathroom, one full size kitchen:

 

This Is Just The First of Multiple Planned "Cookie Cutter" SUNSHINE Cottage Home Communities to Be Developed Throughout The NW, U.S; Canada and ultimately the World:


The SUNSHINE Cottage Home Communities WILL NOT! BE SUBSIDIZED BY ANY TAX DOLLARS.

 

The SUNSHINE Cottage Home Community will ALSO serve as a means to promote our Cottage Home KITS to individuals buyers. 

 

INTRODUCING: A brand new and timely concept DIY / do it your-self (On construction site classes) How To Build Your Own SUNSHINE Cottage Home that will SAVE our cherished customers additional tens of thousands of dollars MORE in labor cost.

 

These strategically located planned, multiple cookie cutter communities will enable us to share our vision with tens of thousands and millions of people from surrounding, thousands of communities nationwide-worldwide, to include media outlets whom will then share our story with their viewing audience, which will provide the means to further educate the general public and fuel more Cottage Home KIT sales, which will in turn enable us to continually lower our Home KIT prices even further, which will in turn, again, will fuel an increase in Home KIT sales, and so on, and so on.

If we don't reach our entire posted funding goal from this campaign then our back up plan will be to use the available funds to build at minimum our two floor plans / Model A-600 sf and Model B-468 sf on a smaller lot of land.

 

Our Cottage Homes can also be used as single family homes on their own tax lot, city or county applications, or as a detached home office, and income producing ADU-accessory dwelling unit:

 

We have posted our preferred banker for our customers convivence, whom could secure their own construction, mortgage loan or refinance services.  

 

Our company goal is very simple, contrary and polar opposite to all other for profit homebuilding companies . . .

 

. . . Achieve a high volume of gross unit sales (at minimum profits) in order to keep all home prices at their lowest in order to help thousands to millions of families in need. This philosophy will result in a greater number of sales that will in turn lower home prices even further, and so on and so on.

 

We can deliver a high volume of Cottage Home KITS per year / world-wide through our international network of suppliers. We have a grand total capacity, potential to delivery, literally #250,000 to #1,800,000 Cottage Cottage Home KITS per year with an order fulfillment accuracy of 99.8%.

 

PURCHASE COTTAGE HOME KIT NOW:

 

OUR COMPANY PROMISES:

TO FORWARD 100% OF ALL DISCOUNT SAVINGS WE RECEIVE FROM OUR VENDORS SUPPLIERS DIRECTLY ON TO ALL OUR CHERISHED CUSTOMERS IN THE FORM OF LOWER HOME KIT PRICES IN PERPETUITY . . . William Sagona, President & CEO.

 

We will process all our customer Home KIT orders first through our website platform and then efficiently direct each of those orders directly on to each customers build site.

Our unique ability to process an extraordinarily high volume of orders (Ranging from thousands to literally potentially millions of Cottage Home KIT orders each year) involve an extraordinarily  large consumption of lumber, stoves, refrigerators, roofing, windows, doors and so on that will greatly benefit our customers too; because we are committed and have promised to forward 100% of all our discounts, economies of scale savings that we receive from our supplier vendors, directly on to our cherished customers in the form of perpetually lower Cottage Home KIT prices.

 

The higher volume of Cottage Home KIT orders will = LOWER HOME COST for our cherished customers.

 

Strong Barriers To Market:

We have very strong barriers to market in place (eliminating any serious challenge from any future competitors in this space for many years) through secured NDA / non compete agreements with our international network of suppliers / order fulfillment centers with tens of thousands of locations in multiple countries and continents; including, we also have plans to file multiple patents for IP / intellectual property protection.

 

The Human Impact:

You contributions will be helping to make a substantial and lasting positive impact, difference in the many lives of families in need, by helping to provide their most basics needs, to provide an affordable, quality shelter and to properly feed their families.

 

Your support will provide peace of mind & relief from suffering to potentially millions of people:

 

Too many children are going hungry.

 

Too many people are homeless and or at high risk of homelessness because they are struggling to pay their rent and or mortgage payments each month.

 

I cannot overstate the great value that your contributions, help and support for our campaign will provide. You will be helping potentially millions of people within the U.S. alone whom are spending too much of their paycheck on just housing.

 

Risks & Challenges:

One of our challenges is to secure enough funds to build our pilot community. We understand that another cause for concern and that are a common cause for failure is not securing a AAA experienced management team, to include operating with poor cash management which could lead to a cash flow crises.

In addition, we also realize for any company to be successful they need to clearly identify their market, whom their customers are and what their customers want, and then to deliver at great prices.

We have addressed these risk and challenges. First, we have located the majority of our private funding for our Oregon pilot project which is needed to fully fund, supported by your contributions.

We have assembled a AAA team of highly experienced and successful business partners and advisors. We have reduced our risk to to a cash flow crises by operating our company very lien, requiring a low monthly overhead budget. Lastly, after many moths of research we have precisely identified whom our end users, customers are.  

Our Power Point deck outlines all of this beginning with Problem / Solution / Go to market strategy / Whom are customers are / Whom are competitors are / Whom are team is / Our five year goals. In addition, we have built a comprehensive financial proforma that identifies all of our building cost and profits. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help:

Even if this is not a good time for you to contribute money, you can still contribute and be a big help to us and many families in need by simply sharing our story with as many others as possible through your social media platforms, via friends and family / see Indiegogo share tool links.

A warm and sincere thankyou in advance for any help you can provide us.

Please don't hesitate to call me directly with any questions. 1-(541) 497-3585 Oregon, pacific time -zone.

PURCASE COTTAGE HOME KIT NOW:

William Sagona

Founder, President & CEO
story_txt:
Introduction / (THE PROBLEM): 

My name is Bill Sagona, I am the Founder, President and CEO of Sunshine Network Homes, Inc. (A Delaware C corporation) The reason I started this company, a highly scalable truly affordable and sustainable housing model was for multiple reasons. First, because I was appalled at the number of people in this country whom are either living in their cars and or are homeless living on the streets out in the cold. Another main reason was because I did not see any viable solutions out there that could solve our affordable housing crises at scale fast. In addition, too many people; America's work force, incomes are not keeping pace with the high cost of housing and overall living expenses. And lastly, because I personally could not find any decent, affordable housing in my own home town of Bend Oregon where the average cost of a home is $575,000 - $3,400,000. 
 
PURCHASE COTTAGE HOME KIT NOW:
 
People Are HUNGRY, SCARED & HURTING:
There are 38,000,000 people are on food assistance programs within the U.S. This number is obviously much greater now due to our global pandemic COVID19. Approximately 60,000,000 people in the U.S alone have now filed for unemployment government assistance due to our economy being shut down. In addition, we are still seeing approximately 850,000 people filing for unemployment claims every week.
 
Tragedy unfolding:
 
While HUD said "it counted 114,829 homeless kids younger than 18, the Education Department reported 1.3 million homeless children in public schools during the same time in the 2016-2017 school year"
 

 

 
 

​People line up for miles, waiting hours in their cars just to get food to feed their families

People standing in long lines waiting hours to apply for unemployment insurance

 
Learn how to help others in need while helping your own family with our new INCOME OPPORTUNITY. See Building Partnership page Phase I & Phase II for details.
 
The COVID19 Pandemic has greatly increased the need for truly affordable homes.
 
We are a triple bottom line company with values in order of priority; people first, planet, profits last​.​

 
Our Homeless Neighbors Desperately Need Our Help:
*United States Statistics:
*372,417 homeless individuals.
*180,413 homeless people in families.
*96,913 chronically homeless individuals.
*37,878 homeless veterans.
*36,361 homeless youth.
*552,830 overall homeless.
*Seattle's Cost Of Homelessness Other U.S. cities experiencing similar cost.
*Portland homeless.
*KIDS SLEEPING ON BUSES AND FLOORS!!



 
WE CAN EASILY SHIP OUR EARTH FRIENDLY, TRULY AFFORDABLE, DELUXE COTTAGE HOME KITS TO THE MOST REMOTE REGIONS OF THE WORLD:
 

 
Our company is positioned to help all of North America U.S. work force, including Canada and millions of people around the world.
 
Including . . .
 

Teachers, Fire fighters, Nurses, Police, Service workers and many more, whom incomes are not keeping up with the cost of todays housing and overall living expenses.
 
This funding campaign is very important because your generous support will help many people to realize truly affordable, earth friendly housing and food security including, peace of mind and hope for a much brighter future.
 
PURCHASE COTTAGE HOME KIT NOW:
 
OUR INSPIRATION:
Our timely and highly scalable business model is very unique compared to all other housing models in existence. Inspired by the SEARS & ROEBUCK kit home ,Henry Ford Model-T assembly line and  . . .
. . . Dick and Mack McDonalds brothers whom built the worlds first fast food restaurant, that was located at 14th & E street in San Bernardino CA, just 2-blocks from my grandmothers home located at Evans & E street three houses down on left side of street, a CA bungalow style. ("A hamburger in 30-seconds not 30-minutes") We ate there regularly when my sisters and I would visit our grandmother from our home in the city next door, Rialto. The fries then were extra yummy, because they were fried in chicken fat, great for the taste buds, but bad for the heart. See movie The Founder / true story.
 
All our NEW homes will be sold BELOW MARKET, at WHOLESALE  PRICES!

 
WE WILL ALSO CREATE POTENTIALLY MILLIONS OF NEW JOBS:
Your support will ALSO help to create thousands to literally hundreds of thousands & potentially even millions of good paying jobs ($20 - $25 hr) for the 13-residential home building trades / sub contractors INCLUDING APPRENTICHIP TRAINING that will be involved in the construction of our Cottage Homes & SUNSHINE Cottage Home Communities.
 
What We Need From You / (THE SOLUTION):

We now need your help to raise $3,564,128 to fund the 1st of 15 acre phases (14-cottage homes per 1-acre are planned) of our pre-built pilot development called SUNSHINE Cottage Home Community planned for one of three sites in Oregon. These funds will be used to pay for horizontal and vertical construction cost and thus get us on our feet where we will then be enabled to leverage building out the remaining 14-acre phase completely on our own.  
At the end of the 15-acre development we will have built and sold a total of (15-acre x 14-cottage homes per 1-acre will = 210 homes people can truly afford). Then our company balance sheet will be strong enough to repeat this development process again on our own, while leveraging construction loans for each new buyer via our preferred banker UMPQUA Bank whom will be funding multiple development projects in multiple western states. 
This pilot community will consist of 14-SUNSHINE Cottage Homes zoned medium to high density per 1-acre, offered in four unique cookie cutter home themes built utilizing our two floor plans Model A-600 & Model B-468, we will call 1) Monterey Pacific 2) Western Ranch 3) Spanish Santa Fee 4) Early Colonial. Each of these home themes will have their own unique and distinctive flavor of interior and exterior deigns, including unique landscaping. 
 
Complete Deluxe Cottage Home KIT only (price does not include land / labor / excavation / foundation / permits.) Does includes all building materials, appliances, fixtures, windows, doors, insulation and so on. Home KITS can be shipped anywhere world-wide. Includes literally everything you will need (These are not empty SHELL homes) Currently priced at Model B-468 sf $56,408 & Model A-600 sf $64,445.

 
Our Cottage Homes and SUNSHINE Cottage Home Communities are deliberately and thoughtfully designed "cookie cutter" in order to take great advantage of predictable redundancy and muscle memory during the building process - HUGE VALUE.
 
They are also designed to enlist community FREE, volunteer labor too, that will help lower the cost of labor even further.
 
Predictable redundancy and muscle memory will play a huge part in greatly lowering the construction of SUNSHINE Cottage Home Communities and Cottage Home KITS to include speeding up building permits. 
 
PURCHASE COTTAGE HOME KIT NOW:
 
Community common area site plan concept:

 
We are planning on a total of 15-acres to build on here in Oregon which represents a grand total of #210 truly affordable and sustainable homes that will be attractively priced under market, at wholesale pricing. ($289,777 Model A-600) and ($285,997 Model B-468). The national average home price is Q3 2020: $387,000. The average home price in Portland Oregon metro area is $419,600. In addition, all our homes will be pre-sold requiring a modest ($100 fully refundable, reservation, hold order deposit) where all homes will be sold on a first come first serve basis / PERIOD!
 
Traditional row home site plan concept:

 
WE WILL NOT PERMIT ANY HOUSING INVESTMENT COMPANIES OR INDIVIDUAL CASH BUYERS TO OUTBID OUR CHERISHED CUSTOMERS OR TO PURCHASE ENTIRE SUNSHINE COTTAGE HOME COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENTS AT ANY PRICE / PERIOD!
 
We promise to maintain 100% control of keeping our home prices low and truly affordable for our cherished customers, which are families in need of true housing and food security.
 
Model A-600 sf two bedroom, one full bathroom, one full size kitchen:



Model B-468 sf one bedroom, one full bathroom, one full size kitchen:


 
This Is Just The First of Multiple Planned "Cookie Cutter" SUNSHINE Cottage Home Communities to Be Developed Throughout The NW, U.S; Canada and ultimately the World:

The SUNSHINE Cottage Home Communities WILL NOT! BE SUBSIDIZED BY ANY TAX DOLLARS.

story:
Have you ever pulled a blade out of your kitchen drawer and its dull and unsatisfactory? That problem is being solved with ChopSwap a subscription based knife sharpening club.

I've been a professional knife sharpener for over a decade (as well as a Navy Veteran) and have built a knife sharpening business locally in NY. With ChopSwap, I have a plan to hire and  train disabled veterans  to sharpen knives and serve home cooks throughout the US.

When you Join ChopSwap you’ll receive my JackKnife, a high quality JA Henkels 8” Chef Knife…used by professional chefs, now available to home cooks exclusively through ChopSwap.   (Comparable value $65.00)

https://www.bedbathandbeyond.com/store/product/...

The JackKnife!

You’ll also get knife skills classes, tips, recipes, cooking demo videos by Professional Chefs and special offers for home cooks.

When you choose a replacement plan to receive a freshly sharpened Chef Knife we send you one. You put your old knife into the prepaid envelope. No frills! You always have a sharp knife at your fingertips!

So please-  help me with my mission; put a Jack Knife in your kitchen. Together we can employ Veterans and “Always Stay Sharp.”

Thank You for supporting a Veteran owned business,

Please stay safe,

Jack “Knife” Martin III

Founder, CEO, Husband, Dad, Dogfather, Bad Golfer

story:
Love the start of a new season!

FIRST SEASON  brings together the love of sports and the life changing experience of adding children to a family. Our one of kind baby swings gives sports fans long lasting memories of swinging moments with their new child!

My name is Mike Putnam.  I have spent my 20 year career in the events, marketing and advertising industry.  When I was a kid, I loved playing and following sports.  Now as a father of two involved in youth sports, enjoying the game through my kid’s eyes makes me appreciate the impact sports has had on me and my family’s life.  We could not be more excited than to have the opportunity to be involved with a business that intersects with the priceless moments between parents and their children.

A little over two years ago my wife Lisa and I came up with the idea for First Season while opening gifts on Christmas.  My nephew opened up a gift upside down.  It was a football helmet and as he pulled it out, Lisa said;

Nope, it was a lamp!  The next morning our research started.  We moved quickly to develop the idea of making a sports baby swing in six major sports (baseball, basketball, football, soccer, tennis, golf) 

Our journey led us to partnering with a well known toy designer named Brett Klisch, owner of Peru Meridan Studios.  Brett has been in the toy industry for over 25 years and has helped manufacturer product for some of the largest brands in the market.  Brett is a board member of the Toy Association and a founder of the Creative Factory at Toy Fair NY.  

 

From the beginning, our priorities have been to develop a safe and comfortable swing for babies and parents to enjoy.   We are partnered with HQTS to ensure our swing is manufactured to the following approved specifications;

Consumer Products Safety Commission
ASTM F2088 - 15
STANDARD CONSUMER SAFETY SPECIFICATION FOR INFANT SWINGS
F2088 – 15

With our patents, trademarks and prototype now complete, we are ready and really excited to move to wide-scale manufacturing on our 5 sports ball designs.  

What We Need & What You Get

With a successful campaign, we will be able to ship the swings in late August for early September delivery!  Contribute through our featured perk and select a swing of your choice at a special Indiegogo price of $75, plus shipping. (-24% MSRP of $99)

We need to raise $130,000.  This will allow us to move forward with the manufacturing of the five sport designed swings with the factory who created the prototype.  All the materials in the prototype are manufacturing ready and safety approved for infants swings.

The swing is made up of four parts;

  • Plastic Seat Ring & Attached Rope - 35 lb weight limit,  Recommended ages 7-36 months
  • Fabric Seat - 3 Point Safety Harness with buckle - Removable & Machine Washable
  • Circular Foam Panels which make up "The Ball"
  • Graphic Sleeve which wraps around the foam panels - Inter-Changeable & Machine Washable - Switch sports to start a new season!


Our Development Process:

 

SHIPPING

We are working with BTX Global Logistics senior leadership team to ensure that we are planning and coordinating the delivery of our first shipment on time.  We are very confident that with Brett's experience and factory relationships we are in good hands to complete the manufacturing and deliver swings in September 2021.  

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand not everyone can contribute at this time, but that doesn't mean you can't help!  Please help us spread the word and share the product on your favorite social media channel using the Indiegogo share tools.

Thank you for your support and we hope you enjoy your swing and the start of your next season!

The Putnam Family - Monroe, CT

story:
Ario

 

Light Matters

Today's indoor lighting is static, as if the sun were fixed in the sky. This is unnatural and has significant implications to our sleep, mood, immune system, weight management, and overall well-being.

 

Ario Features

    In the Press

    Ario in Action

    Ario’s high-performance LEDs provide bright, 2400 lumen output and a wide color range, from 6500K blue-rich light (mid-day sun) to 1800K amber light (candle/fire light).

      Ario provides a natural way to wake up when you want to, with gently increasing light.​

       

      Ario  provides blue-rich light, energizing you like a sunny day while working at home.

      Ario's calming amber light creates a relaxing atmosphere.​ 

       

      Ario's downward-directed light prepares you for sleep. Ario can turn itself off or act as a nightlight that won't disturb sleep.


       

      MOBILE & WEB ACCESS

      Everything the physical controls do and more! You are in control of how to start and live your day.

      • Sunrise alarm
      • Time zone
      • Schedule update
      • Remote control
      • Color temperature range

         

       

      DIRECTIONAL & COLOR CONTROLS

      Two light engines, one facing up, one facing down, a purpose-built highly-integrated LED controller, and an advanced processor power Ario.

       

      FREE-STANDING & MODULAR DESIGNS

      Ario is a beautifully polished, autonomous system, configurable as either a floor or desk/table lamp. 

       

      AUTONOMOUS, EASY CONTROL

      Ario’s real-time clock and non-volatile storage automatically adjust color and direction, even after loss of power or WiFi. You can control Ario via physical buttons, wall switch, or the Ario app on your phone, tablet, or PC.

      EFFICIENCY & LONGEVITY

      Ario’s solid-state LEDs use only 1/5 the energy of equivalent incandescent lights. Ario’s state-of-the-art LEDs and heat sink deliver >35,000 hours of life. 

      Science Behind Ario

      Decades of research from Harvard Medical School, NASA, and leading institutions around the world have revealed a great deal of information about how light impacts and regulates our health. We designed Ario based on this large body of knowledge and on recommendations of the National Institute of Health and American Medical Association. Here is a summary.

      Our body learns what time it is from light in our environment. Non-visual photoreceptors in our eyes, discovered fairly recently, are sensitive to changing levels of blue light from above. These receptors provide signals to the suprachiasmatic nucleus (SCN), a tiny region located in the hypothalamus responsible for controlling our circadian rhythm, or body clock. This in turn influences the production of hormones regulating bodily process.

      Today’s static artificial lights throw off our body clock by as much as three hours. While we don’t perceive this directly, this changes the balance of our endocrine system, generally reducing levels of body process regulating hormones both day and night. These changes to our basic physiology affect our metabolism which in turn impacts our sleep, behavior, mood, and general health.

      Medical and lighting professionals recommend the following to promote healthy circadian rhythm, restful sleep, and overall well-being. Ario is designed to deliver what is recommended: 

      • Blue-rich light from above stimulates cortisol production in the morning to synchronize circadian rhythm and awaken, and during the day to maintain alertness.
      • Amber-toned light with very little blue and a relatively dark ceiling, at the end of the day. This makes it easier to relax and prepare the body for sleep by facilitating the release of the hormone melatonin which is inhibited by typical light exposure at night.

      Ario Lamp Specs

      Light

      • 2400 Lumen output (150W equivalent)
      • 1800K-6500K CCT (color range from candle to daylight)
      • Upward and downward light delivery
      • Automatic adjustments based on user needs and preferences
      • LEDs last 20+ years at normal usage. No bulbs to install or replace.

      Sizes & Models

      • Configurable as a floor or desk/table lamp the body stems can be removed to adjust height down 
      • Weight: 15 lbs (6.8 Kg)
      • Height: 2 ft (61cm) or 5 ft (152 cm)
      • Diameter: 13 in (33 cm)

      Materials & Sensors

      • Ultra-durable brushed aluminum finish
      • High-efficiency acrylic glass diffuser
      • Low glare shades for directional light shaping
      • Proximity sensor to power off when not in use
      • Ambient light sensor to reduce energy usage

      Power, Controls, & Connectivity

      • Integrated WiFi connectivity
      • Manual and remote control (integrated buttons, app, web, and management console)
      • 1-30W, 90-264 vac 50/60Hz universal input
      • 1-100% dimming, color, and direction control

       

       

       

      Ario central stem module, "The Brain"

       

      Ario directional light engine, "Lamp head" 

      FAQ

      How do I assemble my Ario Lamp?

      Follow this easy, step-by-step guide on our website. Screw driver recommended. 

      How does Ario work?

      By adjusting its color and light direction, Ario mimics the natural light dark cycle our bodies evolved to expect. Your eyes contain non-visual photo receptors sensitive to blue light from above that help cue your body’s natural circadian rhythm. By day, Ario delivers blue rich light from top and bottom to synchronize circadian rhythm, and help make your mind and body alert. At night, Ario delivers warm light with virtually no blue, in a downward direction. This allows you to see well without disturbing your body’s natural production of melatonin.

      What is unique about Ario?

      Ario is the only lamp that fully supports circadian rhythm. With a unique combination of features, Ario automatically changes direction of light delivery and color over a wide range of controlled blue output. It includes a real-time clock and stored program to always light with the right color and direction of light. Ario is also brighter than consumer smart bulbs.

      What contributes to the cost of the lamp?

      The lamp includes the full fixture, two light sources, processor, real-time clock, and web app which allows you to customize your schedule. Considering it would take two bulbs, we compare favorably to smart bulbs that are 1/3 the brightness and cost $70-100/each. The lamp is also well made to last as long as the light sources.

      What about data? 

      At Ario, we believe the data Ario learns about you are yours! You can safely and securely access your data via your personal account to see how you are living and make daily adjustments to live healthier. 

      Shipping Details

      For international orders outside the US, any local duty and taxes are not included. You are responsible for paying these at time of delivery. Contact your customs officials for an estimate.

      Refund Policy

      Sales through Indiegogo are final and are not eligible for refund or return. All purchases are covered by our one-year limited warranty.

      Ario Team

      BRIAN HOSKINS - CEO & CO-FOUNDER

      Brian has over 15 years of experience in technology product management and business development. He has led major product launches, ranging from first releases to established services with millions of users at both Microsoft and Slingkast, a mobile marketing startup he founded. Brian holds an MBA with High Distinction from Harvard Business School and a B.A., summa cum laude, from Vanderbilt University.

      DALE DELL'ARIO  - CTO & CO-FOUNDER

      Dale has over 40 years development experience with commercial, medical, and consumer products in companies like HP and Olympic/Natus Medical. He has designed and fabricated dozens of infant therapy, SAD treatment, and functional art interior lighting products. Dale holds a BS and MS from the product design program at Stanford and is a member of the Human Centric Lighting Committee.

      BING CHEN - ADVISOR & CO-FOUNDER

      Bing is an expert in embedded systems and electronics. He developed a massively parallel data acquisition system for the ATLAS Experiment at CERN, the Large Hadron Collider in France and Switzerland. Bing holds a BS and MS in electrical engineering from the University of Washington and received his Technology Entrepreneurship Certificate from the UW Foster School of Business.

      RICHARD BAILEY  - LEAD ELECTRICAL ENGINEER

      Richard has over 35 years development experience with commercial, defense, and consumer products in companies like Kistler Aerospace and Spaceflight Industries. He has designed and fabricated complex electronic systems including unmanned ground vehicles and satellites and specializes in power systems and IP-based communications systems. He holds a BS in Electrical Engineering from U of Colorado.

      GUY DELISI - GENERAL MANAGER, OPERATIONS

      Guy has over 30 years of experience in senior operations, managing manufacturing, distribution, and services organizations. He has led organizations in the Oil and Gas, Industrial Automation, and Aerospace industries in new process development and process optimization projects, development of CM strategy, strategic and financial growth planning, ISO quality system certifications and national and international supply chain management.

      WILL DIMMIT  - SOFTWARE DEVELOPER

      Will’s background is in UI, home automation, database, and systems development. He was an early adopter of the KinomaJS framework, working with Kinoma for the framework’s public launch at SXSW 2014. He since worked with Kinoma to support other developers’ mobile and embedded development. More recently, Will partnered with iHome for the development of mobile apps for a variety of IoT devices.

Ario can turn itself off or act as a nightlight that won't disturb sleep. MOBILE & WEB ACCESSEverything the physical controls do and more! You are in control of how to start and live your day.

story:
Support us by claiming a perk and recieve your chair by Novemeber (Free Shipping to USA and Canada!) 

If you back today, you will receive your Moderain chair by November! It's time to invest in your body and join the Moderain team. 


Colors 

At the moment there are 3 colors to choose from! What will the next color be? You decide!

$50,000 - Survey voted color

$100,000 - Survey voted color

$500,000 - Survey voted color 

 

Features 

We use the best materials for our chairs. Beautiful synthetic leather stitched to perfection. Two layers of foam. One for comfort, the other for stability. Every chair will be put through a series of tests. Swivel test, backrest strength test, backrest durability test, raw material test, and a weight/load test. Our chairs will be 100% tested to ensure quality. 

Adjustable Head Rest 

  • Height is adjustable.
  • Extra padding for comfort.
  • Removable but recommended for posture control. 

Padded Arm Rests 

  • Adjustable. Forwards/backward. Up/down.
  • Padded for long hour, elbow discomfort.
  • Aluminum base. Chairs break their arms more than you may think. This solves that. 

Comfortable Seat 

  • Flat. This ensures correct seating of the sit bones.
  • 2 Layers of foam. One for comfort. The other for extra support. 

Aluminum Legs 

  • Aluminum to support weight up to 2000 pounds!
  • Gas lift.
  • Rotatable wheels. 

Ergonomic Backrest 

  • Curved to match the user's spine. (Lumbar support)
  • Keeps you in amazing posture.
  • Adjustable to lean back. Although recommended to keep your posture up right. 


Corporate 

Quality chairs are very important for businesses that have their employees sit for long hours of the day. Employees shouldn't have to worry about being uncomfortable. We realize this importance. If you are looking into doing a high quantity order we may be able to offer a deal. Please feel free to contact us directly before doing so.

 support@moderain.com 

 

What We Need 

Too many people are still using chairs that are not appropriate for their health. Our goal is to change that. With an affordable, comfortable chair that not only looks good but keeps your body healthy. 


We have worked hard with our manufacturer to bring you the perfect chair. We have our first sample ready. It's exactly what we hoped for and we know you will be as happy as we are. With your support, we can go into production to improve the posture of the world. If you support our vision but don't have the necessary funds. Please know we completely understand! Another way to help us is just to simply share our vision with your family and friends. 


To kick off our campaign we are giving an exclusive discount. Our early birds are our first backers and we want to give back. It comes to about a 20% off our retail price and the biggest discount we will have. 

 

Our Team 

"At the moment I am the only member of Moderain but I will be looking for ambitious people to join me. I have an amazing manufacturer with me and I couldn't have done this without them. I have experience with E-commerce but I'm pleased to help bring this new product to the world. I'm delighted and driven to make it succeed. I currently work a full-time office job. Combined with this project, I have been sitting for 60-80 hours a week. I understand the importance of a great chair. I hope I have not only delivered that knowledge but a solution. There have been many obstacles and problems along the way but I am so excited to finally share the perfect chair to you!

Thank you! And if you are considering backing and supporting me, I can ensure you are in good hands." 

 

Frequently Asked Questions 

How do you offer such a low price? 
We want everyone to be given the chance to improve their health. We have cut a lot of costs such as retail, storage, and shipping fees. 

Do you ship to...? 
We ship anywhere in the world! 

What is your return policy? 
We are very confident you will be happy with your chair. Although if there is any reason you would like to return it we offer a 14-day money back guarantee (upon arrival). 
If you do decide to return a chair it must be in resellable condition. 

Does your shipping include additional taxes, duties, or VAT? 
Unfortunately, we cannot keep up with worldwide additional fees. Please use dutycalculator.com or other services to calculate your fees. 

Can I get a refund? 
Please refer to indiegogos refund policy.

How confident are you to deliver on time? 
Very confident. We have met all of our deadlines this far. We are ready and organized to ship after the campaign has ended. 

What are the costs of shipping? 
Free for Canadians and Americans. Unfortunately we are not set up for free worldwide shipping. Shipping charges worldwide may vary. 

Comment to ask more questions!

 

Thank you! During the early stages I will personally be answering all comments and emails. Please feel free to reach me. - Tanner

story:
Hello!

We are New Ashen and we'd love to invite you to join us on our creative journey.

We are a startup contemporary furniture and accessory design studio operating in Doncaster, South Yorkshire in the UK. 

We design and hand-make modern, stylish furniture and decor from concrete (with the aim of us soon also using wood & other high quality materials too) to give your home, garden and office space a bold and unique edge.  

We have a passion for bold and modern design and want to share this passion to enable others to be able to access stylish designer home accessories without the designer price tag.

Community and charity is important to us and once we are up and running we will donate a percentage of our profits each month to a number of local and national charities. 

So, why are we here?

We need a little extra funding to help get the business off the ground, whilst enabling you lovely people to pre-order our products in return. The funding will help us to produce a large quantity of handmade products and to be able to sell them at a reasonable price, and will enable us to create a wide range of high quality moulds (and therefore a wider range of finished products), buy materials in bulk and continue to invest in new materials for the future.

By supporting our campaign you will be helping us to launch an exclusive range of unique, quality products lovingly handmade in Yorkshire.

We'd be eternally grateful for your support of our creative new venture and hope you love our products as much as we do!

Overfunding targets

Extra £2,000 total overfunding will go towards marketing & supplies to help us build a better online retail presence.

Extra £11,000 total overfunding will go towards marketing & supplies to help us build a better online retail presence including the purchase of a second hand van to enable us to 1. Cut raw material delivery costs and 2. enable us to provide cheaper local deliveries of bulkier items. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Your support will enable us to purchase materials to create a range of different moulds (and therefore products) of varying size and shape. It will also enable us to purchase the materials we need to start production of our products and help us to build a good-looking e-commerce website on which to sell our finished products.

In return for your support you will receive one or more special access Perks, which include some of our beautiful, minimalist products as a thank you for your faith and generosity.

 

Risks & Challenges

  • Items from the Perks may vary slightly in size and colour (which will mainly be a normal concrete shade) from the images shown due to lighting and slight variations in the concrete. 
     
  • Unfortunately international postage is quite high due to weight at the moment however we are actively working with shipping providers to reduce this as quickly as we can.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Whether you are able to support us with a donation or not, we'd be hugely grateful if you could share our campaign via the sharing links provided or connect with us on our social networks via the links in our profile bio.

Many thanks for your time and support!

The New Ashen team

story:
Short Summary of Wood Nations

 

  • Wood Nations is made of Pine wood (Its not from a MDF or a sliced veneer) 
  • It has map shape of a country or a continent and a total of 16 powerful magnets are built in.
  • Can get two miniature of same shape and two metal key rings too.
  • Variety choices are available. 

 

Colors

    

 

 

 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

  • I've moved my career from financial market to make something i can see and touch few years ago. I'm concentrating thing from wood these days.
  • I have a small workroom for my job. Its about 21 square feet and hard to carry out the finishing work simultaneously with the timber cutting of course.
  • The funds primarily use wood purchases, cuts, and laser cuts to make Wood Nations. The rest will be spent on the next social campaign planning and execution through improving the working environment.

 

The Impact

 

  • I am an ordinary young man who likes to travel.

  • I still have good memories of Australia, which was a foreign country and it started with a little experience of travel to Spain.

  • Not just me, but many people There will be a country that has good memories, such as where I went and where I live. Somewhere I'd like to visit.

  • Meet new people and give you a new world I wondered if I could keep something that I should not lose.

 

Risks & Challenges

 

  • Islands are not included in each country.
  • A country consisting of several islands like Japan, Countries that are at risk of breakdown by morphology were excluded.
  • There are four spots on each map with metal clusters, and four magnets per spot.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

  • You can check my page of Facabook and Youtube

story_txt:
Short Summary of Wood Nations

 

Wood Nations is made of Pine wood (Its not from a MDF or a sliced veneer) 
It has map shape of a country or a continent and a total of 16 powerful magnets are built in.
Can get two miniature of same shape and two metal key rings too.
Variety choices are available. 


 
Colors
    

 
 
 
 
 
What We Need & What You Get
 

I've moved my career from financial market to make something i can see and touch few years ago. I'm concentrating thing from wood these days.
I have a small workroom for my job. Its about 21 square feet and hard to carry out the finishing work simultaneously with the timber cutting of course.
The funds primarily use wood purchases, cuts, and laser cuts to make Wood Nations. The rest will be spent on the next social campaign planning and execution through improving the working environment.



 
The Impact
 

I am an ordinary young man who likes to travel.
I still have good memories of Australia, which was a foreign country and it started with a little experience of travel to Spain.
Not just me, but many people There will be a country that has good memories, such as where I went and where I live. Somewhere I'd like to visit.
Meet new people and give you a new world I wondered if I could keep something that I should not lose.

 

Risks & Challenges
 

Islands are not included in each country.
A country consisting of several islands like Japan, Countries that are at risk of breakdown by morphology were excluded.
There are four spots on each map with metal clusters, and four magnets per spot.



 

 

Other Ways You Can Help
 

You can check my page of Facabook and Youtube

Facebook  https://www.facebook.com/pg/SeoulBoyofficial


Youtube  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6TBDwZ-AkQgStsovVDE2-w

story:
Short Summary

Our Goal is to create online marketplace for Farmers and help them sell their products directly to consumers,:

  • Consumers will get fresh products directly from Farmers.
  • Natural and Organic products without any chemical processing.
  • Support this campaign and get fresh farm products at your doorstep & give financial freedom to farmers.

In this digital age we want to make  agriculture business digital,  so are you  ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are looking for initial investment of $25000 to develop the platform.
  • Funds will be used for website development & farmers distribution centers. !
  • We really hope that you support this campaign to make a revolution in India and support Indian Farmers and Indian consumers to get the fresh farm products.
  • Each contribute will get fresh farm product directly from farmer to your doorstep and your name will be mentioned on the website in the contributes list.

The Impact

This Project will bring smile on the farmers faces:

  • Supporting this project you will be a part of this revolution.
  • We also have plans to provide funding to farmers for seeds etc.
  • We are a team of skilled  professionals, help us help farmers and consumers.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you are not working or student then also you can help us by spreading this campaign across the social media.
  • Please contribute a small amount to this campaign and bring smile of million of farmers also do not forget to share this campaign !

And that's all there is to it.

We really hope that you support this campaign to make a revolution in India and support Indian Farmers and Indian consumers to get the fresh farm products.
Each contribute will get fresh farm product directly from farmer to your doorstep and your name will be mentioned on the website in the contributes list.

Supporting this project you will be a part of this revolution.
We also have plans to provide funding to farmers for seeds etc.
We are a team of skilled  professionals, help us help farmers and consumers.

Other Ways You Can Help
If you are not working or student then also you can help us by spreading this campaign across the social media.
Please contribute a small amount to this campaign and bring smile of million of farmers also do not forget to share this campaign !
And that's all there is to it.
