story:
Neo is an internet connected toy delivering stories to kids and is 'Social'. For kids aged 2+, but anyone who loves stories could get Neo home.

 

                

 

We created 'Neo' a toy for kids to listen to stories and a companion mobile app for parents and family to create, share and discover new stories and connect with a community of parents who believe in the power of storytelling.

Kids listen to stories delivered by Neo without using a mobile app. Neo talks to kids and tells them jokes and trivia.

Connect Neo to your Home WIFI - with a simple one-time setup process using our app.

 

It is easy to send a story to Neo.

Record your own story - Record a story in your own voice on our mobile app and send it to Neo over the internet.

OR

Pick a story from the app - Pick a story from our mobile app and Neo will narrate it to your child. These stories are pre-recorded audio books by storytellers.  

 

Neo downloads and delivers stories to kids - Neo can talk and tells kids it has a new story. Kids press a button on Neo to listen to new stories.

 

 

 

  I think it's a great idea. Makes it easier on single parents to have an aide to help tuck their kids in at bedtime.  - Chris, Dad.

 I am glad that you have come with a toy rather than using cell phone app directly for kids  - Ekta, Mother.

 I am a pilot and am not usually home for bedtime stories. This can help me read my kids bedtime stories when I am travelling" - Samir, Dad 

 

Playing with physical toys helps spark kids imagination, nurtures their social and creative skills.

Today's toys need to be smart to interest kids and keep up with the new digital experiences. That does not mean every toy needs to morph into a mobile phone or a tablet. 

We were inspired by the 90's cult hit ‘Toy Story’ characters and brought alive Social Toys, toys on the internet with an explicit human connection.

Social toys help re-kindle the connection with 'digital' kids and connect the entire family.

Storytelling has always been at the core of parenting and fuels the power of imagination in a child.

Neo the monster takes it one step forward helping the child bond with family despite the modern day pressures of time and physical availability.

Every family has  stories to be passed on to the next generation. There are so many beautiful undiscovered stories even today. We want to bring together a community of story tellers and parents who believe in story telling. With Neo they can create and share new stories with the community.

 

We prototyped 'Neo' using off the shelf components in early 2015. The next year and half was spent creating a delightful, stable, safe and manufacturable product.

Our team went through multiple iterations of the electronic board design and selection of components.

After we developed the electronics, we worked with the toy designer duo of Suhasini Paul and Paul Sandip to design the character and used prototyping techniques like 3D printing, CNC milling to create the physical prototype.

 

We successfully carried out a small batch production of 40 units of the toy in 2016 to put our assumptions to test.

Late 2016 we tested these toys with interested users as a part of our beta test and incorporated their feedback to improve the product.

We are now ready to take the design and the electronics to the manufacturers for production.

All we need is your help to make this campaign successful.

    

 

 

We have taken the utmost care to not collect any information unless its absolutely necessary for the purpose of a feature of the toy.

No information shall be collected without the consent of parents.

We do not store any information about kids as we understand, kids privacy needs to be respected.

Parents have complete control over any information we collect and we promise to be transparent about it.

We have worked with internet security specialists to ensure security and safety of the toy and we are always committed to this cause.  

 

The funds cover the initial cost of production of the toys. Toys will be manufactured by a process called injection moulding. For this process we will need to first carry out tooling and creation of moulds. The production then begins by using these moulds to create the toys.

We will also purchase electronic components with the funds for the units to be shipped to backers. Funds will also be utilised for assembly, testing and packaging, to deliver the toys to you.

We are carrying out all the electronic certifications now. A small part of the funds will be used for product related certifications.

 

 

 

          

Like our product? Help us by telling your friends about us on your social network.

           

   

 

     

The Team - (Left to Right) Piyush, Amit & Jayesh

Amit Deshpande - Co-Founder 

Amit has spent more than 15 years in the software industry. His experience spans across software product companies and digital agencies in India and the UK. He has architected award winning digital products for leading consumer brands. His experience with creating instant messaging products and developing software for embedded devices found him his new passion—Internet connected hardware products.

Amit is a tinkerer always experimenting with new tech, an avid reader and loves music and sports.

Piyush Supe - Hardware Engineer

Piyush is a roboticist. He completed his Masters in Mechatronics from New Castle University, UK. In his spare time, he loves to hack his way through a hardware product.

Piyush is an avid sports fan, foodie and loves electronics and hardware.

Jayesh Jain - Full stack Engineer

Jayesh is a software engineer and creates web products, mobile apps and tools for data analytics. Though, he is an electronics engineer his passion lies in developing software products.

He is a traveller, hiker and curious about spiritualism and cultures.

 

       

Our advisors guide and counsel us .

  Sandip Maiti - Co-Founder & Advisor

Sandip is also a Co-Founder of a large independent Digital Agency in India. He is an avid technologist with over 15 years of marketing experience in USA & India.

  Mausumi Sircar - Advisor, Artist

Mausumi is the 'first user' for all our toy prototypes. She is a creative partner who advises us on design, content and brings to light the concerns and pain points of parents. She is an artist and pursues her passion of painting simultaneously. 

 

      

What material is the toy made of?

The body is made of ABS and some parts out of food grade silicon - both are kids safe

Why WIFI and not bluetooth?

We wanted to connect family and grandparents who may be far away and not staying in the same home, city or in different countries,

How long does it take to full charge the Battery?

About 5 hours for a full charge. 

What is play time for a complete charge cycle?

3 hours of non stop playing stories and a standby time of 9 hours.

Can kids send voice messages?

Not in this version, we have not added any mic or a listening device on the toy.

How many people can send stories to Neo?

Any number depending on how many you invite and give permission to send a story.

All about Claiming Perks

https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...

 

       

All refunds processed as per Indiegogo's policies.

To summarise, refunds can be processed when the campaign is on and if the chosen perk has not been closed.

For details please see

https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/526876-Refunds

https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/213172367

story:
GENII: The smarter smart-home solution

Imagine being able to control every device in your home - no matter where you are in the world. You could:

  • Increase your home’s security by switching on your lights and TV when you’re out of town. 
  • Have your house give you a warm welcome by turning up the thermostat during your commute home.
  • Do the kids want to play in the yard? No problem: you can turn off your sprinklers - even if you’re at work.
  • And of course: get rid of the clutter on your coffee table by putting all of those remotes right inside your phone.

Genii is the first smartphone-based universal remote that’s truly universal: it not only controls hundreds of thousands of devices, it controls them no matter where you are on the planet.

How does it work?

Up till now, even the smartest smart-home solutions had one major drawback: they only worked when you were actually inside your house. Genii changes all that. Instead of relying solely on short-range communication technologies such as Bluetooth and infrared, Genii uses the internet to connect to your home from anywhere.

Setting Genii up is a breeze:
  1. Place a Genii on the device you want to control (we support pretty much anything that uses a remote) and connect the Genii Hub to your home network.
  2. Run a quick setup in our easy-to-use app - and that’s it!

Tech Specs

Meet the Team

Our team of 20 engineers has decades of experience in developing mobile technologies in the private sector, creating products that are being used daily all over the world. We’ve made hotel doors that open when they sense a guest’s mobile, ATMs that use your phone instead of a card, and subway stations where your mobile is your ticket. In fact, if you’ve travelled somewhere recently, you probably used some of our tech without even realizing it.

Throughout it all, our dream has always been to take the technologies we developed and use them to make something that’ll revolutionize the home lives of everyone, everywhere. As geeks, we’ve played with more than a few smart-home devices and universal remotes. We realized that while there some good products out there, none of them gave us everything we wanted - which is why we decided to make one ourselves.

Questions and Answers

Is this for real?

Totally.

What’s the Genii Hub?

The Genii Hub is our “dispatcher.” Plug it in to an electrical outlet anywhere in your home and connect it to your WiFi. Once it’s online, it can take orders from your phone over the internet. Those orders are then sent via Bluetooth to the Geniis.

What are the Geniis?

The Geniis relay orders to your devices. They do this by shooting out infrared beams - just like your remotes do.

So for example, if you wanted to control your TV with our app, you’d stick a Genii either on it or near it (the Geniis need to “see” the devices’ infrared receiver). The Geniis are battery operated, with battery life estimated at around two years.

So I’m in China, and I want to turn my TV on in San Jose. Give me the blow-by-blow.

Sure. You launch the Genii app on your phone and select the TV tab. Here, you tap “On,” just as you would if you were using your remote back home.

Using either WiFi or a data connection, our app establishes a link with the Genii Hub you’ve installed back at your place. The Genii Hub gets the request, and sends it by Bluetooth to the appropriate Genii. In this case, it’s the one that you placed on your TV.

The Genii gets the request from the Hub and sends an infrared beam to your TV, turning it on. Mission accomplished: now anyone passing by your house will think you’re right at home.

Can I use the phone app to control the Geniis directly?

You can indeed - but without a Genii Hub, your phone will need to be within Bluetooth range of the Geniis.

How many Geniis will I need?

That depends on how many devices you want to control. Each Genii can communicate with a single device.

What about Genii Hubs?

You’ll only need one of those. Since the Genii Hub uses Bluetooth, it can communicate with Geniis that are anywhere nearby - line-of-sight is not required. (Other smart-home hubs fire IR beams, which means they can only control the devices they can “see” - i.e., forget about turning the TV upstairs on).

What does the standard Genii package come with?

Our standard package comes with the Genii Hub and 3 Geniis. The app will be available on Google Play and iTunes (at no extra charge, of course).

You can also purchase a package without the hub - i.e., 3 Geniis. See our perks for prices.

What colors does Genii come in?

An elegant white or a stylish black.

story:
The Lustrous Mirror by Pose: Revolutionizing Entertainment for Everyone

 

The Mirror comes in two different sizes, 49" and 55".

 

​The Mirror by Pose is a smart mirror that does it all:

  • Video chat with others

  • Take pictures and videos

  • Stream movies and TV shows on Netflix, Hulu, Disney+ and more

  • Stream music from Spotify, Apple Music, Pandora and more

  • Play video games

  • Browse social media, such as Facebook, Instagram and TikTok

 

Browsing Instagram

 

Streaming Apple Music

 

Add LED Lights

Add LED lights to the Mirror and build your own world!

 

What does the Mirror have?

It has a 12MP camera, and a luminous, high-resolution screen, with a sleek aluminum frame. The Mirror comes with an HDMI input port to connect and display the output from different devices. It also has two USB ports and one power button. The Mirror can also connect to the Wi-Fi, allowing you to browse the internet for the latest cat video, watch the newest Netflix release (on a high-resolution screen), and follow your favorite celebrity on Instagram. It has Bluetooth, as well, so you can connect your wireless earphones and listen to music.

 

Why we're here:

We are currently in the prototype phase, closely approaching the production phase. We are looking to raise enough money to finish the development of the Mirror. We would like to finish creating software that will help further simplify life for our customers in amazing ways!

 

Risks & Challenges

When starting a new company, there are many risks that comes with the adventure. Although we try to plan for any obstacles that may come our way, we are all vulnerable to unforeseen hurdles. One of the obstacles we may incur is the time it takes to develop the software. If the development of the software takes longer than expected, it could push the delivery time back. If this happens, we are willing to give a discount on the product to the customers who purchased the device during this campaign. But we will work very hard to stay on schedule. Another obstacle we may face is the supplier may run into unforeseen issues that slows down production, or even bring it to a stop. Sometimes, these issues can't be helped, but we are willing to work with our customers on the best resolution for everyone involved.

If you back us, we guarantee we will deliver you a great product.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you aren't able to donate at this time, you can make a big difference by sharing this project with your friends and help get the word out about us!
story_txt:
The Lustrous Mirror by Pose: Revolutionizing Entertainment for Everyone
 
The Mirror comes in two different sizes, 49" and 55".
 

​The Mirror by Pose is a smart mirror that does it all:

Video chat with others
Take pictures and videos
Stream movies and TV shows on Netflix, Hulu, Disney+ and more
Stream music from Spotify, Apple Music, Pandora and more
Play video games
Browse social media, such as Facebook, Instagram and TikTok

 
Browsing Instagram

 
Streaming Apple Music

 
Add LED Lights

Add LED lights to the Mirror and build your own world!
 
What does the Mirror have?
It has a 12MP camera, and a luminous, high-resolution screen, with a sleek aluminum frame. The Mirror comes with an HDMI input port to connect and display the output from different devices. It also has two USB ports and one power button. The Mirror can also connect to the Wi-Fi, allowing you to browse the internet for the latest cat video, watch the newest Netflix release (on a high-resolution screen), and follow your favorite celebrity on Instagram. It has Bluetooth, as well, so you can connect your wireless earphones and listen to music.
 

Why we're here:
We are currently in the prototype phase, closely approaching the production phase. We are looking to raise enough money to finish the development of the Mirror. We would like to finish creating software that will help further simplify life for our customers in amazing ways!
 

Risks & Challenges
When starting a new company, there are many risks that comes with the adventure. Although we try to plan for any obstacles that may come our way, we are all vulnerable to unforeseen hurdles. One of the obstacles we may incur is the time it takes to develop the software. If the development of the software takes longer than expected, it could push the delivery time back. If this happens, we are willing to give a discount on the product to the customers who purchased the device during this campaign. But we will work very hard to stay on schedule. Another obstacle we may face is the supplier may run into unforeseen issues that slows down production, or even bring it to a stop. Sometimes, these issues can't be helped, but we are willing to work with our customers on the best resolution for everyone involved.
If you back us, we guarantee we will deliver you a great product.

Other Ways You Can Help
If you aren't able to donate at this time, you can make a big difference by sharing this project with your friends and help get the word out about us!

story:
Water, Water Everywhere

70% of the Earth is covered in water. We all learn this statistic when we are still kids, along with another one: we are 70% water as well. On this planet and inside every creature that calls it home, water reigns supreme. There is no denying its ubiquity. At the same time, though, the form of water that we refer to when we are talking about water the drink – freshwater – is incredibly limited. Just 2.5% of all water is freshwater, and less than half of that is readily accessible. The science behind these concepts is sound, and for anyone who has been paying even cursory attention to recent developments in ecological science, they are concepts that give us pause.

 

A Stark Reality

While most people today can obtain safe drinking water with relative ease, this is not something that we can take for granted. The population is growing, pollution has reached record heights, and water prices rise every year without fail. Disaster lurks forever just around the corner, the prices mere cents on the gallon away from throwing our society into crisis. This is an unspoken horror among government officials and large corporations: we don't know how long our current water supply can last us or how urgently we need to take action. What we do know is that if we were doing right by the people of Earth, we would have taken steps to legislate water conservation years ago. Barring that, we need to get creative.

 

Innovating for the Future

Creativity, as far as we are concerned, comes down to innovation. The technology that we have relied upon for decades falls far short of what we need to safeguard our collective future. Unless we take bold measures, we are setting up the generations to come for severe destruction, the likes of which they may not be able to overcome. It is no exaggeration that the future of humanity rests in our hands right now. We are at a crossroads, one path leading into darkness and the other into abundance. We can do the right thing, but it is going to require intelligence and stark choices.

 

Introducing: Water Security System

Our solution is a patented smart system that we call the Water Security System. We have engineered this cutting-edge system for affordability and reliability, putting to good use our 60+ years of experience with valves and fittings manufacturing. Confident that this IoT tool will make an impact on water usage on a large scale, we intend to help people become more aware of the water they are using on their property and avoid wasting water whenever possible – all while preventing costly water damage from leaks, dripping, and pipe ruptures.

 

How It Works

The Water Security System provides complete stability for water in your home, condominium, or office. We have designed this system to be intuitive, and there are four different versions of the system.

  1. Flow-Base: This system is the most powerful one, monitoring all the water that comes into the property and automatically shut-off the main water source whenever there is a leak or an unusual water flow. It will protect your entire property, sending notifications to your smartphone whenever there is an issue or a status change.
  2. Multi-Point: This system works with water sensors installed on the floor, strategically positioned near appliances and plumbing fixtures that use water. The sensors cause the main water source to shut-off any time they detect water, protecting your property and sending a notification to your smartphone.
  3. Point of Use: This system monitors individual appliances and plumbing fixtures. You hard-wire the sensor (much more comfortable than it sounds) into the appliance or fixture – a washing machine, a water heater, a dishwasher, or an ice machine – and it will cause the main water source to shut-off when it detects a leak, sending a notification to your smartphone.
  4. Water Sensor: The Water Sensor is the option for our cost-conscious customers. It's easy to install and battery-operated, sounding an alarm whenever it detects water, reducing water damage by alerting you to leaks while you are in your property.

 

A Miracle for Property Managers and Property Owners

The Property Manager Dashboard that we have designed for the Water Security Solution makes it easy to track and analyze water usage. Within the dashboard, you can simulate water consumption based on data gathered in real-time, access, open, and close valves remotely; and take charge of water security once and for all, heading off issues before they turn into a giant, costly problems. For any property manager who has experienced water damage (or heard tales of water damage from their colleagues), this solution is nothing short of a miracle.

Check it out for yourself:

 

 

Fostering Better Habits

Because the Water Security System encourages water conservation indirectly, it qualifies as a form of "nudging," reinforcing positive behavior over time. We are putting property managers and property owners entirely in charge of water usage for the first time, and we believe that level of accountability will elicit more responsible stewardship of the resource we have taken to calling blue gold. There is no telling just how significant an impact this solution could have, and we have set our sights on turning this into a movement, empowering people everywhere to recognize the realities of potable water and why it is so vital for us to become more aware of its limited quantity.

 

Water Security Solution – Good for You, Good for the Planet

The way that we see it, we are charting a way out of this era and into a new era – one property at a time.

We appreciate all your support, both monetary and non-monetary, and we thank you for taking the time to read about what we are doing.

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

Working hard on this project for several years, we are finally ready to launch it. We are not ignorant of all the challenges that we are going to face, though. We know that we need to set up a proper sales network and customer support team, and to do that, we need to raise some start-up capital. Our goal through this campaign is to raise $ 75.000, and every dollar that we raise brings us one step closer to that goal.


To say thanks to everyone who makes a contribution to this campaign, we are offering some exciting rewards, including merchandise branded with the Water Security Solution logo and early access to any of our four Water Security Solution systems.

Contribute now and help us bring the Water Security Solution to as many homes, condominiums, and offices as we can!

story:
BRAND

 

We are a brand seeking beauty of life through genuine fragrances - Based in Seoul, all of our natural ingredients are directly imported from Grasse, France. 

All of these fragrances are carefully blended and recreated into our signature collection by visually-impaired perfumers in Studio L'OLFACTIF SEOUL.

 

GOLD STONE DIFFUSER

 

 

 

7 SCENTS - 7 MOODS

 

 

PERKS

 

REAL REVIEWS 

 

PRESS

 

 

OUR OATH

We do not negotiate our beliefs in fair trade, customers' health & safety, and a rightful procedure of making our products with anything for a larger profit. 

 

CHALLENGES

L'OLFACTIF is a dedicated social venture which strives to make pleasant changes for those who are in social blind spots. Most of our employees are somewhat challenged in their physical condition - And we do annually provide career education programs for those who are in need. 

 

PROCESS

We probably cannot change the world.

But, SOMEONE's LIFE CAN SURELY BECOME DIFFERENT

by OUR SMALL EFFORTS and INTERESTS.

story:
Overview

 

I am carolyn Patterson-bynum. Next, I will bring a moido Western kitchen machine, multi-function cooking pot that everyone can become a Michelin three-star chef.

 

MOIDO is smart, with 20 applications, and can cook for you.

You can choose from delicious recipes and remotely monitor your cooking situation, so that you are no longer a slave to the kitchen.

Of course, MOIDO can also be used as a traditional cooker when needed. It is compatible with all types of stoves, is energy efficient and has a beautiful appearance.


MOIDO is the smartest cooker in the world.

We are ready for mass production in our state-of-the-art manufacturing facility.

With it, everyone can become a Michelin, three-star chef

Smart menu,
Simulate the Michelin chef technique,
20 modes,
19 of them are automatic modes, no preheating is required. After confirming the selection, it will be intelligently locked and cooked automatically.
1. Low temperature cooking
2.DIY
3. Ecological stew
4. Steak
5. Slight boiling extraction
6. Lamb chops
7. Stew
8.Pork chop
9. Oatmeal
10.Chicken
11.Vegetarian
12.Salmon
13. Pancakes
14.Fish
15. Cookies
16.Frying
17. Sandwich
18.Jam
19. Cake
20. Thaw
*Except for "DIY", all other functions are automatic

story:
Although smart devices and the internet of things have been around for quite some time now, it has never been truly affordable to invest in such products. Aria tackles these issues by offering affordable smart devices equipped with top quality functionality. With Aria you will no longer have to browse endlessly through different companies looking for the right product, as our wide catalog of products will be sure to meet your requirements. 

We Have Also Been Certified by Arrow.com Engineers!

Arrow Electronics guides innovation forward for over 200,000 of the world’s leading manufacturers of technology used in homes, business and daily life. With our Arrow certification badge, you can be assured that our technology is verified and feasible for manufacturing.

 

Yes, we know what you're thinking; Aren't there already solutions and companies dealing with smart home systems? And to be honest, yes there are. However, Aria is nothing like other companies out there. We truly care about our community.

There are 3 main aspects that Aria focuses on to deliver the best smart products in the market:

  1. Fully Functional Products
  2. Beautifully Designed Products
  3. Low Cost/Affordable Products

 

Functional Products

Most of the solutions out there focus on one main thing, and that is to deliver a functional product. This is of course the most important aspect of a smart product, as it has to work and perform the whole set of features it is designed to. However, we believe that many companies take advantage of this aspect and end up charging homeowners for features that should be straightforward.

A smart light bulb, for example, is meant to have some standard features such as being dimmable or remotely controlled. But making these features certainly does not justify the high price of some existing light bulbs out there. There is no reason to spend $50 on a single light bulb and we noticed that these high price tags were stopping many homeowners from making their homes smart. Our products are carefully designed to meet our functionality requirements, as well as maintaining a level of sophistication that is worthy of showcasing in your home. 

 

Beautifully Designed

There are also other products out there that provide the required functionality but compared to our standards, they do a poor design execution. We are strong believers that presentation is a very important aspect of every product and for that reason we have taken extra time to carefully design all of our products. We want to offer products that you will be proud of owning, and not something that just performs a set of functions. 

This is what differentiates Aria from other competitive products as we design our products to be showcased and displayed, and not hidden away because they are bulky, basic or simply dull. Not only does Aria offer a wide variety of products, but also with its modern and elegant design you will no longer have to do a trade-off between design and functionality.

 

Our Products Are Affordable!

The main goal of Aria is not only to offer beautiful and functional products, but also offer them at a very low cost. We do not believe in over-charging or making our customers have to spend in additional equipment to make their products work. We believe that whatever comes in the box should already be plug-and-play and ready to go. For this reason all of Aria's products work via WiFi and most importantly without a hub. And even better, our products are up to half the price than other products on the market right now. 

As a sample use case, picture yourself upgrading the light bulbs in your bedroom with smart light bulbs. You want to pick multi-color lights to be able to set the lighting in your bedroom to different colors. An average bedroom has 5 light bulbs, so doing this calculation:

 

 

We Are The Complete Solution

Aria is meant to be your last stop to make your home modern. Why are you going to spend time and effort looking for the best deal or lowest-cost products if Aria already offers that to you. Sure you can look around and find smart devices that are affordable, but you will end up buying different products, all from different companies, all manufactured in different places and worst of all they all come with their own software or proprietary app. Aria solves all of these issues by offering a wide range of products, at the most affordable price and the best user experience. And best of all, our apps work with every major operating system and smart assistants.

 

 

With our blend of minimalist and modern approach to design, not only will you have a smart product that will perform all the functionalities you are looking for, but you will also own a product that can be displayed as elegant decor around your home. With Aria you will have the ability to build a truly unique modern home, bringing together design and functionality without breaking the bank.

 

Our products do not require a hub for you to take control of your home. This is what sets us apart from many other smart products out there which require you to purchase a separate hub in addition to paying for your smart products. All of Aria's smart products will be fully functional by simply connecting them to a WiFi connection and pairing them to our mobile application environment. You can then remotely control them through our mobile apps which will help you detach from physically controlling your devices.

 

Ambient Sensor

Ember

Get an accurate temperature reading of any room in your home with Ember. Not only will it be able to sense the current temperature of its surroundings but it will also sense the current humidity level and record that as well. And while connected to our mobile application environment, you can setup triggers to control another of our smart devices or simply send you a notification when the temperature drops to a very low threshold.

 

 

Smart Plug 

Binary

As the smart product that every home owner should have, this smart plug will allow you to toggle on/off even your most demanding appliances. With support for up to 10 amps, Binary offers a very simple setup and direct functionality. Simply plug it in, pair it and start using it. 

 

 

Multi-Color Light Bulb

Spectrum

Get a hold of the complete color spectrum with this color adjustable light bulb. Adjust the ambiance color to match your mood with over 16 million color options plus hundreds of shades of white. Change the look and feel of any room. Perfect for ambiance lighting and setting the perfect mood anywhere in your home.

 

 

Daylight Light Bulb

Kelvin

Make your lighting setup smart with this dimmable, color temperature adjustable light bulb. Adjust the ambiance to your choosing, going from warm amber to cool daylights and anything in between. Or simply stick to a white natural lighting and set the perfect lighting mood to match your day.

 

 

Smart LED Strip Controller

Hue Dial

With this sleek and functional smart dial you will be able to accurately adjust the color of any 12 volt or 24 volt LED strip. Use it with our LED strips or simply connect some of your own, the restrictions are non-existent. With its easy to use nature, the dial will allow you to control any RGB, RGBW or single-channel LED strip by simply rotating the dial to change the hue, intensity or saturation. It can also be paired to our mobile application environment and you will be able to set the ambiance of any room remotely and without effort.

 

 

                                                                                                                                                                                 

 

Aria's software has been developed with portability in mind. Since its inception, we have focused on letting the user control their home in any manner they want. This is the reason why we decided to make our application multi-platformed, which means that not only will you be able to use your smartphone/tablet and download our applications, but we will also deploy desktop applications to accompany the app. This way you can take full advantage of Aria using your smartphone, tablet, laptop or even desktop computer!

 

With simple usability in mind, Aria devices not only work with our mobile applications, but also with smart assistants. Have an Amazon Echo or Google Home? Not a problem! With skills created for both platforms, you can issue voice commands and take control any of your Aria smart devices. 

For the future:

  • Multiple language support is in the works, with Spanish voice commands rolling out first
  • Ability to work with Microsoft Cortana using our Windows Desktop app
  • Homekit support is also in the works

 

Aria will not only be a smart home platform, but an entire solution to modernize your home. With a wide variety of products in the works, our large catalog will offer a modern touch to each aspect of your home. By supporting us today you will be among the first to receive news about future products and special discounts on them as well. Don’t miss this opportunity!

And while connected to our mobile application environment, you can setup triggers to control another of our smart devices or simply send you a notification when the temperature drops to a very low threshold.



 
 
Smart Plug 
Binary
As the smart product that every home owner should have, this smart plug will allow you to toggle on/off even your most demanding appliances. With support for up to 10 amps, Binary offers a very simple setup and direct functionality. Simply plug it in, pair it and start using it. 



 
 
Multi-Color Light Bulb
Spectrum
Get a hold of the complete color spectrum with this color adjustable light bulb. Adjust the ambiance color to match your mood with over 16 million color options plus hundreds of shades of white. Change the look and feel of any room. Perfect for ambiance lighting and setting the perfect mood anywhere in your home.


 
 
Daylight Light Bulb
Kelvin
Make your lighting setup smart with this dimmable, color temperature adjustable light bulb. Adjust the ambiance to your choosing, going from warm amber to cool daylights and anything in between. Or simply stick to a white natural lighting and set the perfect lighting mood to match your day.

  
 
Smart LED Strip Controller
Hue Dial
With this sleek and functional smart dial you will be able to accurately adjust the color of any 12 volt or 24 volt LED strip. Use it with our LED strips or simply connect some of your own, the restrictions are non-existent. With its easy to use nature, the dial will allow you to control any RGB, RGBW or single-channel LED strip by simply rotating the dial to change the hue, intensity or saturation. It can also be paired to our mobile application environment and you will be able to set the ambiance of any room remotely and without effort.

  
 
                                                                                                                                                                                  Aria's software has been developed with portability in mind. Since its inception, we have focused on letting the user control their home in any manner they want. This is the reason why we decided to make our application multi-platformed, which means that not only will you be able to use your smartphone/tablet and download our applications, but we will also deploy desktop applications to accompany the app. This way you can take full advantage of Aria using your smartphone, tablet, laptop or even desktop computer! With simple usability in mind, Aria devices not only work with our mobile applications, but also with smart assistants. Have an Amazon Echo or Google Home? Not a problem! With skills created for both platforms, you can issue voice commands and take control any of your Aria smart devices. For the future:
Multiple language support is in the works, with Spanish voice commands rolling out first
Ability to work with Microsoft Cortana using our Windows Desktop app

Homekit support is also in the works
 Aria will not only be a smart home platform, but an entire solution to modernize your home. With a wide variety of products in the works, our large catalog will offer a modern touch to each aspect of your home. By supporting us today you will be among the first to receive news about future products and special discounts on them as well. Don’t miss this opportunity!

story:
Forte Flex  team members all share the same vision for our company’s culture in that we pursue a high quality of life for animals and have compassion for those that are suffering. Our excellent, quality-infused products will enhance their lives and bring relief to their owners as they see their suffering reduced. Founder, Cherie Hecht, has worked for the past 20 years in the health and rehabilitation of sport horses and canines. During the past eight years, she has been formulating and producing health products for the equine industry. In addition, the past six years have also been spent developing a canine formula, and trialing it with multiple dogs of all ages, breeds, and conditions. We are now officially ready to launch this life-changing product on the market!

 

 

Introducing Forte Flex K9, the very first canine supplement that works to support the entire leg system not just the joints! Most products are designed to support the health of the synovial fluid and cartilage in the joint only. Our product focuses on all of the components involved in the stabilization and mobility of the limb. This includes the effects from muscle injuries, hip dysplasia, CrCL (canine ACL) injuries, as well as arthritis.

 

 

Does My Dog Need Forte Flex?

Forte Flex K9 is also used to prevent against arthritis and soft tissue damage in all active dogs including:

  • High active dogs
  • Working dogs 
  • Security dogs
  • Dogs who do sports and compete

Forte Flex K9 is not just for dogs suffering from arthritis and soft tissue injuries. ForteFlex K9 provides the nutrients to help keep the joints healthy before damage can occur. If also provides the needed proteins to help keep cartilage, tendons, ligaments and muscles strong and pliable! Forte Flex K9 also reduces free radicals from the tissue which attack joints and cause the break down of cartilage.

Forte Flex K9 is beneficial for the following issues:
•    Arthritis
•    Mobility Issues & discomfort
•    Inflammation
•    Hip and Knee Dysplasia
•    ACL Strains and Ruptures
•    Over-all Stiffness
•    Increased Energy
•    Joint Health
•     Muscle Strains & Tears
•     Free Radical Damage
•     Skin Health

•    Prevents against arthritis & soft tissue damage

 

Dogs that took Forte Flex K9 in test trials saw improvement in comfort, mobility, and over-all happiness in under 30 days. Every single dog in the trials saw a significant improvement in over-all comfort and mobility than that provided by the current joint supplement they were on. Many of the dogs were able to cease prescription drugs for pain management while on Forte Flex K9.

 

 

 

After all the research, testing, going back to the drawing board, adjusting, and going back to the drawing board AGAIN, we are now officially ready to go into production! This is where you come in!! Manufacturing a product requires a large financial investment upfront and it is often months before a return-on-investment is seen. The funds provided by contributors pre-purchasing Forte Flex on this platform, will enable Forte Flex K9 to quickly go into production and onto the market! We could keep telling you how amazing this product is but instead let's just let the dogs speak for themselves!

 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are currently planning to raise $15,000 for manufacturing and marketing. If we raise more than requested, then additional product will be produced!

We will be offering a special price for Forte Flex K9 of only $28.00 per bottle. After launch, the cost will be $34.99. Each bottle contains 90 ct of  soft chews which equals anywhere from a 30-day supply to a 90-day supply depending on the size of your dog.

If three bottles of Forte Flex K9 are purchased, the price will be reduced to only $26.66 per bottle.

Buy a six-pack of Forte Flex K9 for $145 and save 30% off the retail price!

Don't have a dog? Want to help other pooches? We have three different options to purchase product to be donated to a shelter of your choice or to our local shelter here in Austin Texas.

If the entire goal is not achieved, your monies will be returned to you and we will have to wait just a bit longer before we can launch this amazing product on the market.

 

The Impact

Canine arthritis is not just an old dog affliction.  Osteoarthritis affects an estimated 20% of our canine pets over the age of one year, and commonly appears in hips, knees, elbows, shoulders, neck or back. Canines are now dealing with more soft tissue injuries and pain issues than ever before. Until now, there has not been an OTC product to address both arthritis and soft tissue damage.

Forte Flex K9 is formulated to address both joint and soft tissue issues specific to dogs. Most joint products on the market focus only on the joints. Ours is the only canine product designed to help with both joints and soft tissue damage.

  • Helps relieve discomfort with our proprietary blend of ingredients that work as a natural pain reliever and anti-inflammatory, while supporting the healing process of soft tissue.
  • Increases mobility in canines with pre-existing issues like arthritis, hip dysplasia, and ligament issues, such as ACL injuries
  • Studies show that dogs using Forte Flex K9 experience a visible change in mobility in under 30 days
  • Pre-purchasing Forte Flex K9 today will enable the production process to be put into place much more quickly, which means the product will be available to assist your pet much sooner.

 

 

 

So, Whats in it? 

 

 

 

 

How Long Will a Bottle Last Me? 

Each container holds 90 chewables  

Recommended Dosage:

  • Dogs 1-12 lbs: ½ - 1 chewable 
  • Dogs 12-30 lbs: 1 chewable 
  • Dogs 31-60 lbs: 2-3 chewable 
  • Dogs 61-100 lbs: 3 chewable 
  • Dogs 100 lbs + : 3-4 chewable 

 

Risks & Challenges

We are in the final stages for launch! We have spent six years working on perfecting the formula, testing and measuring the results, and overcoming the challenges of bringing an idea to reality. We have made it to the final step of manufacturing and distributing. Our risks are minimal. It is each and every one of you who shares our vision for premium health care for our pets that will help make this final step possible. The time to help end the suffering our pets may go through is now! Let's not wait any longer - let's put this premier product on the market now!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help! Don’t have a dog? The chances that you know someone who does are pretty good, so why don’t you share our campaign with them and, at the same time, help one more Forte Flex Fido get a chance to get his puppy-days back?

Check out our Indiegogo share tools and let your friends now about this great offer! You can also follow us on our social media platforms;
